item.name: All-Purpose Tool +1
entries: This simple screwdriver can transform into a variety of tools; com a acció, you can touch the item and transform it into any type of artisan's tool of your choice (see the "Equipment" chapter in the {@book Manual del Jugador|PHB} for a list of {@item eines d'artesania|PHB}). Whatever form the tool takes, you are proficient with it.
While holding this tool, Tens un +1 a the spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your conjurs d'artificier.

Com a acció, you can focus on the tool to channel your creative forces. Choose a cantrip that you don't know from any class list. durant 8 hores, you can cast that cantrip, and it counts as an artificer cantrip for you. Once this property is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Amulet of the Devout +1
entries: This amulet bears the symbol of a deity inlaid with precious stones or metals. While you wear the holy symbol, Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells.
While you wear this amulet, pots emprar Canalitzar Divinitat feature without expending one of the feature's uses. Once this property is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Arcane Grimoire +1
entries: While you are holding this leather-bound book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells, and Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your wizard spells.
You can use this book as a spellbook. A més, Quan empris el tret Recuperació Arcana, you can increase the number of spell slot levels you regain by 1.

item.name: Bloodwell Vial +1
entries: To attune to this vial, you must place a few drops of your blood into it. The vial can't be opened while your attunement to it lasts. If your attunement to the vial ends, the contained blood turns to ash. You can use the vial com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus spells while wearing or holding it, and Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your conjurs de sortiller.

A més, when you roll any Hit Dice to recover hit points while you are carrying the vial, you can regain 5 punts de sortilleria. This property of the vial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Moon Sickle +1
entries: This silver-bladed sickle glimmers softly with moonlight. While holding this arma màgica, Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with it, and Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your druid and ranger spells. A més, you can use the sickle com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus druid and ranger spells.
When you cast a spell that restores hit points, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the amount of hit points restored, provided you are holding the sickle.

item.name: Rhythm-Maker's Drum +1
entries: While holding this {@item drum|PHB}, Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your bard spells.
Com a acció, you can play the {@item drum|PHB} to regain one use of your Inspiració Bàrdica feature. This property of the {@item drum|PHB} no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper +1
entries: While holding this rod, Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your warlock spells.
A més, you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod. You can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Vareta del Mag de Guerra +1
entries: Mentre empunyis la vara, tens +1 a impactar amb conjurs. A més, ignores mitja cobertura quan tires per impactar amb conjurs.

A més, you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod. You can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Vareta del Mag de Guerra +3
entries: Mentre empunyis la vara, tens +3 a impactar amb conjurs. A més, ignores mitja cobertura quan tires per impactar amb conjurs.

item.name: Abracadabrus
entries: An abracadabrus is an ornate, gemstone-studded wooden chest that weighs 25 pounds while empty. Its interior compartment is a cube measuring 1½ feet on a side.

The chest té 20 càrregues. A creature can use an action to touch the closed lid of the chest and expend 1 of the chest's charges while naming one or more nonmagical objects (including raw materials, foodstuffs, and liquids) worth a total of 1 gp or less. The named objects magically appear in the chest, provided they can all fit inside it and the chest doesn't contain anything else. For example, the chest can conjure a plate of strawberries, a bowl of hot soup, a flagon of water, a stuffed animal, or a bag of twenty caltrops. Food and drink conjured by the chest are delicious, and they spoil if not consumed passades 24 hores. Gems and precious metals created by the chest disappear after 1 minute.

The chest recupera {@dice 1d20} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. If the item's last charge is expended, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the chest loses its magic (becoming an ordinary chest), and its gemstones turn to dust.

item.name: Absorbing Tattoo
entries: This tattoo incorporates designs that emphasize one color more than others. While the tattoo is on your skin, tens resistència al dany a type of associated with that color, as shown on the table below. El/la/li MM chooses the color or determines it randomly.

rows: Àcid
Green
Fred
Blue
Foc
Red
Força
White
Elèctric
Yellow
Necròtic
Black
Verí
Violet
Psíquic
Argent
Radiant
Or
Tro
Orange

entries.name: Absorbir Dany
entries: When you take dany del tipus escollit, you can use your reaction to gain immunity against that instance of the damage, and you regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage you would have taken. Once this reaction is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Àcid (vial)
entries: Com a acció, pots abocar els continguts del vial damunt d'una criatura a 5 peus d'abast. també el pots llançar fins a 20 peus, fent-lo esclatar. Sia com sia, fes un atac a distància contra la criatura o objecte (el vial es considera arma improvitzada). Si impacta, l'objectiu rep {@dice 2d6} de dany d'àcid.

item.name: Acid Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Adjustable Stilts
entries: The stilts take 1 minute to put on or remove. They increase the height of any humanoid wearing them by 2 to 5 feet. Each stilt weighs 8 pounds and is 1 foot long when fully collapsed.

item.name: Akmon, Hammer of Purphoros
entries: Purphoros's hammer works wonders and disasters, the god of the forge using it to craft ground-breaking marvels and dangerous inventions in equal measure. Purphoros rarely bestows Akmon on mortals but occasionally leaves it unattended at his forge in Mount Velus. When Purphoros does permit a mortal to use the hammer, it's usually so they might bring an important work into being, wreck a force of destruction, or forge something remarkable somewhere the god isn't welcome.

entries.name: Hammer of the Forge
entries: This magic warhammer grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. When you hit with an attack using it, l'objectiu rep un {@damage 3d10} extra de dany de foc.

entries.name: Blessing of the Forge
entries: If you are a worshiper of Purphoros, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: The hammer has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The hammer has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The hammer has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Purphoros, the hammer has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} properties.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Reforged
entries: While holding the hammer, tens resistència al dany de foc and are immune to {@condition exhaust}. Additionally, you have proficiency with smith's tools and have advantage on all ability checks made using them.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While the hammer is on your person, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells (save DC 18): {@spell animar objectes}, {@spell escalfar el metall}, {@spell fabricar}, {@spell arma màgica}, {@spell apedaçar}, {@spell esclatar}. Once you use the hammer to cast a spell, the spell can't be cast again from it until the next dusk.

entries.name: Destroying the Hammer
entries: To destroy the hammer, it must be taken to the realm of Tizerus, in the Underworld. There it must be coated in clay from the Mire of Punishment. The heat of the hammer hardens the clay, which fuses to it after one month. Once fully hardened, the clay-covered hammer must be swallowed and digested by a kraken.

item.name: Alchemical Compendium
entries: Acrid odors cling to this stained, heavy volume. The book's metal fittings are copper, iron, lead, silver, and gold, some frozen mid-transition from one metal to another. When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell engrandir/enxiquir}, {@spell descens de ploma}, {@spell carn a pedra}, {@spell forma gasosa}, {@spell arma màgica}, i {@spell polimorfia}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the transmutation school.

Com a acció, you can touch a nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried and spend a number of charges to transform the target into another object. For 1 charge, the object can be no larger than 1 foot on a side. You can spend additional charges to increase the maximum dimensions by 2 feet per charge. The new object must have a gold value equal to or less than the original.

item.name: Foc d'Alquimista (vial)
entries: Aquest líquid enganxifós s'encèn quan entra en contacte amb l'aire. Com a acció, pots llançar-lo fins a 20 peus d'abast, fent-lo esclatar. Fes un atac a distància contra la criatura o objecte, (considera-ho un atac improvitzat). Si impacta, l'objectiu rep {@dice 1d4} de dany de foc a l'inici de cada torn seu. La criatura afectada pot acabar aquest mal emprant la seva acció per apagar les flames (CD 10).

item.name: eines d'alquimista
additionalEntries: Materials d'alquímia enable a character to produce useful concoctions, such as acid or foc alquímic.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Materials d'alquímia include two glass beakers, a metal frame to hold a beaker in place over an open flame, a glass stirring rod, a small mortar and pestle, and a pouch of common alchemical ingredients, including salt, powdered iron, and purified water.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: Proficiency with materials d'alquímia allows you to unlock more information on {@skill Arcana} checks involving potions and similar materials.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: When you inspect an area for clues, proficiency with materials d'alquímia grants additional insight into any chemicals or other substances that might have been used in the area.

additionalEntries.name: Alchemical Crafting
entries: You can use this tool proficiency to create alchemical items. A character can spend money to collect raw materials, which weigh 1 pound for every 50 gp spent. El/la/li MM can allow a character to make a check using the indicated skill with advantage. Com a part d'un Descans Llarg, you can use materials d'alquímia to make one dose of acid, foc alquímic, antitoxina, oil, perfume, or soap. Subtract half the value of the created item from the total gp worth of raw materials you are carrying.

additionalEntries.caption: eines d'alquimista
rows: Create a puff of thick smoke
Identify a poison
Identify a substance
Start a fire
Neutralize acid

item.name: Gerra Alquímica
entries: This ceramic jug appears to be able to hold a gallon of liquid and weighs 12 pounds whether full or empty. Sloshing sounds can be heard from within the jug when it is shaken, even if the jug is empty.

You can use an action and name one liquid from the table below to cause the jug to produce the chosen liquid. Afterward, you can uncork the jug as an action and pour that liquid out, up to 2 gallons per minute. The maximum amount of liquid the jug can produce depends on the liquid you named.
Once the jug starts producing a liquid, it can't produce a different one, or more of one that has reached its maximum, until the next dawn.

rows: Àcid
8 ounces
Verí Bàsic
½ ounce
Beer
4 gallons

1 gallon
Mayonnaise

Oil
1 quart
Vinegar

item.name: Alexandrite
entries: A transparent dark green gemstone.

item.name: Amber
entries: A transparent watery gold to rich gold gemstone.

item.name: Amatista
entries: A transparent deep purple gemstone.

item.name: Amulet of dinosaur feathers (Imperi del Sol)
Amulet de Salut
entries: La teva puntuació de Constitució és 19 mentre vesteixis l'amulet. No té efecte si la teva puntuació de Constitució ja és 19 o superior.

item.name: Amulet Protector contra Detecció i Localització
entries: Mentre duguis l'amulet, ets invisible contra màgia d'{@filter endevinació|spells|school=D}. No pots ser objectiu d'aquest tipus de màgia i els escudrinyaments no et poden percebre.

item.name: Amulet of Protection from Turning
entries: While you wear this amulet of silver and turquoise, tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against effects that turn undead.

If you fail a saving throw against such an effect, you can choose to succeed instead. You can do so three times, and expended uses recharge daily at dawn. Each time an effect that turns undead is used against you, the amulet glows with silvery blue light for a few seconds.

item.name: Amulet of the Black Skull
entries: This amulet is carved from obsidian and shaped like a screaming humanoid skull, with ruby eyes and emeralds for teeth. It hangs from an iron chain necklace.

The amulet has 6 charges and regains {@dice 1d6} charges daily at dawn. While wearing the amulet, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges to transport yourself and anything you are wearing or carrying to a location within 100 feet of you. The destination you choose doesn't need to be in your line of sight, but it must be familiar to you (in other words, a place you have seen or visited), and it must be on the same plane of existence as you. This effect isn't subject to the magic restrictions placed on the Tomb of the Nine Gods; thus, the amulet can be used to enter and exit the tomb.

If you aren't undead, you ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 16) each time you use the amulet to teleport. On a failed saving throw, the black skull cackles as you are transformed in transit. The transformation takes effect as soon as you arrive at the destination, and is determined randomly by rolling percentile dice and consulting the Black Skull Transformation table.

entries.caption: Black Skull Transformation
rows: The symbol of {@creature Acererak|ToA} is burned into your flesh, a curse that can only be removed with a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic. Until the curse ends, your hit points can't be restored by magic.
You grow larger as if affected by an {@spell engrandir/enxiquir} spell, except the effect dura 1 hora.
You grow smaller as if affected by an {@spell engrandir/enxiquir} spell, except the effect dura 1 hora.
You arrive at the destination wearing nothing but the amulet of the black skull. Everything else that you were wearing or carrying appears in a random unoccupied space within 100 feet of you.
You are {@condition paralitzat} for 1 minute or until this effect is ended with a {@spell restabliment menor} spell or similar magic.
You become {@condition petrificat}. This effect can be ended only with a {@spell restabliment superior} spell or similar magic.

item.name: Amulet of the Drunkard
entries: This amulet smells of old, ale-stained wood. While wearing it, you can regain {@dice 4d4 + 4} hit points when you drink a pint of beer, ale, mead, or wine. Once the amulet has restored hit points, it can't do so again until the next dawn.

item.name: Amulet dels Plans
entries: Mentre duguis l'amulet, pots, com a acció, anomenar un lloc en un altre pla d'existència que t'és familar. Fes una tirada d'Intel·ligència (CD 15). Si superes, llances el conjur {@spell saltar de pla}. Si falles, tu i tota criatura a 15 peus de tu viatgeu a un lloc a l'atzar. Tira {@dice d100}. De 1 a 60, viatgeu a un lloc a l'atzar del pla que has anomenat. De 61 a 100, viatgeu a un pla d'existència a l'atzar.

item.name: Escut Animat
entries: Mentre duguis l'escut, pots dir la seva paraula màgica as a bonus action per a que s'animi. L'escut salta a l'aire i flota al teu espai; et protegeix com si l'empunyessis, però et deixa les mans lliures. L'escut roman animat: durant 1 minut; fins que n'acabis l'efecte com a acció bonus; fins que et quedis {@condition incapacitat}; o fins que moris. Llavors, l'escut cau al terra (o a la teva mà si en tens una de lliure).

item.name: Antitoxina (vial)
entries: Qui begui tot el vial té avantatge a salvar contra emmetzinament durant 1 hora.  No afecta a no-morts ni a constructes.

item.name: Aparell d'en Kwalish
entries: L'objecte té l'aparença d'un barril hermètic Gran d'unes 500 lliures. Té un ganxo amagat que es pot trobar amb una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) (CD 20). Si es treu obre el cul del barril i permet que 2 criatures (Mitjanes o menors) hi entrin de quatre grapes. L'interior té 10 palanques al fons en posició neutral i que poden moure's munt i avall. Quan s'utilitzen alguns l'aparell es transforma en forma d'un escamarlà gegant.
L'aparell d'en Kwalish és un objecte Gran amb el bloc d'estats següent:

items.name: Velocitat:
items.entry: 30 peus, 30 peus nadant (o 0 peus pels dos si les potes i la cua no estan exteses

items.name: Immunitat contra Dany:
items.entry: verí, psíqui

entries: L'aparell necessita 1 pilot per moure'l com un vehicle. Mentre el cul estigui tancat, l'interior és hermètic contra aire i aigua, i té 10 hores d'aire (parteix-lo pel número de criatures al seu interior).
L'aparell flota a l'aigua. Pot immergir-se fins a 900 peus sota l'aigua. Si s'endinsa més, rep {@damage 2d6} de dany contundent per minut degut a la pressió.

Tota criatura dins l'aparell pot, com acció, moure fins a 2 palanques amunt o avall. Al final de l'efecte, la palanca torna a la posició neutral. Cada palanca, d'esquerra a dreta, té la funció associada a la Taula d'Aparell d'en Kwalish.

entries.caption: Palanques de l'Aparell d'en Kwalish:
rows: Les potes i la Cua s'extenen. Permet caminar i nadar a l'aparell
Les potes i la Cua s'amaguen. La velocitat de l'aparell és 0 i no pot rebre velocitat d'altres efected.
Les persianes de davant s'obren.
Les persianes de davant es tanquen.
Les persianes dels costat s'obren (2 per banda).
Les persianes dels costat es tanquen (2 per banda).
Surten 2 pinces de davant de l'aparell.
Les pinces s'amaguen.
Cada pinça extesa fa aquest atac armat cos a cos: {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent.
Cada pinça extesa fa aquest atac armat cos a cos: {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h} L'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar).
L'aparell camina o nada cap endavant.
L'aparell camina o nada cap endarrere.
L'aparell es gira 90º cap a l'esquerra.
L'aparell es gira 90º cap a la dret.
Unes llums en forma d'ulls irradien llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.
Les llums s'apaguen.
L'aparell s'immergeix fins a 20 peus en un líquid.
L'aparell puja per fins a 20 peus en un líquid.
El cul s'obre.
El cul es tanca hermèticament.

item.name: Aquamarine
entries: A transparent pale blue-green gemstone.

item.name: Arcanaloth's Music Box
entries: This music box is made of dark wood with gold filigree. Each of its five sides is sculpted with the image of a horned woman playing a different instrument musical: a dulcimer, a flute, a harp, a lyre, and a viol. While touching the box, pots, com a acció, make it play music featuring one of the instruments shown, which can be heard fins a 60 peus away. You can also use an action to stop the music.

item.name: Arcane Canó
entries: This Large canó is imbued with magic. It requires no ammunition and doesn't need to be loaded. It takes one action to aim the canó and one action to fire it. After the canó has fired, it must recharge durant 5 minuts before it can be fired again.
The creature firing the canó chooses the effect from the following options:

entries.name: Acid Jet
entries: The canó discharges acid in a line 300 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A més, a creature that fails its saving throw takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn seu; a creature can end this damage by using its action to wash off the acid with a pint or more of water.

entries.name: Fire Jet
entries: The canó discharges fire in a line 300 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Qui falli rep 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. El foc encèn tot objecte inflamable dins de l'àrea que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

entries.name: Frost Shot
entries: The canó shoots a ball of frost to a point you can see within 1,200 feet of the canó. The ball then expands to form a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de fred, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet durant 1 minut. Qui superi en rep la meitat, and its speed isn't reduced. A creature whose speed is reduced by this effect can repeat the save al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Lightning Shot
entries: The canó shoots a ball of lightning to a point you can see within 1,200 feet of the canó. The lightning then expands to form a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Qui falli rep 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Creatures wearing metal armor have disadvantage on the save.

entries.name: Esprai de Verí
entries: The canó expels poison gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de verí i està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. Si supera, la criatura rep la meitat del dany i no està {@condition emmetzinat}. A creature {@condition emmetzinat} in this way can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Braç de Propulsió Arcana
item.reqAttune: by a creature missing a hand or an arm
entries: This prosthetic appendage was developed by artificers of House Cannith. To attune to this item, you must attach it to your arm at the wrist, elbow, or shoulder, at which point the prosthetic magically forms a copy of the appendage it's replacing.
While attached, the prosthetic provides these benefits:

items: The prosthetic is a fully capable part of your body.
You can take an action to remove the prosthetic, and it removes itself if your attunement to it ends. It can't be removed against your will.

The prosthetic is a magic melee weapon with which you're proficient. It deals {@dice 1d8} de dany de força on a hit and has the thrown property, with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When thrown, the prosthetic detaches and flies at the target of the attack, then immediately returns to you and reattaches.

item.name: Armadura d'Invulnerabilitat
entries: Tens resistència al dany no-màgic nonmagical mentre vesteixis l'armadura. A més, pots, com a acció, obtenir immunitat al dany no-màgic durant 10 minuts o fins que ja no vesteixis l'armadura. Quan empris aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Armadura de Vulnerabilitat (Contundent)
entries: Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens resistència al dany contundent.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: L'armadura està maleïda. Només es revelarà tal fet quan se li llanci el conjur {@spell identificar} o quan algú s'hi harmonitzi. Qui harmonitzi amb l'armadura patirà la maledicció fins que se li llanci el conjur {@spell anul·lar maledicció} o una màgia similar; desvestir l'armadura no treu la maledicció. Aquesta maledicció otorga vulnerabilitat als danys perforant i tallant.

item.name: Armadura de Vulnerabilitat (Perforant)
entries: Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens resistència al dany perforant.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: L'armadura està maleïda. Només es revelarà tal fet quan se li llanci el conjur {@spell identificar} o quan algú s'hi harmonitzi. Qui harmonitzi amb l'armadura patirà la maledicció fins que se li llanci el conjur {@spell anul·lar maledicció} o una màgia similar; desvestir l'armadura no treu la maledicció. Aquesta maledicció otorga vulnerabilitat als danys contundent i tallant.

item.name: Armadura de Vulnerabilitat (Tallant)
entries: Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens resistència al dany tallant.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: L'armadura està maleïda. Només es revelarà tal fet quan se li llanci el conjur {@spell identificar} o quan algú s'hi harmonitzi. Qui harmonitzi amb l'armadura patirà la maledicció fins que se li llanci el conjur {@spell anul·lar maledicció} o una màgia similar; desvestir l'armadura no treu la maledicció. Aquesta maledicció otorga vulnerabilitat als danys contundent i perforant.

item.name: Escut Atrapa-Fletxes
entries: Tens +2 a la CA contra atacs a distància mentre empunyis l'escut. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut. A més, quan un atacant fa un atac a distànca contra un objectiu a 5 peus de tu pots, com a reacció, esdevenir l'objectiu en lloc seu.

item.name: Sang d'Assassí
entries: Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 10). Si falla, rep 6 ({@dice 1d12}) de dany de verí i està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 24 hores. Si supera, la criatura rep la meitat del dany i no està {@condition emmetzinat}.

item.name: Astral Shard
entries: This crystal is a solidified shard of the Pla Astral, swirling with silver mist. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus conjurs de sortiller while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, immediately after casting the spell you can teleport to an unoccupied space que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast.

item.name: Astromancy Archive
entries: This brass disc of articulated, concentric rings unfolds into an armillary sphere. Com a acció bonus, you can unfold it into the sphere or back into a disc. When found, it contains the following spells, which are wizard spells for you while you are attuned to it: {@spell auguri}, {@spell endevinació}, {@spell find the path}, {@spell presagiar}, {@spell localitzar criatura}, i {@spell localitzar objecte}. It functions as a spellbook for you, with spells encoded on the rings.
While you are holding the archive, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The archive has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the archive, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the archive. The new spell must be of the divination school.

When una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge and force the creature to roll a {@dice d4} and apply the number rolled as a bonus or penalty (escull) to the original roll. You can do this after you see the roll but before its effects are applied.

item.name: Atlas of Endless Horizons
entries: This thick book is bound in dark leather, crisscrossed with inlaid silver lines suggesting a map or chart. When found, the book contains the following spells, which are wizard spells for you while you are attuned to the book: {@spell portal arcà}, {@spell porta dimensional}, {@spell portal}, {@spell pas boira}, {@spell saltar de pla}, {@spell cercle de teletransport}, i {@spell formular el retorn}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the conjuration school.

When you are hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge to teleport fins a 10 peus a un espai desocupat que puguis veure. If your new position is out of range of the attack, it misses you.

item.name: Axe Beak
entries: An {@creature axe beak}'s splayed toes allow it to run across snow, and it can carry as much weight as a mule. A domesticated axe beak can be purchased in Ten-Towns for 50 gp.

item.name: Axe of the Nannès Lords
entries: Seeing the peril his people faced, a young dwarf prince came to believe that his people needed something to unite them. Thus, he set out to forge a weapon that would be such a symbol.

Venturing deep under the mountains, deeper than any dwarf had ever delved, the young prince came to the blazing heart of a great volcano. With the aid of Moradin, the dwarven god of creation, he first crafted four great tools: the {@italic Brutal Pick}, the {@italic Earthheart Forge}, the {@italic Anvil of Songs}, and the {@italic Shaping Hammer}. With them, he forged the {@italic Axe of the Nannès Lords}.

Armed with the artifact, the prince returned to the dwarf clans and brought peace. His axe ended grudges and answered slights. The clans became allies, and they threw back their enemies and enjoyed an era of prosperity. This young dwarf is remembered as the First King. When he became old, he passed the weapon, which had become his badge of office, to his heir. The rightful inheritors passed the axe on for many generations.

Later, in a dark era marked by treachery and wickedness, the axe was lost in a bloody civil war fomented by greed for its power and the status it bestowed. Centuries later, the nans still search for the axe, and many adventurers have made careers of chasing after rumors and plundering old vaults to find it.

entries.name: Arma Màgica
entries: The {@italic Axe of the Nannès Lords} is a arma màgica that grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. The axe also functions as a {@item cinturó dels nans}, a {@item dwarven thrower}, and a {@item sword of sharpness}.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The axe has the following randomly determined properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental properties}

entries.name: Blessings of Moradin
entries: If you are a dwarf attuned to the axe, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You have immunity to poison damage.
The range of your {@sense visió de foscor} increases by 60 feet.
Tens competència amb artisan's tools related to blacksmithing, brewing, and stonemasonry.

entries.name: Conjure Earth Elemental
entries: If you are holding the axe, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell convocar elemental} spell from it, summoning an {@creature earth elemental}. You can't use this property again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Travel the Depths
entries: Pots, com a acció, touch the axe to a fixed piece of dwarven stonework and cast the {@spell teleportació} spell from the axe. If your intended destination is underground, there is no chance of a mishap or arriving somewhere unexpected. You can't use this property again until 3 days have passed.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: The axe bears a curse that affects any non-dwarf that becomes attuned to it. Even if the attunement ends, the curse remains. With each passing day, the creature's physical appearance and stature become more dwarflike. After seven days, the creature looks like a typical dwarf, but the creature neither loses its racial traits nor gains the racial traits of a dwarf. The physical changes wrought by the axe aren't considered magical in nature (and therefore can't be dispelled), but they can be undone by any effect that removes a curse, such as a {@spell restabliment superior} or {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell.

entries.name: Destroying the Axe
entries: The only way to destroy the axe is to melt it down in the {@italic Earthheart Forge}, where it was created. It must remain in the burning forge for fifty years before it finally succumbs to the fire and is consumed.

item.name: Azorius Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Azorius, allows you to cast {@spell atac captura}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Azorius's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Azorius Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Azorius guild
entries: This keyrune is carved from white marble and lapis lazuli to resemble a noble bird of prey. It can become a {@creature àguila gegant} for up to 1 hour. While the transformed eagle is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Com a acció, you can see through the eagle's eyes and hear what it hears fins el final del teu proper torn, and you gain the benefit of its keen sight. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature àguila gegant}. If there isn't enough space for the eagle, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the eagle takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Azuredge
entries: Forged by the archwizard Ahghairon, this intelligent battleaxe was crafted to defend Waterdeep. Its current wielder is a former member of Force Grey named {@creature Meloon Wardragon|WDH}, but the weapon is searching for a new owner.

Azuredge has a solid steel handle etched with tiny runes, wrapped in blue dragon hide with a star sapphire set into the pommel. The axe head is forged from silver, electrum, and steel alloys whose edges constantly shimmer with a deep blue luminescence.
Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. The {@spell escut} spell provides no defense against the axe, which passes through that spell's barrier of magical force.
When you hit a diastre or an undead with the axe, cold blue flames erupt from its blade and deal an extra 2d6 radiant damage to the target.

entries.name: Hurling
entries: The battleaxe té 3 càrregues. You can expend 1 charge and make a ranged attack with the axe, hurling it as if it had the thrown property with a normal range of 60 feet and a long range of 180 feet. Whether it hits or misses, the axe flies back to you at the end of the current turn, landing in your open hand or at your feet in your space (as you choose). The axe regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Illumination
entries: While holding the axe, pots, com a acció, cause the axe to glow blue or to quench the glow. This glow desprèn llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Azuredge is a sentient lawful neutral weapon with an Intel·ligència of 12, a Saviesa of 15, and a Carisma of 15. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.

The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Common. It has a calm, delicate voice. The weapon can sense the presence of non-lawful creatures within 120 feet of it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Azuredge is sworn to protect Waterdeep, and it desires to be wielded by a law-abiding person willing to dedicate everything to the city's defense. The weapon is patient and takes its time finding its ideal wielder.

If someone tries to use Azuredge against its will, the axe can become ten times heavier than normal, and can magically adhere to any Medium or larger object or surface it comes into contact with. Once it does so, the axe can't be wielded. Nothing short of a {@spell desig} spell can separate the axe from the item or surface to which it is adhered without destroying one or the other, though the axe can choose to end the effect at any time.

item.name: Azurite
entries: An opaque mottled deep blue gemstone.

item.name: Baba Yaga's Mortar and Pestle
entries: The creations of the immortal hag Baba Yaga defy the laws of mortal magic. Among the notorious implements that cement her legend on countless worlds are the artifacts that propel her through the planes: Baba Yaga's Mortar and Pestle. These signature tools of Baba Yaga are a single artifact for purposes of attunement. Should the two objects become separated, the pestle appears next to the mortar at the next dawn.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: This artifact has the following random properties, which you can determine by rolling on the tables in the "Artifacts" section of the {@book Guia del Mestre de Masmorres|DMG}:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} properties
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property

entries.name: Properties of the Mortar
entries: The mortar is a Tiny wooden bowl. However, the mortar increases in size to accommodate anything you place inside, expanding-if there's enough space-up to Large size, meaning it can hold even a Large creature.

entries.name: Properties of the Pestle
entries: The pestle is a 6-inch-long, worn wooden tool. Once during your turn while you are holding the pestle, you can extend it into a quarterstaff or shrink it back into a pestle (no requereix acció). As a quarterstaff, the pestle is a arma màgica that grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci.

The pestle té 12 càrregues. When you hit with a melee attack using the pestle, you can expend up to 3 of its charges to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany de força for each charge expended. The pestle regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Perfect Eines
entries: While holding the mortar and pestle, pots, com a acció, say the name of any nonmagical plant, mineral, or fluid and an amount of the material worth 10 gp or less. The mortar instantly fills with the desired amount of that material. Once you use this action, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

You can also use the artifact as {@item materials d'alquímia|PHB}, {@item subministraments de cerveseria|PHB}, {@item utensilis de cuina|PHB}, an {@item kit d'herbalisme|PHB}, and a {@item kit de metzines|PHB}. Tens avantatge a tirades de any check you make using the artifact as one of these tools.

entries.name: Primal Parts
entries: As an action while the pestle and the mortar is within 5 feet of you, you can command the pestle to grind. For the next minute, or until you use your action to verbally command it to stop, the pestle moves on its own, grinding the contents of the mortar into a mush or fine powder that's equally useful for cooking or alchemy. A l'inici de cada torn teu, whatever is in the mortar rep {@damage 4d10} de dany de força. If this reduces the target's hit points to 0, the target is reduced to powder, pulp, or paste, as appropriate. Only magic items are unaffected. If you wish, when the pestle stops, you can have the mortar separate its contents-like powdered bone, crushed herbs, pulped organs-into separate piles.

entries.name: Traverse the Night
entries: If you are holding the pestle while you are inside the mortar, pots, com a acció, verbally command the mortar to travel to a specific place or creature.

You don't need to know where your destination is, but it must be a specific destination-not just the nearest river or a red dragon's lair. If the stated destination is within 1,000 miles of you, the mortar lifts into the air and vanishes. You and any creatures in the mortar travel through a dreamlike sky, with hazy reflections of the world passing by below. Creatures might see images of you streaking through the sky between your point of origin and the destination. You arrive at the location 1 hour later or, if it is night, 1 minute later.

entries.name: Bones Know Their Home
entries: When you command the mortar to travel, you can instead throw out the dust or paste of something ground by the mortar and name a location on a different plane of existence or a different world on the Material Plane. If that material came from a creature native to the named plane or world, the mortar travels through an empty night sky to an unoccupied space at that destination, arriving in 1 minute.

entries.name: Destroying the Mortar and Pestle
entries: The mortar and pestle are destroyed if they are crushed underfoot by the {@i Dancing Hut of Baba Yaga} or by Baba Yaga herself.

item.name: Baba Yaga's Pestle
entries: The pestle is a 6-inch-long, worn wooden tool. Once during your turn while you are holding the pestle, you can extend it into a quarterstaff or shrink it back into a pestle (no requereix acció). As a quarterstaff, the pestle is a arma màgica that grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci.

The pestle té 12 càrregues. When you hit with a melee attack using the pestle, you can expend up to 3 of its charges to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany de força for each charge expended. The pestle regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Motxilla
entries: Una motxilla pot dur 1 peu cúbic o 30 lliures de pes. També li pots enganxar objectes a l'exterior, com ara un sac de dormir o una corda.

item.name: Backpack Parachute
entries: A humanoid wearing this piece of gear can deploy the parachute as a reaction while falling, or as an action otherwise. The parachute requires at least a 10-foot cube of unoccupied space in which to deploy, and it doesn't open fast enough to slow a fall of less than 60 feet. If it has sufficient time and space to deploy properly, the parachute allows its wearer to land without taking falling damage. Once it has been used, the parachute takes 10 minutes to repack.

item.name: Badge of the Watch
entries: A badge of the Watch is given only to those who have earned the trust of the Open Lord of Waterdeep. The badge, signifying the rank of captain in Waterdeep's City Watch, bears the emblem of Waterdeep and is meant to be worn or carried.
While wearing the badge, tens +1 a la CA if you aren't using a {@item shield|phb}.

If the badge is more than 5 peus lluny de tu for more than 1 minute, it vanishes and harmlessly reappears on a surface within 5 feet of the Open Lord. While holding the badge, the Open Lord knows your location, provided the two of you are on the same plane of existence and your attunement to the badge hasn't ended.
Com a acció, the Open Lord can touch the badge and end your attunement to it.

item.name: Sac de Mongetes
entries: Dins d'aquesta bossa de tela densa hi ha {@dice 3d4} faves seques. Pesa ½ lliura i cada fava pesa ¼ de lliura.

Si n'aboques els continguts al terra, exploten en una esfera de 10 peus de radi centrada en les mongetes. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea (tu també) ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Qui falli rep {@dice 5d4} de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. El foc encèn tot objecte inflamable a l'àrea que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

Si treus una fava de la bossa, la plantes al terra (o a la sorra) i la regues, en sortirà un brot passat 1 minut. El/la/li MM: tria un efecte de la taula següent; n'escull un a l'atzar; o en crea un de nou.

rows: Broten {@dice 5d4} gripaus. Qui se'n mengi un ha de tirar un dau. Si surt senar, la criatura ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, rep {@dice 5d6} de dany de verí i esdevé {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora. Si surt parell, rep {@dice 5d6} punts de vida temporals durant 1 hora.
Esclata un guèiser i en surt aigua, cervesa, suc de gerds, te, vinagre, vi, o oli (el/la/li MM decideix) a 30 peus d'alçada durant {@dice 1d12} rondes.
Brota un {@creature treant}. Hi ha un {@chance 50} per cent de probabilitats que sigui caòtic malvat i que ataqui.

Surt una estàtua de pedra immòbil (però animada) similar a tu. T'amenaça verbalment. Si te'n vas i d'altres s'hi apropen, et descriu com la criatura més malfactora de totes i els incita a buscar-te i atacar-te. Si ets al mateix pla d'existència que l'estàtua, sap on ets. L'estàtua esdevé desanimada passades 24 hores.
S'encèn una foguera de flames blaves i dura 24 hores (o fins que algú l'apagui).
Broten {@dice 1d6 + 6} {@creature shrieker||shriekers}.

Surten {@dice 1d4 + 8} gripaus d'un rosa cridaner. Quan algú toca un dels gripaus aquest es transforma en una criatura Gran o menor (escull el/la/li MM). El monstre transformat roman durant 1 minut; llavors desapareix i es torna fum rosa.
Un {@creature bulette} famolenc surt i ataca.

Creix un arbre fruiter. Té {@dice 1d10 + 20} fruites: {@dice 1d8} d'aquestes fan de pocions màgiques a l'atzar, i 1 fa d'una poció màgica escollida per el/la/li MM. L'arbre s'esvaeix passada 1 hora. La fruita que es culli (i la màgia que pugui tenir) roman 30 dies.

Brota un niu amb {@dice 1d4 + 3} ous. Qui en mengi un ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 20). Qui superi incrementa en 1 la seva puntuació de característica més baixa (si hi ha un empat, es tria a l'atzar). Qui falli, rep {@dice 10d6} de dany de força d'una explosió màgica interna.

Una piràmide amb una base quadrada de 60 peus de costat emergeix del terra. A dins hi ha un sarcòfac que contè un {@creature senyor de les mòmies}. La piràmide és la llar del {@creature senyor de les mòmies}; el sarcòfag contè el seu tresor (escull el/la/li MM).

Brota una mongetera gegant de l'alçada que esculli el/la/li. A dalt hi ha un destí que escull el/la/li MM chooses, com ara un mirador esplèndid, el castell d'un {@creature cloud giant||cloud giant's} o un altre pla d'existència.

item.name: Bag of Bounty
entries: This is a sturdy leather sack with tiny Siberys shards embedded into the lining. If you have the Marcacollidora pots, com a acció, cast crear menjar i aigua, drawing a feast from within the bag. You shape this meal with your thoughts. You can create the standard bland fare without requiring any sort of check, but you can attempt to create finer food by making a Carisma check; if you're proficient with utensilis de cuina, add your bonus to this check. A failed check results in a sour and squalid meal.

rows: Poor
No roll required
Modest
Comfortable
Wealthy
Aristocratic

entries: A bag of bounty can be used up to three times over the course of a day. After that, the bag no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Bossa de Devoració
entries: La bossa sembla una {@item bossa de contenció}, però és realment un forat d'alimentació d'una criatura gegant extradimensional. Si la gires de dins enfora, el forat es tanca.

La criatura extradimensional percep tot allò que es posi a la bossa. Devorarà tota matèria animal o vegetal i es pedrà per sempre. Quan s'hi posi una part d'una criatura viva (com ara quan algú vol agafar quelcom de la bossa), hi ha un {@chance 50} que la criatura sigui estibada cap endins. Una criatura a dins de la bossa pot, com a acció, escapar-ne amb una tirada de Força (CD 15); una altra criatura pot, com a acció, intentar treure-la de dins amb una tirada de Força (CD 20) (però la segona criatura potser també és tibada cap endins). Tota criatura que comenci el seu torn dins de la bossa és devorada i el seu cos és irrecuperable.
S'hi poden emmagatzemar objectes inanimats, fins a 1 peu cúbic. Tanmateix, 1 cop al dia, la bossa se'ls empassarà i els escupirà a un altre pla d'existència i lloc en el temps (El/la/li MM escull)
Si la bossa s'estripa o pateix un tall és destruïda; els continguts es transporten a un lloc a l'atzar del Pla Astral.

item.name: Bossa de Contenció
entries: L'interior d'aquesta bossa és molt més gran que l'exterior: fa 2 peus de diàmetre a la boca i uns 4 peus de fons. Pot dur fins a 500 lliures o 64 peus cúbics. La bossa sempre pesarà 15 lliures. Treure un objecte de la bossa costa una acció.

Si la bossa és tallada, esquinçada, o porta més per o volum de l'establert, es trenca i es destrueix, i els seus continguts s'escampen pel Pla Astral. Si es gira de dins enfora, els continguts s'aboquen sense danyar-los. La bossa s'ha de tornar a girar a la posició normal per poder tornar-se a fer servir. Tota criatura que necessiti respirar pot sobreviure a dins la bossa uns 10 minuts; aquest temps es divideix per cada criatura que hi hagi a la bossa (mínim 1 minut per criatura). Passat aquest temps, comencen a asfixiar-se.

Si la bossa de contenció es posa dins d'un expai extradimensional creat per un {@item Heward's handy haversack}, un {@item portable hole} o objecte similar, ambdòs són destruits a l'instant i s'obre un portal al Pla Astral, allà on un dels objectes ha estat ficat a dons de l'altre. Tota criatura a 10 peus del portal és absorbida i transportada a un lloc a l'atzar del Pla Astral. Fet això, el portal es tanca. El portal és unidireccional i no pot tornar a ser obert.

item.name: Bossa de Trucs, Gris
entries: Aquesta bossa de tela gray sembla buida; però qui busqui a dins seu hi trobarà objectes petits i difuminats.

Pots, com a acció, treure l'objecte i llançar-lo fins a 20 peus. Quan aterri, es transforma en una criatura de la taula següent (tira {@dice d8} per a escollir-la). La criatura s'esvaeix al proper trenc d'alba o si es queda a 0 punts de vida.

La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats, i actua durant el teu torn. Pots, com a acció bonus, donar-li ordres de moviment i d'acció pel seu proper torn; també poden ser ordres generals (ataca als enemics). Si no n'hi dones, actua de forma natural per una criatura de la seva mena.
Quan hagis tret 3 objectes de la bossa no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

rows: {@creature Weasel}
{@creature Giant rat}
{@creature Badger}
{@creature Boar}
{@creature Panther}
{@creature Giant badger}
{@creature Dire wolf}
{@creature Giant elk}

item.name: Bossa de Trucs, Rust
entries: Aquesta bossa de tela de color rovell sembla buida; però qui busqui a dins seu hi trobarà un objecte petit i difuminat.

Pots, com a acció, treure l'objecte i llançar-lo fins a 20 peus. Quan aterri, es transforma en una criatura de la taula següent (tira {@dice d8} per a escollir-la). La criatura s'esvaeix al proper trenc d'alba o si es queda a 0 punts de vida.

La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats, i actua durant el teu torn. Pots, com a acció bonus, donar-li ordres de moviment i d'acció pel seu proper torn; també poden ser ordres generals (ataca als enemics). Si no n'hi dones, actua de forma natural per una criatura de la seva mena.
Quan hagis tret 3 objectes de la bossa no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

rows: {@creature Rat}
{@creature Owl}
{@creature Mastiff}
{@creature Goat}
{@creature Giant goat}
{@creature Giant boar}
{@creature Lion}
{@creature Brown bear}

item.name: Bossa de Trucs, Tan
entries: Aquesta bossa de tela tan sembla buida; però qui busqui a dins seu hi trobarà un objecte petit i difuminat.

Pots, com a acció, treure l'objecte i llançar-lo fins a 20 peus. Quan aterri, es transforma en una criatura de la taula següent (tira {@dice d8} per a escollir-la). La criatura s'esvaeix al proper trenc d'alba o si es queda a 0 punts de vida.

La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats, i actua durant el teu torn. Pots, com a acció bonus, donar-li ordres de moviment i d'acció pel seu proper torn; també poden ser ordres generals (ataca als enemics). Si no n'hi dones, actua de forma natural per una criatura de la seva mena.
Quan hagis tret 3 objectes de la bossa no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

rows: {@creature Jackal}
{@creature Ape}
{@creature Baboon}
{@creature Axe beak}
{@creature Black bear}
{@creature Giant weasel}
{@creature Giant hyena}
{@creature Tiger}

item.name: Balance of Harmony
entries: This scale bears celestial symbols on one pan and fiendish symbols on the other. You can use the scale to cast {@spell detectar el bé i el mal} as a ritual. Doing so requires you to place the scale on a solid surface, then sprinkle the pans with aigua beneïda or place a transparent gem worth 100 gp in each pan. The scale remains motionless if it detects nothing, tips to one side or the other for good (consecrated) or evil (desecrated), and fluctuates slightly if it detects a creature appropriate to the spell but neither good nor evil. By touching the scales after casting the ritual, you instantly learn any information the spell can normally convey, and then the effect ends.
attachedSpells: detectar el bé i el mal

item.name: Canica
entries: Solen sortir d'una {@item Caniques (Bossa de 1,000)|phb|bossa de caniques}.

item.name: Caniques (bossa de 1,000)
entries: Com a acció, pots abocar les boles metàliques de la bossa, estenent-les a una àrea de 10 peus de costat. Tota criatura que travessi l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 10). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. Tota criatura que es mogui a la meitat de la velocitat per l'àrea no ha de fer la salvada.

item.name: Balloon Pack
entries: This backpack contains the spirit of an {@creature air elemental} and a compact leather balloon. While you're wearing the backpack, you can deploy the balloon as an action and gain the effect of the {@spell levitar} spell durant 10 minuts, targeting yourself and requiring no concentration. Alternativament, pots, com a reacció, deploy the balloon when you're falling and gain the effect of the {@spell descens de ploma} spell for yourself.

When either spell ends, the balloon slowly deflates as the elemental spirit escapes and returns to the Elemental Plane of Air. As the balloon deflates, you descend gently toward the ground for fins a 60 peus. If you are still in the air at the end of this distance, you fall if you have no other means of staying aloft.
After the spirit departs, the backpack's property is unusable unless the backpack is recharged durant 1 hora in an elemental air node, which binds another spirit to the backpack.

item.name: Band of Loyalty
entries: If you are reduced to zero hit points while attuned to a band of loyalty, you instantly die. These rings are favored by spies who can't afford to fall into enemy hands.

item.name: Banded Agate
entries: A translucent striped brown, blue, white, or red gemstone.

item.name: Banner of the Krig Rune
entries: Crafted from a thick, red fabric, this banner measures 5 feet high and 3 feet wide. The krig (war) rune is displayed on the fabric with round, metal plates sewn into it. It can be attached to a 10-foot pole to serve as a standard. Furling or unfurling the banner requires an action. The banner has the following properties.

entries.name: Mark of Courage
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can touch the unfurled banner and cause it to emanate courage. You and your allies are immune to the {@condition acovardit} condition while within 20 feet of it. This benefit dura 10 minuts or until the banner is furled. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Sentinel Standard
entries: You can see {@condition invisible} creatures while they are within 20 feet of the unfurled banner and within your line of sight.

entries.name: Standard's Shield
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can touch the unfurled banner and invoke this power. Any ranged attack roll that targets you or an ally of yours has disadvantage if the target is within 20 feet of the unfurled banner. This benefit lasts for 1 minute or until the banner is furled. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Battle
entries: You can transfer the banner's magic to a place by tracing the krig rune on the ground with your finger. The point where you trace it becomes the center of a spherical area of magic that has a 500-foot radius and that is fixed to the place. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the banner to be within 5 feet of you and during which you choose creatures, creature types, or both that will benefit from the magic. At the end, the banner is destroyed, and the area gains the following property:
While in the 500-foot-radius sphere, the creatures you chose during the transfer process are immune to the {@condition acovardit} condition and gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and AC.

item.name: Barking Box
entries: This metal cube, 6 inches on a side, has a crank on top. Using an action to wind the crank activates the box durant 8 hores. While activated, the box barks whenever it detects vibrations within 15 feet of it, as long as the box and the source of the vibrations are in contact with the same ground or substance. A switch on one side of the box sets the device to emit either a small dog's bark or a large dog's bark.

item.name: Barril
entries: Un barril pot contenir fins a 40 galons de líquids o 4 peus cúbics de sòlids.

item.name: Barrier Peaks Trinket
entries: At any point while the characters are searching through unusual equipment or detritus in the Monastery of the Distressed Body or the city of Daoine Gloine, roll on the following table to determine what they find. Each character finds one Barrier Peaks trinket over the course of the adventure.

entries.caption: Barrier Peaks Trinkets
rows: A handheld device containing a glowing green gem that darkens when no oxygen is present
A foot-long, egg-shaped object made from stitched leather
A black metal cylinder that dictates the history of an unknown plant or animal species when held
A cylindrical jar containing a pickled crustacean of unknown origin
A small thumb-button storage cylinder that releases a useless iron key when pressed
An unusual heraldic cloak pin that emits a short musical fanfare when tapped
A handheld tube that sucks in dust when squeezed and captures it in a detachable compartment
A scintillating disk of unknown material
A dial that can be twisted to slowly click back to its origin, whereupon it emits a loud ringing noise
A hovering, apple-sized orb of metal that follows you around
The {@condition petrificat} cocoon of an unknown insect
A bronze gauntlet set with many slots, and which violently expels any object pressed into those slots
A box that plays an illusory message in an unknown language when opened
A rod that causes you to forget the last five minutes when you press a button near its tip
A palm-sized cylinder that emits a harmless ray of glowing blue light when squeezed
A bead that suppresses your hearing when secreted inside either ear, causing you to be {@condition eixordat}
An amulet that displays your current health as a green bar above your head, with the bar retracting as your hit point total decreases
A casket containing one hundred tasteless blue pills that produce no discernible effect when swallowed
A metal mechanical puzzle with no apparent solution
A metal spinning top that never tips over when spun
Two strips of cloth-like material, each coated with a soft, hair-like fuzz on one side
A simple wire pyramid that preserves any foodstuffs it is placed over
A star chart labeled in an unknown script
A rectangle of black glass that displays indecipherable arcane runes when you swipe your finger across it
A schematic that shows the inner workings of an impossibly complex device
An odd pair of comfortable shoes made from supple, multicolored material
A mirror that makes you appear more beautiful when you tap your reflection
A mechanical metal puppy that playfully follows you around when activated
A talking bracelet that speaks only to correct your grammar
A bar of soap that can remove any stain
A journal in Common, written by someone in a world similar to but not quite the same as your own
A tub containing one serving of disgusting but nutritious goop that refills itself slowly over the course of one week
An instruction manual for activating a mysterious, world-destroying device
A small supple disk that displays weird moving symbols when placed over either eye
A tiny desk set with large, colorful buttons, each of which plays a discordant musical fanfare when pressed
A pair of tinted spectacles that reduce the glare of the sun when worn
An inflatable bedroll made from an unknown material, and which slowly deflates when used
A rod tipped with a blunt metal pincer whose grip can be adjusted by turning a screw
A battered helmet with a transparent orange visor that flips into place when donned
An animated map of a mysterious city that appears to be tracking the movements of five creatures
A cylinder of mist that holds your hair perfectly in shape when sprayed onto your head
A talking wand that tells you the name of any plant you point it at
A metal bracelet that displays the number of steps you've taken since your last long rest
A tiny handheld device that projects a glowing dot onto whatever you point it at
A rectangular piece of glass that displays a twelve-digit countdown on its surface
A wall chart of mysterious formulae arranged into a color-coded grid
A handheld device that solves any math problem you input using its buttons
A ball of speckled brown fur that appears to be alive
A complicated crystal board game that you don't know how to play
A large glass rectangle that displays a storm of black and white patterns when you press a button on its underside

item.name: Barrier Tattoo (Large)
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo depicts protective imagery and uses ink that resembles liquid metal.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Protection
entries: While you aren't wearing armor, the tattoo grants you an Armor Class of 18. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

item.name: Barrier Tattoo (Medium)
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo depicts protective imagery and uses ink that resembles liquid metal.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Protection
entries: While you aren't wearing armor, the tattoo grants you an Armor Class of 15 + el teu modificador de Destresa (maximum of +2). You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

item.name: Barrier Tattoo (Rare)
entries: This tattoo depicts protective imagery and uses ink that resembles liquid metal. While you aren't wearing armor, the tattoo grants you an Armor Class of 15 + el teu modificador de Destresa (maximum of +2). You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Barrier Tattoo (Small)
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo depicts protective imagery and uses ink that resembles liquid metal.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Protection
entries: While you aren't wearing armor, the tattoo grants you an Armor Class of 12 + your dexterity bonus. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

item.name: Barrier Tattoo (Uncommon)
entries: This tattoo depicts protective imagery and uses ink that resembles liquid metal. While you aren't wearing armor, the tattoo grants you an Armor Class of 12 + el teu modificador de Destresa. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Barrier Tattoo (Very Rare)
entries: This tattoo depicts protective imagery and uses ink that resembles liquid metal. While you aren't wearing armor, the tattoo grants you an Armor Class of 18. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Verí Bàsic (vial)
entries: Amb els continguts d'un vial pots untar una arma tallant o perforant o 3 unitats de munició. Untar el verí costa una acció. Una criatura impactada per l'arma o munició enverinada ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 10). Si falla, rep {@dice 1d4} de dany de verí (a més del normal de l'arma). Un cop untat, el verí s'asseca i perd el seu efecte passat 1 minut.

item.name: Cistella
entries: Una cistella pot contenir fins a 2 peus cúbics o 40 lliures d'equipament.

item.name: Battering Shield
entries: While holding this iron tower shield, tens +1 a la CA. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.

Additionally, the shield has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. If you are holding the shield and push a creature within your reach at least 5 feet away, you can expend 1 charge to push that creature an additional 10 feet, knock it {@condition enderrocat}, or both.

item.name: Battle Standard of Infernal Power
entries: This hell-forged battle standard is made of infernal iron and fitted with a small, unopenable cage containing a {@creature quasit}. The trapped {@creature quasit} is {@condition incapacitat}, and its cage has AC 19, 10 hit points, and immunity to all types of damage except force damage. If killed or somehow released, the {@creature quasit} disappears in a cloud of smoke, and a new one appears in the cage, provided the cage is intact.
While you hold the banner, your weapon attacks and those of all allied creatures within 300 feet of you count as magical for the purposes of overcoming immunitat contra dany and resistances.

item.name: Perla de Força
entries: Aquesta boleta negra fa ¾ de polzada de diàmetre i pesa 1 onça. Normalment es troben {@dice 1d4 + 4} {@italic perles de força} juntes.

Pots, com a acció, llançar la perla fins a 60 peus. Quan xoca, explota i es destrueix. Tota criatura a 10 peus d'abast de la perla quan xoca ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Qui falli, rep {@dice 5d4} de dany de força. Una esfera de força transparent embolcalla l'àrea durant 1 minut. Tota criatura que hagi fallat la salvada i estigui completament dins de l'àrea hi roman atrapada. Qui hagi salvat o només hi siguin parcialment són expulsades inofensivament. Res pot atravessar l'esfera (ni atacs ni efectes) a part d'aire respirable.

Tota criatura atrapada pot, com a acció, empenyer la paret, fent moure l'esfera la meitat de la velocitat de caminar de la criatura. L'esfera es pot agafar: pesa 1 lliura i les criatures de dins no sumen al pes.

item.name: Bead of Nourishment
entries: This spongy, flavorless, gelatinous bead dissolves on your tongue and provides as much nourishment as 1 day of rations.

item.name: Bead of Refreshment
entries: This spongy, flavorless, gelatinous bead dissolves in liquid, transforming up to a pint of the liquid into fresh, cold drinking water. The bead has no effect on magical liquids or harmful substances such as poison.

item.name: Bejeweled ivory drinking horn with gold filigree
Bejeweled ivory drinking horn with gold inlay (Coalició Temerària)
Belashyrra's Beholder Crown
entries: This symbiotic crown is carved from dark purple and mauve stone, with ten points like stalks set with gemstones resembling the eyestalks of a {@creature beholder}. To attune to this item, you must wear it on your head for the entire attunement period, during which the crown's hidden tendrils burrow into your scalp to bond with your skull.
While wearing the crown, pots veure-hi a la foscor màgica i no-màgica com de costum, a 120 peus d'abast.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: The crown té 10 càrregues. While wearing it, pots, com a acció, expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save DC 16): {@spell fascinar persona} (1 charge), {@spell desintegrar} (6 charges), {@spell temor} (3 charges), {@spell dit de la mort} (7 charges), {@spell carn a pedra} (6 charges), {@spell immobilitzar humanoide} (2 charges), {@spell raig d'afebliment} (2 charges), {@spell adormir} (1 charge), {@spell alentir} (3 charges), {@spell Telequinesi} (5 charges).
The crown regains {@dice 1d6 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The crown can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the crown ends, and it detaches from you.
The daelkyr {@creature Belashyrra|ERLW} made these crowns. While on the same plane of existence as the crown, Belashyrra can see through its eyestalks.

item.name: Bell Branch
entries: This silver implement is shaped like a tree branch and is strung with small golden bells. The branch is a spellcasting focus for your spells while you hold it.
The branch has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: Com a acció bonus, you can expend 1 charge to detect the presence of aberrations, celestials, constructs, elementals, fey, diastres, or undead within 60 feet of you. If such creatures are present and don't have total cover from you, the bells ring softly, their tone indicating the creature types present.
Com a acció, you can expend 1 charge to cast {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}.

attachedSpells: protegir del bé i del mal

item.name: Cinturó de Força de Gegant dels Núvols
entries: Mentre vesteixis el cinturó, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 27. No té efecte si la teva puntuació de Força ja és equivalent o superior a la del cinturó.

item.name: Cinturó dels Nans
entries: Mentre vesteixis el cinturó, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: La teva puntuació de Constitució incrementa en 2 (fins a un màxim de 20).
Tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) quan interactues amb nans.

entries: A més, quan estàs en harmonia amb el cinturó, tens un {@chance 50} de possibilitats, cada trenc d'alba, de tenir una barba sencera (si te'n pot crèixer naturalment). Si ja tens barba, aquesta s'espesseix considerablement.
Si no ets nan, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens avantatge a salvades contra metzines. A més, tens resistència vers dany de verí.
Tens {@sense visió de foscor} a 60 peus d'abast.
Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Nannès.

item.name: Cinturó de Força de Gegant del Foc
entries: Mentre vesteixis el cinturó, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 25. No té efecte si la teva puntuació de Força ja és equivalent o superior a la del cinturó.

item.name: Cinturó de Força de Gegant del Gel
entries: Mentre vesteixis el cinturó, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 23. No té efecte si la teva puntuació de Força ja és equivalent o superior a la del cinturó.

item.name: Cinturó de Força de Gegant dels Turons
entries: Mentre vesteixis el cinturó, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 21. No té efecte si la teva puntuació de Força ja és equivalent o superior a la del cinturó.

item.name: Cinturó de Força de Gegant de la Pedra
entries: Mentre vesteixis el cinturó, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 23. No té efecte si la teva puntuació de Força ja és equivalent o superior a la del cinturó.

item.name: Cinturó de Força de Gegant de les Tempestes
entries: Mentre vesteixis el cinturó, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 29. No té efecte si la teva puntuació de Força ja és equivalent o superior a la del cinturó.

item.name: Birdpipes
entries: Pan pipes or sàtir pipes, also known as the shalm, these are sacred to {@deity Lliira|Faerûnian|scag} and popular with wood elf and wild elf bards.

item.name: Black Crystal Tablet
item.reqAttune: by a creature that has proficiency in the Arcana skill
entries: Any creature that attunes to the tablet ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 20) at the end of its next long rest. Si falla, the creature becomes afflicted with a random form of long-term madness (see "{@book Madness|dmg|8|Madness}" in chapter 8 of the {@book Guia del Mestre de Masmorres|dmg}).

Com a acció, a creature attuned to the Black Crystal Tablet can use it to cast {@spell mal d'ull} or {@spell portal} (the portal created by this spell links to the Far Realm only). After the tablet is used to cast a spell, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Black Dragon Mask
entries: This horned mask of glossy ebony has horns and a skull-like mien. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties.

entries.name: Absorbir Dany
entries: Tens resistència al dany d'àcid damage. If you already have damage resistance to acid from another source, you gain immunity to acid damage. If you already have immunity to acid damage from another source, you regain hit points equal to half of any acid you are dealt.

entries.name: Inefabilitat Dracònica
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Carisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense visió de foscor} with a radius of 60 feet, or an additional 60 feet of {@sense visió de foscor} if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain visió a cegues out to a range of 30 feet durant 5 minuts.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Dracònic. A més, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma you make against Black dragons.

entries.name: Resistència Llegendària
entries: (1/Dia) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: You pot respirar sota l'aigua.

item.name: Cota d'Escates de Drac Negre
entries: La cota d'escates de drac està feta d'escames d'un tipus de drac. Alguns dracs coleccionen les escates que han mudad i les regalen als humanoides. En altres casos els caçadors curen i preserven la pell d'un drac mort amb molta cura. Sia com sia, una cota d'escates de drac és molt valuosa. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens: +1 a la CA; avantatge a salvar contra l'Alè d'Atac i la Presència Aterradora dels dracs; i resistència al dany d'àcid.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac negre més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Black Opal
entries: A translucent dark green with black mottling and golden flecks gemstone.

item.name: Black Pearl
entries: An opaque pure black gemstone.
