entries: This spear is enchanted with 10 charges of a {@spell llum del dia} spell for use in twilight or dark forest underbrush. The command phrase is "Tiamat's eyes shine," written in Dracònic runes on the spear's crossguard.

item.name: Dragonguard
entries: You have a +1 bonus to AC mentre vesteixis l'armadura.

This +1 breastplate has a gold dragon motif worked into its design. Created for a human hero of Neverwinter named Tergon, it grants its wearer advantage on saving throws against the breath weapons of creatures that have the dragon type.

item.name: Dragonstaff of Ahghairon
entries: While holding the dragonstaff of Ahghairon, tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against the spells and breath weapons of dragons, as well as the breath weapons of other creatures of the dragon type (such as dragon turtles).

A creature of the dragon type that you touch with the staff can move through the city of Waterdeep, ignoring Ahghairon's dragonward (see "Ahghairon's Dragonward," in the Introduction). This effect lasts until the creature is touched again by the staff or until a time you proclaim when you confer the benefit.

The staff té 10 càrregues. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell command} spell. If you target a dragon with this casting, the dragon has disadvantage on its saving throw. The staff regains {@dice 1d10} charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Dragontooth Daga
entries: A dagger fashioned from the tooth of a dragon. While the blade is obviously a fang or predator's tooth, the handle is leather wrapped around the root of the tooth, and there is no crossguard.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. On a hit with this weapon, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany d'àcid.

entries.name: Dracònic Potency
entries: Against enemies of the Cult of the Dragon, the dagger's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to 2, and the extra acid damage increases to {@dice 2d6}.

item.name: Dread Helm
entries: This fearsome steel helm makes your eyes glow red while you wear it.

item.name: Dreamlily
entries: A psychoactive liquid that smells and tastes like your favorite beverage, essence of dreamlily is a Sarlonan opiate. First imported to help manage pain during the Last War, it's now the most commonly abused substance in Sharn. Though dreamlily isn't illegal if used for medicinal purposes, it's heavily taxed, and thus most dreamlily is smuggled in and sold on the black market. Dreamlily dens can be found across the lower wards. Consuming dreamlily causes disorienting euphoria and brings about remarkable resistance to pain. A creature under the effects of dreamlily is {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the creature is immune to fear, and the first time it es queda a 0 punts de vida without being killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead. A dose of dreamlily costs around 1 gp, or up to ten times that if purchased through legal channels. There are many varieties of the drug, however, and the duration or the price might vary accordingly.

item.name: Driftglobe
entries: This small sphere of thick glass weighs 1 pound. If you are within 60 feet of it, pots dir la seva paraula màgica and cause it to emanate the {@spell llum} or {@spell llum del dia} spell. Once used, the {@spell llum del dia} effect no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

You can speak another paraula màgica as an action to make the illuminated globe rise into the air and float no more than 5 feet off the ground. The globe hovers in this way until you or another creature grasps it. If you move more than 60 feet from the hovering globe, it follows you until it is within 60 feet of you. It takes the shortest route to do so. If prevented from moving, the globe sinks gently to the ground and becomes inactive, and its light winks out.

item.name: Metzina de dróu
entries: Aquesta metzina la solen fer només la gent {@creature drow} en un lloc lluny de la llum solar. and only in a place far removed from sunlight. Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13). Si falla, està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora. Si falla la salvada per 5 o més, la criatura també cau {@condition inconscient} mentre estigui {@condition emmetzinat} així. La criatura es desperta si rep dany o si una altra criatura, com a acció, la sacseja per a despertar-la.

item.name: Drown
entries: A steel trident decorated with bronze barnacles along the upper part of its haft, Drown has a sea-green jewel just below the tines and a silver shell at the end of its haft. It floats on the surface if dropped onto water, and it floats in place if it is released underwater. The trident is always cool to the touch, and it is immune to any damage due to exposure to water. Drown contains a spark of {@creature Olhydra|pota}, the Princess of Evil Water.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. When you hit with it, the targets take an extra {@dice 1d8} de dany de fred.

entries.name: Water Mastery
entries: Obténs els beneficis següents while you hold Drown:

items: You can speak Aquan fluently.
Tens resistència al dany de fred.
Pots llançar el conjur {@spell dominar criatura} (save DC 17) on a {@creature water elemental}. Once you have done so, Drown no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Tears of Endless Anguish
entries: While inside a water node, you can perform a ritual called the Tears of Endless Anguish, using Drown to create a {@item devastation orb of water|PotA}. Once you perform the ritual, Drown can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Flaw
entries: Drown makes its wielder covetous. While attuned to the weapon, you gain the following flaw: "I demand and deserve the largest share of the spoils, and I refuse to part with anything that's mine." A més, if you are attuned to Drown for 24 consecutive hours, barnacles form on your skin. The barnacles can be removed with a {@spell restabliment superior} spell or similar magic, but not while you are attuned to the weapon.

item.name: Pack de masmorreig
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item motxilla|phb}
a {@item palanca|phb}
a {@item martell|phb}
10 {@item piton|phb|pitóns}
10 {@item torch|phb|torches}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
10 days of {@item Racions (1 dia)|phb|rations}
a {@item waterskin|phb}
{@item Corda de cànem (50 peus)|phb|50 feet of hempen rope}

item.name: Duplicitous Manuscript
entries: To you, this book is a magical spellbook. To anyone else, the book appears to be a volume of verbose romance fiction. Com a acció, you can change the book's appearance and alter the plot of the romance.

When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell terreny il·lusori}, {@spell imatge major}, {@spell imatge mirall}, {@spell desconcertar}, {@spell Aura Màgica d'en Nystul}, {@spell força fantasmagòrica}, i {@spell imatge silenciosa}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the illusion school.

Quan una criatura you can see makes una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) to discern the true nature of an illusion spell you cast, or makes a saving throw against an illusion spell you cast, you can use your reaction and expend 1 charge to impose disadvantage on the roll.

item.name: Duskcrusher
entries: This item takes the form of a leather-wrapped metal rod emblazoned with the symbol of Pelor, the Dawn Father. While grasping the rod, pots, com a acció bonus, cause a warhammer head of crackling radiance to spring into existence. The warhammer's radiant head emits llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals. The light is sunlight. Pots, com a acció, make the radiant head disappear.

While the radiant head is active, Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica, and attacks with the weapon deal radiant damage instead of dany contundent. An undead creature hit by the weapon rep {@damage 1d8} de dany radiant extra.

While you are holding Duskcrusher and its radiant head is active, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell Raig Solar} spell (save DC 15) from the weapon, and this action no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Dust of Deliciousness
entries: This reddish brown dust can be sprinkled over any edible substance to greatly improve the flavor. The dust also dulls the eater's senses: anyone eating food treated with this dust has disadvantage on Saviesa ability checks and Saviesa saving throws durant 1 hora. There is enough dust to flavor six servings.

item.name: Dust of Disappearance
entries: Found in a small packet, this powder resembles very fine sand. There is enough of it for one use. When you use an action to throw the dust into the air, you and each creature and object within 10 feet of you become {@condition invisible} for {@dice 2d4} minutes. The duration is the same for all subjects, and the dust is consumed when its magic takes effect. If a creature affected by the dust attacks or casts a spell, the invisibility ends for that creature.

item.name: Dust of Dryness
entries: This small packet contains {@dice 1d6 + 4} pinches of dust. Pots, com a acció, sprinkle a pinch of it over water. The dust turns a cube of water 15 feet on a side into one marble-sized pellet, which floats or rests near where the dust was sprinkled. The pellet's weight is negligible.
Someone can use an action to smash the pellet against a hard surface, causing the pellet to shatter and release the water the dust absorbed. Doing so ends that pellet's magic.
An elemental composed mostly of water that is exposed to a pinch of the dust ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13), taking {@dice 10d6} de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
entries: Found in a small container, this powder resembles very fine sand. It appears to be {@item dust of disappearance}, and an {@spell identificar} spell reveals it to be such. There is enough of it for one use.

When you use an action to throw a handful of the dust into the air, you and each creature that needs to breathe within 30 feet of you ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, become unable to breathe while sneezing uncontrollably. A creature affected in this way is {@condition incapacitat} and suffocating. As long as it is conscious, a creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on it on a success. The {@spell restabliment menor} spell can also end the effect on a creature.

item.name: Dust of the Mummy
entries: This poison is created during a mummy's embalming process, distilled from the dead creature's removed organs. Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 12). Si falla, be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed creature can't regain hit points, and its punts de vida màxims decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the creature's punts de vida màxims to 0, the creature dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic.

item.name: Dwarven Plate
entries: Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens +1 a la CA. A més, if an effect moves you against your will along the ground, you can use your reaction to reduce the distance you are moved by fins a 10 peus.

item.name: Dwarven Thrower
entries: Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. It has the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged attack using this weapon, it deals an extra {@dice 1d8} damage or, if the target is a giant, {@dice 2d8} damage. Immediately after the attack, the weapon flies back to your hand.

item.name: Dynamite (stick)
entries: Com a acció, a creature can light a stick of dynamite and throw it at a point fins a 60 peus away. Each creature within 5 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 12), taking {@dice 3d6} de dany contundent; si supera, en rep la meitat.

A character can bind sticks of dynamite together so they explode at the same time. Each additional stick increases the damage by {@damage 1d6} (to a maximum of {@damage 10d6}) and the burst radius by 5 feet (to a maximum of 20 feet).

Dynamite can be rigged with a longer fuse to explode after a set amount of time, usually 1 to 6 rounds. Roll initiative for the dynamite. After the set number of rounds goes by, the dynamite explodes on that initiative.

item.name: Dyrrn's Tentacle Whip
entries: This long, whip-like strand of tough muscle bears a sharp stinger at one end. To attune to this symbiotic weapon, you wrap the whip around your wrist for the entire attunement period, during which time the whip painfully embeds its tendrils into your arm.

Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this magic whip, but attack rolls made against aberrations with this weapon have disadvantage. A creature hit by this weapon takes an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany psíquic. When you roll a 20 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll with this weapon, the target is {@condition atordit} fins el final del seu proper torn.
Com a acció bonus, you can sheathe the whip by causing it to retract into your arm, or draw the whip out of your arm again.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The whip can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the whip ends, and it detaches from you.

item.name: Eagle Whistle
entries: While you blow an eagle whistle continuously, you can fly twice as fast as your walking speed. You can blow the whistle continuously for a number of rounds equal to 5 + five times your Constitució modifier (minimum of 1 round) or until you talk, hold your breath, or start suffocating. A use of the whistle also ends if you land. If you are aloft when you stop blowing the whistle, you fall. The whistle has three uses. It regains expended uses daily at dawn.

item.name: Ear Horn of Hearing
entries: While held up to your ear, this horn suppresses the effects of the {@condition eixordat} condition on you, allowing you to hear normally.

item.name: Earworm
entries: To attune to this symbiont, you must hold it against the skin behind your ear for the entire attunement period, whereupon it burrows into your head and bonds to your skull. While the earworm is inside you, pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Deep Speech.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: The earworm té 4 càrregues. You can cast the following spells from it, expending the necessary number of charges (spell save DC 15): {@spell detectar pensaments} (2 charges) or {@spell xiuxiuegos de disbauxa} (1 charge). Each time you use the earworm to cast the {@spell detectar pensaments} spell, it sends the information gleaned to the nearest daelkyr, or to the next nearest earworm until it reaches a daelkyr.
The earworm recupera {@dice 1d4} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The earworm can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the earworm ends, and it exits your body.

item.name: Efreeti Bottle
entries: This painted brass bottle weighs 1 pound. When you use an action to remove the stopper, a cloud of thick smoke flows out of the bottle. At the end of your turn, the smoke disappears with a flash of harmless fire, and an {@creature efreeti} apareix en un espai desocupat within 30 feet of you.
The first time the bottle is opened, el/la/li MM rolls to determine what happens.

rows: The {@creature efreeti} attacks you. After fighting for 5 rounds, the {@creature efreeti} disappears, and the bottle loses its magic.

The {@creature efreeti} serves you durant 1 hora, doing as you command. Then the {@creature efreeti} returns to the bottle, and a new stopper contains it. The stopper can't be removed durant 24 hores. The next two times the bottle is opened, the same effect occurs. If the bottle is opened a fourth time, the {@creature efreeti} escapes and disappears, and the bottle loses its magic.
The {@creature efreeti} can cast the {@spell desig} spell three times for you. It disappears when it grants the final wish or passada 1 hora, and the bottle loses its magic.

item.name: Efreeti Chain
entries: Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens +1 a la CA, you are immune to fire damage, and you can understand and speak Primordial. A més, you can stand on and walk across molten rock as if it were solid ground.

item.name: Elder Cartographer's Glossography
entries: When you attain rank 4, you gain a small tome that is an uncommon magic item. The elder cartographer's glossography grants advantage on Intel·ligència or Saviesa checks related to geographical features or locations.

item.name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo depicts clawlike forms and other jagged shapes.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Magical Strikes
entries: While the tattoo is on your skin, your atacs desarmats are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks, and Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls with atacs desarmats.

entries.name: Eldritch Maul
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can empower the tattoo durant 1 minut. For the duration, each of your melee attacks with a weapon or an atac desarmat can reach a target fins a 15 peus lluny de tu, as inky tendrils launch toward the target. A més, your melee attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany de força on a hit. Once used, this bonus action no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
entries: This tattoo depicts clawlike forms and other jagged shapes. While the tattoo is on your skin, your atacs desarmats are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks, and Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls with atacs desarmats.

entries.name: Eldritch Maul
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can empower the tattoo durant 1 minut. For the duration, each of your atacs armats cos a cos can reach a target fins a 30 peus lluny de tu, as tendrils of ink launch from your weapon or atac desarmat toward the target. A més, your atacs armats cos a cos deal an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany de força on a hit. Once used, this bonus action no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Electrum (ep)
entries: Common coins come in several different denominations based on the relative worth of the metal from which they are made. The three most common coins are the gold piece (gp), the silver piece (sp), and the copper piece (cp).

With one gold piece, a character can buy a belt pouch, 50 feet of good rope, or a goat. A skilled (but not exceptional) artisan can earn one gold piece a day. The gold piece is the standard unit of measure for wealth, even if the coin itself is not commonly used. When merchants discuss deals that involve goods or services worth hundreds or thousands of gold pieces, the transactions don't usually involve the exchange of individual coins. Rather, the gold piece is a standard measure of value, and the actual exchange is in gold bars, letters of credit, or valuable goods.
One gold piece is worth ten silver pieces, the most prevalent coin among commoners. A silver piece buys a laborer's work for a day, a flask of lamp oil, or a night's rest in a poor inn.
One silver piece is worth ten copper pieces, which are common among laborers and beggars. A single copper piece buys a candle, a torch, or a piece of chalk.

A més, unusual coins made of other precious metals sometimes appear in treasure hoards. The electrum piece (ep) and the platinum piece (pp) originate from fallen empires and lost kingdoms, and they sometimes arouse suspicion and skepticism when used in transactions. An electrum piece is worth five silver pieces, and a platinum piece is worth ten gold pieces.
A standard coin weighs about a third of an ounce, so fifty coins weigh a pound.

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

Roll a {@dice d4} and consult the Elemental Essence Shards table to determine the shard's essence and property. When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.caption: Elemental Essence Shards
rows: Air
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Air)|TCE}
Earth
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Earth)|TCE}
Foc
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Fire)|TCE}
Water
{@item Elemental Essence Shard (Water)|TCE}

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Air)
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use the following property:

entries.name: Property
entries: You can immediately fly fins a 60 peus sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Earth)
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use the following property:

entries.name: Property
entries: You gain resistance to a damage type of your choice fins el final del teu proper torn.

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Fire)
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use the following property:

entries.name: Property
entries: One target of the spell that you can see catches fire. The burning target rep {@damage 2d10} de dany de foc at the start of its next turn, and then the flames go out.

item.name: Elemental Essence Shard (Water)
entries: This crackling crystal contains the essence of an elemental plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use the following property:

entries.name: Property
entries: You create a wave of water that bursts out from you in a 10-foot radius. Each creature of your choice that you can see in that area rep {@damage 2d6} de dany de fred i ha de salvar per Força amb la teva CD de salvació de conjur. Si falla or be pushed 10 peus lluny de tu and fall {@condition enderrocat}.

item.name: Elemental Gem, Blue Sapphire
entries: This gem contains a mote of elemental energy. When you use an action to break the gem, an {@creature air elemental} is summoned as if you had cast the {@spell convocar elemental} spell, and the gem's magic is lost.

item.name: Elemental Gem, Emerald
entries: This gem contains a mote of elemental energy. When you use an action to break the gem, a {@creature water elemental} is summoned as if you had cast the {@spell convocar elemental} spell, and the gem's magic is lost.

item.name: Elemental Gem, Red Corundum
entries: This gem contains a mote of elemental energy. When you use an action to break the gem, a {@creature fire elemental} is summoned as if you had cast the {@spell convocar elemental} spell, and the gem's magic is lost.

item.name: Elemental Gem, Yellow Diamond
entries: This gem contains a mote of elemental energy. When you use an action to break the gem, an {@creature earth elemental} is summoned as if you had cast the {@spell convocar elemental} spell, and the gem's magic is lost.

item.name: Elixir of Health
entries: When you drink this potion, it cures any disease afflicting you, and it removes the {@condition encegat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition paralitzat}, i {@condition emmetzinat} conditions. The clear red liquid has tiny bubbles of light in it.

item.name: Elven Chain
entries: Tens +1 a la CA mentre vesteixis l'armadura. You are considered proficient with this armor even if you lack proficiency with medium armor.

rows: A small notebook that causes anything written in it to disappear passada 1 hora
A crystal lens made of ivory and gold that causes anything observed through it to appear to be surrounded by motes of multicolored light
A small golden pyramid inscribed with elven symbols and about the size of a walnut
A cloak pin made from enamel in the shape of a butterfly; when you take the pin off, it turns into a real butterfly, and returns when you are ready to put your cloak back on again
A golden compass that points toward the nearest portal to the Terra Fata within 10 miles
A small silver spinning top that, when spun, endlessly spins until interrupted
A small songbird made of enamel, gold wire, and precious stone; uttering the songbird's name in Èlfic causes the trinket to emit that bird's birdsong
A small enamel flower that, when put in one's hair, animates, tying back the wearer's hair with a living vine with flowers; plucking a single flower from this vine returns it to its inanimate form

item.name: Embroidered glove set with jewel chips
Embroidered silk and velvet mantle set with numerous moonstones
Emerald
entries: A transparent deep bright green gemstone.

entries.items: One card in this deck is enchanted to appear as whatever specific card its owner commands. This magic works only 25 percent of the time, but the deck is worth 500 gp to any serious gambler who doesn't mind the risk—or who isn't told about it.

item.name: Enduring Spellbook
entries: This spellbook, along with anything written on its pages, can't be damaged by fire or immersion in water. A més, the spellbook doesn't deteriorate with age.

item.name: Pack d'Entreteniment
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item motxilla|phb}
a {@item sac de dormir|phb}
2 {@item disfressa|phb|costumes}
5 {@item espelma|phb|candles}
5 days of {@item Racions (1 dia)|phb|rations}
a {@item waterskin|phb}
a {@item kit de disfressa|phb}

item.name: Ephixis, Bow of Nylea
entries: Nylea wields the shortbow Ephixis, the bow whose arrows herald the turning of the seasons. Nylea is quick to let her favored followers borrow her bow, particularly when they intend to use it to perform great deeds, put an end to foul creatures, or cast down the arrogant.

entries.name: Bow of the Wild
entries: This divine weapon includes a shortbow and a quiver with four arrows, each tied to one of the four seasons. Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this bow, and you suffer no disadvantage when attacking at the weapon's long range. Additionally, Ephixis scores a critical hit on a {@dice d20} roll of 19 or 20.

entries.name: Blessing of the Wild
entries: If you are a worshiper of Nylea, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: The bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Nylea, the bow has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} property.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Arrows of the Seasons
entries: The four arrows—each associated with a season—that accompany this bow can be fired only from it. Each arrow disappears immediately after it's used, and it reappears in the quiver at the next dusk. The save DC against spells cast with the arrows is 18. Each arrow has a unique property:

entries.name: Spring
entries: Com a acció, you can fire this arrow, targeting a beast or a plant creature que puguis veure a 320 peus d'abast. Si impacta, the arrow deals no damage, and the target gains the benefits of the {@spell obrir els ulls} spell durant 8 hores.

entries.name: Summer
entries: Com a acció, you can fire this arrow at an unoccupied space on the ground que puguis veure a 320 peus d'abast, no attack roll required. A Nyxborn lynx is summoned in that space (use the stat block for a {@creature tiger} with the {@book Nyxborn traits|MOT|6|Nyxborn Creatures} from chapter 6). The lynx understands your verbal commands and obeys them as best it can, and it takes its turns immediately after yours. The emissary remains durant 1 hora before fading away.

entries.name: Autumn
entries: Com a acció, you can fire this arrow at a space on the ground que puguis veure a 320 peus d'abast, no attack roll required, casting the {@spell paret d'espines} spell there.

entries.name: Winter
entries: Com a acció, you can fire this arrow at a space que puguis veure a 320 peus d'abast, no attack roll required, casting the {@spell tempesta de gel} spell there.

entries.name: Destroying the Bow
entries: The bow can't be destroyed without first destroying all its arrows. The winter arrow must be fed to a cerberus on the winter solstice. The spring arrow must be planted at the base of a Black Oak of Asphodel on the spring equinox. The summer arrow must be broken by a sea giant on the summer solstice. Then the autumn arrow must be shot into the carcass of a hidra on the autumnal equinox. When all four arrows are destroyed, the bow and quiver dissolve into dust.

item.name: Ersatz Eye
entries: This artificial eye replaces a real one that was lost or removed. While the ersatz eye is embedded in your eye socket, it can't be removed by anyone other than you, and you can see through the tiny orb as though it were a normal eye.

item.name: Essència d'Èter
entries: Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition emmetzinat} durant 8 hores. The {@condition emmetzinat} creature is {@condition inconscient}. La criatura es desperta si rep dany o si una altra criatura, com a acció, la sacseja per a despertar-la.

item.name: Everbright Lantern
entries: This llanterna d'ull de bou contains an Eberron dragonshard that sheds light comparable to that produced by a {@spell foc perenne} spell. An everbright lantern sheds light en un con de 120 peus; the closest 60 feet is bright light, and the farthest 60 feet is dim light.

item.name: Eversmoking Bottle
entries: Smoke leaks from the lead-stoppered mouth of this brass bottle, which weighs 1 pound. When you use an action to remove the stopper, a cloud of thick smoke pours out in a 60-foot radius from the bottle. The cloud's area is heavily obscured. Each minute the bottle remains open and within the cloud, the radius increases by 10 feet until it reaches its maximum radius of 120 feet.

The cloud persists as long as the bottle is open. Closing the bottle requires you to speak its paraula màgica as an action. Once the bottle is closed, the cloud disperses after 10 minutes. A moderate wind (11 to 20 miles per hour) can also disperse the smoke after 1 minute, and a strong wind (21 or more miles per hour) can do so after 1 round.

item.name: Sella exòtica
entries: An sella exòtica is required for riding any aquatic or flying mount.

item.name: Pack d'exploració
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item motxilla|phb}
a {@item sac de dormir|phb}
a {@item carmanyola|phb}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
10 {@item torch|phb|torches}
10 days of {@item Racions (1 dia)|phb|rations}
a {@item waterskin|phb}
{@item Corda de cànem (50 peus)|phb|50 feet of hempen rope}

item.name: Explosive Seed
entries: This acorn-sized sphere of brass contains a small amount of blasting powder and a clockwork trigger. An explosive seed can be thrown fins a 30 peus com a acció, detonating on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the exploding seed ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 10). Si falla, rep {@damage 1d8} de dany contundent; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Eye Agate
entries: A translucent circles of gray, white, brown, blue, or green gemstone.

item.name: Eye of Vecna
entries: Seldom is the name of Vecna spoken except in a hushed voice. Vecna was, in his time, one of the mightiest of all wizards. Through dark magic and conquest, he forged a terrible empire. For all his power, Vecna couldn't escape his own mortality. He began to fear death and take steps to prevent his end from ever coming about.

{@creature Orcus|MTF}, the demon prince of undeath, taught Vecna a ritual that would allow him to live on as a {@creature lich}. Beyond death, he became the greatest of all liches. Even though his body gradually withered and decayed, Vecna continued to expand his evil dominion. So formidable and hideous was his temper that his subjects feared to speak his name. He was the Whispered One, the Master of the Spider Throne, the Undying King, and the Lord of the Rotted Tower.

Some say that Vecna's lieutenant Kas coveted the Spider Throne for himself, or that the sword his lord made for him seduced him into rebellion. Whatever the reason, Kas brought the Undying King's rule to an end in a terrible battle that left Vecna's tower a heap of ash. Of Vecna, all that remained were one hand and one eye, grisly artifacts that still seek to work the Whispered One's will in the world.

The Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} might be found together or separately. The eye looks like a bloodshot organ torn free from the socket. The hand is a mummified and shriveled left extremity.

To attune to the eye, you must gouge out your own eye and press the artifact into the empty socket. The eye grafts itself to your head and remains there until you die. Once in place, the eye transforms into a golden eye with a slit for a pupil, much like that of a cat. If the eye is ever removed, you die.

To attune to the hand, you must lop off your left hand at the wrist and the press the artifact against the stump. The hand grafts itself to your arm and becomes a functioning appendage. If the hand is ever removed, you die.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} each have the following random properties:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}

entries.name: Properties of the Eye
entries: Your alignment changes to neutral evil, i obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You have {@sense truesight}.
Pots, com a acció, see as if you were wearing a {@item ring of X-ray vision}. You can end this effect as a bonus action.

The eye té 8 càrregues. You can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell clarividència} (2 charges), {@spell corona de bogeria} (1 charge), {@spell desintegrar} (4 charges), {@spell dominar criatura} (5 charges), or {@spell mal d'ull} (4 charges). The eye regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. Each time you cast a spell from the eye, there is a {@chance 5} chance that Vecna tears your soul from your body, devours it, and then takes control of the body like a puppet. If that happens, you become an NPC under el/la/li MM's control.

entries.name: Properties of the Eye and Hand
entries: If you are attuned to both the hand and eye, you gain the following additional benefits:

items: Ets immune a les malalties and poison.
Using the eye's X-ray vision never causes you to suffer {@condition exhaust}.
You experience premonitions of danger and, unless you are {@condition incapacitat}, can't be surprised.
If you start your turn with at least 1 hit point, you regain {@dice 1d10} hit points.

If a creature has a skeleton, you can attempt to turn its bones to jelly with a touch of the {@item Hand of Vecna}. You can do so by using an action to make a melee attack against a creature you can reach, using your choice of your melee attack bonus for weapons or spells. Si impacta, the target ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 18). Si falla, drop to 0 hit points.
Pots, com a acció, cast {@spell desig}. This property can't be used again until 30 days have passed.

entries.name: Destroying the Eye and Hand
entries: If the Eye of Vecna and the {@item Hand of Vecna} are both attached to the same creature, and that creature is slain by the {@item Sword of Kas}, both the eye and the hand burst into flame, turn to ash, and are destroyed forever. Any other attempt to destroy the eye or hand seems to work, but the artifact reappears in one of Vecna's many hidden vaults, where it waits to be rediscovered.

item.name: Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone
Eye patch with a mock eye set in blue sapphire and moonstone (Coalició Temerària)
Ulls Fascinants
entries: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. They have 3 charges. While wearing them, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell fascinar persona} spell (save DC 13) on a humanoid within 30 feet of you, provided that you and the target can see each other. The lenses regain all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Eyes of Minute Seeing
entries: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, you can see much better than normal out to a range of 1 foot. Tens avantatge a tirades de Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) checks that rely on sight while searching an area or studying an object within that range.

item.name: Ulls d'Àguila
entries: These crystal lenses fit over the eyes. While wearing them, tens avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista. In conditions of clear visibility, you can make out details of even extremely distant creatures and objects as small as 2 feet across.

item.name: Failed Experiment Vareta
entries: This wand has 2 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast either a green-flamed {@spell bola de foc} or a blue {@spell llampec} at random from it (save DC 15).
For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Falkir's Helm of Pigheadedness
entries: This steel helm is shaped like the head of a boar. Once you don the helm, it can't be removed until you die or until a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic is cast on it. If you wear the helm and are a humanoid, you gain the following flaw until the helm is removed: "I'm exceedingly stubborn and think I'm right all the time." (This flaw supersedes any conflicting flaw.)

item.name: Fane-Eater
item.reqAttune: by an evil cleric or paladí
entries: Fane-Eater is a battleaxe belonging to {@creature Arkhan the Cruel|BGDIA}.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls with Fane-Eater. If you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, the creature takes an extra {@dice 2d8} de dany necròtic, and you regain a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage taken.

item.name: Far Gear
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Carisma saving throws, and tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma ({@skill Intimidació}) checks.

entries.name: Aberrant Ally
entries: You can conjure an aberrant creature from the chaos of the multiverse to serve you. This functions as the {@spell Convocar Celestial} spell (no concentration required), except the creature you summon is an aberration amb un valor de repte de 4 o menor. Once you use this feature of the far gear, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Unnatural Perdició
entries: You can cast the {@spell perdició} spell (save DC 15), which affects any number of creatures within range durant 1 minut. Once you use this feature of the far gear, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by el/la/li MM.

item.name: Far Realm Shard
entries: This writhing crystal is steeped in the warped essence of the Far Realm. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can cause a slimy tentacle to rip through the fabric of reality and strike una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. La criatura ha de salvar per Carisma amb la teva CD de salvació de conjur. Si falla rep{@damage 3d6} de dany psíquic and become {@condition acovardit} de tu fins el final del teu proper torn.

item.name: Feather of Diatryma Summoning
entries: This bright plume is made from the feather of a {@creature diatryma|wdh} (pronounced dee-ah-TRY-mah), a Large, colorful, flightless bird native to the Sotafoscor. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the feather into a Large unoccupied space on the ground within 5 feet of you, the feather becomes a living diatryma for up to 6 hours, after which it reverts to its feather form. It reverts to feather form early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching the bird.
When the diatryma reverts to feather form, the magic of the feather can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

The diatryma uses the statistics of an {@creature axe beak}, except that its beak deals piercing damage instead of slashing damage. La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats, and it can be used as a mount. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the diatryma defends itself but takes no other actions.

item.name: Feather Token
entries: This small metal disk is inscribed with the image of a feather. When you fall at least 20 feet while the token is on your person, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling. The token's magic is expended after you land, whereupon the disk becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Feathered mantle with emerald clasp (Imperi del Sol)
Terra Fata Shard
entries: This warm crystal glints with the sunset colors of the Terra Fata sky and evokes whispers of emotional memory. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Manual del Jugador|PHB}. If the result is a spell, it is too wild to be affected by your Metamàgia, and if it normally requires concentration, it doesn't require concentration in this case; the spell lasts for its full duration.
If you don't have the Wild Magic Origen Sortiller, once this property is used to roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Bronze Griffon
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature griffon||Bronze Griffon}.
This bronze statuette is of a {@creature griffon} rampant. It can become a {@creature griffon} for up to 6 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 5 days have passed.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Ebony Volar
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature mosca gegant|dmg|Ebony Volar}.

This ebony statuette is carved in the likeness of a horsefly. It can become a {@creature mosca gegant|dmg} for up to 12 hours and can be ridden as a mount. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 2 days have passed.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Golden Lions
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature lion||Golden Lions}.

These gold statuettes of lions are always created in pairs. You can use one figurine or both simultaneously. Each can become a {@creature lion} for up to 1 hour. Once a {@creature lion} has been used, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Ivory Goats
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature riding horse||Ivory Goats}.
These ivory statuettes of goats are always created in sets of three. Each goat looks unique and functions differently from the others. Their properties are as follows:

items: The goat of traveling can become a Large goat with the same statistics as a {@creature riding horse}. It has 24 charges, and each hour or portion thereof it spends in beast form costs 1 charge. While it has charges, you can use it as often as you wish. When it runs out of charges, it reverts to a figurine and can't be used again until 7 days have passed, when it regains all its charges.
The goat of travail becomes a {@creature giant goat} for up to 3 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 30 days have passed.

The goat of terror becomes a {@creature giant goat} for up to 3 hours. The goat can't attack, but you can remove its horns and use them as weapons. One horn becomes a +1 lance, and the other becomes a +2 longsword. Removing a horn requires an action, and the weapons disappear and the horns return when the goat reverts to figurine form. A més, the goat radiates a 30-foot-radius aura of terror while you are riding it. Any creature hostile to you that starts its turn in the aura ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, està {@condition acovardit} of the goat for 1 minute, or until the goat reverts to figurine form. La criatura {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Once it successfully saves against the effect, a creature is immune to the goat's aura durant les properes 24 hores. Once the figurine has been used, it can't be used again until 15 days have passed.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Marble Elephant
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature elephant||Marble Elephant}.
This marble statuette is about 4 inches high and long. It can become an {@creature elephant} for up to 24 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Obsidian Steed
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature nightmare||Obsidian Steed}.

This polished obsidian horse can become a {@creature nightmare} for up to 24 hours. The {@creature nightmare} fights only to defend itself. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 5 days have passed.

If you have a good alignment, the figurine has a {@chance 10} chance each time you use it to ignore your orders, including a command to revert to figurine form. If you mount the {@creature nightmare} while it is ignoring your orders, you and the {@creature nightmare} are instantly transported to a random location on the plane of Hades, where the {@creature nightmare} reverts to figurine form.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Onyx Dog
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature mastiff||Onyx Dog}.

This onyx statuette of a dog can become a {@creature mastiff} for up to 6 hours. The {@creature mastiff} has an Intel·ligència of 8 and can speak Common. It also has {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 60 feet and can see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects within that range. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Serpentine Owl
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature giant owl||Serpentine Owl}.

This serpentine statuette of an owl can become a {@creature giant owl} for up to 8 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 2 days have passed. The owl can telepathically communicate with you at any range if you and it are on the same plane of existence.

item.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power, Silver Raven
entries: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the paraula màgica and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you, the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objects, or if there isn't enough space for the creature, the figurine doesn't become a creature.
La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.

The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passed, as specified in the figurine's description.
{@creature raven||Silver Raven}.

This silver statuette of a raven can become a raven for up to 12 hours. Once it has been used, it can't be used again until 2 days have passed. While en forma de corb, the figurine allows you to cast the {@spell missatger animal} spell on it at will.

item.name: Finder's Goggles
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Marcatroba
entries: The lenses of these garish goggles are carved from Siberys dragonshards. While wearing these lenses, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Quan fas una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}), you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the check.

Com a acció, you can use the goggles to examine an object to identify the aura of the last creature that touched it. Make una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) against a DC of 13 + the number of days since the last contact occurred. On a success, you learn the creature's type and can immediately use the goggles to cast {@spell localitzar criatura} to find that creature. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Fine gold chain set with a fire opal
Fine gold chain with fire opals (Legió del Crepuscle)
Fine robe with dinosaur feathers and silver embroidery (Imperi del Sol)
Fine steel rapier with gold filigree hilt (Legió del Crepuscle)
Finely articulated jade glove (Advenidors del Riu)
Fire Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Fire Opal
entries: A translucent fiery red gemstone worth.

item.name: Material de PEsca
entries: This kit includes a wooden rod, silken line, corkwood bobbers, steel hooks, lead sinkers, velvet lures, and narrow netting.

item.name: Flame Tongue Shortsword of Greed
entries: Pots, com a acció bonus, speak this magic sword's paraula màgica, causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed llum forta en un radi de 40 peus i llum tènue uns 40 peus adicionals. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany de foc to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the paraula màgica again or until you drop or sheathe the sword.
While you are attuned to this sword pots, com a acció, mentally command it to detect gems and jewels. You learn the kind and number of such objects within 60 feet of the sword.

item.name: Flask
entries: A flask holds 1 pint of liquid.

item.name: Flensing Claws (Huge)
entries: Flensing claws take the form of articulated digits that extend into long metal blades. The claws are knitted into the flesh and bones of a creature's arms and can't be removed without surgical amputation.

Each set of flensing claws is designed for a specific creature and can't be used by anyone else. A creature equipped with flensing claws can use its action to make one atac armat cos a cos with the claws. The creature adds its proficiency bonus and Força modifier to any attack roll made with the claws, and its Força modifier to its damage roll when it hits a target with the claws.

item.name: Flensing Claws (Large)
entries: Flensing claws take the form of articulated digits that extend into long metal blades. The claws are knitted into the flesh and bones of a creature's arms and can't be removed without surgical amputation.

Each set of flensing claws is designed for a specific creature and can't be used by anyone else. A creature equipped with flensing claws can use its action to make one atac armat cos a cos with the claws. The creature adds its proficiency bonus and Força modifier to any attack roll made with the claws, and its Força modifier to its damage roll when it hits a target with the claws.

item.name: Flensing Claws (Medium)
entries: Flensing claws take the form of articulated digits that extend into long metal blades. The claws are knitted into the flesh and bones of a creature's arms and can't be removed without surgical amputation.

Each set of flensing claws is designed for a specific creature and can't be used by anyone else. A creature equipped with flensing claws can use its action to make one atac armat cos a cos with the claws. The creature adds its proficiency bonus and Força modifier to any attack roll made with the claws, and its Força modifier to its damage roll when it hits a target with the claws.

item.name: Flensing Claws (Small)
entries: Flensing claws take the form of articulated digits that extend into long metal blades. The claws are knitted into the flesh and bones of a creature's arms and can't be removed without surgical amputation.

Each set of flensing claws is designed for a specific creature and can't be used by anyone else. A creature equipped with flensing claws can use its action to make one atac armat cos a cos with the claws. The creature adds its proficiency bonus and Força modifier to any attack roll made with the claws, and its Força modifier to its damage roll when it hits a target with the claws.

item.name: Flying Chariot
entries: The chariot's riders and creatures pulling the chariot gain a +1 bonus to their AC.
If this magic chariot is pulled by one or more flying creatures, it too can fly.

entries.name: Chariots
entries: Chariots and the creatures pulling them work like controlled mounts, as described in the mounted combat rules in the {@book Manual del Jugador|PHB|9|Mounted Combat}, but with the following differences:

items: Mounting or dismounting a chariot costs you 5 feet of movement, rather than a number of feet equal to half your speed.
Being mounted on a chariot grants you half cover.
A chariot's speed is equal to the speed of the slowest creature pulling it.
If multiple creatures are pulling the chariot, they all act on the same initiative, and they must take the same action on their turn.

item.name: Folding Boat
entries: This object appears as a wooden box that measures 12 inches long, 6 inches wide, and 6 inches deep. It weighs 4 pounds and floats. It can be opened to store items inside. This item also has three paraula màgicas, each requiring you to use an action to speak it.

One paraula màgica causes the box to unfold into a boat 10 feet long, 4 feet wide, and 2 feet deep. The boat has one pair of oars, an anchor, a mast, and a lateen sail. The boat can hold up to four Medium creatures comfortably.

The second paraula màgica causes the box to unfold into a ship 24 feet long, 8 feet wide; and 6 feet deep. The ship has a deck, rowing seats, five sets of oars, a steering oar, an anchor, a deck cabin, and a mast with a square sail. The ship can hold fifteen Medium creatures comfortably.
When the box becomes a vessel, its weight becomes that of a normal vessel its size, and anything that was stored in the box remains in the boat.

The third paraula màgica causes the folding boat to fold back into a box, provided that no creatures are aboard. Any objects in the vessel that can't fit inside the box remain outside the box as it folds. Any objects in the vessel that can fit inside the box do so.

item.name: Force Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Kit de falsificació
entries: This small box contains a variety of papers and parchments, pens and inks, seals and lacre, gold and silver leaf, and other supplies necessary to create convincing forgeries of physical documents. Tenir competència amb aquest kit et permet sumar el teu bonus de competència a tota tirada d'habilitat per a create a physical forgery of a document.
additionalEntries: A kit de falsificació is designed to duplicate documents and to make it easier to copy a person's seal or signature.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: A kit de falsificació includes several different types of ink, a variety of parchments and papers, several quills, seals and lacre, gold and silver leaf, and small tools to sculpt melted wax to mimic a seal.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: A kit de falsificació can be used in conjunction with the Arcana skill to determine if a magic item is real or fake.

additionalEntries.name: Deception
entries: A well-crafted forgery, such as papers proclaiming you to be a noble or a writ that grants you safe passage, can lend credence to a lie.

additionalEntries.name: Història
entries: A kit de falsificació combined with your knowledge of history improves your ability to create fake historical documents or to tell if an old document is authentic.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: When you examine objects, proficiency with a kit de falsificació is useful for determining how an object was made and whether it is genuine.

additionalEntries.name: Other Eines
entries: Knowledge of other tools makes your forgeries that much more believable. For example, you could combine proficiency with a kit de falsificació and proficiency with cartographer's tools to make a fake map.

additionalEntries.name: Quick Fake
entries: Com a part d'un Descans Curt, you can produce a forged document no more than one page in length. Com a part d'un Descans Llarg, you can produce a document that is up to four pages long. Your Intel·ligència check using a kit de falsificació determines the DC for someone else's Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) check to spot the fake.

additionalEntries.caption: Kit de falsificació
rows: Mimic handwriting
Duplicate a wax seal

item.name: Fragmentation Grenade
entries: Com a acció, a character can throw a grenade at a point fins a 60 peus away. With a grenade launcher, the character can propel the grenade fins a 120 peus away.
Each creature with 20 feet of an exploding fragmentation grenade ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, rep {@damage 5d6} de dany perforant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Fulminating Treatise
entries: This thick, scorched spellbook reeks of smoke and ozone, and sparks of energy crackles along the edges of its pages. When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell contingència}, {@spell bola de foc}, {@spell ràfega de vent}, {@spell Barraca Diminuta d'en Leomund}, {@spell missil màgic}, {@spell tronada}, i {@spell paret de força}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the evocation school.

When one creature you can see takes damage from an evocation spell you cast, you can use your reaction and expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@damage 2d6} de dany de força to the creature and knock the creature {@condition enderrocat} if it is Large or smaller.

item.name: Galder's Bubble Pipe
entries: This finely carved pipe blows odorless bubbles instead of smoke when used. The pipe has 3 charges, and it regains all spent charges daily at dawn. While you hold the pipe, you can expend charges to gain access to the following properties:

items: Pots llançar el conjur {@spell núvol de boira} as an action (1 charge).
Pots llançar el conjur {@spell pas boira} as a bonus action (2 charges).

You can summon a {@creature steam mephit} as an action (3 charges). The mephit is friendly to you, obeys your verbal commands, and acts on its own turn in the initiative order. It disappears in a harmless puff of steam after 1 minute or if it ends its turn more than 60 feet from the pipe.

item.name: Garnet
entries: A transparent red, brown-green, or violet gemstone.

item.name: Gauntlets of Flaming Fury
entries: While you wear both of these steel gauntlets, any non-magical weapon you grasp with either gauntlet is treated as a arma màgica. Com a acció bonus, you can use the gauntlets to cause magical flames to envelop one or two melee weapons in your grasp. Each flaming weapon deals an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany de foc on a hit. The flames last until you sheath or let go of either weapon. Once used, this property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Guants de Poder d'Ogre
entries: Your Força score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect on you if your Força is already 19 or higher without them.

item.name: Gavel of the Venn Rune
entries: This wooden gavel is small by giant reckoning but nearly the size of a warhammer in human hands. The venn (friend) rune is inscribed in mitrall in the base of the haft. Among giants, this item is used as part of rituals to resolve disputes. The gavel has the following properties.

entries.name: Arbiters Shield
entries: At the start of every combat, attack rolls against you have disadvantage before the start of your first turn, provided that the gavel is on your person.

entries.name: Bond of Amity
entries: Com a acció, you can use the gavel to strike a point on a hard surface. The first time in the next minute that a creature within 60 feet of that point deals damage to another creature with an attack that hits, the attacker takes psychic damage equal to half the damage it dealt to the target. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Truth
entries: You can transfer the gavel's magic to a place by tracing the venn rune on the ground with your finger. The point where you trace it becomes the center of a spherical area of magic that has a 30-foot radius and that is fixed to the place. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the gavel to be within 5 feet of you. At the end, the gavel is destroyed, and the area gains the following property:
Whenever a creature utters a lie while within the 30-foot-radius sphere, that creature takes 5 psychic damage and flinches visibly.

item.name: Gem of Brightness
entries: This prism has 50 charges. While you are holding it, pots, com a acció, speak one of three paraula màgicas to cause one of the following effects:

items: The first paraula màgica causes the gem to shed llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals. This effect doesn't expend a charge. It lasts until you use a bonus action to repeat the paraula màgica or until you use another function of the gem.

The second paraula màgica expends 1 charge and causes the gem to fire a brilliant beam of light at una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. La criatura ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition encegat} durant 1 minut. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

The third paraula màgica expends 5 charges and causes the gem to flare with blinding light en un con de 30 peus originating from it. Tota criatura a dins del con must make a saving throw as if struck by the beam created with the second paraula màgica.

entries: When all of the gem's charges are expended, the gem becomes a nonmagical jewel worth 50 gp.

item.name: Gema de Visió
entries: This gem has 3 charges. Com a acció, you can speak the gem's paraula màgica and expend 1 charge. Durant els 10 minuts següents, you have {@sense truesight} out to 120 feet when you peer through the gem.
The gem recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

item.name: Ghost Lantern
entries: A restless spirit is trapped inside this lantern. While holding the lantern, you can command the spirit as a bonus action to shed llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.
While holding the lantern, pots, com a acció, order the spirit to leave the lantern and duplicate the effect of the {@spell mà de mag} spell. The spirit returns to the lantern quan acaba el conjur.
If you fall {@condition inconscient} within 10 feet of the lantern, the spirit emerges from it, magically stabilizes you with a touch, and then quickly returns to the lantern.
The spirit is bound to the lantern and can't be harmed, turned, or raised from the dead.
Casting a {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell on the lantern releases the spirit to the afterlife and renders the lantern nonmagical.

item.name: Ghost Step Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this tattoo shifts and wavers on the skin, parts of it appearing blurred.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Ghostly Form
entries: The tattoo has 3 charges, and it regains all expended charges daily at dawn. As a bonus action while the tattoo is on your skin, you can expend 1 of the tattoo's charges to become incorporeal fins el final del teu proper torn. For the duration, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens resistència al dany bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks.
You can't be {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

You can move through creatures and solid objects as if they were terreny difícil. If you end your turn in a solid object, you rep {@damage 1d10} de dany de força. If the effect ends while you are inside a solid object, you instead are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space, and you rep {@damage 1d10} de dany de força for every 5 feet traveled.

item.name: Ghost Step Tattoo
entries: This tattoo shifts and wavers on the skin, parts of it appearing blurred. The tattoo has 3 charges, and it regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
As a bonus action while the tattoo is on your skin, you can expend 1 of the tattoo's charges to become incorporeal fins el final del teu proper torn. For the duration, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens resistència al dany bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks.
You can't be {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

You can move through creatures and solid objects as if they were terreny difícil. If you end your turn in a solid object, you rep {@damage 1d10} de dany de força. If the effect ends while you are inside a solid object, you instead are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space, and you rep {@damage 1d10} de dany de força for every 5 feet traveled.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Glamoured Studded Leather
entries: Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens +1 a la CA. You can also use a bonus action to speak the armor's paraula màgica and cause the armor to assume the appearance of a normal set of clothing or some other kind of armor. You decide what it looks like, including color, style, and accessories, but the armor retains its normal bulk and weight. The illusory appearance lasts until you use this property again or remove the armor.

item.name: Glass Bottle
entries: A bottle holds 1½ pints of liquid.

item.name: Eines de Bufar Vidre
additionalEntries: Someone who is proficient with glassblower's tools has not only the ability to shape glass, but also specialized knowledge of the methods used to produce glass objects.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: The tools include a blowpipe, a small marver, blocks, and tweezers. You need a source of heat to work glass.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History
