entries: Your knowledge of glassmaking techniques aids you when you examine glass objects, such as potion bottles or glass items found in a treasure hoard. For instance, you can study how a glass potion bottle has been changed by its contents to help determine a potion's effects. (A potion might leave behind a residue, deform the glass, or stain it.)

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: When you study an area, your knowledge can aid you if the clues include broken glass or glass objects.

additionalEntries.name: Identify Weakness
entries: With 1 minute of study, you can identify the weak points in a glass object. Any damage dealt to the object by striking a weak spot is doubled.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Bufar Vidre
rows: Identify source of glass
Determine what a glass object once held

item.name: Glaur
entries: Short, curved horns like a cornucopia. Played with valves, glaur sound like trumpets, while those without valves, known as gloon, have a more mournful sound.

item.name: Guants per Atrapar Projectils
entries: These gloves seem to almost meld into your hands when you don them. When a atac armat a distància hits you while you're wearing them, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d10} + el teu modificador de Destresa, provided that you have a free hand. If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile if it is small enough for you to hold in that hand.

item.name: Gloves of Soul Catching
entries: Your Constitució score is 20 while you wear these gloves. This property of the gloves has no effect on you if your Constitució is already 20 or higher.

After making a successful atac desarmat while wearing these gloves, you can use the gloves to deal an extra {@damage 2d10} de dany de força to the target, and you regain a number of hit points equal to the force damage dealt. Alternativament, instead of regaining hit points in this way, you can choose to gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw you make before the end of your next turn.

item.name: Guants de Natació i Escalada
entries: While wearing these gloves, climbing and swimming don't cost you extra movement, and Tens un +5 a Força ({@skill Atletisme}) checks made to climb or swim.

item.name: Guants de Lladregot
entries: These gloves are {@condition invisible} while worn. While wearing them, Tens un +5 a Destresa ({@skill Joc de Mans}) checks and Destresa checks made to pick locks.

item.name: Gnomengarde Grenade
entries: This small metallic object is comprised of rune-covered parts made from different metals, linked together with a variety of gears, bands, bits, and bobs. The metals are all different colors, making the grenade shine with a rainbow of color when held up in the light.

Com a acció bonus, a creature can turn a special key to arm the grenade. Once armed, the grenade explodes in a matter of seconds. Com a acció, the wielder can hurl the grenade fins a 120 peus. At the end of their turn, the grenade explodes. All creatures within 60 feet of the grenade when it explodes suffer the following effects:

items: Each creature ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15), taking 28 (8d6) de dany de foc si falla, or half as much fire damage on a successful one.

Each creature ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, rep 28 (8d6) de dany de tro i està {@condition atordit} fins el final del seu proper torn. Si supera, it takes half as much thunder damage i no està {@condition atordit}.

The wielder rolls on the chart* for the {@item wand of wonder|dmg} three times, rerolling any duplicate results. Any effects that specify a target affect all creatures in range of the grenade when it explodes. Any effects that would affect the wielder of the wand instead affect the closest creature to the grenade when it goes off.

entries: The grenade explodes immediately if a creature places it in an extradimensional space or teleports while in possession of it. The effects of the explosion will be felt at both the origin and terminus of the teleportation, but only affecting all creatures within 30 feet of either location.

item.name: Ulleres de Nit
entries: While wearing these dark lenses, tens {@sense visió de foscor} a 60 peus d'abast. If you already have {@sense visió de foscor}, wearing the goggles increases its range by 60 feet.

item.name: Goggles of Object Reading
entries: These leather-framed goggles feature purple crystal lenses. While wearing the goggles, tens avantatge a tirades de Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) checks made to reveal information about a creature or object you can see.
A més, you can cast the {@spell identificar} spell using the googles. Once you do so, you can't do so again until the next dawn.

item.name: Gold (gp)
entries: Common coins come in several different denominations based on the relative worth of the metal from which they are made. The three most common coins are the gold piece (gp), the silver piece (sp), and the copper piece (cp).

With one gold piece, a character can buy a belt pouch, 50 feet of good rope, or a goat. A skilled (but not exceptional) artisan can earn one gold piece a day. The gold piece is the standard unit of measure for wealth, even if the coin itself is not commonly used. When merchants discuss deals that involve goods or services worth hundreds or thousands of gold pieces, the transactions don't usually involve the exchange of individual coins. Rather, the gold piece is a standard measure of value, and the actual exchange is in gold bars, letters of credit, or valuable goods.
One gold piece is worth ten silver pieces, the most prevalent coin among commoners. A silver piece buys a laborer's work for a day, a flask of lamp oil, or a night's rest in a poor inn.
One silver piece is worth ten copper pieces, which are common among laborers and beggars. A single copper piece buys a candle, a torch, or a piece of chalk.

A més, unusual coins made of other precious metals sometimes appear in treasure hoards. The electrum piece (ep) and the platinum piece (pp) originate from fallen empires and lost kingdoms, and they sometimes arouse suspicion and skepticism when used in transactions. An electrum piece is worth five silver pieces, and a platinum piece is worth ten gold pieces.
A standard coin weighs about a third of an ounce, so fifty coins weigh a pound.

item.name: Gold basin with rubies (Legió del Crepuscle)
Gold bird cage with electrum filigree
Gold chalice set with emeralds (Legió del Crepuscle)
Gold circlet set with four aquamarines
Gold dragon comb set with red garnets as eyes
Cota d'Escates de Drac d'Or
entries: La cota d'escates de drac està feta d'escames d'un tipus de drac. Alguns dracs coleccionen les escates que han mudad i les regalen als humanoides. En altres casos els caçadors curen i preserven la pell d'un drac mort amb molta cura. Sia com sia, una cota d'escates de drac és molt valuosa. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens: +1 a la CA; avantatge a salvar contra l'Alè d'Atac i la Presència Aterradora dels dracs; i resistència al dany de foc.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac gold més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Gold jewelry box with platinum filigree
Gold jewelry box with platinum filigree (Coalició Temerària)
Gold locket with a painted portrait inside
Gold locket with a painted portrait inside (Legió del Crepuscle)
Gold pendant with black onyx (Legió del Crepuscle)
Gold ring with turquoise (Legió del Crepuscle)
Gold-plated ceremonial helmet and pauldrons (Legió del Crepuscle)
Golgari Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Golgari, allows you to cast {@spell enredar}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Golgari's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Golgari Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Golgari guild
entries: Made from deep green jade with black veins, this keyrune has an insectile shape. It can transform into a {@creature giant scorpion} for up to 6 hours. The scorpion has an Intel·ligència of 4 and can communicate with you telepathically while it is within 60 feet of you, though its messages are largely limited to describing the passage of potential prey.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature giant scorpion}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Gravenhollow Compass Anell
entries: This gold ring is fitted with a star ruby worth 1,000 gp. A {@spell detectar màgia} spell reveals that the gem radiates a faint aura of divination magic. The gem's star-shaped core is a magical compass that guides the ring's wearer along the safest, shortest route to Gravenhollow.

item.name: Greater Silver Sword
item.reqAttune: by a creature that has psionic ability
entries: Aquesta arma màgica té un +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. While you hold the sword, tens avantatge a tirades de Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws, you are immune to being charmed, and tens resistència al dany psíquic damage. A més, if you score a critical hit with it against a creature's astral body, you can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing.

item.name: Green Copper Ewer
entries: Any poisonous liquid poured into the ewer is instantly transformed into an equal amount of sweet wine. Furthermore, a creature that grasps the ewer's handle can command the ewer to fill with 1 gallon of wine, and it can't produce more wine until the next dawn.

item.name: Green Dragon Mask
entries: This mottled green mask is surmounted by a frilled crest and has leathery spiked plates along its jaw. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties

entries.name: Absorbir Dany
entries: You have resistance against poison damage. If you already have resistance to poison damage from another source, you instead have immunity to poison damage. If you already have immunity to poison damage from another source, whenever you are subjected to poison damage, you take none of that damage and regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt of that type.

entries.name: Inefabilitat Dracònica
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Carisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense visió de foscor} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense visió a cegues} out to 30 feet durant 5 minuts.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Dracònic. A més, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma you make against Green Dragons.

entries.name: Resistència Llegendària
entries: (1/Dia) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: You pot respirar sota l'aigua.

item.name: Cota d'Escates de Drac Verd
entries: Dragon cota d'escates is made of the scales of one kind of dragon. Sometimes dragons collect their cast-off scales and gift them to humanoids. Other times, hunters carefully skin and preserve the hide of a dead dragon. In either case, dragon cota d'escates is highly valued. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens +1 a la CA, tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against the Presència Aterradora and breath weapons of dragons, i tens resistència al dany de verí.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac green més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Grenade Launcher
entries: Com a acció, a character can throw a grenade at a point fins a 60 peus away. With a grenade launcher, the character can propel the grenade fins a 120 peus away.

item.name: Grimoire Infinitus
entries: Several of these spellbooks with gilded pages and silver-plated covers were created during the Age of Arcanum, but only one has been found since the Calamity ended. The book has an infinite number of pages, is three inches thick, eight inches wide, twelve inches long, and weighs three pounds.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: Most of the book is blank, but the following spells are recorded in the first pages of the tome: {@spell alarma}, {@spell camp antimàgic}, {@spell Mà d'en Bigby}, {@spell plaga}, {@spell fascinar persona}, {@spell confusió}, {@spell controlar el temps}, {@spell crear no-morts}, {@spell detectar pensaments}, {@spell engrandir/enxiquir}, {@spell temor}, {@spell presagiar}, {@spell forma gasosa}, {@spell glif de guarda}, {@spell recordar llegendes}, {@spell Barraca Diminuta d'en Leomund}, {@spell suggestió massiva}, {@spell desconcertar}, {@spell pas boira}, {@spell Gos Lleial d'en Mordenkainen}, {@spell esprai prismàtic}, {@spell raig d'afebliment}, {@spell imatge silenciosa}, {@spell teleportació}, i {@spell tronada}.

You can use the grimoire as your spellbook, and you can scribe new spells into it as normal. When you prepare wizard spells using the grimoire, the number of wizard spells you can prepare increases by 1.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Grimoire Infinitus reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: While you carry the spellbook, tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against spells and magical effects.
When you prepare wizard spells using the grimoire as your spellbook, the number of spells you can prepare increases by 1 again.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Grimoire Infinitus reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: You can now use your Recuperació Arcana feature twice between long rests, rather than once.
When you prepare wizard spells using the grimoire as your spellbook, the number of spells you can prepare increases by 1 again.

item.name: Grovelthrash
entries: Crafted from a single piece of obsidian, this warhammer of Torog hums with magical energy and is carved with the images of faces screaming in pain.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Grovelthrash is a sentient neutral evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 18, a Saviesa of 15, and a Carisma of 19. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, and Infernal.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A covetous {@creature ultroloth} named Ciria lives within Grovelthrash. The weapon values material possessions and doling out pain. It compliments its wielder whenever they claim treasure and takes pleasure in harming others.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The warhammer grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Abyssal and Infernal.

Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. When you hit with an attack using this warhammer, you can deal an extra {@damage 2d6} de dany contundent to the target. If you do, you rep {@damage 1d6} de dany psíquic. The warhammer deals double damage to objects and structures.
While holding this weapon, tens avantatge a tirades de Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) checks made to discern a lie spoken in a language you understand.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the warhammer reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
You gain a burrowing speed equal to your walking speed. You can use your burrowing speed to move through sand, loose earth, mud, or ice, not solid rock.

When una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast t'impacta amb un atac while you are wielding the warhammer, you can use your reaction to deal an amount of psychic damage to that creature equal to the damage you took from the attack. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the warhammer reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.

When you have fewer hit points than half your punts de vida màxims, the warhammer deals an extra {@damage 2d6} de dany contundent on a hit. You can burrow through solid rock at half your burrowing speed and leave a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in your wake.

Com a acció, you can use the warhammer to cast one of the following spells from it (save DC 17): {@spell terratrèmol}, {@spell fondre's dins la pedra}, o {@spell moldejar la pedra}. Once a spell has been cast using the warhammer, that spell can't be cast from the warhammer again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Gruul Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Gruul, allows you to cast {@spell forçar el duel}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Gruul's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Gruul Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Gruul guild
entries: This crude keyrune is cobbled together from bits of rubble, broken glass, bone, and animal hair. One end resembles a horned beast. On command, the keyrune transforms into a ceratok, a horned creature much like a {@creature rhinoceros} (and with the same statistics). It remains in its ceratok form durant 1 hora.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a ceratok. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Guardian Emblem
entries: This emblem is the symbol of a deity or a spiritual tradition. Com a acció, you can attach the emblem to a suit of armor or a shield or remove it.

The emblem té 3 càrregues. When you or una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast suffers a critical hit while you're wearing the armor or wielding the shield that bears the emblem, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge to turn the critical hit into a normal hit instead.
The emblem regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Gulthias Staff
entries: Made from the branch of a Gulthias tree (see the {@creature twig plaga||blights} entry of the Monster Manual), a Gulthias staff is a spongy, black length of wood. Its evil makes beasts visibly uncomfortable while within 30 feet of it. The staff has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} of its expended charges daily at dusk.
If the staff is broken or burned to ashes, its wood releases a terrible, inhuman scream that can be heard out to a range of 300 feet. All blights that can hear the scream immediately wither and die.

entries.name: Vampiric Strike
entries: The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff. Si impacta, it deals damage as a normal quarterstaff, and you can expend 1 charge to regain a number of hit points equal to the damage dealt by the weapon. Each time a charge is spent, red blood oozes from the staff's pores, and you ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 12). Si falla, be afflicted with {@table Short-Term Madness|DMG|short term madness} (see "{@variantrule Madness|DMG}" in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

entries.name: Blight Perdició
entries: While you are attuned to the staff, blights and other evil plant creatures don't regard you as hostile unless you harm them.

item.name: Gunpowder Horn
entries: Gunpowder is chiefly used to propel a bullet out of the barrel of a pistol or rifle, or it is formed into a bomb. Gunpowder is sold in small wooden kegs or in water-resistant powder horns.

Setting fire to a container full of gunpowder can cause it to explode, dealing fire damage to creatures within 10 feet of it ({@damage 3d6} for a powder horn). A successful DC 12 Destresa saving throw halves the damage. Setting fire to an ounce of gunpowder causes it to flare for 1 round, shedding llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.

item.name: Gunpowder Keg
entries: Gunpowder is chiefly used to propel a bullet out of the barrel of a pistol or rifle, or it is formed into a bomb. Gunpowder is sold in small wooden kegs or in water-resistant powder horns.

Setting fire to a container full of gunpowder can cause it to explode, dealing fire damage to creatures within 10 feet of it ({@damage 7d6} for a keg). A successful DC 12 Destresa saving throw halves the damage. Setting fire to an ounce of gunpowder causes it to flare for 1 round, shedding llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.

item.name: Gurt's Greataxe
entries: In the Year of the Icy Axe (123 DR), the {@creature frost giant} Lord Gurt fell to Uthgar Gardolfsson—leader of the folk who would become the Uthgardt barbarians—in a battle that marked the ascendance of humankind over the giants in the Dessarin Valley. Gurt's greataxe was buried in Morgur's Mound until it was unearthed and brought back to Waterdeep. After laying in the city's vaults for decades, the axe was given to Harshnag, a {@creature frost giant} adventurer, in recognition of his service to Waterdeep. Uthgardt barbarians recognize the weapon on sight and attack any giant that wields it.

Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. It is sized for a giant, weighs 325 pounds, and deals {@dice 3d12} de dany tallant on a hit, plus an extra {@dice 2d12} de dany tallant if the target is human.
The axe sheds light as a torch when the temperature around it drops below 0 degrees Fahrenheit. The light can't be shut off in these conditions.

Com a acció, you can cast a version of the {@spell escalfar el metall} spell (save DC 13) that deals cold damage instead of fire damage. Once this power is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Eines de Hacker
entries: This kit contains the hardware and software necessary to allow access into most computer systems and electronic devices. Proficiency with eines de hacker lets you add el teu bonus de competència to any Intel·ligència checks you make to connect to or make use of a computer system or electronic device. The kit fits snugly in a backpack or toolbox.

item.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic i està {@condition encegat} durant 24 hores.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition encegat}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

item.name: Hammer of Thunderbolts
entries: Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

entries.name: Giant's Bane (requereix harmonització)
entries: You must be wearing a {@italic cinturó de giant strength} (any variety) and {@item guants de poder d'ogre} to attune to this weapon. The attunement ends if you take off either of those items. While you are attuned to this weapon and holding it, your Força score increases by 4 and can exceed 20, but not 30. When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon against a giant, the giant ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17). Si falla, die.

The hammer also té 5 càrregues. While attuned to it, you can expend 1 charge and make a atac armat a distància with the hammer, hurling it as if it had the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. If the attack hits, the hammer unleashes a Esclat de Tro audible out to 300 feet. The target and every creature within 30 feet of it ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17). Si falla, està {@condition atordit} fins el final del teu proper torn. The hammer regains {@dice 1d4 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Hand Drum
entries: A double-headed skin drum fitted with handles along its side.

item.name: Hand of Vecna
entries: Seldom is the name of Vecna spoken except in a hushed voice. Vecna was, in his time, one of the mightiest of all wizards. Through dark magic and conquest, he forged a terrible empire. For all his power, Vecna couldn't escape his own mortality. He began to fear death and take steps to prevent his end from ever coming about.

{@creature Orcus|MTF}, the demon prince of undeath, taught Vecna a ritual that would allow him to live on as a {@creature lich}. Beyond death, he became the greatest of all liches. Even though his body gradually withered and decayed, Vecna continued to expand his evil dominion. So formidable and hideous was his temper that his subjects feared to speak his name. He was the Whispered One, the Master of the Spider Throne, the Undying King, and the Lord of the Rotted Tower.

Some say that Vecna's lieutenant Kas coveted the Spider Throne for himself, or that the sword his lord made for him seduced him into rebellion. Whatever the reason, Kas brought the Undying King's rule to an end in a terrible battle that left Vecna's tower a heap of ash. Of Vecna, all that remained were one hand and one eye, grisly artifacts that still seek to work the Whispered One's will in the world.

The {@item Eye of Vecna} and the Hand of Vecna might be found together or separately. The eye looks like a bloodshot organ torn free from the socket. The hand is a mummified and shriveled left extremity.

To attune to the eye, you must gouge out your own eye and press the artifact into the empty socket. The eye grafts itself to your head and remains there until you die. Once in place, the eye transforms into a golden eye with a slit for a pupil, much like that of a cat. If the eye is ever removed, you die.

To attune to the hand, you must lop off your left hand at the wrist and the press the artifact against the stump. The hand grafts itself to your arm and becomes a functioning appendage. If the hand is ever removed, you die.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The {@item Eye of Vecna} and the Hand of Vecna each have the following random properties:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}

entries.name: Properties of the Hand
entries: Your alignment changes to neutral evil, i obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Your Força score becomes 20, unless it is already 20 or higher.
Any atac màgic cos a cos you make with the hand, and any atac armat cos a cos made with a weapon held by it, deals an extra {@dice 2d8} de dany de fred on a hit.

The hand té 8 càrregues. You can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell dit de la mort} (5 charges), {@spell adormir} (1 charge), {@spell alentir} (2 charges), or {@spell teleportació} (3 charges). The hand regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. Each time you cast a spell from the hand, it casts the {@spell suggestió} spell on you (save DC 18), demanding that you commit an evil act. The hand might have a specific act in mind or leave it up to you.

entries.name: Properties of the Eye and Hand
entries: If you are attuned to both the hand and eye, you gain the following additional benefits:

items: Ets immune a les malalties and poison.
Using the eye's X-ray vision never causes you to suffer {@condition exhaust}.
You experience premonitions of danger and, unless you are {@condition incapacitat}, can't be surprised.
If you start your turn with at least 1 hit point, you regain {@dice 1d10} hit points.

If a creature has a skeleton, you can attempt to turn its bones to jelly with a touch of the Hand of Vecna. You can do so by using an action to make a melee attack against a creature you can reach, using your choice of your melee attack bonus for weapons or spells. Si impacta, the target ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 18). Si falla, drop to 0 hit points.
Pots, com a acció, cast {@spell desig}. This property can't be used again until 30 days have passed.

entries.name: Destroying the Eye and Hand
entries: If the {@item Eye of Vecna} and the Hand of Vecna are both attached to the same creature, and that creature is slain by the {@item Sword of Kas}, both the eye and the hand burst into flame, turn to ash, and are destroyed forever. Any other attempt to destroy the eye or hand seems to work, but the artifact reappears in one of Vecna's many hidden vaults, where it waits to be rediscovered.

item.name: Harbor Lluna
entries: Platinum crescent inset with electrum, about three inches long with a hole large enough for a {@item nib|wdh} to fit in (1 harbor moon = 5,000 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Harkon's Bite
entries: A dire wolf tooth dangles from this simple cord necklace. While you wear it, the necklace grants you a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: Attuning to Harkon's Bite curses you until either Harkon Lukas removes the necklace from you or you are targeted by a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic. As long as you remain cursed, you cannot remove the necklace.

Upon donning or removing the necklace, whether you are attuned to it or not, you are afflicted with {@variantrule Player Characters as Lycanthropes|mm|home-llop lycanthropy} as detailed in the Monster Manual. The curse lasts until the dawn after the next full moon. If you are still wearing the necklace at this time, you are afflicted with the lycanthropy again.

item.name: Barret de Camuflatge
entries: Mentre vesteixis el hat, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell ego camuflatge} spell from it at will. The spell ends if the hat is removed.

item.name: Hat of Vermin
entries: This hat has 3 charges. While holding the hat, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges and speak a paraula màgica that summons your choice of a {@creature bat}, a {@creature frog}, or a {@creature rat}. The summoned creature magically appears in the hat and tries to get away from you as quickly as possible. The creature is neither friendly nor hostile, and it isn't under your control. It behaves as an ordinary creature of its kind and disappears passada 1 hora or when it es queda a 0 punts de vida. The hat regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Hat of Wizardry
entries: This antiquated, cone—shaped hat is adorned with gold crescent moons and stars. While you are wearing it, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You can use the hat com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.

You can try to cast a cantrip that you don't know. The cantrip must be on the llista de conjurs de mag, and you must make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) amb CD 10. If the check succeeds, you cast the spell. If the check fails, so does the spell, and the action used to cast the spell is wasted. In either case, you can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Hazirawn
entries: A sentient (neutral evil) greatsword, Hazirawn is capable of speech in Common and Netherese. Even if you aren't attuned to the sword, Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. If you are not attuned to Hazirawn, you deal an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany necròtic when you hit with the weapon.

entries.name: Increased Potency
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon, its bonus on attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and a hit deals an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany necròtic (instead of {@dice 1d6}).

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: Hazirawn has 4 charges to cast spells. As long as the sword is attuned to you and you are holding it in your hand, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell detectar màgia} (1 charge), {@spell detectar el bé i el mal} (1 charge), or {@spell detectar pensaments} (2 charges). Each night at midnight, Hazirawn regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges.

entries.name: Wounding
entries: While you are attuned to the weapon, any creature that you hit with Hazirawn can't regain hit points durant 1 minut. The target can make a DC 15 Constitució saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending this effect early on a success.

attachedSpells: detectar el bé i el mal

item.name: Diadema d'Intel·lecte
entries: Your Intel·ligència score is 19 while you wear this headband. It has no effect on you if your Intel·ligència is already 19 or higher without it.

item.name: Kit de sanació
entries: This kit is a leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and splints. The kit has ten uses. Com a acció, you can expend one use of the kit to stabilize a creature that has 0 hit points, without needing to make una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Medicina}).

item.name: Heart Weaver's Primer
entries: This pristine book smells faintly of a random scent you find pleasing. When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell antipatia/simpatia}, {@spell fascinar persona}, {@spell dominar humanoide}, {@spell captivar}, {@spell senefes hipnòtiques}, {@spell modificar memòria}, i {@spell suggestió}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the enchantment school.
When you cast an enchantment spell, you can expend 1 charge to impose disadvantage on the first saving throw un objectiu makes against the spell.

item.name: Heartstone
entries: This lustrous black gem allows a {@creature night hag} to become ethereal while it is in her possession. The touch of a heartstone also cures any disease. Crafting a heartstone takes 30 days.

item.name: Hell Hound Cloak
entries: This dark cloak is made of cured {@creature hell hound} hide. Com a acció, you can command the cloak to transform you into a {@creature hell hound} for up to 1 hour. The transformation otherwise functions as the {@spell polimorfia} spell, but pots, com a acció bonus, revert to your normal form.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This cloak is cursed with the essence of a {@creature hell hound}, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with {@spell anul·lar maledicció} or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the cloak, keeping it within reach at all times.

The sixth time you use the cloak, and each time thereafter, you ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 15). Si falla, the transformation lasts fins que sigui dissipat or until you drop to 0 hit points, and you can't willingly return to normal form. If you ever remain in {@creature hell hound} form durant 6 hores, the transformation becomes permanent and you lose your sense of self. All your statistics are then replaced by those of a {@creature hell hound}. Thereafter, only {@spell anul·lar maledicció} or similar magic allows you to regain your identity and return to normal. If you remain in this permanent form for 6 days, only a {@spell desig} spell can reverse the transformation.

item.name: Helm of Brilliance
entries: This dazzling helm is set with {@dice 1d10} diamonds, {@dice 2d10} rubies, {@dice 3d10} fire opals, and {@dice 4d10} opals. Any gem pried from the helm crumbles to dust. When all the gems are removed or destroyed, the helm loses its magic.
Obténs els beneficis següents while wearing it:

items: Pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells (save DC 18), using one of the helm's gems of the specified type as a component: {@spell llum del dia} (opal), {@spell bola de foc} (fire opal), {@spell esprai prismàtic} (diamond), or {@spell paret de foc} (ruby). The gem is destroyed when the spell is cast and disappears from the helm.

As long as it has at least one diamond, the helm emits dim light in a 30-foot radius when at least one undead is within that area. Any undead that starts its turn in that area takes {@dice 1d6} de dany radiant.
As long as the helm has at least one ruby, tens resistència al dany de foc.

As long as the helm has at least one fire opal, you can use an action and speak a paraula màgica to cause one weapon you are holding to burst into flames. The flames emit llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals. The flames are harmless to you and the weapon. When you hit with an attack using the blazing weapon, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany de foc. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the paraula màgica again or until you drop or stow the weapon.

entries: Roll a {@dice d20} if you are wearing the helm and take fire damage as a result of failing a saving throw against a spell. On a roll of 1, the helm emits beams of light from its remaining gems. Each creature within 60 feet of the helm other than you ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 17). Si falla, be struck by a beam, taking radiant damage equal to the number of gems in the helm. The helm and its gems are then destroyed.

item.name: Helm of Comprehending Languages
entries: Mentre vesteixis el helm, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell comprendre idiomes} spell from it at will.

item.name: Helm of Devil Command
item.reqAttune: by a creature that can speak Infernal
entries: This bulky, eyeless helmet is made for a {@creature pit fiend} but magically resizes to fit the heads of other wearers.

While wearing the helm, you can see out of it as though you weren't wearing it. A més, you know the exact location and type of all devils within 1,000 feet of you. You can telepathically communicate with a devil within range, or you can broadcast your thoughts to all devils within range. The devils receiving your broadcasted thoughts have no special means of replying to them.

The helm té 3 càrregues. Com a acció, you can expend 1 charge to cast {@spell dominar criatura} (save DC 21), which affects devils only. (The spell fails and the charge is wasted if you target any creature that's not a devil.) If a devil can see you quan llances el conjur on it, the devil knows you tried to charm it. The helm regains all its charges 24 hours after its last charge is expended.

If you are not a devil, using the helm's {@spell dominar criatura} property in els Nou Inferns has a {@chance 20|20 percent} chance of attracting a {@creature narzugon|MTF}, which arrives on the back of a {@creature nightmare} mount in {@dice 1d4} hours. The narzugon tries to recover the helm, killing you if necessary to obtain it. If it gets the helm, the narzugon tries to deliver it to its infernal master.

item.name: Casc de Telepatia
entries: Mentre vesteixis el helm, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell detectar pensaments} spell (save DC 13) from it. As long as you maintain concentration on the spell, pots, com a acció bonus, send a telepathic message to a creature you are focused on. It can reply—using a bonus action to do so—while your focus on it continues.

While focusing on a creature with {@spell detectar pensaments}, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell suggestió} spell (save DC 13) from the helm on that creature. Once used, the suggestion property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Helm of Teleportation
entries: This helm has 3 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cast the {@spell teleportació} spell from it. The helm recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

item.name: Helm of the Gods
entries: Mentre vesteixis el helm, you know whether there is a celestial or diastre within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located, provided the creature isn't behind total cover.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg while wearing the helm, you can pray to one of the gods listed on the Helm of the Gods table and store the listed spell in the helm, replacing any spell that is already stored there. The save DC for the spell is 13.
The helm té 3 càrregues. To cast a spell from the helm, you must expend 1 charge, and the helm regains {@dice 1d3} charges daily at dawn.

rows: Athreos
{@spell protegir del bé i del mal}
Ephara
{@spell santuari}
Erebos
{@spell infligir ferides}
Heliod
{@spell sageta guia}
Iroas
{@spell heroisme}
Karametra
{@spell bonabaia}
Keranos
{@spell càstig tronador}
Klothys
{@spell enredar}
Kruphix
{@spell xiuxiuegos de disbauxa}
Mogis
{@spell venjança dels inferns}
Nylea
{@spell foc follet}
Pharika
{@spell restabliment menor}
Phenax
{@spell fascinar persona}
Purphoros
{@spell càstig abrasador}
Thassa
{@spell identificar}

item.name: Helm of the Scavenger
entries: This ornate chair is designed to propel and maneuver a ship through space.

entries.name: Passive Properties
entries: The following properties of the helm come into play even when no creature is attuned to it:

items: When placed aboard a vessel weighing between 1 and 100 tons, the helm generates an envelope of fresh air around the ship while it is in the void of space (but not underwater). This envelope extends out from the edges of the hull in all directions for a distance equal in length to the vessel's beam, so that creatures aboard and near the ship can breathe normally in space. The temperature within the air envelope is 70 degrees Fahrenheit.

When placed aboard a vessel weighing between 1 and 100 tons, the helm generates an artificial gravity field while the ship is in the void of space, so that creatures can walk on the ship's decks as they normally would. Creatures and objects that fall overboard bob in a gravity plane that extends out from the main deck for a distance equal in length to the vessel's beam.

entries.name: Active Properties
entries: The sensation of being attuned to the helm is akin to being immersed in warm water. While attuned to the helm, you gain the following abilities while you sit in it:

items: You can use the helm to propel the vessel across or through water and other liquids at a maximum speed in miles per hour equal to your highest-level unexpended spell slot.
You can use the helm to propel the vessel through air or space at a maximum speed in miles per hour equal to your highest-level unexpended spell slot × 10.
Provided you have at least one unexpended spell slot, you can steer the vessel, albeit in a somewhat clumsy fashion, in much the same way that oars or a rudder can maneuver a seafaring ship.
Whenever you like, you can see what's happening on and around the vessel as though you were standing in a location of your choice aboard it.

entries.name: Drawback
entries: While attuned to the helm, you cannot expend your own spell slots.

item.name: Helm of Underwater Action
entries: Mentre vesteixis el brass helmet, you can breathe underwater, you gain {@sense visió de foscor} amb un abast de 60 peus, and reps una velocitat de natació de 30 peus.

item.name: Hematite
entries: An opaque gray-black gemstone.

item.name: Corda de cànem (50 peus)
entries: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Força check.

item.name: Kit d'herbalisme
entries: This kit contains a variety of instruments such as clippers, mortar and pestle, and pouches and vials used by herbalists to create remedies and potions. Tenir competència amb aquest kit et permet sumar el teu bonus de competència a tota tirada d'habilitat per a identify or apply herbs. Also, proficiency with this kit is required to create antitoxina and potions of healing.
additionalEntries: Proficiency with an kit d'herbalisme allows you to identify plants and safely collect their useful elements.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: An kit d'herbalisme includes pouches to store herbs, clippers and leather gloves for collecting plants, a mortar and pestle, and several glass jars.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: Your knowledge of the nature and uses of herbs can add insight to your magical studies that deal with plants and your attempts to identify potions.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: When you inspect an area overgrown with plants, your proficiency can help you pick out details and clues that others might miss.

additionalEntries.name: Medicina
entries: Your mastery of herbalism improves your ability to treat illnesses and wounds by augmenting your methods of care with medicinal plants.

additionalEntries.name: Nature and Survival
entries: When you travel in the wild, your skill in herbalism makes it easier to identify plants and spot sources of food that others might overlook.

additionalEntries.name: Identify Plants
entries: You can identify most plants with a quick inspection of their appearance and smell.

additionalEntries.caption: Kit d'herbalisme
rows: Find plants
Identify poison

item.name: Hew
entries: This +1 battleaxe deals maximum damage when the wielder hits a plant creature or an object made of wood. The axe's creator was a dwarf smith who feuded with the dryads of a forest where he cut firewood. Whoever carries the axe feels uneasy whenever he or she travels through a forest.

item.name: Heward's Handy Haversack
entries: This backpack has a central pouch and two side pouches, each of which is an extradimensional space. Each side pouch can hold up to 20 pounds of material, not exceeding a volume of 2 peus cúbics. The large central pouch can hold up to 8 peus cúbics or 80 pounds of material. The backpack always weighs 5 pounds, regardless of its contents.

Placing an object in the haversack follows the normal rules for interacting with objects. Retrieving an item from the haversack requires you to use an action. When you reach into the haversack for a specific item, the item is always magically on top.

The haversack has a few limitations. If it is overloaded, or if a sharp object pierces it or tears it, the haversack ruptures and is destroyed. If the haversack is destroyed, its contents are lost forever, although an artifact always turns up again somewhere. If the haversack is turned inside out, its contents spill forth, unharmed, and the haversack must be put right before it can be used again. If a breathing creature is placed within the haversack, the creature can survive for up to 10 minutes, after which time it begins to suffocate.

Placing the haversack inside an extradimensional space created by a {@item bossa de contenció}, {@item portable hole}, or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Pla Astral. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10-feet of the gate is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Pla Astral. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can't be reopened.

item.name: Heward's Handy Spice Pouch
entries: This belt pouch appears empty and has 10 charges. While holding the pouch, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges, speak the name of any nonmagical food seasoning (such as salt, pepper, saffron, or cilantro), and remove a pinch of the desired seasoning from the pouch. A pinch is enough to season a single meal. The pouch regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Heward's Hireling Armor
entries: A number of Kwalish's experiments were attempts to research the works of the legendary mage Heward, who first crafted what he named hireling armor. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens +1 a la CA. A més, the armor's animated straps can assist with the drawing and sheathing of weapons, such that you can draw or stow two one-handed weapons when you would normally be able to draw or stow only one.

This armor also has six pockets, each of which is an extradimensional space. Each pocket can hold up to 20 pounds of material, not exceeding a volume of 2 peus cúbics. The armor always weighs 10 pounds, regardless of its pockets' contents. Placing an object into one of the armor's pockets follows the normal rules for interacting with objects. Retrieving an item from a pocket of the armor requires you to use an action. When you reach into a pocket for a specific item, the item is always magically on top.

Placing the armor inside an extradimensional space created by a {@item bossa de contenció}, a {@item Heward's handy haversack}, or a similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Pla Astral. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Pla Astral. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can't be reopened.

item.name: Hide of the Feral Guardian
entries: It is believed that this polished and beautifully detailed leather armor was a gift from Melora, bestowed on a long-forgotten archdruid and champion of the natural world before the terrors of the Calamity.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While wearing the armor in its dormant state, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: The armor grants you a +1 bonus to AC.

While you are transformed by an effect that replaces any of your game statistics with those of another creature, you have a +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls, and you retain the benefits of this armor.

Com a acció, you can use the armor to cast {@spell polimorfia} on yourself, transforming into a {@creature giant owl} while retaining your Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the armor reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The AC bonus of the armor increases to +2.
While you are transformed by an effect that replaces any of your game statistics with those of another creature, your bonus to melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1 (to +2).
When you cast the {@spell polimorfia} spell using this armor, you can transform into a {@creature cave bear}.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the armor reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The AC bonus of the armor increases to +3.
While you are transformed by an effect that replaces any of your game statistics with those of another creature, your bonus to melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1 (to +3).
When you cast the {@spell polimorfia} spell using this armor, you can transform into a {@creature guardian wolf|EGW}.

item.name: Holy Symbol of Ravenkind
item.reqAttune: by a cleric or paladin of good alignment
entries: The Holy Symbol of Ravenkind is a unique holy symbol sacred to the good-hearted faithful of Barovia. It predates the establishment of any church in Barovia. According to legend, it was delivered to a paladin named Lugdana by a giant raven—or an angel in the form of a giant raven. Lugdana used the holy symbol to root out and destroy nests of vampires until her death. The high priests of Ravenloft kept and wore the holy symbol after Lugdana's passing.
The holy symbol is a platinum amulet shaped like the sun, with a large crystal embedded in its center.
The holy symbol has 10 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Hold Vampires
entries: Com a acció, you can expend 1 charge and present the holy symbol to make it flare with holy power. Vampires and {@creature vampire spawn} within 30 feet of the holy symbol when it flares ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, a target is {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns to end the effect on itself.

entries.name: Turn Undead
entries: If you have the Turn Undead or the Turn the Unholy feature, you can expend 3 charges when you present the holy symbol while using that feature. When you do so, undead have disadvantage on their saving throws against the effect.

entries.name: Sunlight
entries: Com a acció, you can expend 5 charges while presenting the holy symbol to make it shed llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals. The light is sunlight and dura 10 minuts or until you end the effect (no requereix acció).

item.name: Aigua Beneïda (flask)
entries: Com a acció, you can splash the contents of this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it fins a 20 peus, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a target creature, (considera-ho un atac improvitzat). If the target is a diastre or undead, it takes {@dice 2d6} de dany radiant.
A cleric or paladin may create aigua beneïda by performing a special ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour to perform, uses 25 gp d'argent en pols, and requires the caster to expend a 1st-level spell slot.

item.name: Llanterna coberta
entries: A llanterna coberta casts llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals. Once lit, it burns durant 6 hores on a flask (1 pint) of oil. Com a acció, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

item.name: Hook of Fisher's Delight
entries: This tiny silver fishhook has a little gold feather attached to it. For it to function, the feathered hook must be tied to the end of a fishing line and immersed in enough water to fill at least a 10-foot cube. At the end of each uninterrupted hour of immersion, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, a floppy, 6-inch-long magical fish appears on the end of the hook. The color and properties of the conjured fish are determined by rolling on the Hook of Fisher's Delight table. Once the hook conjures a fish, it can't do so again until the next dawn.

entries.caption: Hook of Fisher's Delight
rows: Green with copper bands
This tasty fish provides a day's worth of nourishment to one creature that eats it. The fish loses this property and rots if it's not eaten within 24 hours of being caught.
Yellow with black stripes

Once removed from the hook, this awful-tasting fish can be thrown fins a 120 peus, targeting a creature the thrower can see. The target ha de salvar per Força (CD 15). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. The fish then disappears.
Blue with white bands

When released from the hook, this fish squirms free, sprouts wings, follows you around, and sings a beautiful tune in Aquan. It disappears after {@dice 2d4} hours or when reduced to 0 hit points. The fish uses the {@creature quipper} stat block, except that it can breathe air and has una velocitat de vol de 30 peus.
Gold with silver stripes

This tasty fish provides a day's worth of nourishment to one creature that eats it and grants {@dice 2d10} punts de vida temporals to that creature. The fish loses these properties and rots if it's not eaten within 24 hours of being caught.

item.name: Banya del Xivarri
entries: Pots, com a acció, speak the horn's paraula màgica and then blow the horn, which emits a thunderous blast en un con de 30 peus that is audible 600 feet away. Tota criatura a dins del con ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Qui falli rep {@dice 5d6} de dany de tro i està {@condition eixordat} durant 1 minut. Qui superi en rep la meitat i no està {@condition eixordat}. Creatures and objects made of glass or crystal have disadvantage on the saving throw and rep {@dice 10d6} de dany de tro instead of {@dice 5d6}.
Each use of the horn's magic has a {@chance 20} chance of causing the horn to explode. The explosion deals {@dice 10d6} de dany de foc to the blower and destroys the horn.

item.name: Horn of Silent Alarm
entries: This horn has 4 charges. When you use an action to blow it, one creature of your choice can hear the horns blare, provided the creature is within 600 feet of the horn and not {@condition eixordat}. No other creature hears sound coming from the horn. The horn recupera {@dice 1d4} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

item.name: Horn of the Endless Laberint
entries: Pots, com a acció, blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the Abyss appear within 60 feet of you. These spirits look like minotaures, and use the {@creature berserker} statistics. They return to Abyss passada 1 hora or when they drop to 0 hit points. Once you use the horn, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.
The horn summons {@dice 3d4 + 3} {@creature berserker||berserkers}. To use the horn, you must be proficient with all simple weapons.

If you blow the horn without meeting its requirement, the summoned {@creature berserker||berserkers} attack you. If you meet the requirement, they are friendly to you and your companions and follow your commands.

item.name: Horn of Valhalla, Brass
entries: Pots, com a acció, blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear within 60 feet of you. These spirits use the {@creature berserker} statistics. They return to Ysgard passada 1 hora or when they drop to 0 hit points. Once you use the horn, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.
A brass horn summons {@dice 3d4 + 3} {@creature berserker||berserkers}. To use the brass horn, you must be proficient with all simple weapons.

If you blow the horn without meeting its requirement, the summoned {@creature berserker||berserkers} attack you. If you meet the requirement, they are friendly to you and your companions and follow your commands.

item.name: Horn of Valhalla, Bronze
entries: Pots, com a acció, blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear within 60 feet of you. These spirits use the {@creature berserker} statistics. They return to Ysgard passada 1 hora or when they drop to 0 hit points. Once you use the horn, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.
A bronze horn summons {@dice 4d4 + 4} {@creature berserker||berserkers}. To use the bronze horn, you must be proficient with medium armor.

If you blow the horn without meeting its requirement, the summoned {@creature berserker||berserkers} attack you. If you meet the requirement, they are friendly to you and your companions and follow your commands.

item.name: Horn of Valhalla, Iron
entries: Pots, com a acció, blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear within 60 feet of you. These spirits use the {@creature berserker} statistics. They return to Ysgard passada 1 hora or when they drop to 0 hit points. Once you use the horn, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.
The iron horn summons {@dice 5d4 + 5} {@creature berserker||berserkers}. To use the iron horn, you must be proficient with all martial weapons.

If you blow the horn without meeting its requirement, the summoned {@creature berserker||berserkers} attack you. If you meet the requirement, they are friendly to you and your companions and follow your commands.

item.name: Horn of Valhalla, Silver
entries: Pots, com a acció, blow this horn. In response, warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear within 60 feet of you. These spirits use the {@creature berserker} statistics. They return to Ysgard passada 1 hora or when they drop to 0 hit points. Once you use the horn, it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.
The silver horn summons {@dice 2d4 + 2} {@creature berserker||berserkers}.
The {@creature berserker||berserkers} are friendly to you and your companions and follow your commands.

item.name: Horned Anell
entries: Allows an attuned wearer to ignore Undermountain's magical restrictions (see "Alterations to Magic").

item.name: Horror Trinket
entries: Before you finish making a character, roll once on the Horror Trinkets table for a unique object your character has with them at the start of their adventuring career. These trinkets hint toward various horrific tales and might lead to dreadful revelations or be nothing more than grim keepsakes. At el/la/li MM's discretion any of these trinkets might also be a Mist talisman (detailed in {@book capítol 3|VRGR|3|Mist Talismans}), a focal item that can lead the bearer through the Mists to a particular Domain of Dread.

entries.caption: Horror Trinkets
rows: A picture you drew as a child of your imaginary friend
A lock that opens when blood is dripped in its keyhole
Clothes stolen from a scarecrow
A spinning top carved with four faces: happy, sad, wrathful, and dead
The necklace of a sibling who died on the day you were born
A wig from someone executed by beheading
The unopened letter to you from your dying father
A pocket watch that runs backward for an hour every midnight
A winter coat stolen from a dying soldier
A bottle of invisible ink that can only be read at sunset
A wineskin that refills when interred with a dead person for a night
A set of silverware used by a king for his last meal
A spyglass that always shows the world suffering a terrible storm
A cameo with the profile's face scratched away
A lantern with a black candle that never runs out and that burns with green flame
A teacup from a child's tea set, stained with blood
A little black book that records your dreams, and yours alone, when you adormir
A necklace formed of the interlinked holy symbols of a dozen deities
A noose that feels heavier than it should
A birdcage into which small birds fly but once inside never eat or leave
A lepidopterist's box filled with dead moths with skull-like patterns on their wings
A jar of pickled ghouls' tongues
The wooden hand of a notorious pirate
A urn with the ashes of a dead relative
A hand mirror backed with a bronze depiction of a medusa
Pallid leather gloves crafted with ivory fingernails
Dice made from the knuckles of a notorious charlatan
A ring of keys for forgotten locks
Nails from the coffin of a murderer
A key to the family crypt
A bouquet of funerary flowers that always looks and smells fresh
A switch used to discipline you as a child
A music box that plays by itself whenever someone holding it dances
A walking cane with an iron ferrule that strikes sparks on stone
A flag from a ship lost at sea
A porcelain doll's head that always seems to be looking at you
A wolf's head wrought in silver that is also a whistle
A small mirror that shows a much older version of the viewer
A small, worn book of children's nursery rhymes
A mummified raven claw
A broken pendant of a silver dragon that's always cold to the touch
A small locked box that quietly hums a lovely melody at night, but you always forget it in the morning
An inkwell that makes one a little nauseous when staring at it
An old doll made from a dark, dense wood and missing a hand and a foot
A black executioner's hood
A pouch made of flesh, with a sinew drawstring
A tiny spool of black thread that never runs out
A tiny clockwork figurine of a dancer that's missing a gear and doesn't work
A black wooden pipe that creates puffs of smoke that look like skulls
A vial of perfume, the scent of which only certain creatures can detect
A stone that emits a single endless sigh
A rag doll with two red dots on its neck
A spring-loaded toy with a missing crank
A mason jar containing a harmless but agitated, animate ooze
A black wooden die with 1's on all the faces
A child's portrait with "born" written on the back, along with next year's date
A dagger-sized shark tooth
A finger that's taken root in a small pot
A toolbox containing the remains of a dangerous but broken clockwork arachnid
A pitcher-sized, opalescent snail shell that occasionally, inexplicably shudders or tips over
The logbook of an ice-breaking ship called The Haifisch
A small portrait of you as a child, alongside your identically dressed twin
A silver pocket watch with thirteen hours marked on the face
A woodcut of a wolf devouring its own hind leg
A planchette etched with raven skulls
A moist coral figurine of a lamprey with arms, legs, and a bipedal stance
A bronze fingertrap sculpted with roaring tigers
A pearl necklace that turns red under the full moon
A fossil of a fish with humanoid features
A plague doctor's mask
A paper talisman with smudged ink
A locket containing the smeared image of an eyeless figure
A canopic jar with a lid sculpted like a goat
A jack-o'-lantern made from a small, pale gourd
A single high-heeled, iron shoe
A candle made from a severed hand
A clockwork device that beats like a heart
A blank masquerade mask
A glass eye with a live worm inside
A sheet with two eyeholes cut in it
The deed to someplace called Tergeron Manor
An ornate, wax-sealed crimson envelope that resists all attempts to open it
A mourning veil trimmed in black lace
A straitjacket covered in charcoal runes
A tattered, burlap mask with a crooked smile painted on it
A green ribbon designed to be worn as a choker
Dentures with mismatched, sharpened teeth
A warm, fist-sized egg case
A copper ring with "mine" engraved on the inside
A glass ampoule containing a neon green fluid
An eye patch embroidered with a holy symbol
A severed big toe with a nail that continues to grow
A journal that has been heavily redacted
A glove with a mouth-like design stitched on the palm
An ornate but empty reliquary made of silver and fractured glass
A ceramic figure of a cat with too many eyes
A crumpled paper ticket bearing the words "admit none"
An electrum coin with your face on one side
A shrunken gremishka head that twitches when anyone casts magic nearby
A sunburst amulet with a red stone at the center

item.name: Horseshoes of a Zephyr
entries: These iron horseshoes come in a set of four. While all four shoes are affixed to the hooves of a horse or similar creature, they allow the creature to move normally while floating 4 inches above the ground. This effect means the creature can cross or stand above nonsolid or unstable surfaces, such as water or lava. The creature leaves no tracks and ignores terreny difícil. A més, the creature can move at normal speed for up to 12 hours a day without suffering {@condition exhaust} from a forced march.

item.name: Horseshoes of Speed
entries: These iron horseshoes come in a set of four. While all four shoes are affixed to the hooves of a horse or similar creature, they increase the creature's walking speed by 30 feet.

item.name: Hunter's Coat
entries: You have a +1 bonus to AC mentre vesteixis l'armadura.

The coat té 3 càrregues. Quan impactes a una criatura with an attack and that creature doesn't have all its hit points, you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@damage 1d10} de dany necròtic to the target. The coat recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.
The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

item.name: Hunting Trap
entries: When you use your action to set it, this trap forms a saw-toothed steel ring that snaps shut quan una criatura steps on a pressure plate in the center. The trap is affixed by a heavy chain to an immobile object, such as a tree or a spike driven into the ground. A creature that steps on the plate ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 13). Si falla, rep {@dice 1d4} de dany perforant and stop moving. Thereafter, until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is limited by the length of the chain (typically 3 feet long). A creature can use its action to make a DC 13 Força check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Each failed check deals 1 piercing damage to the trapped creature.

entries.caption: Icewind Dale Trinkets
rows: A small wooden figurine of a yawning walrus, painted in red and black
A pair of scrimshaw cufflinks with an image of a fisherman on a boat engraved on them
A small iron key with a frayed blue and gold cord tied to it
A small illustrated book of Northlander myths that has pages missing
A damaged scrimshaw cameo depicting a sirènid
A stone from a burial cairn with a tiny Nannès rune carved into it
A ripped cloth sail with a symbol you don't recognize
An Ulu knife with a scrimshaw handle
A jar containing an unidentifiable, sweet, sticky substance
A delicate glass ball painted with snowflakes, capped by a metal loop with a tiny hook attached to it
An expedition log with missing pages and a pressed flower used as a bookmark
An owl figurine carved from whalebone
A sewing box that smells of old wood and has three spools of blue thread inside
A scrimshaw-handled ink pen with black runic designs along its length
A brooch made from a small insect encased in amber
A scrimshaw pepper shaker etched with the letter W
An old, wooden-handled ice pick stained with blood that won't wash off
A fabric doll bearing an angry expression
A set of wind chimes made from seashells
A beautiful silver tin that, when opened, emits the smell of rotting fish
A bloodstained dreamcatcher made from fishing line, gold wire, and snowy owlbear feathers
A figurine of a polar bear made of ice that never melts
A snow globe that doesn't need to be shaken
A piece of sea glass shaped like a unicorn's horn
A dark blue scarf that gets lighter in shade the higher the altitude of the wearer

item.name: Icon of Ravenloft
item.reqAttune: by a creature of good alignment
entries: The Icon of Ravenloft is a 12-inch tall statuette made of the purest silver, weighing 10 pounds. It depicts a cleric kneeling in supplication.
The icon was given to Strahd by the archpriest Ciril Romulich, an old family friend, to consecrate the castle and its chapel.

While within 30 feet of the icon, a creature is under the effect of a {@spell protegir del bé i del mal} spell against diastres and undead. Only a creature attuned to the icon can use its other properties.

entries.name: Auguri
entries: Pots, com a acció, cast an {@spell auguri} spell from the icon, with no material components required. Once used, this property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Bane of the Undead
entries: You can use the icon as a holy symbol while using the Turn Undead or Turn the Unholy feature. Si ho fas, increase the save DC by 2.

entries.name: Curar Ferides
entries: While holding the icon, you can take an action to heal una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. The target regains {@dice 3d8 + 3} hit points, unless it is an undead, a construct, or a fiend. Once used, this property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

attachedSpells: protegir del bé i del mal

item.name: Illuminator's Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features beautiful calligraphy, images of writing implements, and the like.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Magical Scribing
entries: While this tattoo is on your skin, you can write with your fingertip as if it were un bolígraf de tinta that never runs out of ink.

Com a acció, you can touch a piece of writing up to one page in length and speak a creature's name. The writing becomes {@condition invisible} to everyone other than you and the named creature durant les properes 24 hores. Either of you can dismiss the invisibility by touching the script (no requereix acció). Once used, this action no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Illuminator's Tattoo
entries: This tattoo contains beautiful calligraphy, images of writing implements, and the like. While this tattoo is on your skin, you can write with your fingertip as if it were un bolígraf de tinta that never runs out of ink.

Com a acció, you can touch a piece of writing up to one page in length and speak a creature's name. The writing becomes {@condition invisible} to everyone other than you and the named creature durant les properes 24 hores. Either of you can dismiss the invisibility by touching the script (no requereix acció). Once used, this action no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Illusionist's Bracers
entries: A powerful illusionist of House Dimir originally developed these bracers, which enabled her to create multiple minor illusions at once. The bracers' power, though, extends far beyond illusions.
While wearing the bracers, whenever you cast a cantrip, pots, com a acció bonus, on the same turn to cast that cantrip a second time.

item.name: Immovable Vara
entries: This flat iron rod has a button on one end. Pots, com a acció, press the button, which causes the rod to become magically fixed in place. Until you or another creature uses an action to push the button again, the rod doesn't move, even if it is defying gravity. The rod can hold up to 8,000 pounds of weight. More weight causes the rod to deactivate and fall. A creature can use an action to make a DC 30 Força check, moving the fixed rod fins a 10 peus on a success.

item.name: Infernal Puzzle Box
entries: An infernal puzzle box is a cube-shaped container 5 to 6 inches on a side, composed of airtight, interlocking parts made from materials found in els Nou Inferns. Most of these boxes are made of infernal iron, though some are carved from bone or horn. Infernal puzzle boxes are used to safeguard diabolical contracts signed between devils and mortals, even after the terms of these contracts are fulfilled. An empty infernal puzzle box weighs 3 pounds regardless of the materials used to fashion it.

When an object small enough to fit inside an infernal puzzle box is placed in it, the container magically seals shut around the object, and no magic can force the box open. The sealed box becomes immune to all damage as well. Every infernal puzzle box is constructed with a unique means of opening it. The trick to solving the puzzle is always mundane, never magical. Once a creature figures out the trick or sequence of steps needed to open a particular infernal puzzle box, that creature can open the box com a acció, allowing access to the box's contents.

A creature that spends 1 hour holding an infernal puzzle box while trying to open it can make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) amb CD 30. If the check succeeds, the creature figures out the trick or sequence of steps needed to open the box. If the check fails by 5 or more, la criatura ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 18), taking 42 ({@dice 12d6}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Infernal Tack
item.reqAttune: by a creature of evil alignment.
entries: A {@creature narzugon|MTF} binds a nightmare to its service with infernal tack, which consists of a bridle, bit, reins, saddle, stirrups, and spurs. A {@creature nightmare} equipped with infernal tack must serve whoever wears the spurs until the wearer dies or the tack is removed.

Pots, com a acció, call a {@creature nightmare} equipped with infernal tack by clashing the spurs together or scraping them through blood. The nightmare appears at the start of your next turn, within 20 feet of you. It acts as your ally and takes its turn on your initiative count. It remains for 1 day, until you or it dies, or fins que ho dissipis as an action. If the nightmare dies, it reforms in els Nou Inferns within 24 hours, after which you can summon it again.

The tack doesn't conjure a nightmare from thin air; one must first be subdued so the tack can be placed on it. No nightmare accepts this forced servitude willingly, but some eventually form strong loyalties to their masters and become true partners in evil.

item.name: Infiltrator's Key
entries: This mitrall skeleton key was forged using the blood of twelve master thieves executed for trying to steal magic items during the Age of Arcanum.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The Infiltrator's Key grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: The key can be used as {@item eines de lladre|phb} for the purpose of opening locks. When using the key, you are considered proficient in thieves' tools and tens avantatge a tirades de ability checks made to open locks.
