While holding the key, your steps are muffled, giving you advantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks made to move silently.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the Infiltrator's Key reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: While holding the key, pots, com a acció bonus, transform the key into a magic dagger or back into a key. While the key is in the form of a dagger, Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with it, and it returns to your hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack.

While holding the key, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell ego alteració}, {@spell invisibilitat}, {@spell picaporta}, o {@spell passar desapercebudament}. Once a spell has been cast using the key, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the Infiltrator's Key reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: Com a acció bonus, you can touch the key to a floor, wall, or ceiling that is no more than 5 feet thick and cause a magical opening to appear in the surface. When you create the opening, you choose its length and width, fins a 10 peus for each dimension. The opening lasts until the key passes through it to the other side, at which point it disappears (if a creature is in the opening when the doorway closes, the creature is safely shunted to the nearest unoccupied space). The key can't be used to create another opening until the next dawn.

While holding the key, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell porta dimensional}, {@spell forma gasosa}, o {@spell desconcertar}. Once a spell has been cast using the key, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Ingot of the Skold Rune
entries: This appears to be a simple ingot of iron ore, about a foot long and a few inches across. Inspection of its surface reveals the faint, silvery outline of the skold (shield) rune. The ingot has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Escut Rúnic
entries: You have a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Shield Bond
entries: Com a acció bonus, choose una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast, (excepte tu). Fins el final del teu proper torn, any damage the target takes is reduced to 1, but you take half the damage prevented in this way. The damage you take can't be reduced in any way. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Shield Ward
entries: You can transfer the ingot's magic to a nonmagical item—a shield or a two-handed melee weapon-by tracing the skold rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the ingot is destroyed, and the rune appears in silver on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Shield.
items.entry: The shield is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. Its magic gives you a +1 bonus to AC, and the first time after each of your long rests that damage reduces you to 0 hit points, you are instead reduced to 1 hit point. You must be wielding the shield to gain these benefits.

items.name: Weapon.
items.entry: The weapon is now an uncommon arma màgica. It grants you a +1 bonus to AC while you're holding it.

item.name: Ink (1-ounce bottle)
entries: Ink (1-ounce bottle)

item.name: Insect Repellent (block of incense)
entries: Insect repellent can be purchased in Port Nyanzaru in two forms: blocks of incense or a greasy salve. The merchant prince Kwayothe controls the sale of both. Neither kind of repellent protects against giant insects or the vile swarms of insects described in appendix A of the Monster Manual.
When lit, it burns durant 8 hores and repels normal insects within a 20-foot-radius centered on it.

item.name: Insect Repellent (greasy salve)
entries: Insect repellent can be purchased in Port Nyanzaru in two forms: blocks of incense or a greasy salve. The merchant prince Kwayothe controls the sale of both. Neither kind of repellent protects against giant insects or the vile swarms of insects described in appendix A of the Monster Manual.

A gourd or vial of salve contains 20 applications of odorless grease. One application protects its wearer against normal insects durant 24 hores. The salve is waterproof so it doesn't wash off in rain.

item.name: Insignia of Claws
entries: The jewels in the insignia of the Cult of the Dragon flare with purple light when you enter combat, empowering your natural fists or natural weapons.
While wearing the insignia Tens un +1 a the attack rolls and the damage rolls you make with atacs desarmats and natural weapons. Such attacks are considered to be magical.

item.name: Instrument of Illusions
entries: While you are playing this instrument musical, you can create harmless, illusory visual effects within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the instrument. If you are a bard, the radius increases to 15 feet. Sample visual effects include luminous musical notes, a spectral dancer, butterflies, and gently falling snow. The magical effects have neither substance nor sound, and they are obviously illusory. The effects end when you stop playing.

item.name: Instrument of Scribing
entries: This instrument musical has 3 charges. While you are playing it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge from the instrument and write a magical message on a nonmagical object or surface que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. The message can be up to six words long and is written in a language you know. If you are a bard, you can scribe an additional seven words and choose to make the message glow faintly, allowing it to be seen in nonmagical darkness. Casting {@spell dissipar màgia} on the message erases it. Otherwise, the message fades away passades 24 hores.
The instrument regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Instrument of the Bards, Anstruth Harp
entries: An instrument of the bards is an exquisite example of its kind, superior to an ordinary instrument in every way. Seven types of these instruments exist, each named after a legendary col·legi de bards. A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, rep {@dice 2d4} de dany psíquic.

Pots, com a acció, play the instrument and cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spell, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your habilitat de llançament de conjurs and spell save DC.

You can play the instrument while casting a spell that causes any of its targets to be {@condition fascinat} on a failed saving throw, thereby imposing disadvantage on the save. This effect applies only if the spell has a somatic or a material component.
All instruments of the bards can be used to cast the following spells: {@spell volar}, {@spell invisibilitat}, {@spell levitar}, i {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}.
A més, the Anstruth harp can be used to cast {@spell controlar el temps}, {@spell curar ferides} (nivell 5), and {@spell paret d'espines}.
attachedSpells: protegir del bé i del mal

item.name: Ioun Stone of Vitality
entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of {@dice 1d3} feet and confers a benefit to you. Thereafter, another creature must use an action to grasp or net the stone to separate it from you, either by making a successful attack roll against AC 24 or a successful DC 24 Destresa ({@skill Acrobàcies}) check. Pots, com a acció, seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.
A stone has AC 24, 10 hit points, and resistance to all damage. It is considered to be an object that is being worn while it orbits your head.
Tens un +1 a salvades de mort while this luminous green-and-blue marbled sphere orbits your head.

item.name: Ioun Stone, Absorption
entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

When you use an action to toss one of these stones into the air, the stone orbits your head at a distance of {@dice 1d3} feet and confers a benefit to you. A stone has AC 24, 10 hit points, and resistance to all damage. It is considered to be an object that is being worn while it orbits your head.
While this pale lavender ellipsoid orbits your head, you can use your reaction to cancel a spell of 4th level or lower cast by a creature you can see and targeting only you.

Once the stone has canceled 20 levels of spells, it burns out and turns dull gray, losing its magic. If you are targeted by a spell whose level is higher than the number of spell levels the stone has left, the stone can't cancel it.

entries: An {@italic Ioun stone} is named after Ioun, a god of knowledge and prophecy revered on some worlds. Many types of {@italic Ioun stone} exist, each type a distinct combination of shape and color.

Pots, com a acció, seize and stow the stone, ending its effect.
A stone has AC 24, 10 hit points, and resistance to all damage. It is considered to be an object that is being worn while it orbits your head.

This vibrant purple prism stores spells cast into it, holding them until you use them. The stone can store up to 3 levels worth of spells at a time. When found, it contains {@dice 1d4 - 1} levels of stored spells chosen by el/la/li MM.

Any creature can cast a spell of 1st through 3rd level into the stone by touching it as the spell is cast. The spell has no effect, other than to be stored in the stone. If the stone can't hold the spell, the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.

While this stone orbits your head, you can cast any spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and habilitat de llançament de conjurs of the original caster, but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the stone is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.

item.name: Iron Bands of Bilarro
entries: This rusty iron sphere measures 3 inches in diameter and weighs 1 pound. Pots, com a acció, speak the paraula màgica and throw the sphere at a Huge or smaller creature que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. As the sphere moves through the air, it opens into a tangle of metal bands.

Make a ranged attack roll with an attack bonus equal to your Destresa modifier plus el teu bonus de competència. Si impacta, the target is {@condition restrained} until you take a bonus action to speak the paraula màgica again to release it. Doing so, or missing with the attack, causes the bands to contract and become a sphere once more.

A creature, including the one {@condition restrained}, can use an action to make a DC 20 Força check to break the iron bands. On a success, the item is destroyed, and the {@condition restrained} creature is freed. If the check fails, any further attempts made by that creature automatically fail until 24 hours have elapsed.
Once the bands are used, they no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Iron Flask
entries: This iron bottle has a brass stopper. Pots, com a acció, speak the flask's paraula màgica, targeting una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. If the target is native to a plane of existence other than the one you're on, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 17). Si falla, be trapped in the flask. If the target has been trapped by the flask before, it has advantage on the saving throw. Once trapped, a creature remains in the flask until released. The flask can hold only one creature at a time. A creature trapped in the flask doesn't need to breathe, eat, or drink and doesn't age.

Pots, com a acció, remove the flask's stopper and release the creature the flask contains. La criatura és amistosa vers a tu i els teus aliats durant 1 hora and obeys your commands for that duration. If you give no commands or give it a command that is likely to result in its death, it defends itself but otherwise takes no actions. At the end of the duration, the creature acts in accordance with its normal disposition and alignment.

An {@spell identificar} spell reveals that a creature is inside the flask, but the only way to determine the type of creature is to open the flask. A newly discovered bottle might already contain a creature chosen by el/la/li MM or determined randomly.

rows: Empty
{@creature Arcanaloth}
{@creature Cambion}
{@creature Dao}
Demon (type 1): {@creature barlgura}, {@creature shadow demon}, o {@creature vrock}
Demon (type 2): {@creature chasme} or {@creature hezrou}
Demon (type 3): {@creature glabrezu} or {@creature yochlol}
Demon (type 4): {@creature nalfeshnee}
Demon (type 5): {@creature marilith}
Demon (type 6): {@creature balor} or {@creature goristro}
{@creature Deva}
Devil (greater): {@creature horned devil}, {@creature erinyes}, {@creature ice devil}, o {@creature pit fiend}
Devil (lesser): {@creature imp}, {@creature spined devil}, {@creature bearded devil}, {@creature barbed devil}, {@creature chain devil}, o {@creature diable d'ossos}
{@creature Djinni}
{@creature Efreeti}
Elemental (any)
{@creature Githyanki knight}
{@creature Githzerai zerth}
{@creature Invisible stalker}
{@creature Marid}
{@creature Mezzoloth}
{@creature Night hag}
{@creature Nycaloth}
{@creature Planetar}
{@creature Salamander}
Slaad (any)
{@creature Solar}
{@creature succubus||Succubus/Incubus}
{@creature Ultroloth}
{@creature Xorn}

item.name: Olla de ferro
entries: An olla de ferro holds 1 gallon of liquid.

item.name: Ironfang
entries: A {@item pic de guerra|phb} forged from a single piece of iron, Ironfang has a fang-like head inscribed with ancient runes. The pick is heavy in the hand, but when the wielder swings the pick in anger, the weapon seems almost weightless. This weapon is immune to any form of rust, acid, or corrosion—nothing seems to mark it. Ironfang contains a spark of {@creature Ogrémoch|pota}, the Prince of Evil Earth.
Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. When you hit with it, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d8} de dany de tro.

entries.name: Earth Mastery
entries: Obténs els beneficis següents while you hold Ironfang:

items: You can speak Terran fluently.
Tens resistència al dany d'àcid.
You have {@sense tremorsense} out to a range of 60 feet.
You can sense the presence of precious metals and stones within 60 feet of you, but not their exact location.
Pots llançar el conjur {@spell dominar criatura} (save DC 17) on an {@creature earth elemental}. Once you have done so, Ironfang no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Esclatar
entries: Ironfang has 3 charges. Pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge and cast the 2nd-level version of {@spell esclatar} (DC 17). Ironfang recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

entries.name: The Rumbling
entries: While inside an earth node, you can perform a ritual called the Rumbling, using Ironfang to create a {@item devastation orb of earth|PotA}. Once you perform the ritual, Ironfang can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Flaw
entries: Ironfang heightens its wielder's destructive nature. While attuned to the weapon, you gain the following flaw: "I like to break things and cause ruin."

item.name: Ivana's Whisper
entries: This poison bears a distinct scent and chemical message from Ivana Boritsi. Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 18). Si falla, experience the effects of a {@spell somnis} spell created by Ivana the next time they sleep. This poison is nonmagical, and Ivana doesn't directly communicate with those affected during the dream. Rather, she creates the illusion of speaking with her intended target by alchemically crafting her message, predicting her target's reactions, and chemically encoding in her responses. She wears this poison as a perfume or hides it within gift bouquets, allowing it to convey her message later.

item.name: Izzet Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Izzet, allows you to cast {@spell vira del caos|XGE}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Izzet's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Izzet Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Izzet guild
entries: Formed of carved and polished red and blue stone, the keyrune includes bits of cable and wire. One end resembles a humanlike head, suggesting the jagged elemental form of the {@creature galvanice weird|GGR} that it can become for a duration of 3 hours. In this form, it will serve you as a bodyguard, lift and carry things for you, act as a test subject for your experiments, or aid you in any other way that its capabilities allow.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature galvanice weird|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Jacinth
entries: A transparent fiery orange gemstone.

item.name: Jade
entries: A translucent light green, deep green, or white gemstone.

item.name: Jade game board with solid gold playing pieces
Jade Serpent Staff
entries: This staff is broken into five pieces, each worth 100 gp for the jade alone. The entire staff can be restored with {@spell apedaçar} cantrips; each casting of the spell repairs one break in the staff. If the staff is made whole, it transforms from an object into an animated jade serpent that has the statistics of a {@creature giant poisonous snake}, with these changes:

items: The serpent is a construct that understands and obeys whoever was holding the staff when it transformed.
It has immunity to poison damage and the {@condition emmetzinat} condition. No necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

When it es queda a 0 punts de vida, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1, the snake turns to dust and is destroyed. On any other roll, it changes back into a staff and breaks into {@dice 1d4 + 1} pieces that must be magically mended before the staff can be used again.

item.name: Jade sword with amber (Advenidors del Riu)
Jade totem with diamond eyes (Advenidors del Riu)

entries.items: Imprinted on this staff is a fragment of a dead wizard's personality. The first character who touches the staff gains the following flaw: "I crave power above all else, and will do anything to obtain more of it." This flaw trumps any conflicting personality trait.

item.name: Jasper
entries: An opaque blue, black, or brown gemstone.

item.name: Javelin of Backbiting
entries: Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. When you throw it, its normal and long ranges both increase by 30 feet, and it deals one extra die of damage on a hit. After you throw it and it hits or misses, it flies back to your hand immediately.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with {@spell anul·lar maledicció} or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon, keeping it within reach at all times. A més, you have disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.

Whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll using this weapon, the weapon bends or flies a impactar you in the back. Make a new attack roll with advantage against your own AC. If the result is a hit, you take damage as if you had attacked yourself with the javelin.

item.name: Javelin of Lightning
entries: This javelin is a arma màgica. When you hurl it and speak its paraula màgica, it transforms into a bolt of lightning, forming a line 5 feet wide that extends out from you to a target within 120 feet. Tota criatura a dins de la línia excluding you and the target ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 13), taking {@dice 4d6} de dany elèctric si falla; qui superi, en rep la meitat. The lightning bolt turns back into a javelin when it reaches the target. Fes un atac armat a distància against the target. Si impacta, the target takes damage from the javelin plus {@dice 4d6} de dany elèctric.
The javelin's property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba. In the meantime, the javelin can still be used as a arma màgica.

item.name: Jet
entries: An opaque deep black gemstone.

item.name: Eines de Joieria
additionalEntries: Training with jeweler's tools includes the basic techniques needed to beautify gems. It also gives you perícia in identifying precious stones.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Jeweler's tools consist of a small saw and hammer, files, pliers, and tweezers.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: Proficiency with jeweler's tools grants you knowledge about the reputed mystical uses of gems. This insight proves handy when you make {@skill Arcana} checks related to gems or gem-encrusted items.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: When you inspect jeweled objects, your proficiency with jeweler's tools aids you in picking out clues they might hold.

additionalEntries.name: Identify Gems
entries: You can identify gems and determine their value at a glance.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Joieria
rows: Modify a gem's appearance
Determine a gem's history

item.name: Jug
entries: A jug holds 1 gallon of liquid.

item.name: Junky +1 Daga
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this dagger, which looks like junk. When it is used, its grip frays, its blade chips, and it flakes rust. If you get a natural 1 on an attack roll while wielding this weapon, it breaks and becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Keelboat
entries: Keelboats and rowboats are used on lakes and rivers. If going downstream, add the speed of the current (typically 3 miles per hour) to the speed of the vehicle. These vehicles can't be rowed against any significant current, but they can be pulled upstream by draft animals on the shores.

item.name: Keoghtom's Ointment
entries: This glass jar, 3 inches in diameter, contains {@dice 1d4 + 1} doses of a thick mixture that smells faintly of aloe. The jar and its contents weigh ½ pound.

Com a acció, one dose of the ointment can be swallowed or applied to the skin. The creature that receives it regains {@dice 2d8 + 2} hit points, ceases to be {@condition emmetzinat}, and is cured of any disease.

item.name: Keycharm
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Marcaguarda
entries: This small stylized key plays a vital role in the work of House Kundarak. If you cast the {@spell alarma}, {@spell pany arcà}, o {@spell glif de guarda} spell, you can tie the effect to the keycharm so that whoever holds it receives the notification from the {@spell alarma} spell, bypasses the lock of the {@spell pany arcà} spell, or avoids triggering the glyph placed by the {@spell glif de guarda} spell. A més, the holder (who needn't be attuned to the item) can take an action to end any one spell tied to it, provided the holder knows the paraula màgica you set for ending the tied spells. The keycharm can have up to three tied spells at one time.

item.name: Khrusor, Spear of Heliod
entries: Heliod wields Khrusor, a spear blessed with the power of the sun. In his hands, it can be pitched from Nyx to any point on Theros. When Heliod lends his weapon to a mortal, it's typically so they can perform some great work in his name or as a test of their worthiness.

entries.name: Spear of the Sun
entries: This spear grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. When you hit with an attack using this spear, the target rep {@damage 2d8} de dany radiant extra.

entries.name: Blessing of the Sun
entries: If you are a worshiper of Heliod, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 3+.
items.entry: You gain 15 punts de vida temporals each dawn.

items.name: Piety 10+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The spear has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Heliod, the spear has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} properties.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Luminous
entries: The spear desprèn llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals. The light is sunlight.

entries.name: Sun's Retaliation
entries: When you take damage from a creature within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack with the spear against that creature. Si impacta, the spear deals damage as normal, and the creature is {@condition encegat} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. This property of the spear no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: The spear té 10 càrregues. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell sageta guia} (1 charge), {@spell llum del dia} (3 charges, targeting the tip of the spear only), {@spell Raig Solar} (6 charges). The spear regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

entries.name: Destroying the Spear
entries: If taken to Erebos's palace in Tizerus, and used to sacrifice a champion of Heliod to Erebos, Khrusor is either destroyed or fundamentally twisted to Erebos's service.

item.name: Knave's Eye Patch
entries: Mentre vesteixis el eye patch, you gain these benefits:

items: Tens avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.
If you have the Sensible al Sol trait, you are unaffected by the trait.
You are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts or determine whether you are lying. Creatures can communicate telepathically with you only if you allow it.

item.name: Korolnor Scepter
entries: The Korolnor Scepter is one of ten Ruling Scepters of Shanatar, forged by the dwarven gods and given to the ruling houses of the ancient dwarven empire. The Korolnor Scepter's location was unknown for the longest time until a {@creature storm giant} queen, Neri, found it in a barnacle-covered shipwreck at the bottom of the Trackless Sea. The Ruling Scepters are all roughly the same size and shape, but their materials and properties vary.

The Korolnor Scepter is a tapered mitrall rod as thick and long as a dwarf's forearm, with a small platinum knob at the bottom and a rounded disk adorned with a ring of seven tiny blue gems at the top.
Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this scepter, which can be wielded as a magic club.

You can use the properties of the {@item Wyrmskull Throne|SKT}, as well as the properties of the scepter itself. The scepter has 10 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expanded charges at dawn. Its properties are as follows:

items: If you are underground or underwater, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge to determine the distance to the surface.
As an action: you can expend 2 charges to cast the {@spell encàrrec} spell from the scepter.

As an action: you can expend 3 charges to cast the {@spell teleportació} spell from the scepter. If the destination is within 60 feet of the {@item Wyrmskull Throne|SKT}, there is no chance of a teleport error or mishap occurring.

item.name: Kyrzin's Ooze
entries: This opalescent, symbiotic goo comes sealed in a jar and slowly shifts and moves, as if endlessly exploring the jar's interior. To attune to this item, you must first drink the contents of the jar, unlocking the following properties.

entries.name: Resistant
entries: While attuned to Kyrzin's ooze, tens resistència al dany poison and acid, and you're immune to the {@condition emmetzinat} condition.

entries.name: Amorf
entries: Com a acció, you can speak a paraula màgica and cause your body to assume the amorphous qualities of an ooze. For the next minute, you (along with any equipment you're wearing or carrying) pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema. Once you use this property, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Alè Àcid
entries: Com a acció, you can exhale acid en una línia de 30 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15), taking 36 ({@dice 8d8}) de dany d'àcid; si supera, en rep la meitat. Once you use this property, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The ooze can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the ooze ends, as it seeps out of you.
If you die while the ooze is inside you, it bursts out and engulfs you, turning your corpse into a {@creature black pudding} allied with the daelkyr.

item.name: Escala (10 peus)
entries: Escala (10 peus)

item.name: Lamp
entries: A lamp casts llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals. Once lit, it burns durant 6 hores on a flask (1 pint) of oil.

item.name: Llanterna Reveladora
entries: While lit, this {@item llanterna coberta|phb} burns durant 6 hores on 1 pint of oil, shedding llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals. {@condition Invisible} creatures and objects are visible as long as they are in the lantern's bright light. Pots, com a acció, lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

item.name: Lantern of Tracking
entries: This llanterna coberta burns durant 6 hores on 1 pint of oil, shedding llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.

Each lantern of tracking is designed to track down a certain type of creature, which is determined by rolling on the Lantern of Tracking table. Once determined, this creature type can't be changed. While the lantern is within 300 feet of any creature of that type, its flame turns bright green. The lantern doesn't pinpoint the creature's exact location, however.

entries.caption: Lantern of Tracking
rows: Aberrations
Celestials
Constructs
Dragons
Elementals
Fata
Diastres
Giants
Monstrositats
Undead

item.name: Lapis Lazuli
entries: An opaque light and dark blue with yellow flecks gemstone.

item.name: Lash of Shadows
entries: This snakeskin whip is touched by the power of Zehir and ends in five animated serpent heads.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Lash of Shadows is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 18, a Saviesa of 16, and a Carisma of 20. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, and Dracònic.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A mad {@creature marilith} named Sizlifeth lives within the Lash of Shadows. The weapon has a short temper and experiences only extreme emotions. It is most happy when dealing harm.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The whip grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Abyssal and Dracònic.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

You can attempt to poison any creature that is hit by the whip. La criatura ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13). Si falla, suffer the effect of one of the following poisons of your choice; once a poison other than Metzina de serp has been used, that poison no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba:

items.name: Dead Eyes.
items.entry: A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison is {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the creature is {@condition encegat}.

items.name: Metzina de serp.
items.entry: A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison rep {@damage 3d6} de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the whip reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poisons increases to 15.

The weapon gains a new poison option called Ghoul's Blood. A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison is {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the creature is {@condition paralitzat}. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the whip reaches an exalted state, it gains the following additional properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poisons increases to 17.

The weapon gains a new poison option called Cocatriu Tears. A creature that fails the saving throw against this poison begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw Al final del seu proper torn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrificat} durant 24 hores.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Leather Gòlem Armor
entries: Strange rituals have repurposed the body of a flesh gòlem into this partially sentient suit of leather armor. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens +1 a la CA and to salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics. A més, you gain the following properties:

items.name: Forma Immutable
entries: You are immune to any spell or effect that would alter your form.

items.name: Absorbir Electricitat
entries: You gain resistance to lightning damage. Whenever you take lightning damage, you gain 5 punts de vida temporals.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This armor is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a anul·lar maledicció spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the armor. A més, while you wear the cursed armor, you gain the following properties:

items.name: Aversió al Foc
entries: If you take fire damage, you have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks fins el final del teu proper torn.

items.name: Bersèrk
entries: Quan rebis un atac crític, tira {@dice d6}. Si surt un 6 l'armadura et torna bersèrk. A cada torn així ataca a la criatura que tingui més a prop i pugui veure. Si no n'hi ha cap prou a prop per moure's i atacar-la, atacarà a un objecte (preferentment més petit). Once the armor causes you to go berserk, it cannot be removed. You continue to attack until you are incapacitated or until another creature is able to calm you with appropriate magic (such as a apaivagar emocions spell) or a successful DC 15 Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check.

item.name: Eines de Pelleteria
additionalEntries: Knowledge of leatherworking extends to lore concerning animal hides and their properties. It also confers knowledge of leather armor and similar goods.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Leatherworker's tools include a knife, a small mallet, an edger, a hole punch, thread, and leather scraps.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana
entries: Your expertise in working with leather grants you added insight when you inspect magic items crafted from leather, such as boots and some cloaks.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: You gain added insight when studying leather items or clues related to them, as you draw on your knowledge of leather to pick out details that others would overlook.

additionalEntries.name: Identify Hides
entries: When looking at a hide or a leather item, you can determine the source of the leather and any special techniques used to treat it. For example, you can spot the difference between leather crafted using dwarven methods and leather crafted using halfling methods.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Pelleteria
rows: Modify a leather item's appearance
Determine a leather item's history

item.name: Libram of Souls and Flesh
entries: With covers made of skin and fittings of bone, this tome is cold to the touch, and it whispers faintly. When found, the book contains the following spells, which are wizard spells for you while you are attuned to the book: {@spell animar els morts}, {@spell cercle de la mort}, {@spell pseudo vida}, {@spell dit de la mort}, {@spell parlar amb els morts}, {@spell convocar no-mort|TCE}, i {@spell toc vampíric}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the necromancy school.

Com a acció, you can expend 1 charge to take on a semblance of undeath durant 10 minuts. For the duration, you take on a deathly appearance, and undead creatures are indifferent to you, unless you have damaged them. You also appear undead to all outward inspection and to spells used to determine the target's status. The effect ends if you deal damage or force a creature to make a saving throw.

item.name: Lifewell Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features symbols of life and rebirth.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Necrotic Resistència
entries: Tens resistència al dany necrotic.

entries.name: Life Ward
entries: When you would be reduced to 0 hit points, you drop to 1 hit point instead. Once used, this property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Lifewell Tattoo
entries: This tattoo comprises symbols of life and rebirth. While this tattoo is on your skin, tens resistència al dany necrotic.

entries.name: Abjurar la Mort
entries: When you would be reduced to 0 hit points, you drop to 1 hit point instead. Once used, this benefno es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Lightbringer
entries: This +1 mace was made for a cleric of Lathander, the god of dawn. The head of the mace is shaped like a sunburst and made of solid brass. Named Lightbringer, this weapon glows as bright as a {@item torch|phb} when its wielder commands. While glowing, the mace deals an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany radiant to undead creatures.

item.name: Lightning Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Living Gloves
entries: These symbiotic gloves—made of thin chitin and sinew—pulse with a life of their own. To attune to them, you must wear them for the entire attunement period, during which the gloves bond with your skin.
While attuned to these gloves, you gain one of the following proficiencies (your choice when you attune to the gloves):

items: {@skill Sleight of Hand}
{@item Eines de lladre|PHB}
One kind of artisan's tools of your choice
One kind of instrument musical of your choice

entries: Quan fas una tirada d'habilitat using the chosen proficiency, you add double el teu bonus de competència to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The gloves can't be removed from you while you're attuned to them, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to them. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the gloves ends, and they can be removed.

item.name: Living Loot Satchel
entries: As a rank 2 hoardsperson, you are granted the use of a living loot satchel, which is an uncommon magic item. It functions as a {@item bossa de contenció} and is available in a variety of colors and styles.

entries.caption: Class-Based Living Loot Satchel
rows: Barbarian
Broad belt with a dozen hanging pockets
Bard
Lute case
Cleric
Hollowed-out holy tome
Druida
Made from natural, organic, locally sourced woven fibers
Guerrer
A thick, battle-scarred iron lockbox
Paladí
A metal case with fine engraving and scrollwork
Explorador
A fur-lined bindle
Rogue
A nondescript coin pouch
Sortiller
A battered leather satchel, prone to spitting out multicolored sparks at the seams
Bruixot
A patchwork monster-leather satchel with a "purely decorative" fanged mouth.
Mag
A pocket dimension hidden up your sleeve or inside your hat

entries: The living loot satchel is a kind of magical being that safeguards the franchise's funds and valuables. Its innards are connected to a secure coffer within Head Office's vault in Waterdeep, to which the satchel periodically transfers the franchise's wealth. Com a acció, you can transfer any amount of your franchise funds back to your satchel with a successful DC 15 Destresa ({@skill Joc de Mans}) check.

entries.name: Secret Satchel
entries: As a rank 3 hoardsperson, your living loot satchel gets an upgrade to function as the replica chest used for the {@spell Cofre Secret d'en Leomund} spell, becoming a rare magic item. You can open the secret chest through your living loot satchel to deposit or withdraw items—even items that wouldn't normally fit in your satchel, but which fit within the chest. Thanks to Head Office striking deals you don't want to know about with extraplanar creatures you really don't want to know about, there is no chance for the spell to end.

entries.name: That Thing You Need
entries: At rank 3, pots, com a acció bonus, reach into your living loot satchel and make una tirada de Destresa ({@skill Joc de Mans}) amb CD 15. On a success, you draw forth an item of your choice on the Adventuring Gear table in chapter 5 of the Player's Handbook. The item must be of a size that can fit into your secret chest and be worth no more than 15 gp. Once you attempt to draw five items from your satchel, you cannot draw forth any more items until the next dawn.

entries.name: Portable Hole Satchel
entries: At rank 4, your living loot satchel receives another upgrade, becoming a very rare magic item. The secret chest accessed by your satchel now has the storage capacity of a {@item portable hole}—6 feet in diameter and 10 feet deep. As before, you can place any appropriately sized object into the portable-hole-sized chest, even if it wouldn't normally fit into your satchel.

entries.name: That Expensive Thing You Need
entries: Also at rank 4, Quan empris el tret That Thing You Need, you can requisition any item of up to 250 gp in value, as long as it would fit into the confines of your satchel's portable hole.

item.name: Loadstone
entries: This stone is a large gem worth 150 gp.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: The stone is cursed, but its magical nature is hidden; {@spell detectar màgia} doesn't detect it. An {@spell identificar} spell reveals the stone's true nature. If you use the Dash or Disengage action while the stone is on your person, its curse activates. Until the curse is broken with {@spell anul·lar maledicció} or similar magic, your speed is reduced by 5 feet, and your maximum load and maximum lift capacities are halved. You also become unwilling to part with the stone.

item.name: Lock
entries: A key is provided with the lock. Without the key, a creature proficient with {@item eines de lladre|phb} can pick this lock una tirada de Destresa (CD 15). Your DM may decide that better locks are available for higher prices.

item.name: Lock of Trickery
entries: This lock appears to be an ordinary lock (of the type described in chapter 5 of the Player's Handbook) and comes with a single key. The tumblers in this lock magically adjust to thwart burglars. Destresa checks made to pick the lock have disadvantage.

item.name: Longhorn
entries: A Faerûnian flute of sophisticated make, found only in areas with skilled artisans, as in great cities or elven enclaves.

item.name: Lord's Ensemble
item.reqAttune: by a creature with a humanoid build
entries: The Masked Lords of Waterdeep don this ensemble when meeting with one another. This raiment renders each lord indistinguishable from the others. The ensemble consists of three pieces—a helm, an amulet, and a robe—that function as a single magic item when worn together, but only within the city of Waterdeep and its sewers. You become attuned to the ensemble as a single item.

entries.name: Lord's Helm
entries: This bucket helm covers your head and conceals your face. Screens over the eyes help to shroud your identity without blinding you. While you wear the helm, your voice is magically altered to sound genderless, and you are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts, to determine whether you are lying, to know your alignment, or to know your creature type. Creatures can communicate telepathically with you only if you allow it.

entries.name: Lord's Amulet
entries: This amulet bears the crest of Waterdeep. It functions as an {@item amulet protector contra detecció i localització}.

entries.name: Lord's Robe
entries: This elegant robe functions as a {@item anell d'acció lliure}, and it creates the illusion that you have a nondescript, androgynous humanoid build and stand 6 feet tall.

item.name: Lost Crown of Besilmer
entries: This dwarven battle-helm consists of a sturdy open-faced steel helmet, decorated with a golden circlet above the brow from which seven small gold spikes project upward. Obténs els beneficis següents while wearing the crown:

items: Tens resistència al dany psíquic.
Tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against effects that would charm you.

Pots, com a acció bonus, inspire one creature you can see that is within 60 feet of you and that can see or hear you. Once before the end of your next turn, the inspired creature can roll a {@dice d6} and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes. This uses 1 charge from the crown. It has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

item.name: Lost Sword
entries: The Lost Sword is a sentient lawful good {@item +1 shortsword} (Intel·ligència 11, Saviesa 13, Carisma 13). It has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 120 feet. It communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it.
The sword's purpose is to fight evil. The sword has the following additional properties:

items: The sword continually desprèn llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals. Only by destroying the sword can this light be extinguished.
A lawful good creature can attune itself to the sword in 1 minute.

While attuned to the weapon, the sword's wielder can use the sword to cast the {@spell mantell del creuat} spell. Once used, this property of the sword no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Luba's Tarokka of Souls
entries: Not all lingering spirits are tragic souls, lost on their way to the hereafter. Some languish as prisoners, souls so wicked mortals dare not free them upon an unsuspecting afterlife.

Created by a figure of Vistani legend, Luba's Tarokka of Souls shaped the destiny of countless heroes. The prophecies of this deck of cards also revealed great evils and guided its creator into the path of nefarious forces. Untold times the deck's creator, Mother Luba, narrowly escaped doom, spared only by her keen insights. But even for her, not all wickedness could be escaped. In the most dire cases, Mother Luba managed to ensnare beings of pure evil amid the strands of fate, imprisoning them within her tarroka deck. There these foul spirits dwell still, trapped within a nether-realm hidden amid shuffling cards, waiting for fate to turn foul—as it inevitably will.

Like all tarokka decks, the {@i Tarokka of Souls} is a lavishly illustrated collection of fifty-four cards, comprising the fourteen cards of the high deck and forty other cards divided into four suits: coins, glyphs, stars, and swords.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The artifact has the following random properties, which you can determine by rolling on the tables in the "Artifacts" section of the {@book Guia del Mestre de Masmorres|DMG}:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} properties
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} properties

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While holding the deck, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell comprendre idiomes}, {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}, {@spell detectar màgia}, {@spell detectar malalties i metzines}, {@spell localitzar objecte}, o {@spell escodrinyar}. Once you use the deck to cast a spell, you can't cast that spell again from it until the next dawn.

entries.name: Enduring Vision
entries: While holding the deck, you automatically succeed on Constitució saving throws made to maintain your concentration on {@spell endevinació} spells.

entries.name: Twist of Fate
entries: Com a acció, you can draw a card from the deck and twist the fortune of another creature que puguis veure a 15 peus d'abast. Choose one of the following effects:

items.name: Weal.
items.entry: The creature has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws for the next hour.

items.name: Woe.
items.entry: The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws for the next hour.

items: The deck can be used in this way twice, and you regain all expended uses at the next dawn.

entries.name: Prisoners of Fate
entries: Whenever you use the Twist of Fate property, there is a chance that one of the souls trapped in the deck escapes. Roll {@dice d100} and consult the Souls of the Tarokka table. If you roll one of the high cards, the soul associated with it escapes. You can find its statistics in the {@book Manual de Monstres|MM}. If you roll a soul that has already escaped, roll again.

entries.caption: Souls of the Tarokka
rows: Artifact
{@creature Flameskull}
Bèstia
{@creature Wraith}
Broken
{@creature Banshee}
Darklord
{@creature Vampire}
Donjon
{@creature Mummy}
Executioner
{@creature Death knight}
Ghost
{@creature Ghost}
Horseman
{@creature Senyor de les Mòmies}
Innocent
{@creature Ghost}
Marionette
{@creature Mummy}
Mists
{@creature Wraith}
Raven
{@creature Vampire spawn}
Seer
{@creature Vampire}
Tempter
{@creature Vampire spawn}

entries: The released soul appears at a random location within {@dice 10d10} miles of you and terrorizes the living. Until the released soul is destroyed, it gains the benefit of a weal from the deck's Twist of Fate property, and both you and the original target of Twist of Fate suffer the effect of woe.

entries.name: Shuffling Fate
entries: If you go 7 days without using the Twist of Fate property, your attunement to Luba's Tarroka of Souls ends, and you can't attune to it again until after another creature uses Twist of Fate on you.

entries.name: Destroying the Deck
entries: Luba's Tarokka of Souls can be destroyed only if all fourteen souls within are released and destroyed. This reveals a fifteenth soul, a {@creature lich}, that inhabits the Nether card, which appears only when the fourteen souls are defeated. If this ancient entity is destroyed, the Nether card vanishes and the deck becomes a normal tarokka deck, with no special properties, but it includes a new card of el/la/li MM's design.

entries.name: Mother Luba and the Vistani
entries: The creator of the Tarokka of Souls, Mother Luba was one of the most influential leaders of the Vistani. For untold generations, the Vistani have wandered the Erm de l'Ombra, which includes terrifying demiplanes like the vampire-haunted realm of Barovia. These travelers have learned many secrets of these domains and encountered countless others wandering amid the Erm de l'Ombra's horrors. Most Vistani bands accept well-intentioned wayfarers from diverse walks and of disparate origins, embracing any who seek to find a home amid the endless roads and vistas hidden amid the mists.

A halfling Vistani, Mother Luba led one of the largest groups of Vistani in the Erm de l'Ombra. She hailed from the same world that Count Strahd von Zarovich and Madam Eva came from, and she created a community of kindness and resilience-ever rare to find in the Plane of Shadow. She led her people in welcoming strangers, feeding the hungry, and defying the cruel. She and Madam Eva were once friends, until Madam Eva began bargaining with the creatures of the night. "We may wander amid the shadows," Mother Luba said. "But we must ever serve as a light to our fellow travelers."
Some years ago, Mother Luba disappeared into the mists, leaving behind only the Tarokka of Souls. It is said that if you draw the Mists card from it, you can hear the whispers of her kind voice.

attachedSpells: detectar el bé i el mal

item.name: Lute crafted of exotic wood with mother-of-pearl inlay and zircon gems (Coalició Temerària)
Luxon Beacon
entries: This dodecahedron of faintly glowing crystal is heavier than it appears. A set of handles are affixed to its sides, and it pulsates and thrums when touched.

entries.name: Fragment of Possibility
entries: A creature that touches the beacon and concentrates for 1 minute receives a Fragment of Possibility, which looks like a Tiny, grayish bead of energy that follows the creature around, staying within 1 foot of it at all times. The fragment dura 8 hores or until used. Once the beacon grants a Fragment of Possibility, it can't grant another until the next dawn. A creature with a Fragment of Possibility from a Luxon Beacon can't gain another Fragment of Possibility from any source.

Quan una criatura with a Fragment of Possibility makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it can expend its fragment to roll an additional {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use. Alternativament, when an attack roll is made against the creature, it can expend its fragment to roll a {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use, the one it rolled or the one the attacker rolled.
If the original {@dice d20} roll has advantage or disadvantage, the creature rolls its {@dice d20} after advantage or disadvantage has been applied to the original roll.

entries.name: Soul Snare
entries: If a follower of the Luxon who has undergone a ritual of consecution dies within 100 miles of a Luxon Beacon, their soul is ensnared by it. This soul will be reincarnated within the body of a random humanoid baby developing within 100 miles of the beacon.

item.name: Lyre of Building
entries: While holding this {@item lyre|PHB}, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell apedaçar} as an action. You can also play the {@item lyre|PHB} as a reaction when an object or a structure que puguis veure a 300 peus d'abast takes damage, causing it to be immune to that damage and any further damage of the same type fins el final del teu proper torn.

A més, you can play the {@item lyre|PHB} as an action to cast {@spell fabricar}, {@spell moure la terra}, {@spell passaparets}, o {@spell convocar constructe|TCE}, and that spell can't be cast from it again until the next dawn.

item.name: Mace of Disruption
entries: When you hit a diastre or an undead with this arma màgica, that creature takes an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany radiant. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, be destroyed. Si supera, the creature becomes {@condition acovardit} de tu fins el final del teu proper torn.
While you hold this weapon, desprén llum forta en un radi de 20 peus, i llum ténue uns 20 peus adicionals.

item.name: Mace of Smiting
entries: Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. El bonus es torna +3 when you use the mace to attack a construct.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, the target takes an extra 7 dany contundent, or an extra 14 dany contundent if it's a construct. If a construct has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, it is destroyed.
{@i Note: According to the SRD, it is an extra {@dice 2d6} and {@dice 4d6} de dany contundent, although {@link this is incorrect|https://rpg.stackexchange.com/a/174522/53884}}.

item.name: Mace of Terror
entries: This arma màgica has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to release a wave of terror. Each creature of your choice in a 30-foot radius extending from you ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition acovardit} de tu durant 1 minut. While està {@condition acovardit} in this way, a creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. Tampoc pot prendre reaccions. For its action it can use only the {@action Córrer} action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If it has nowhere it can move, the creature can use the {@action Esquivar} action. Al final de cada torn seu, a creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
The mace recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

item.name: Mace of the Black Crown
entries: This mace has a haft of black iron and a ruby head with a fiendish countenance. Carrying the boon of Asmodeus, it is fit for the most powerful servants of els Nou Inferns.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Mace of the Black Crown is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 20, a Saviesa of 12, and a Carisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Common and Infernal.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A greedy {@creature erinyes} named Xartaza lives within the Mace of the Black Crown. Xartaza wants to recruit more souls for Asmodeus, so the weapon pushes its wielder toward lawful evil actions by manipulating the wielder's dreams. A former Blood War general, Xartaza hates demons and relishes crafting sound battle plans in any conflict.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The mace grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Infernal.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

While holding the mace, pots, com a acció bonus, speak its Infernal paraula màgica, causing flames to erupt from the head. These flames shed llum forta en un radi de 40 peus i llum tènue uns 40 peus adicionals. While the mace is ablaze, it deals an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany de foc to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the paraula màgica again or until you are no longer holding the mace.

While holding the mace, pots, com a acció, summon an {@creature imp}. Any devil you summon with this mace és amistós vers a tu i als teus aliats durant la duració del conjur. The imp obeys any verbal commands that you issue to it and returns to els Nou Inferns 10 minutes after you summoned it. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the mace reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and the extra fire damage dealt by the weapon when it is ignited increases to {@dice 2d6}.
The weapon's Summon Devil feature can also be used to summon a {@creature bearded devil}.
Tens resistència al dany poison while holding this weapon.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the mace reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3, and the extra fire damage dealt by the weapon when it is ignited increases to {@dice 3d6}. Fire damage dealt by the mace ignores resistance to fire damage.
The weapon's Summon Devil feature can also be used to summon a {@creature barbed devil}.
Tens resistència al dany de foc while you hold this weapon.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Macuahuitl
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this longsword, which is made of laminated wood, and inset with jagged teeth of obsidian. It deals an extra {@dice 2d6} damage to any creature of the plant type.

item.name: Maddgoth's Helm
entries: While you wear this helm and are inside Maddgoth's castle, on its roof, or in its courtyard, you have immunity to all damage. If the helm is taken from the castle, it turns to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: Lupa
entries: This lens allows a closer look at small objects. It is also useful as a substitute for flint and steel when starting fires. Lighting a fire with a lupa requires light as bright as sunlight to focus, tinder to ignite, and about 5 minutes for the fire to ignite. A lupa grants advantage on any ability check made to appraise or inspect an item that is small or highly detailed.

item.name: Malachite
entries: An opaque striated light and dark green gemstone.

item.name: Malice
entries: Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora. The {@condition emmetzinat} creature is {@condition encegat}.

item.name: Esposes
entries: These metal restraints can bind a Small or Medium creature. Escaping the esposes requires a successful DC 20 Destresa check. Breaking them requires a successful DC 20 Força check. Each set of esposes comes with one key. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves' tools can pick the esposes' lock una tirada de Destresa (CD 15). Esposes have 15 hit points.

item.name: Mantle of Spell Resistència
entries: Tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against spells while you wear this cloak.

item.name: Manual of Bodily Health
entries: This book contains health and diet tips, and its words are charged with magic. If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book's contents and practicing its guidelines, your Constitució score increases by 2, as does your maximum for that score. The manual then loses its magic, but regains it in a century.

item.name: Manual of Clay Gòlems
entries: This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of gòlem. El/la/li MM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A creature that can't use a manual of gòlems and attempts to read it takes {@dice 6d6} de dany psíquic.

To create a {@creature clay gòlem}, you must spend 30 days, working without interruption with the manual at hand and resting no more than 8 hours per day. You must also pay 65,000 gp to purchase supplies. Once you finish creating the gòlem, the book is consumed in eldritch flames. The gòlem becomes animate when the ashes of the manual are sprinkled on it. It is under your control, and it understands and obeys your spoken commands.

item.name: Manual of Flesh Gòlems
entries: This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of gòlem. El/la/li MM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A creature that can't use a manual of gòlems and attempts to read it takes {@dice 6d6} de dany psíquic.

To create a {@creature flesh gòlem}, you must spend 60 days, working without interruption with the manual at hand and resting no more than 8 hours per day. You must also pay 50,000 gp to purchase supplies. Once you finish creating the gòlem, the book is consumed in eldritch flames. The gòlem becomes animate when the ashes of the manual are sprinkled on it. It is under your control, and it understands and obeys your spoken commands.

item.name: Manual of Gainful Exercise
entries: This book describes fitness exercises, and its words are charged with magic. If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book's contents and practicing its guidelines, your Força score increases by 2, as does your maximum for that score. The manual then loses its magic, but regains it in a century.

item.name: Manual of Iron Gòlems
entries: This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of gòlem. El/la/li MM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A creature that can't use a manual of gòlems and attempts to read it takes {@dice 6d6} de dany psíquic.

To create an {@creature iron gòlem}, you must spend 120 days, working without interruption with the manual at hand and resting no more than 8 hours per day. You must also pay 100,000 gp to purchase supplies. Once you finish creating the gòlem, the book is consumed in eldritch flames. The gòlem becomes animate when the ashes of the manual are sprinkled on it. It is under your control, and it understands and obeys your spoken commands.

item.name: Manual of Quickness of Action
entries: This book contains coordination and balance exercises, and its words are charged with magic. If you spend 48 hours over a period of 6 days or fewer studying the book's contents and practicing its guidelines, your Destresa score increases by 2, as does your maximum for that score. The manual then loses its magic, but regains it in a century.

item.name: Manual of Stone Gòlems
entries: This tome contains information and incantations necessary to make a particular type of gòlem. El/la/li MM chooses the type or determines it randomly. To decipher and use the manual, you must be a spellcaster with at least two 5th-level spell slots. A creature that can't use a manual of gòlems and attempts to read it takes {@dice 6d6} de dany psíquic.

To create a {@creature stone gòlem}, you must spend 90 days, working without interruption with the manual at hand and resting no more than 8 hours per day. You must also pay 80,000 gp to purchase supplies. Once you finish creating the gòlem, the book is consumed in eldritch flames. The gòlem becomes animate when the ashes of the manual are sprinkled on it. It is under your control, and it understands and obeys your spoken commands.

item.name: Map or Scroll Case
entries: This cylindrical leather case can hold up to ten rolled-up {@item paper (una fulla)|phb|fulles de paper} or five rolled-up {@item parchment (una fulla)|phb|sheets of parchment}.

item.name: Marble font with gold inlay (Legió del Crepuscle)
Mask of the Beast
entries: This wooden mask is shaped in the likeness of a beast's visage and té 3 càrregues. While wearing the mask you can expend 1 charge and use the mask to cast the {@spell amistat animal} spell as an action. The mask regains all expended charges at dawn.

item.name: Màscara de la Reina dels Dracs
entries: Individually, the five dragon masks resemble the dragons they are named for. When two or more of the dragon masks are assembled, however, they transform magically into the Màscara de la Reina dels Dracs. Each mask shrinks to become the modeled head of a chromatic dragon, appearing to roar its devotion to {@creature Tiamat|RoT} where all the masks brought together are arranged crown-like on the wearer's head. Below the five masks, a new mask shapes itself, granting the wearer a dracònic visage that covers the face, neck, and shoulders.

While you are attuned to and wear this mask, you can have any of the properties from any one mask. Additionally, you gain the Absorbir Dany from each of the five dragon masks, and you gain five uses of the Resistència Llegendària property.

item.name: Eines de Maçoneria
additionalEntries: Mason's tools allow you to craft stone structures, including walls and buildings crafted from brick.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Mason's tools consist of a trowel, un martell, a chisel, brushes, and a square.

additionalEntries.name: Història
entries: Your expertise aids you in identifying a stone building's date of construction and purpose, along with insight into who might have built it.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: You gain additional insight when inspecting areas within stone structures.

additionalEntries.name: Perception
entries: You can spot irregularities in stone walls or floors, making it easier to find trap doors and secret passages.

additionalEntries.name: Demolition
entries: Your knowledge of masonry allows you to spot weak points in brick walls. You deal double damage to such structures with your weapon attacks.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Maçoneria
rows: Chisel a small hole in a stone wall
Find a weak point in a stone wall

item.name: Masquerade Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo appears on your body as whatever you desire.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Fluid Ink
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can shape the tattoo into any color or pattern and move it to any area of your skin. Whatever form it takes, it is always obviously a tattoo. It can range in size from no smaller than a copper piece to an intricate work of art that covers all your skin.

entries.name: Ego Camuflatge
entries: Com a acció, you can use the tattoo to cast the {@spell ego camuflatge} spell (DC 13 to discern the disguise). Once the spell is cast from the tattoo, it can't be cast from the tattoo again until the next dawn.

item.name: Masquerade Tattoo
entries: This tattoo appears on your skin as whatever you desire. Com a acció bonus, you can shape the tattoo into any color or pattern and move it to any area of your skin. Whatever form it takes, it is always obviously a tattoo. It can range in size from no smaller than a copper piece to an intricate work of art that covers all your skin.

entries.name: Ego Camuflatge
entries: Com a acció, you can use the tattoo to cast the {@spell ego camuflatge} spell. Once the spell is cast from the tattoo, it can't be cast from the tattoo again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Master's Amulet
entries: Every {@creature shield guardian} has an amulet magically linked to it. A shield guardian can have only one corresponding amulet, and if that amulet is destroyed, the shield guardian is {@condition incapacitat} until a replacement amulet is created. A shield guardian's amulet is subject to direct attack if it isn't being worn or carried. It has AC 10, 10 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Crafting an amulet requires 1 week and costs 1,000 gp in components.

A shield guardian's solitary focus is to protect the amulet's wearer. The amulet's wearer can command the guardian to attack its enemies or to guard the wielder against attack. If an attack threatens to injure the wearer, the construct can magically absorb the blow into its own body, even at a distance.

A spellcaster can store a single spell within a shield guardian, which can then cast the spell on command or under specific conditions. Many a wizard has been rendered helpless by enemies, only to surprise those foes when its shield guardian unleashes potent magical power.

item.name: Masterpiece painting in mahogany frame with gold inlay (Legió del Crepuscle)
Mastix, Whip of Erebos
entries: Erebos wields Mastix, a whip capable of extending like an impossibly long shadow. In the hands of the god of the dead, the whip snares the reluctant dead and drags them into his realm. When Erebos grants his weapon to a mortal follower, it's typically to reclaim a powerful soul or to humiliate Heliod.

entries.name: Whip of the Dead
entries: Erebos's whip seethes with the enervating energy of the Underworld. This magic whip grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. When you hit with an attack using this whip, the target rep {@damage 2d8} de dany necròtic extra and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Additionally, when you make an attack with the whip en el teu torn, you can increase the range of the attack to 300 feet. This property of the weapon can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Blessing of the Dead
entries: If you are a worshiper of Erebos, you gain all the following benefits for which you have the required piety:

items.name: Piety 1+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property—a burden Erebos imposes to test his faithful.

items.name: Piety 25+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

items.name: Piety 50+.
items.entry: The whip has 1 additional randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property.

entries: If you aren't a worshiper of Erebos, the whip has 2 randomly determined {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental} properties.
See "Artifacts" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for details on randomly determined properties.

entries.name: Erebos's Claim
entries: While carrying the whip, pots, com a acció, cast either {@spell cercle de la mort} or {@spell dominar criatura} (targeting only undead) from the whip. The save DC for these spells is 18. Once you use the whip to cast a spell, that spell can't be cast from it again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Destroying the Whip
entries: To destroy the whip, it must be taken to the heights of Mount Hiastos in Nyx, unraveled by a Returned, and left to bask in continual daylight for one month.

item.name: Matalotok
entries: Matalotok, the Frost Father, is an ancient hammer fashioned by Thrym, the god of frost giants. The favored weapon of the demon lord {@creature Kostchtchie|BGDIA}, Matalotok is frigid to the touch and wreathed in mist.

You are immune to cold damage while holding Matalotok. Whenever it deals damage to a creature, the hammer radiates a burst of intense cold in a 30-foot-radius sphere. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) de dany de fred.

item.name: Matchless Pipe
entries: A switch made of flint is built into the bowl of this fine wooden smoking pipe. With a few flicks of the switch, the pipe lights itself.

item.name: Medalló de Pensaments
entries: The medallion té 3 càrregues. While wearing it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cast the {@spell detectar pensaments} spell (save DC 13) from it. The medallion recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

item.name: Menga leaves (1 ounce)
entries: The dried leaves of a menga bush can be ground, dissolved in a liquid, heated, and ingested. A creature that ingests 1 ounce of menga leaves in this fashion regains 1 hit point.
