A creature that ingests more than 5 ounces of menga leaves in a 24-hour period gains no additional benefit and ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 11). Si falla, fall {@condition inconscient} durant 1 hora. The {@condition inconscient} creature awakens if it takes at least 5 damage on one turn.
A healthy menga bush usually has {@dice 2d6} ounces of leaves. Once picked, the leaves require 1 day to dry out before they can confer any benefit.

item.name: Bàscula de mercants
entries: A scale includes a small balance, pans, and a suitable assortment of weights up to 2 pounds. With it, you can measure the exact weight of small objects, such as raw precious metals or béns mercantils, to help determine their worth.

item.name: Carmanyola
entries: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

item.name: Llàgrimes de Mitjanit
entries: A creature that ingests this poison suffers no effect until the stroke of midnight. If the poison has not been neutralized before then, the creature must succeed on a DC 17 Constitució saving throw, taking 31 ({@dice 9d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Poderós Servent d'en Leuk-o
entries: Named for the warlord who infamously employed it, the {@creature Poderós Servent d'en Leuk-o|TCE} is a fantastically powerful, 10-foot-tall machine that turns into an animate construct when piloted. Crafted of a gleaming black alloy of unknown origin, the servant is often described as a combination of a disproportioned dwarf and an oversized beetle. The servant contains enough space for 1 ton of cargo and a crew compartment within, from which up to two Medium creatures can control it-and potentially execute a spree of unstoppable destruction.

Tales of the servant's origins involve more conjecture than fact, often referring to otherworldly beings, the mysterious Barrier Peaks in Oerth, and the supposedly related device known as the {@i Machine of Lum the Mad}. The best details on the device's origins and operation can be found in the {@i Mind of Metal}, a tome of artificer's secrets that connects the device to the traditions of the lost Olman people, and which was written by Lum the Mad's several times over granddaughter, Lum the Maestro, while she reconstructed the long disassembled Poderós Servent d'en Leuk-o.

entries.name: Dangerous Attunement
entries: Two creatures can be attuned to the servant at a time. If a third creature tries to attune to it, nothing happens.
The servant's controls are accessed by a hatch in its upper back, which is easily opened while there are no creatures attuned to the artifact.

Attuning to the artifact requires two hours, which can be undertaken com a part d'un Descans Llarg, during which time you must be inside the servant, interacting with its controls. While crew members are attuning themselves, any creature or structure outside and within 50 feet of the servant has a {@chance 25|25 percent} chance of being accidentally targeted by one of its Puny Destructiu attacks once during the attunement. This process must be undergone every time a creature attunes itself to the artifact.

entries.name: Controlling the Servant
entries: While any creatures are attuned to the artifact, attuned creatures can open the hatch as easily as any other door. Other creatures can open the hatch as an action una tirada de Destresa (CD 25) using {@item eines de lladre|PHB}. A {@spell picaporta} spell cast on the hatch also opens it until the start of the caster's next turn.

A creature can enter or exit through the hatch by spending 10 feet of movement. Those inside the servant have total cover from effects originating outside it. The controls within it allow creatures to see outside without obstruction.
While you are inside the servant, you can command it by using the controls. During your turn (for either attuned creature), you can command it in the following ways:

items: Open or close the hatch (no action required, un cop per torn)
Move the servant up to its speed (no requereix acció)
Com a acció, you can command the servant to take one of the actions in its stat block or some other action.
Quan una criatura provokes an opportunity attack from the servant, you can use your reaction to command the servant to make one Puny Destructiu attack against that creature.

entries: While there are no attuned creatures inside the servant, it is an inert object.

entries.name: Ghost in the Machine
entries: Upon his death, the soul of the mighty warlord Leuk-o was drawn into the artifact and has become its animating force. The servant has been known to attack or move of its own accord, particularly if doing so will cause destruction. Once every 24 hours, the servant, at el/la/li MM's discretion, takes one action while uncrewed.

If the servant loses half of its hit points or more, each creature attuned to it ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 20). Si falla, està {@condition fascinat} durant 24 hores. While {@condition fascinat} in this way, the creature goes on a destructive spree, seeking to destroy structures and attack any unattuned creatures within sight of the servant, starting with those threatening the artifact-preferably using the servant, if possible.

entries.name: Self-Destruct
entries: By inputting a specific series of lever pulls and button presses, the servant's two crew members can cause it to explode. The self-destruct code is not revealed to crew members when they attune to the artifact. If the code is discovered (el/la/li MM determines how), it requires two attuned crew members to be inside the servant and spend their actions on 3 consecutive rounds performing the command. Should the crew members begin the process of entering the code, though, the servant uses its Ghost in the Machine property and turns the crew members against each other.

If the crew members successfully implement the code, at the end of the third round, the servant explodes. Every creature in a 100-foot-radius sphere centered on the servant ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 25). Qui falli rep 87 ({@damage 25d6}) de dany de força, 87 ({@damage 25d6}) de dany elèctric, and 87 ({@damage 25d6}) de dany de tro. Qui superi en rep la meitat. Objects and structures in the area take triple damage. Creatures inside the servant are slain instantly and leave behind no remains.

This does not destroy the servant permanently. Rather, {@dice 2d6} days later, its parts—left arm, left leg, right arm, right leg, lower torso, and upper torso—drop from the sky in random places within 1,000 miles of the explosion. If brought within 5 feet of one another, the pieces reconnect and reform the servant.

entries.name: Destroying the Servant
entries: The servant can be destroyed in two ways. After it has self-destructed, its disconnected pieces can be melted down in one of the forge-temples of its ancient Olman creators. Alternativament, if the servant strikes the Machine of Lum the Mad, both artifacts explode in an eruption that is three times the size and three times the damage as the servant's self-destruct property.

item.name: Sella militar
entries: A sella militar braces the rider, helping you keep your seat on an active mount in battle. It gives you advantage on any check you make to remain mounted.

item.name: Mind Flayer Skull
entries: While you have the skull in your possession, you are {@condition invisible} to mind flayers, as is anything you are wearing or carrying.

item.name: Mind Lash
entries: In the hands of any creature other than a {@creature mind flayer}, a mind lash functions as a normal whip. In the hands of an illithid, this arma màgica strips away a creature's will to survive as it also strips away flesh, dealing an extra {@dice 2d4} de dany psíquic to any target it hits. Any creature that takes psychic damage from the mind lash must also succeed on a DC 15 Saviesa saving throw or have disadvantage on Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws durant 1 minut. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

item.name: Mirror of Life Trapping
entries: When this 4-foot-tall mirror is viewed indirectly, its surface shows faint images of creatures. The mirror weighs 50 pounds, and it has AC 11, 10 hit points, and vulnerability to dany contundent. It shatters and is destroyed when reduced to 0 hit points.

If the mirror is hanging on a vertical surface and you are within 5 feet of it, pots, com a acció, speak its paraula màgica and activate it. It remains activated until you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again.

Any creature other than you that sees its reflection in the activated mirror while within 30 feet of it ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 15). Si falla, be trapped, along with anything it is wearing or carrying, in one of the mirror's twelve extradimensional cells. This saving throw is made with advantage if the creature knows the mirror's nature, and constructs succeed on the saving throw automatically.

An extradimensional cell is an infinite expanse filled with thick fog that reduces visibility to 10 feet. Creatures trapped in the mirror's cells don't age, and they don't need to eat, drink, or sleep. A creature trapped within a cell can escape using magic that permits planar travel. Otherwise, the creature is confined to the cell until freed.

If the mirror traps a creature but its twelve extradimensional cells are already occupied, the mirror frees one trapped creature at random to accommodate the new prisoner. A freed creature apareix en un espai desocupat within sight of the mirror but facing away from it. If the mirror is shattered, all creatures it contains are freed and appear in unoccupied spaces near it.

While within 5 feet of the mirror, pots, com a acció, speak the name of one creature trapped in it or call out a particular cell by number. The creature named or contained in the named cell appears as an image on the mirror's surface. You and the creature can then communicate normally.

In a similar way, pots, com a acció, speak a second paraula màgica and free one creature trapped in the mirror. The freed creature appears, along with its possessions, in the unoccupied space nearest to the mirror and facing away from it.

item.name: Mirror of the Past
entries: The holder of this platinum hand mirror can learn something about the history of a specific object or creature by taking an action to gaze into the mirror and think of the target. Instead of the holder's reflection, the mirror presents scenes from the target's past. Information conveyed is accurate, but it is random and cryptic, and presented in no particular order. Once it is activated, the mirror gives its information for 1 minute or less, then returns to normal. No es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Mizzium Apparatus
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: Innovation is a dangerous pursuit, at least the way the mages of the Izzet League engage in it. As protection against the risk of an experiment going awry, they have developed a device to help channel and control their magic. This apparatus is a collection of leather straps, flexible tubing, glass cylinders, and plates, bracers, and fittings made from a magic-infused metal alloy called mizzium, all assembled into a harness. The item weighs 8 pounds.

While you are wearing the mizzium apparatus, you can use it as an arcane focus. A més, you can attempt to cast a spell that you do not know or have prepared. The spell you choose must be on your class's spell list and of a level for which you have a spell slot, and you must provide the spell's components.

You expend a spell slot to cast the spell as normal, but before resolving it you must make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}). The DC is 10 + twice the level of the spell slot you expend to cast the spell.

On a successful check, you cast the spell as normal, using your spell save DC and modificador de llançament de conjurs. On a failed check, you cast a different spell from the one you intended. Randomly determine the spell you cast by rolling on the table for the level of the spell slot you expended. If the slot is 6th level or higher, roll on the table for 5th-level spells.
If you try to cast a cantrip you don't know, the DC for the Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) check is 10, and on a failed check, there is no effect.

entries.caption: 1st-Level Spells
rows: {@spell mans ardents}
{@spell vira del caos|XGE}
{@spell esprai de colors}
{@spell foc follet}
{@spell núvol de boira}
{@spell tronada}

entries.caption: 2nd-Level Spells
rows: {@spell difuminar}
{@spell ràfega de vent}
{@spell escalfar el metall}
{@spell Fletxa Àcida d'en Melf}
{@spell raig d'incendi}
{@spell esclatar}

entries.caption: 3rd-Level Spells
rows: {@spell temor}
{@spell fer-se el mort}
{@spell bola de foc}
{@spell forma gasosa}
{@spell tempesta d'aiguaneu}
{@spell núvol fètid}

entries.caption: 4th-Level Spells
rows: {@spell confusió}
{@spell convocar elementals menors}
{@spell Tentacles Obscurs de l'Evard}
{@spell tempesta de gel}

entries.caption: 5th-Level Spells
rows: {@spell animar objectes}
{@spell matanúvol}
{@spell con de fred}
{@spell batussa incendiària}

item.name: Mizzium Mortar
entries: This short tube, about 2 feet long and 6 inches in diameter, is made from mizzium, a magically enhanced metal alloy forged by the Izzet League. The end that's pointed toward a target is open, and a glowing ball of molten metal can be seen at the other end as long as the mortar has at least 1 charge remaining.
The mortar has 4 charges for the following properties. recupera {@dice 1d4} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Molten Spray
entries: You can expend 1 charge as an action to loose a 30-foot cone of molten mizzium. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15), taking {@dice 5d4} de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

entries.name: Mizzium Bombard
entries: You can expend 3 charges as an action to launch a hail of molten projectiles in un cilindre de 20 peus de radi i 40 d'alçada centered on a point que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Qui falli, rep {@dice 5d8} de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Breastplate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, tens resistència al dany de foc. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Half Plate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, tens resistència al dany de foc. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks.

item.name: Molten Bronze Skin (Plate)
entries: This magical armor appears as a jug of molten bronze. When you attune to it, the bronze adheres and contours to your skin. The armor can be worn under normal clothes, but it doesn't impede bodily functions. Once you put it on, it can't be removed unless you choose to do so.
While wearing the armor, tens resistència al dany de foc. The armor also doesn't impose disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks.

item.name: Monster Hunter's Pack
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item cofre|phb}
a {@item palanca|phb}
a {@item martell|phb}
three wooden stakes
a {@item holy symbol|phb}
a {@item aigua beneïda (flask)|phb|flask of aigua beneïda}
a set of {@item esposes|phb}
a {@item mirall d'acer|phb}
a {@item oli (matràs)|phb|flask of oil}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
3 {@item torch|phb|torches}

item.name: Moodmark Paint
entries: This thick, black paint is stored in a small jar, containing enough paint to apply moodmarks to one creature. The paint is dabbed on the face in spots or markings that often resemble the eyes of insects or spiders. Applying the paint in this way takes 1 minute.

Durant les properes 8 hores, the marks change to reflect your mental state. A creature that can see you and makes a successful DC 10 Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) check can discern whether you are happy, sad, angry, disgusted, surprised, or afraid, as well as the main source of that emotion. For example, you might communicate fear caused by a monster you just saw around the corner, grief at the loss of a friend, or happiness derived from pride in your performance in combat. A dark elf has advantage on this check.

item.name: Moonblade
item.reqAttune: by an elf or semi-elf of neutral good alignment
entries: Of all the magic items created by the elves, one of the most prized and jealously guarded is a moon blade. In ancient times, nearly all elven noble houses claimed one such blade. Over the centuries, some blades have faded from the world, their magic lost as family lines have become extinct. Other blades have vanished with their bearers during great quests. Thus, only a few of these weapons remain.

A moonblade passes down from parent to child. The sword chooses its bearer and remains bonded to that person for life. If the bearer dies, another heir can claim the blade. If no worthy heir exists, the sword lies dormant. It functions like a normal longsword until a worthy soul finds it and lays claim to its power.
A moonblade serves only one master at a time. The attunement process requires a special ritual in the throne room of an elven regent or in a temple dedicated to the elven gods.

A moonblade won't serve anyone it regards as craven, erratic, corrupt, or at odds with preserving and protecting elvenkind. If the blade rejects you, you make ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws with disadvantage durant 24 hores. If the blade accepts you, you become attuned to it and a new rune appears on the blade. You remain attuned to the weapon until you die or the weapon is destroyed.

A moonblade has one rune on its blade for each master it has served (typically {@dice 1d6 + 1}). The first rune always grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. Each rune beyond the first grants the moon blade an additional property. El/la/li MM chooses each property or determines it randomly on the Moon Blade Properties table.

entries.caption: Moonblade Properties
rows: Increase the bonus to attack and damage rolls by 1, to a maximum of +3. Reroll if the moonblade already has a +3 bonus.
The moonblade gains a randomly determined {@table Special Features; What Minor Property Does It Have|dmg|minor property} (see "Special Features" DMG p143).
The moonblade gains the finesse property.
The moonblade gains the thrown property (abast 20/60 peus).
The moonblade functions as a {@item defender}.
The moon blade scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.
When you hit with an attack using the moon blade, the attack deals an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany tallant.

Quan impactes a una criatura of a specific type (such as dragon, fiend, or undead) with the moonblade, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} damage of one of these types: àcid, elèctric, foc, fred, o tro.

Pots, com a acció bonus, cause the moonblade to flash brightly. Each creature that can see you and is within 30 feet of you ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition encegat} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. This property can't be used again until you take a short rest while attuned to the weapon.
The moonblade functions as a {@item ring of spell storing}.

Pots, com a acció, call forth an elfshadow, provided that you don't already have one serving you. The elfshadow apareix en un espai desocupat within 120 feet of you. It uses the statistics for a {@creature shadow}, except it is neutral, immune to effects that turn undead, and doesn't create new shadows. You control this creature, deciding how it acts and moves. It remains until it es queda a 0 punts de vida or you dismiss it as an action.
The moonblade functions as a {@item vorpal sword}.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: A moon blade is a sentient neutral good weapon with an Intel·ligència of 12, a Saviesa of 10, and a Carisma of 12. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.

The weapon communicates by transmitting emotions, sending a tingling sensation through the wielder's hand when it wants to communicate something it has sensed. It can communicate more explicitly, through visions or dreams, when the wielder is either in a trance or asleep.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Every moonblade seeks the advancement of elvenkind and elven ideals. Courage, loyalty, beauty, music, and life are all part of this purpose.
The weapon is bonded to the family line it is meant to serve. Once it has bonded with an owner who shares its ideals, its loyalty is absolute.
If a moon blade has a flaw, it is overconfidence. Once it has decided on an owner, it believes that only that person should wield it, even if the owner falls short of elven ideals.

item.name: Moonstone
entries: A translucent white with pale blue glow gemstone.

item.name: Moorbounder
entries: Beasts of burden are common throughout Xhorhas, and often horses and other riding animals are the best or only option. For those who require speed and have a little more coin to spend, the best option is often a moorbounder. However, moorbounders that haven't undergone proper training or established bonds of trust with their masters tend to attack and even eat their riders.
Moorbounders can cost anywhere from 300 to 500 gp each. They're often cheaper and more abundant in towns on the wastes than in cities like Rosohna.

item.name: Moss Agate
entries: A translucent pink or yellow-white with mossy gray or green markings gemstone.

item.name: Mummy Rot Antidote
entries: White dust swirls constantly within this pale gray potion. When you drink the potion, it cures you of mummy rot.

item.name: Muroosa Balm
entries: This paste made from the muroosa bush is known to help prevent sunburn, but it is also a fire retardant. After spending 1 minute applying a quarter pint of muroosa balm to your skin, you gain resistance against fire damage durant 1 hora.
A dose of muroosa balm sufficient for treating sunburn costs 1 gp.

item.name: Mystery Key
entries: A question mark is worked into the head of this key. The key has a {@chance 5} chance of unlocking any lock into which it's inserted. Once it unlocks something, the key disappears.

item.name: Nature's Mantle
entries: This cloak shifts color and texture to blend with the terrain surrounding you. While wearing the cloak, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus druid and ranger spells.
While you are in an area that is lightly obscured, you can {@action Amagar-se} as a bonus action even if you are being directly observed.

item.name: Navigation Orb
entries: A navigation orb is a hollow, 7-foot-diameter sphere of thin, polished mitrall with a large skye (cloud) rune embossed on its outer surface. The orb levitates 10 feet above the ground and is keyed to a particular cloud castle, allowing you to control that castle's altitude and movement while the orb is inside the castle. If the orb is destroyed or removed from its castle, the castle's altitude and location remain fixed until the orb is returned or replaced.
Com a acció, you can cause one of the following effects to occur if you are touching the orb:

The castle moves at a speed of 1 mph en línia recta, in a direction of your choice, until the castle stops or is made to stop, or until another action is used to change its direction. If this movement brings the castle into contact with the ground, the castle lands gently.
The castle, if it is moving, comes to a gradual stop.
The castle makes a slow, 90-degree turn clockwise or counterclockwise (turning a northerly view into a westerly view, for example). The castle can turn while it is moving en línia recta.
Any creature touching the orb knows the altitude of the base of the castle above the ground or water below it.

item.name: Eines de Navegació
entries: This set of instruments is used for navigation at sea. Proficiency with navigator's tools lets you chart a ship's course and follow navigation charts. A més, these tools allow you to add el teu bonus de competència to any ability check you make to avoid getting lost at sea.
additionalEntries: Proficiency with navigator's tools helps you determine a true course based on observing the stars. It also grants you insight into charts and maps while developing your sense of direction.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Navigator's tools include a sextant, a compass, calipers, a ruler, parchment, ink, and a quill.

additionalEntries.name: Survival
entries: Knowledge of navigator's tools helps you avoid becoming lost and also grants you insight into the most likely location for roads and settlements.

additionalEntries.name: Sighting
entries: By taking careful measurements, you can determine your position on a nautical chart and the time of day.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Navegació
rows: Plot a course
Discover your position on a nautical chart

item.name: Collaret d'Adaptació
entries: Mentre vesteixis el necklace, you can breathe normally in any environment, and tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws made against harmful gases and vapors (such as {@spell matanúvol} i {@spell núvol fètid} effects, inhaled poisons, and the breath weapons of some dragons).

item.name: Necklace of electrum medallions with red and blue tournalines (Coalició Temerària)
Necklace of Fireballs
entries: This necklace has {@dice 1d6 + 3} beads hanging from it. Pots, com a acció, detach a bead and throw it fins a 60 peus away. When it reaches the end of its trajectory, the bead detonates as a 3rd-level {@spell bola de foc} spell (save DC 15).
You can hurl multiple beads, or even the whole necklace, as one action. When you do so, increase the level of the {@spell bola de foc} by 1 for each bead beyond the first.

item.name: Necklace of jade and pink pearls (Advenidors del Riu)
Necklace of Prayer Beads
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or paladí
entries: This necklace has {@dice 1d4 + 2} magic beads made from aquamarine, black pearl, or topazi. It also has many nonmagical beads made from stones such as amber, bloodstone, citrine, coral, jade, pearl, or quartz. If a magic bead is removed from the necklace, that bead loses its magic.

Six types of magic beads exist. El/la/li MM decides the type of each bead on the necklace or determines it randomly. A necklace can have more than one bead of the same type. To use one, you must be wearing the necklace. Each bead contains a spell that you can cast from it as a bonus action (using your spell save DC if a save is necessary). Once a magic bead's spell is cast, that bead no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

rows: Blessing
{@spell Beneir}
Curing
{@spell Curar Ferides} (nivell 2) or {@spell restabliment menor}
Favor
{@spell Restabliment Superior}
Smiting
{@spell Càstig Marcador}
Summons
{@spell Planar ally}
Wind walking
{@spell Pas del Vent}

item.name: Necklace string of small pink pearls
Necrotic Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Needle of Apedaçar
entries: This weapon is a magic dagger disguised as a sewing needle. When you hold it and use a bonus action to speak its paraula màgica, it transforms into a dagger or back into a needle.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with the dagger. While holding it, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell apedaçar} cantrip from it.

item.name: Nepenthe
entries: Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. When you hit a diastre or an undead with it, that creature rep {@damage 2d10} de dany radiant extra.

While you hold the drawn sword, it creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around you. You and all creatures friendly to you in the aura have advantage on salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics. If you have 17 or more levels in the paladin class, the radius of the aura increases to 30 feet.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Nepenthe is a sentient, neutral evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 10, a Saviesa of 8, and a Carisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 60 feet. It can read and understand Èlfic. It can also speak Èlfic, but only through the voice of its wielder, with whom the sword can communicate telepathically.

entries.name: Personality
entries: In its lifetime, the sword has beheaded thousands of criminals, not all of whom were guilty of the crimes for which they were convicted. The sword cannot distinguish the guilty from the innocent. With each beheading, it hungers for more justice and blood. The sword is corrupt and irredeemable.

item.name: Nether Scroll of Azumar
entries: Unlike most scrolls, a Nether Scroll of Azumar is not a consumable magic item. It takes 30 days of concentrated study—at least 8 hours per day—to attempt to understand this scroll. After completing this study, you must make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) amb CD 25. If this check fails, you rep {@damage 16d10} de dany psíquic, and you can attempt the check again after another 30 days of concentrated study.
When you succeed on the check, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Your Intel·ligència score increases by 2, to a maximum of 22. Once you gain this benefit, you can't use this scroll to increase your Intel·ligència again.
You gain advantage on salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

entries: When you gain the scroll's benefits, a {@creature stone gòlem} magically apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of you and acts as your ally. If you die, the gòlem turns to dust.

item.name: Nib
entries: Copper coin about the size of a thumbnail (1 nib = 1 common copper coin)

item.name: Night Caller
entries: This whistle is carved from transparent crystal, and it resembles a tiny dragon curled up like a snail. The name Night Caller is etched on the whistle in Nannès runes. If a character succeeds on a DC 20 Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana} or {@skill History}) check, the character recalls lore that says the {@creature duergar} made several such whistles for various groups in an age past.

If you blow the whistle in darkness or under the night sky, it allows you to cast the {@spell animar els morts} spell. The target can be affected through fins a 10 peus of soft earth or similar material, and if it is, it takes 1 minute to claw its way to the surface to serve you. Once the whistle has animated an undead creature, it can't do so again until 7 days have passed.
Once every 24 hours, you can blow the whistle to reassert control over one or two creatures you animated with it.

item.name: Nightfall Pearl
entries: Used to summon night, this 6-inch-diameter, jet-black orb is cold to the touch. You can spend 10 minutes to activate it, causing the area within 10 miles of it at the moment of activation to become night even if it is daytime. This night dura 24 hores, until you cancel it com a acció, or until your attunement to the pearl ends. Once used, the pearl can't be used again durant 24 hores.

item.name: Nimblewright Detector
entries: To activate the nimblewright detector, a character must hold down its trigger. When the activated device comes within 500 feet of a nimblewright other than Nim, the umbrella begins to spin, whir, and click. The spinning, whirring, and clicking accelerates as the distance to the target lessens, reaching maximum velocity and volume when a nimblewright other than Nim is within 30 feet of the device.

item.name: Nolzur's Marvelous Pigments
entries: Typically found in {@dice 1d4} pots inside a fine wooden box with a brush (weighing 1 pound in total), these pigments allow you to create three-dimensional objects by painting them in two dimensions. The paint flows from the brush to form the desired object as you concentrate on its image.

Each pot of paint is sufficient to cover 1,000 square feet of a surface, which lets you create inanimate objects or terrain features—such as a door, a pit, flowers, trees, cells, rooms, or weapons—that are up to 10,000 peus cúbics. It takes 10 minutes to cover 100 square feet.

When you complete the painting, the object or terrain feature depicted becomes a real, nonmagical object. Thus, painting a door on a wall creates an actual door that can be opened to whatever is beyond. Painting a pit on a floor creates a real pit, and its depth counts against the total area of objects you create.

Nothing created by the pigments can have a value greater than 25 gp. If you paint an object of greater value (such as a diamond or a pile of gold), the object looks authentic, but close inspection reveals it is made from paste, bone, or some other worthless material.
If you paint a form of energy such as fire or lightning, the energy appears but dissipates as soon as you complete the painting, doing no harm to anything.

item.name: Oathbow
entries: When you nock an arrow on this bow, it whispers in Èlfic, "Swift defeat to my enemies." When you use this weapon to make a ranged attack, you can, as a command phrase, say, "Swift death to you who have wronged me." The target of your attack becomes your sworn enemy until it dies or until dawn seven days later. You can have only one such sworn enemy at a time. When your sworn enemy dies, you can choose a new one after the next dawn.

When you make a ranged attack roll with this weapon against your sworn enemy, tens avantatge a tirades de the roll. A més, your target gains no benefit from cover, other than total cover, and you suffer no disadvantage due to long range. If the attack hits, your sworn enemy takes an extra {@dice 3d6} de dany perforant.
While your sworn enemy lives, you have disadvantage on attack rolls with all other weapons.

item.name: Obsidian
entries: An opaque black gemstone.

item.name: Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate
entries: Tens +1 a la CA and resistance to poison damage mentre vesteixis l'armadura. A més, you gain advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition grappled} condition on yourself.

item.name: Obsidian statuette with gold fittings and inlay
Obviator's Lenses
entries: Also at rank 2, you gain the use of an uncommon magic item taking the form of a pair of spectacles, a spyglass, a monocle, or any other device with one or two lenses. When you look through the obviator's lenses, you use a bonus action to make them function as {@item eyes of minute seeing} or {@item ulls d'àguila}. Once you make this choice, it cannot be changed until the next dawn.

entries.name: Enhanced Lenses
entries: At rank 4, your obviator's lenses gain additional power and become a rare magic item. The lenses now function as both {@item ulls d'àguila} and {@item eyes of minute seeing}.

Additionally, you can focus the power of the lenses to gain accuracy in combat, gaining advantage on a weapon attack roll (no requereix acció). If that attack hits, roll one additional weapon damage die. This property of the lenses no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Occultant Àbac
entries: Head office grants you the use of a unique item known as an occultant abacus (sometimes just referred to as an occultant), whose beads resemble tiny skulls.

entries.name: Read the Kill
entries: Also at rank 1, your occultant abacus not only tracks your franchise's kills, it helps you determine the impact of those kills on the franchise's fate. Over a period of 1 minute, you can study a creature killed by someone in your franchise within the last 24 hours, then grant the character who slew it a {@dice d10}. Once within the next hour, that character can add the {@dice d10} to an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. If it's not clear who administered the killing blow, you grant this benefit to a random creature involved in the fight. Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi until you finish a long rest.

rows: Using a tiny bellows to pump one last breath into a corpse.
Reading the entrails with special reading-the-entrails glasses.
Burning a small piece of the body and looking for shapes in the smoke.
A cautious, reasoned, professional guesstimate.
Careful measurements. The distance between nostrils. The difference between the index finger and the middle finger. The elasticity of the ear lobe.
You take a long, careful look, and then decide based on which fellow franchisee has been nice to you lately.

entries.name: Eldritch Occultant
entries: Starting at rank 2, your occultant abacus becomes an uncommon magic item that can track lives both eliminated and saved. While holding your occultant abacus within 5 feet of a creature killed within the past 24 hours, you can cast the {@spell auguri} spell. The course of action you inquire about with the spell does not need to have any connection to the dead creature. This property of the occultant abacus no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Bring Out Your Dead
entries: Also at rank 2, you regain the use of your Read the Kill feature after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Bead of Instant Karma
entries: At rank 3, one of the beads on your occultant abacus channels the power of instant karma, turning the occultant abacus into a rare magic item. Com a reacció, you can target one creature you can see that is about to attempt an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, either granting advantage or imposing disadvantage on the roll. The bead crumbles to dust when used, reappearing on your occultant abacus at the next dawn.

entries.name: Bead of Diverted Karma
entries: At rank 4, one of the beads on your occultant abacus allows you to divert karma to where it's needed, turning the occultant abacus into a very rare magic item. While the bead is unused, you know automatically when any creature you can see is about to make an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw with disadvantage. When such a roll is made, pots, com a reacció, grant a {@dice d10} to a different creature you can see. That creature can add the {@dice d10} to any ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes within the next minute. The bead crumbles to dust when used, reappearing on your occultant abacus at the next dawn.

entries.name: Correct the Balance
entries: As a rank 4 occultant, you learn that sometimes the death of a creature has unintended consequences. Within seven days of a creature's death, you can use your occultant abacus to divine ways to reverse or mitigate events resulting from that death. Com a acció, make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Religió}) amb CD 15. On a success, you learn the relevant information based on the nature of the creature and its place in the world.

If you fail the check, this property of the occultant abacus no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba. If you succeed on the check, this property can't be used again until dawn seven days later.

item.name: Oli (matràs)
entries: Oil usually comes in a clay flask that holds 1 pint. Com a acció, you can splash the oil in this flask onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it fins a 20 peus, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a target creature or object, (considera-ho un atac improvitzat). Si impacta, the target is covered in oil. If the target takes any fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an additional 5 fire damage from the burning oil. You can also pour a flask of oil on the ground to cover a 5-foot-square area, provided that the surface is level. If lit, the oil burns for 2 rounds and deals 5 fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn in the area. A creature can take this damage only un cop per torn.

item.name: Oil of Eterietat
entries: Beads of this cloudy gray oil form on the outside of its container and quickly evaporate. The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it's wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium). Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of the {@spell eterietat} spell durant 1 hora.

item.name: Oil of Sharpness
entries: This clear, gelatinous oil sparkles with tiny, ultrathin silver shards. The oil can coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to 5 pieces of slashing or piercing ammunition. Applying the oil takes 1 minute. Durant 1 hora, the coated item is magical and has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

item.name: Oil of Slipperiness
entries: This sticky black unguent is thick and heavy in the container, but it flows quickly when poured. The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it's wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium). Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of a {@spell llibertat de moviments} spell durant 8 hores.
Alternatively, the oil can be poured on the ground com a acció, where it covers a 10-foot square, duplicating the effect of the {@spell greix} spell in that area durant 8 hores.

item.name: Oli de Taggit
entries: Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13). Si falla, esdevé {@condition emmetzinat} durant 24 hores. The {@condition emmetzinat} creature is {@condition inconscient}. The creature wakes up if it takes damage.

item.name: Olisuba Leaf
entries: These dried leaves of the Olisuba tree, when steeped to make a tea, can help a body recover from strenuous activity. If you drink a dose of Olisuba tea during a long rest, your {@condition exhaust} level is reduced by 2 instead of 1 at the end of that long rest.

item.name: Onyx
entries: An opaque black and white banded, or pure black or white gemstone.

item.name: Opal
entries: A translucent pale blue with green and golden mottling gemstone.

item.name: Opal of the Ild Rune
entries: This triangular fire opal measures about three inches on each side and is half an inch thick. The ild (fire) rune shimmers within its core, causing it to be slightly warm to the touch. The opal has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Ignite
entries: Com a acció, you can ignite an object within 10 feet of you. The object must be flammable, and the fire starts in a circle no larger than 1 foot in diameter.

entries.name: Fires Friend
entries: Tens resistència al dany de fred.

entries.name: Fire Tamer
entries: Com a acció, you can extinguish any open flame within 10 feet of you. You choose how much fire to extinguish in that radius.

entries.name: Gift of Flame
entries: You can transfer the opal's magic to a nonmagical item—a weapon or a suit of armor—by tracing the ild rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the opal is destroyed, and the rune appears in red on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Weapon.
items.entry: The weapon is now an uncommon arma màgica. It deals an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany de foc to any target it hits.

items.name: Armor.
items.entry: The armor is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. Tens resistència al dany de fred while wearing the armor.

item.name: Opal of the Ild Rune
entries: This triangular fire opal measures about three inches on each side and is half an inch thick. The ild rune—the rune of fire—shimmers within its core. Grasping this object causes a split second of searing, fiery pain to pass through you. That pain quickly fades, giving way to a warming glow.

entries.name: Ignite (Simple Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe the ild rune using ash onto a flammable object. That object immediately bursts into flame. While it burns, the fire extends 1 foot out from the rune you scribed.

entries.name: Fire Tamer (Simple Property)
entries: Com a acció, you touch an open flame and scribe the ild rune within it with a hand motion. This causes the flame to immediately extinguish. For a large blaze, the fire is extinguished in a 10-foot radius around you. You can extend this distance by expending a spell slot when using the ild rune in this manner. The radius extends by 20 feet per level of the expended spell slot.

entries.name: Fire's Friend (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, tens resistència al dany de fred.

entries.name: Combustion (Complex Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe this rune using ash onto a creature within your reach as you expend a spell slot. The creature automatically rep {@damage 1d10} de dany de foc mes {@damage 1d10} de dany de foc per level of the expended spell slot.

entries.name: Flame Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune using ash onto a melee or ranged weapon, or onto up to 20 pieces of ammunition. The weapon or ammunition gains a ghostly aura of yellow flame and deals fire damage instead of piercing, slashing, or dany contundent.
A més, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon or ammunition a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last durant 24 hores or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Flame Stoker (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, your fire attacks are deadlier. Whenever you roll fire damage from an attack or a spell you cast, you can reroll that damage and use the higher result.

item.name: Orb of Direction
entries: While holding this orb, pots, com a acció, determine which way is north. This property functions only on the Material Plane.

item.name: Orb of Dragonkind
entries: Ages past, on the world of Krynn, elves and humans waged a terrible war against evil dragons. When the world seemed doomed, the wizards of the Towers of High Sorcery came together and worked their greatest magic, forging five Orbs of Dragonkind (or Dragon Orbs) to help them defeat the dragons. One orb was taken to each of the five towers, and there they were used to speed the war toward a victorious end. The wizards used the orbs to lure dragons to them, then destroyed the dragons with powerful magic.

As the Towers of High Sorcery fell in later ages, the orbs were destroyed or faded into legend, and only three are thought to survive. Their magic has been warped and twisted over the centuries, so although their primary purpose of calling dragons still functions, they also allow some measure of control over dragons.
Each orb contains the essence of an evil dragon, a presence that resents any attempt to coax magic from it. Those lacking in force of personality might find themselves enslaved to an orb.
An orb is an etched crystal globe about 10 inches in diameter. When used, it grows to about 20 inches in diameter, and mist swirls inside it.

While attuned to an orb, pots, com a acció, peer into the orb's depths and speak its paraula màgica. You must then make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a successful check, you control the orb for as long as you remain attuned to it. On a failed check, you become {@condition fascinat} by the orb for as long as you remain attuned to it.

While you are {@condition fascinat} by the orb, you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it, and the orb casts {@spell suggestió} on you at will (save DC 18), urging you to work toward the evil ends it desires. The dragon essence within the orb might want many things: the annihilation of a particular people, freedom from the orb, to spread suffering in the world, to advance the worship of Takhisis ({@creature Tiamat|RoT|Tiamat's} name on Krynn), or something else el/la/li MM decides.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: An Orb of Dragonkind has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: The orb has 7 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn. If you control the orb, you can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell curar ferides} (5th-level version, 3 charges), {@spell llum del dia} (1 charge), {@spell abjurar la mort} (2 charges), or {@spell escodrinyar} (3 charges). You can also use an action to cast the {@spell detectar màgia} spell from the orb without using any charges.

entries.name: Call Dragons
entries: While you control the orb, pots, com a acció, cause the artifact to issue a telepathic call that extends in all directions for 40 miles. Evil dragons in range feel compelled to come to the orb as soon as possible by the most direct route. Dragon deities such as {@creature Tiamat|RoT} are unaffected by this call. Dragons drawn to the orb might be hostile toward you for compelling them against their will. Once you have used this property, it can't be used again durant 1 hora.

entries.name: Destroying an Orb
entries: An Orb of Dragonkind appears fragile but is impervious to most damage, including the attacks and breath weapons of dragons. A {@spell desintegrar} spell or one good hit from a +3 arma màgica is sufficient to destroy an orb, however.

item.name: Orb of Gonging
entries: This common wondrous item is a hollow, 5-inch-diameter orb that weighs 5 pounds. Its outer shell is composed of notched bronze rings, which can be turned so that the notches line up. Aligning the notches requires an action, and doing so causes the orb to gong loudly until the notches are no longer aligned. The sounds are spaced 6 seconds apart and can be heard out to a range of 600 feet.

item.name: Orb of the Stein Rune
entries: This orb of granite is about the size of an adult human's fist. The stein (stone) rune appears on it in the form of crystalline veins that run across the surface. The orb has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Indomable Stand
entries: Com a acció, you can channel the orb's magic to hold your ground. For the next minute or until you move any distance, tens avantatge a tirades de all checks and saving throws to resist effects that force you to move. A més, any enemy that moves to a space within 10 feet of you ha de salvar per Força (CD 12). Si falla, be unable to move any farther this turn.

entries.name: Stone Soul
entries: You can't be {@condition petrificat}.

entries.name: Earthen Step
entries: Pots llançar el conjur {@spell fondre's dins la pedra} as a bonus action. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Stone
entries: You can transfer the orb's magic to a nonmagical item—a shield or a pair of boots—by tracing the stein rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the orb is destroyed, and the rune appears in silver on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Shield.
items.entry: The shield is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While you wield it, tens resistència al dany all dealt by atacs armats a distància.

items.name: Boots.
items.entry: The pair of boots is now an uncommon magic item that requires attunement. While you wear the boots, tens avantatge a tirades de Força, and you can use your reaction to avoid being knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

item.name: Orb of the Stein Rune
entries: This spherical chunk of granite is about the size of a human fist. The stein rune—the rune of stone—appears on the orb as crystalline veins that play across its surface. When first grasped, the stone feels impossibly heavy, as if even a titan could not lift it. That feeling passes after a moment, allowing you to carry the stone with ease.

entries.name: Indomable Stand (Simple Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe the stein rune onto the ground at your feet. Until you move, tens avantatge a tirades de all ability checks and saving throws to resist effects that would force you to move. A més, any creature that moves within 10 feet of you ha de salvar per Força (CD 12). Si falla, have its movement immediately end.

entries.name: Stone Soul (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you cannot be {@condition petrificat}.

entries.name: Stone's Secrets (Simple Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe this rune onto a stone wall or floor. You learn the location and size of all creatures standing on or touching that surface within 30 feet of you, though only for the moment when the property is used.

entries.name: Crushing Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune using dirt or crushed stone onto one weapon that deals dany contundent. The weapon gains a ghostly brown aura, and dany contundent dealt by the weapon ignores resistance and immunity. If you roll the maximum on the weapon's damage die or dice, the target of your attack is knocked {@condition enderrocat} if it is a creature.
A més, you can expend a spell slot to grant the weapon a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last durant 24 hores or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Earthen Step (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast fondre's dins la pedra as a bonus action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

entries.name: Overwhelming Bolt (Complex Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe this rune using dirt or crushed rock onto a creature within your reach as you expend a spell slot. The creature must succeed on a Força saving throw (DC 12 + the level of the expended spell slot). On a failure, the creature rep {@damage 2d8} de dany contundent mes {@damage 1d8} de dany contundent per level of the expended spell slot i està {@condition enderrocat}. Si supera en rep la meitat and is not knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

item.name: Orb of the Veil
entries: This onyx sphere bears deep, spiraling grooves and dangles from an iron chain. While the orb is on your person, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Your Saviesa score increases by 2, as does your maximum for that score.
You gain {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense visió de foscor}, the orb increases its range by 60 feet.
Tens avantatge a tirades de Saviesa checks to find hidden doors and paths.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: The orb is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed, you are unwilling to part with the orb, keeping it on your person at all times. All nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you automatically extinguish, and fire damage dealt by you is halved.

item.name: Orb of Time
entries: While holding this orb, pots, com a acció, determine whether it is morning, afternoon, evening, or nighttime outside. This property functions only on the Material Plane.

item.name: Orc Stone
entries: I saved the life of an orc, who gave me a stone with the symbol of the Many-Arrows tribe (a humanoid skull pierced by three arrows) carved into it. The stone is an uncommon magic item that requires attunement, and only I can attune to it.

Com a acció, I can use the stone to summon the spirit of an orc warrior, which appears within 30 feet of me. The spirit uses the {@creature orc war chief} stat block in the Monster Manual and disappears after 10 minutes or when reduced to 0 hit points. The spirit understands any language I speak and obeys my commands.
After the stone is used three times, it turns to dust. (See Appendix B of Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden)

item.name: Orcsplitter
item.reqAttune: by a dwarf, fighter, or paladin of good alignment
entries: A mighty axe wielded long ago by the dwarf king Torhild Flametongue, Orcsplitter is a battered weapon that appears unremarkable at first glance. Its head is graven with the Nannès runes for "orc," but the runes are depicted with a gap or slash through the markings; the word "orc" is literally split in two.
Obténs els beneficis següents while holding this arma màgica:

items: Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with it.
When you roll a 20 on an attack roll with this weapon against an {@creature orc}, that {@creature orc} ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17). Si falla, drop to 0 hit points.

You can't be surprised by {@creature orc||orcs} while you're not {@condition incapacitat}. You are also aware when {@creature orc||orcs} are within 120 feet of you and aren't behind total cover, although you don't know their location.
You and any of your friends within 30 feet of you can't be {@condition acovardit} while you're not {@condition incapacitat}.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Orcsplitter is a sentient, lawful good weapon with an Intel·ligència of 6, a Saviesa of 15, and a Carisma of 10. It can see and hear out to 120 feet and has {@sense visió de foscor}. It communicates by transmitting emotions to its wielder, although on rare occasions it uses a limited form of telepathy to bring to the wielder's mind a couplet or stanza of ancient Nannès verse.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Orcsplitter is grim, taciturn, and inflexible. It knows little more than the desire to face {@creature orc||orcs} in battle and serve a courageous, just wielder. It disdains cowards and any form of duplicity, deception, or disloyalty. The weapon's purpose is to defend nans and to serve as a symbol of dwarven resolve. It hates the traditional foes of nans—giants, goblins, and, most of all, {@creature orc||orcs}—and silently urges its possessor to meet such creatures in battle.

item.name: Orcus Figurine
entries: Carved from an ogre's {@condition petrificat} heart, the gray figurine depicts the Demon Prince of Undeath in ghastly detail, clutching his skull-topped wand in one hand and three severed heads by the hair in the other. The figurine smells like decaying flesh, and this scent is detectable out to a range of 5 feet.

The figurine is a Tiny object with AC 17, 3 hit points, and immunity to all types of damage except radiant damage. A {@spell detectar el bé i el mal} spell or similar magic reveals that the figurine has been desecrated. As long as it has at least 1 hit point, the figurine has the following magical properties:

items: Undead within 30 feet of the figurine can't be turned.
Dead creatures within 30 feet of the figurine can't be brought back to life.

A creature that holds the figurine while praying to Orcus for at least 1 hour has a {@chance 10|10 percent} chance of summoning a smoky avatar of the demon lord. Once this avatar is summoned, it can't be summoned again for 30 days. Orcus's avatar has the statistics of a {@creature wraith} except that it's chaotic evil. It attacks all non-undead creatures it encounters, and it disappears passada 1 hora or when reduced to 0 hit points.

item.name: Order of the Silver Dragon +2 Shield
entries: Mentre duguis l'escut, reps +2 a la CA. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.

The shield is emblazoned with a stylized silver dragon that is the emblem of the Order of the Silver Dragon (see {@adventure {@i Curse of Strahd}, capítol 7|CoS|7|The Order of the Silver Dragon}). The shield whispers warnings to its bearer, granting a +2 bonus to initiative if the bearer isn't {@condition incapacitat}.
A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

item.name: Orrery of the Wanderer
entries: This delicate and exquisitely crafted clockwork orrery features multiple geared components whose sweeping hands and dials represent the complex interplay of planar and magical realms. Standing two feet high, the orrery housing is a wondrous device imbued with magic of its own, but the power of its six clockwork components makes the artifact even more potent.

The Orrery of the Wanderer was created by a renowned clockwork mage known only as Lottie. She crafted the relic as a means of tapping into the power of the planes, and to channel the divination and foretelling powers of the stars. But Lottie soon realized that her creation was far more powerful than she had intended. As it tapped into planar magic, the orrery began to manifest the darkness and malevolence inherent to some of the planes. Eventually, it would impress upon its owner a desire to open portals into the most cursed and dangerous worlds, including the Far Realm.

To prevent the orrery from ever being so used, Lottie scattered the components that powered it, secreting them across the world. But the orrery's instinct for survival is strong, and its components have a way of inexorably coming together over decades or centuries, found by treasure hunters, stolen by monsters, found and stolen again—and moving closer to each other all the time.
Random Properties. The orrery has the following randomly determined properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental properties}

entries: The random properties of the orrery might function only when all its components are installed, or might function sporadically if any components are missing.

entries.name: The Sum of Its Parts
entries: Each of the six components that powers the Orrery of the Wanderer is a powerful magic relic in its own right:

items: The {@item chronolometer|AI}
The {@item dimensional loop|AI}
The {@item far gear|AI}
The {@item rotor of return|AI}
The {@item timepiece of travel|AI}
The {@item wheel of stars|AI}

entries: Creatures can attune to the orrery's components individually. If attuned to an individual component, a creature must hold the component to make use of its features. A creature can also attune to the orrery and all the components installed in it. Attuning to an installed component doesn't count against the number of magic items you can normally attune to.
While a component is not installed in the orrery, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by el/la/li MM.

entries.name: Future Echoes
entries: With or without its components, the orrery lets you catch momentary glimpses of the future that warn you of danger. As long as the orrery is within 30 feet of you, tens +1 a la CA.

entries.name: Into the Void
entries: With or without its components, the attuned orrery infuses your spirit with the tumultuous energy of the planes. Over time, your alignment changes to chaotic neutral, and you are compelled to engage with and explore the most dangerous planar realms.

entries.name: Master of Travel
entries: While all six components of the Orrery of the Wanderer are installed, the artifact té 7 càrregues. While touching the orrery, you can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 17): {@spell contactar plà forani} (3 charges), {@spell demiplà} (6 charges), {@spell portal} (7 charges), {@spell saltar de pla} (5 charges), or {@spell cercle de teletransport} (3 charges). The orrery regains {@dice 1d4 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Orzhov Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Orzhov, allows you to cast {@spell command}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Orzhov's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Orzhov Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Orzhov guild
entries: This keyrune is carved from white marble with veins of black. The end is shaped like a thrull's head, with a gold faceplate affixed. On command, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature winged thrull|GGR} for up to 2 hours. If you don't come from an Orzhov oligarch family, it serves you grudgingly, clownishly aping your movements and mannerisms while carrying out your orders.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature winged thrull|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Outer Essence Shard
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

Roll a {@dice d4} and consult the Outer Essence Shards table to determine the shard's essence and property. When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.caption: Outer Essence Shards
rows: Lawful
{@item Outer Essence Shard (Lawful)|TCE}
Chaotic
{@item Outer Essence Shard (Chaotic)|TCE}
Good
{@item Outer Essence Shard (Good)|TCE}
Evil
{@item Outer Essence Shard (Evil)|TCE}

item.name: Outer Essence Shard (Chaotic)
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.name: Property
entries: Escull una criatura who takes damage from the spell. That target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks made abans de l'inici del teu proper torn.

item.name: Outer Essence Shard (Evil)
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.name: Property
entries: Escull una criatura who takes damage from the spell. That target rep {@damage 3d6} de dany necròtic extra.

item.name: Outer Essence Shard (Good)
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.name: Property
entries: You or one creature of your choice que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast gains {@dice 3d6} punts de vida temporals.

item.name: Outer Essence Shard (Lawful)
entries: This flickering crystal holds the essence of an Outer Plane. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.
When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can use that property.

entries.name: Property
entries: You can end one of the following conditions affecting yourself or una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast: {@condition fascinat}, {@condition encegat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition emmetzinat}, o {@condition atordit}.

item.name: Oversized Arc llarg
entries: This unique weapon can be used only by a Medium or larger creature that has a Força of 18 or higher. The bow shoots oversized arrows that deal piercing damage equal to 2d6 + the wielder's Força modifier.

item.name: Eines de Pintar
additionalEntries: Proficiency with eines de pintar represents your ability to paint and draw. You also acquire an understanding of art history, which can aid you in examining works of art.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Eines de Pintar include an easel, canvas, paints, brushes, charcoal sticks, and a palette.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History, Religion
entries: Your expertise aids you in uncovering lore of any sort that is attached to a work of art, such as the magical properties of a painting or the origins of a strange mural found in a dungeon.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation, Perception
entries: When you inspect a painting or a similar work of visual art, your knowledge of the practices behind creating it can grant you additional insight.

additionalEntries.name: Painting and Drawing
entries: Com a part d'un Descans Curt o Llarg, you can produce a simple work of art. Although your work might lack precision, you can capture an image or a scene, or make a quick copy of a piece of art you saw.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Pintar
rows: Paint an accurate portrait
Create a painting with a hidden missatge

item.name: Pair of engraved bone dice (Coalició Temerària)
Tint pàl·lid
entries: Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 16). Si falla, take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) de dany de verí and become {@condition emmetzinat}. The {@condition emmetzinat} creature must repeat the saving throw every 24 hours, taking 3 ({@dice 1d6}) de dany de verí on a failed save. Until this poison ends, the damage the poison deals can't be healed by any means. After seven successful saving throws, the effect ends and the creature can heal normally.

item.name: Paper Bird
entries: After you write a message of fifty words or fewer on this magic sheet of parchment and speak a creature's name, the parchment magically folds into a Tiny paper bird and flies to the recipient whose name you uttered. The recipient must be on the same plane of existence as you, otherwise the bird turns into ash as it takes flight.

The bird is an object that has 1 hit point, an Armor Class of 13, una velocitat de vol de 60 peus, a Destresa of 16 (+3), and a score of 1 (−5) in all other abilities, and it is immune to poison and psychic damage.

It travels to within 5 feet of its intended recipient by the most direct route, whereupon it turns into a nonmagical and inanimate sheet of parchment that can be unfolded only by the intended recipient. If the bird's hit points or speed is reduced to 0 or if it is otherwise immobilized, it turns into ash.
Paper birds usually come in small, flat boxes containing {@dice 1d6 + 3} sheets of the parchment.

item.name: Pariah's Shield
entries: Soldiers of the Boros Legion consider it an honor to bear this shield, even knowing that it might be the last honor they receive. The front of the shield is sculpted to depict a grieving human face.
Tens +1 a la CA for every two allies within 5 feet of you (up to a maximum of +3) mentre empunyis l'escut. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.
When una criatura que puguis veure a 5 peus d'abast takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage, instead of the creature taking it. When you do so, the damage type changes to force.

item.name: Pathfinder's Greataxe
entries: When you wield this +1 greataxe, you always know the way to the nearest passage leading from underground toward the surface, as well as the approximate depth the axe is underground.

item.name: Pearl
entries: An opaque lustrous white, yellow, or pink gemstone.

item.name: Pearl of Power
entries: While this pearl is on your person, pots, com a acció, speak its paraula màgica and regain one expended spell slot. If the expended slot was of 4th level or higher, the new slot is 3rd level. Once you have used the pearl, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Pearl of Undead Detection
entries: This black pearl glows faintly when undead are within 120 feet of it.

item.name: Pennant of the Vind Rune
entries: This blue pennant is crafted from silk and is five feet long and whips about as if buffeted by a wind. The vind (wind) rune appears on its surface, looking almost like a cloud. The pennant has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Wind Step
entries: Com a acció, you fly fins a 20 peus. If you don't land at the end of this flight, you fall unless you have another means of staying aloft.

entries.name: Comforting Wind
entries: You can't suffocate.

entries.name: Winds Grasp
entries: As a reaction when you fall, you can cause yourself to take no damage from the fall. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Wind Walker
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell levitar} as a bonus action. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Wind
entries: You can transfer the pennant's magic to a nonmagical item—a suit of armor, a pair of boots, or a cloak—by tracing the vind rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the pennant is destroyed, and the rune appears in silver on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Armor.
items.entry: The armor is now an uncommon magic item that requires attunement. You gain a bonus to speed of 5 feet while you wear the armor, and if it normally imposes disadvantage on {@skill Stealth} checks, it no longer does so.

items.name: Boots/Cloak.
items.entry: The pair of boots or cloak is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing the item, you can convert fins a 20 peus of your movement on each of your turns into flight. If you don't land at the end of this flight, you fall unless you have another means of staying aloft. També pots llançar {@spell descens de ploma} once from the item, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

item.name: Pennant of the Vind Rune
entries: This five-foot-long blue pennant is crafted from silk and whips about as if buffeted by a strong breeze. The vind rune—the rune of wind—flickers across its surface like a shimmering cloud. Grasping the pennant causes you to feel a powerful ràfega de vent wash over you, tearing at your clothes and gear. Anyone watching you sees nothing out of the ordinary, and the sensation passes after a moment.

entries.name: Comforting Wind (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you cannot suffocate or drown, and you gain advantage on saving throws against poisonous gases, inhaled poisons, and similar effects.

entries.name: Wind Step (Simple Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe the vind rune in the air around you and immediately fly 20 feet. If you do not land at the end of this flight, you fall.

entries.name: Wind's Grasp (Simple Property)
entries: As a reaction when you fall, you can scribe this rune in the air around you to take no damage from the fall.

entries.name: Howling Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune in the air above one ranged weapon. The weapon gains a ghostly blue aura and has its normal and maximum range doubled. The weapon's attacks do not suffer disadvantage due to range.
A més, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last durant 24 hores or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Shrieking Bolt (Complex Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe this rune in the air between you and a creature you can see while you expend a spell slot. La criatura ha de salvar per Força (DC 12 + the spell slot's level). On a failure, it rep {@damage 2d8} de dany contundent mes {@damage 1d8} de dany contundent per level of the expended spell slot, and is pushed en línia recta directly away from you for 10 feet per level of the expended spell slot. Si supera en rep la meitat and is not pushed away from you.

entries.name: Wind Walker (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast levitate as a bonus action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

item.name: Peregrine Mask
entries: Mentre vesteixis el winged helm, tens una velocitat de vol de 60 peus. A més, tens avantatge a tirades de initiative rolls.

item.name: Perfume of Bewitching
entries: This tiny vial contains magic perfume, enough for one use. Pots, com a acció, apply the perfume to yourself, and its effect lasts 1 hour. For the duration, tens avantatge a tirades de all Carisma checks directed at humanoids amb un valor de repte de 1 o menor. Those subjected to the perfume's effect are not aware that they've been influenced by magic.

item.name: Periapt of Health
entries: You are immune to contracting any disease while you wear this pendant. If you are already infected with a disease, the effects of the disease are suppressed while you wear the pendant.

item.name: Periapt of Proof against Poison
entries: This delicate silver chain has a brilliant-cut black gem pendant. While you wear it, poisons have no effect on you. You are immune to the {@condition emmetzinat} condition and have immunity to poison damage.

item.name: Amulet de Tancar Ferides
entries: While you wear this pendant, you stabilize whenever you are dying a l'inici del teu torn. A més, whenever you roll a Dau de Vida to regain hit points, double the number of hit points it restores.

item.name: Peridot
entries: A transparent rich olive green gemstone.

item.name: Petrified Grung Egg
entries: While this egg is on your person, pots, com a acció, speak its paraula màgica and regain one expended spell slot. If the expended slot was of 4th level or higher, the new slot is 3rd level. Once you have used the egg, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.
Additionally, while you are attuned to the egg, you gain resistance to poison damage.
The egg turns to dust and is destroyed if it leaves the Tomb of the Nine Gods.
