item.name: Pewter mug with green spinels (Coalició Temerària)
Philter of Love
entries: The next time you see a creature within 10 minutes after drinking this philter, you become {@condition fascinat} by that creature durant 1 hora. If the creature is of a species and gender you are normally attracted to, you regard it as your true love while you are {@condition fascinat}. This potion's rose-hued, effervescent liquid contains one easy-to-miss bubble shaped like a heart.

item.name: Piercer
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

A character attuned to the sword regains the maximum possible number of hit points from expended Hit Dice. However, the attuned character must eat twice as much food each day (a minimum of 2 pounds) to avoid {@condition exhaust} (see "The Environment" in chapter 8 of the Player's Handbook.)

item.name: Pipe of Remembrance
entries: This long, delicate wooden pipe features a bowl made from smooth river stone. When the pipe is lit, smoke exhaled from it does not dissipate, instead lingering around the bearer. After 10 minutes, the smoke forms moving shapes that reenact the bearer's most impressive and heroic achievements durant 5 minuts. When this realistic performance is complete, the smoke dissipates. The pipe no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Pipe of Smoke Monsters
entries: While smoking this pipe, pots, com a acció, exhale a puff of smoke that takes the form of a single creature, such as a dragon, a flumph, or a froghemoth. The form must be small enough to fit in a 1-foot cube and loses its shape after a few seconds, becoming an ordinary puff of smoke.

item.name: Sac de Gemecs Maleït
entries: You must be proficient with wind instruments to use these pipes. They have 3 charges. Pots, com a acció, play them and expend 1 charge to create an eerie, spellbinding tune. Each creature within 30 feet of you that hears you play ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition acovardit} de tu durant 1 minut. If you wish, all creatures in the area that aren't hostile toward you automatically succeed on the saving throw. A creature that fails the saving throw can repeat it al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on its saving throw is immune to the effect of these pipes durant 24 hores. The pipes regain {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Gaita del Clavegueram
entries: You must be proficient with wind instruments to use these pipes. While you are attuned to the pipes, ordinary rats and giant rats are indifferent toward you and will not attack you unless you threaten or harm them.

The pipes have 3 charges. If you play the pipes com a acció, pots, com a acció bonus, expend 1 to 3 charges, calling forth one {@creature swarm of rats} with each expended charge, provided that enough rats are within half a mile of you to be called in this fashion (as determined by el/la/li MM). If there aren't enough rats to form a swarm, the charge is wasted. Called swarms move toward the music by the shortest available route but aren't under your control otherwise. The pipes regain {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

Whenever a {@creature swarm of rats} that isn't under another creature's control comes within 30 feet of you while you are playing the pipes, you can make a Carisma check contested by the swarm's Saviesa check. If you lose the contest, the swarm behaves as it normally would and can't be swayed by the pipes' music durant les properes 24 hores. If you win the contest, the swarm is swayed by the pipes' music and becomes friendly to you and your companions for as long as you continue to play the pipes each round as an action. A friendly swarm obeys your commands. If you issue no commands to a friendly swarm, it defends itself but otherwise takes no actions. If a friendly swarm starts its turn and can't hear the pipes' music, your control over that swarm ends, and the swarm behaves as it normally would and can't be swayed by the pipes' music durant les properes 24 hores.

item.name: Pitcher
entries: A pitcher holds 1 gallon of liquid.

item.name: Piwafwi (Capa dels Elfs)
entries: This dark spider-silk cloak is made by {@creature drow}. It is a {@item capa dels elfs}. It loses its magic if exposed to sunlight durant 1 hora without interruption.

While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks made to see you have disadvantage. and tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

item.name: Piwafwi of Fire Resistència
entries: This dark spider-silk cloak is made by {@creature drow}. It is a {@item capa dels elfs}. It also grants resistance to fire damage while you wear it. It loses its magic if exposed to sunlight durant 1 hora without interruption.

While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks made to see you have disadvantage. and tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made to hide, as the cloak's color shifts to camouflage you. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.

item.name: Pixie Dust
entries: A pinch of this dust can substitute for the material components of any enchantment spell of 3rd level or lower. If a pinch of pixie dust is sprinkled on a creature, roll percentile dice and consult the Pixie Dust table to determine the effect.

entries.caption: Pixie Dust
rows: The creature sprinkled with dust gains una velocitat de vol de 60 peus durant 10 minuts.
The creature sprinkled with dust ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 11). Si falla, fall unconscious durant 1 minut. The creature awakens if it takes damage or if it is shaken or slapped as an action.
The creature sprinkled with dust ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 11). Si falla, be affected by a {@spell confusió} spell.

The creature sprinkled with dust becomes {@condition invisible} durant 1 hora. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} as long as it is on the creature's person. The effect on the creature ends if it attacks, deals any damage, or casts a spell.

item.name: Planecaller's Codex
entries: The pages of this book are bound in diastre hide, and its cover is embossed with a diagram of the Great Wheel of the multiverse. When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell desterrament}, {@spell trobar familiar}, {@spell portal}, {@spell cercle màgic}, {@spell vincle planar}, i {@spell convocar elemental|TCE}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the conjuration school.
When you cast a conjuration spell that summons or creates one creature, you can expend 1 charge to grant that creature advantage on attack rolls durant 1 minut.

item.name: Armadura de Plaques of Eterietat
entries: While you're wearing this armor, pots dir la seva paraula màgica as an action to gain the effect of the {@spell eterietat} spell, which dura 10 minuts or until you remove the armor or use an action to speak the paraula màgica again. This property of the armor no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Platinum (pp)
entries: Common coins come in several different denominations based on the relative worth of the metal from which they are made. The three most common coins are the gold piece (gp), the silver piece (sp), and the copper piece (cp).

With one gold piece, a character can buy a belt pouch, 50 feet of good rope, or a goat. A skilled (but not exceptional) artisan can earn one gold piece a day. The gold piece is the standard unit of measure for wealth, even if the coin itself is not commonly used. When merchants discuss deals that involve goods or services worth hundreds or thousands of gold pieces, the transactions don't usually involve the exchange of individual coins. Rather, the gold piece is a standard measure of value, and the actual exchange is in gold bars, letters of credit, or valuable goods.
One gold piece is worth ten silver pieces, the most prevalent coin among commoners. A silver piece buys a laborer's work for a day, a flask of lamp oil, or a night's rest in a poor inn.
One silver piece is worth ten copper pieces, which are common among laborers and beggars. A single copper piece buys a candle, a torch, or a piece of chalk.

A més, unusual coins made of other precious metals sometimes appear in treasure hoards. The electrum piece (ep) and the platinum piece (pp) originate from fallen empires and lost kingdoms, and they sometimes arouse suspicion and skepticism when used in transactions. An electrum piece is worth five silver pieces, and a platinum piece is worth ten gold pieces.
A standard coin weighs about a third of an ounce, so fifty coins weigh a pound.

item.name: Platinum bracelet set with a sapphire
Platinum headdress with topazi sun symbol (Imperi del Sol)
Platinum ring with yellow sapphire (Imperi del Sol)
Platinum staff topped with amber (Imperi del Sol)
Poison Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Kit de metzines
entries: A kit de metzines includes the vials, chemicals, and other equipment necessary for the creation of poisons. Tenir competència amb aquest kit et permet sumar el teu bonus de competència a tota tirada d'habilitat per a craft or use poisons.
Additionally, the {@book Crafting and Harvesting Poison|dmg|8|Crafting and Harvesting Poison} rules require the use of a kit de metzines.
additionalEntries: A kit de metzines is a favored resource for thieves, assassins, and others who engage in skulduggery. It allows you to apply poisons and create them from various materials. Your knowledge of poisons also helps you treat them.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: A kit de metzines includes glass vials, a mortar and pestle, chemicals, and a glass stirring rod.

additionalEntries.name: Història
entries: Your training with poisons can help you when you try to recall facts about infamous poisonings.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation, Perception
entries: Your knowledge of poisons has taught you to handle those substances carefully, giving you an edge when you inspect {@condition emmetzinat} objects or try to extract clues from events that involve poison.

additionalEntries.name: Medicina
entries: When you treat the victim of a poison, your knowledge grants you added insight into how to provide the best care to your patient.

additionalEntries.name: Nature, Survival
entries: Working with poisons enables you to acquire lore about which plants and animals are poisonous.

additionalEntries.name: Handle Poison
entries: Your proficiency allows you to handle and apply a poison without risk of exposing yourself to its effects.

additionalEntries.caption: Poisoner's Eines
rows: Spot a {@condition emmetzinat} object
Determine the effects of a poison

item.name: Pole of Angling
entries: While holding this 10-foot pole, you can speak a paraula màgica and transform it into a fishing pole with a hook, a line, and a reel. Speaking the paraula màgica again changes the fishing pole back into a normal 10-foot pole.

item.name: Pole of Collapsing
entries: While holding this 10-foot pole, pots, com a acció, speak a paraula màgica and cause it to collapse into a 1-foot-long rod, for ease of storage. The pole's weight doesn't change. Pots, com a acció, speak a different paraula màgica and cause the rod to revert to a pole; however, the rod will elongate only as far as the surrounding space allows.

item.name: Portable Hole
entries: This fine black cloth, soft as silk, is folded up to the dimensions of a handkerchief. It unfolds into a circular sheet 6 feet in diameter.

Pots, com a acció, unfold a portable hole and place it on or against a solid surface, whereupon the portable hole creates an extradimensional hole 10 feet deep. The cylindrical space within the hole exists on a different plane, so it can't be used to create open passages. Any creature inside an open portable hole can exit the hole by climbing out of it.

Pots, com a acció, close a portable hole by taking hold of the edges of the cloth and folding it up. Folding the cloth closes the hole, and any creatures or objects within remain in the extradimensional space. No matter what's in it, the hole weighs next to nothing.

If the hole is folded up, a creature within the hole's extradimensional space can use an action to make a DC 10 Força check. On a successful check, the creature forces its way out and appears within 5 feet of the portable hole or the creature carrying it. A breathing creature within a closed portable hole can survive for up to 10 minutes, after which time it begins to suffocate.

Placing a portable hole inside an extradimensional space created by a {@item bossa de contenció}, {@item Heward's handy haversack}, or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Pla Astral. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Pla Astral. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can't be reopened.

item.name: Ariet portàtil
entries: You can use a ariet portàtil to break down doors. When doing so, you gain a +4 bonus on the Força check. One other character can help you use the ram, giving you advantage on this check.

item.name: Portfolio Keeper
entries: At rank 2, you gain the use of a weathered leather pouch that is an uncommon magic item. The portfolio keeper holds and organizes notes, brochures, and business cards bearing your contact information. It also has an inexhaustible supply of brochures related to your franchise's current branding scheme.

When you meet someone for the first time, their details and a rough sketch are magically stored on a small parchment card in the portfolio keeper. You can access the details of any such stored card as a bonus action.

entries.name: Cards of Encàrrec
entries: At rank 3, the power of your portfolio keeper becomes more potent, making it a rare magic item. When you give out a business card stored in your portfolio keeper, you can choose to have the card allow its recipient to contact you through your {@item sending stone|AI} as if they had cast a {@spell encàrrec} spell. A business card loses this power seven days after it has been given out, and no more than five cards can have this power at one time.

You can also use your {@item sending stone|AI} to cast {@spell encàrrec} and contact anyone who has one of your business cards. Once you use this feature of the stone, you cannot use it again until dawn seven days later.

entries.name: Charming Introduction
entries: Also at rank 4, you are able to make a focused effort to keep a potential customer's attention. When you provide a humanoid with a business card from your portfolio keeper, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell fascinar persona} on them (save DC 15). The spell ends prematurely if the character loses the business card.

item.name: Pot of Awakening
entries: If you plant an ordinary shrub in this 10-pound clay pot and let it grow for 30 days, the shrub magically transforms into an {@creature awakened shrub} at the end of that time. When the shrub awakens, its roots break the pot, destroying it.
The awakened shrub is friendly toward you. Absent commands from you, it does nothing.

item.name: Potion of Acid Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Amistat Animal
entries: When you drink this potion, you can cast the {@spell amistat animal} spell (save DC 13) durant 1 hora at will. Agitating this muddy liquid brings little bits into view: a fish scale, a hummingbird tongue, a cat claw, or a squirrel hair.

item.name: Potion of Aqueous Form
entries: When you drink this potion, you transform into a pool of water. You return to your true form after 10 minutes or if you are {@condition incapacitat} or die.
You're under the following effects while in this form:

items.name: Liquid Movement.
items.entry: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet. You can move over or through other liquids. You can enter and occupy the space of another creature. You can rise up to your normal height, and you can pass through even Tiny openings. You extinguish nonmagical flames in any space you enter.

items.name: Watery Resilience.
items.entry: Tens resistència al dany nonmagical. You also have advantage on Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws.

items.name: Limitations.
items.entry: You can't talk, attack, cast spells, or activate magic items. Any objects you were carrying or wearing meld into your new form and are inaccessible, though you continue to be affected by anything you're wearing, such as armor.

item.name: Potion of Clarividència
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the {@spell clarividència} spell. An eyeball bobs in this yellowish liquid but vanishes when the potion is opened.

item.name: Potion of Climbing
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed durant 1 hora. During this time, tens avantatge a tirades de Força ({@skill Atletisme}) checks you make to climb. The potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

item.name: Potion of Cloud Giant Força
entries: When you drink this potion, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 27 durant 1 hora. The potion has no effect on you if your Força is equal to or greater than that score.
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature cloud giant}.

item.name: Potion of Cold Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Comprehension
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of a {@spell comprendre idiomes} spell durant 1 hora. This liquid is a clear concoction with bits of salt and soot swirling in it.

item.name: Potion of Diminution
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the "reduce" effect of the {@spell engrandir/enxiquir} spell for {@dice 1d4} hours (no concentration required). The red in the potion's liquid continuously contracts to a tiny bead and then expands to color the clear liquid around it. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

item.name: Potion of Alè de Foc
entries: After drinking this potion, pots, com a acció bonus, exhale fire at a target within 30 feet of you. The target ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 13), taking {@dice 4d6} de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. The effect ends after you exhale the fire three times or when 1 hour has passed. This potion's orange liquid flickers, and smoke fills the top of the container and wafts out whenever it is opened.

item.name: Potion of Fire Giant Força
entries: When you drink this potion, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 25 durant 1 hora. The potion has no effect on you if your Força is equal to or greater than that score.
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature fire giant}.

item.name: Potion of Fire Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Flying
entries: When you drink this potion, obtèns una velocitat de vol equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar durant 1 hora and can hover. If you're in the air when the potion wears off, you fall unless you have some other means of staying aloft. This potion's clear liquid floats at the top of its container and has cloudy white impurities drifting in it.

item.name: Potion of Force Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Frost Giant Força
entries: When you drink this potion, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 23 durant 1 hora. The potion has no effect on you if your Força is equal to or greater than that score.
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature frost giant}.

item.name: Potion of Forma Gasosa
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the {@spell forma gasosa} spell durant 1 hora (no concentration required) or until you end the effect as a bonus action. This potion's container seems to hold fog that moves and pours like water.

item.name: Potion of Giant Size
entries: When you drink this potion, you become Huge durant 24 hores if el teu tamany és Mitjà o Petiter, otherwise the potion does nothing. For that duration, your Força becomes 25, if it isn't already higher, and your punts de vida màxims is doubled (your current hit points are doubled when you drink the potion). A més, the reach of your melee attacks increases by 5 feet.

Everything you are carrying and wearing also increases in size for the duration. When rolling damage for weapons enlarged in this manner, roll three times the normal number of dice; for example, an enlarged longsword would deal {@dice 3d8} de dany tallant (instead of {@dice 1d8}), or {@dice 3d10} de dany tallant (instead of {@dice 1d10}) si s'usa amb dos mans.

When the effect ends, any hit points you have above your punts de vida màxims become punts de vida temporals. This potion is a pale white liquid made from the tongue of a giant clam, with a pungent aroma akin to that of rotting algae. It tastes sweet, however, when consumed.

item.name: Potion of Greater Healing
entries: You regain {@dice 4d4 + 4} hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

item.name: Potion of Growth
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the "enlarge" effect of the {@spell engrandir/enxiquir} spell for {@dice 1d4} hours (no concentration required). The red in the potion's liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

item.name: Poció de curació
entries: You regain {@dice 2d4 + 2} hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

item.name: Potion of Heroisme
entries: Durant 1 hora after drinking it, you gain 10 punts de vida temporals that last durant 1 hora. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the {@spell beneir} spell (no concentration required). This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.

item.name: Potion of Hill Giant Força
entries: When you drink this potion, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 21 durant 1 hora. The potion has no effect on you if your Força is equal to or greater than that score.
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature hill giant}.

item.name: Potion of Invisibilitat
entries: This potion's container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. When you drink it, you become {@condition invisible} durant 1 hora. Anything you wear or carry is {@condition invisible} with you. The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

item.name: Potion of Invulnerability
entries: For 1 minute after you drink this potion, tens resistència al dany all. The potion's syrupy liquid looks like liquefied iron.

item.name: Potion of Lightning Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Longevity
entries: When you drink this potion, your physical age is reduced by {@dice 1d6 + 6} years, to a minimum of 13 years. Each time you subsequently drink a potion of longevity, there is 10 percent cumulative chance that you instead age by {@dice 1d6 + 6} years. Suspended in this amber liquid are a scorpion's tail, an adder's fang, a dead spider, and a tiny heart that, against all reason, is still beating. These ingredients vanish when the potion is opened.

item.name: Potion of Maximum Power
entries: The first time you cast a damage-dealing spell of 4th level or lower within 1 minute after drinking the potion, instead of rolling dice to determine the damage dealt, you can instead use the highest number possible for each die.
This glowing purple liquid smells of sugar and plum, but it has a muddy taste.

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (beast)
entries: When you drink a potion of mind control, you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature si ho fas before the end of your next turn. If you don't, the potion is wasted.

A potion of mind control produces the effect of a {@spell dominar bèstia} spell. If the target's initial saving throw fails, the effect dura 1 hora, with no concentration required on your part. The {@condition fascinat} creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (humanoid)
entries: When you drink a potion of mind control, you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature si ho fas before the end of your next turn. If you don't, the potion is wasted.

A potion of mind control produces the effect of a {@spell dominar humanoide} spell. If the target's initial saving throw fails, the effect dura 1 hora, with no concentration required on your part. The {@condition fascinat} creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

item.name: Potion of Mind Control (monster)
entries: When you drink a potion of mind control, you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature si ho fas before the end of your next turn. If you don't, the potion is wasted.

A potion of mind control produces the effect of a {@spell dominar criatura} spell. If the target's initial saving throw fails, the effect dura 1 hora, with no concentration required on your part. The {@condition fascinat} creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

item.name: Potion of Mind Reading
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the {@spell detectar pensaments} spell (save DC 13). The potion's dense, purple liquid has an ovoid cloud of pink floating in it.

item.name: Potion of Necrotic Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Poison
entries: This concoction looks, smells, and tastes like a {@item poció de curació} or other beneficial potion. However, it is actually poison masked by illusion magic. An {@spell identificar} spell reveals its true nature.

If you drink it, you rep {@dice 3d6} de dany de verí, and you ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13). Si falla, està {@condition emmetzinat}. A l'inici de cada torn teu while you are {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, you rep {@dice 3d6} de dany de verí. Al final de cada torn teu, you can repeat the saving throw. Si supera, the poison damage you take on your subsequent turns decreases by {@dice 1d6}. The poison ends when the damage decreases to 0.

item.name: Potion of Poison Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Possibility
entries: When you drink this clear potion, you gain two Fragments of Possibility, each of which looks like a Tiny, grayish bead of energy that follows you around, staying within 1 foot of you at all times. Each fragment dura 8 hores or until used.

When you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can expend your fragment to roll an additional {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use. Alternativament, when an attack roll is made against you, you can expend your fragment to roll a {@dice d20} and choose which of the {@dice d20}s to use, the one you rolled or the one the attacker rolled.
If the original {@dice d20} roll has advantage or disadvantage, you roll your {@dice d20} after advantage or disadvantage has been applied to the original roll.
While you have one or more Fragments of Possibility from this potion, you can't gain another Fragment of Possibility from any source.

item.name: Potion of Psychic Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Radiant Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Speed
entries: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the {@spell pressa} spell for 1 minute (no concentration required). The potion's yellow fluid is streaked with black and swirl on its own.

item.name: Potion of Stone Giant Força
entries: When you drink this potion, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 23 durant 1 hora. The potion has no effect on you if your Força is equal to or greater than that score.
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature stone giant}.

item.name: Potion of Storm Giant Força
entries: When you drink this potion, la teva puntuació de Força es torna 29 durant 1 hora. The potion has no effect on you if your Força is equal to or greater than that score.
This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a {@creature storm giant}.

item.name: Potion of Superior Healing
entries: You regain {@dice 8d4 + 8} hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

item.name: Potion of Sanació Suprema
entries: You regain {@dice 10d4 + 20} hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

item.name: Potion of Thunder Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Potion of Resistència}

item.name: Potion of Vitality
entries: When you drink this potion, it removes any {@condition exhaust} you are suffering and cures any disease or poison affecting you. Durant les properes 24 hores, you regain the maximum number of hit points for any Dau de Vida you spend. The potion's crimson liquid regularly pulses with dull light, calling to mind a heartbeat.

item.name: Potion of Watchful Rest
entries: When you drink this potion, obténs els beneficis següents durant les properes 8 hores: you no pot ésser adormit màgicament, and you can remain awake during a long rest and still gain its benefits. This sweet, amber-colored brew has no effect on creatures that don't require sleep, such as elves.

item.name: Potion of Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: You can breathe underwater durant 1 hora after drinking this potion. Its cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

item.name: Eines de Terrissa
additionalEntries: Potter's tools are used to create a variety of ceramic objects, most typically pots and similar vessels.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Potter's tools include potter's needles, ribs, scrapers, a knife, and calipers.

additionalEntries.name: Història
entries: Your expertise aids you in identifying ceramic objects, including when they were created and their likely place or culture of origin.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation, Perception
entries: You gain additional insight when inspecting ceramics, uncovering clues others would overlook by spotting minor irregularities.

additionalEntries.name: Reconstruction
entries: By examining pottery shards, you can determine an object's original, intact form and its likely purpose.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Terrissa
rows: Determine what a vessel once held
Create a serviceable pot
Find a weak point in a ceramic object

item.name: Pouch
entries: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 {@item fona bullet|phb|sling bullets} or 50 {@item dard de sarbatana|phb|dards de sarbatana}, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a {@item bossa de components|phb}. A pouch can hold up to ⅕ cubic foot or 6 lliures d'equipament.

item.name: Powered Armor
entries: Powered armor resembles a suit of unusual armadura de plaques, with finely articulated joints connected by an oily, black, leather-like material. The armor has been worked to create the appearance of a heavily muscled warrior, and its great helm is unusual in that it has no openings—only a broad glass plate in the front with a second piece of glass above it. Strange plates, tubing, and large metal bosses adorn the armor in seemingly random fashion. On the back of the armor's left gauntlet is a rectangular metal box, from which projects a short rod tipped with a cone-shaped red crystal.
Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You have a +1 bonus to AC.
Your Força score is 18 (this has no effect if your Força is already 18 or higher).
Tens avantatge a tirades de salvades de mort.

entries: The armor has further capabilities that can be powered either by cel·les d'energia or by your own life energy. Pots, com a acció bonus, draw power from an cel·la d'energia or sacrifice hit points to gain one of the following benefits:

items: Emit a force field to gain {@dice 2d6 + 5} punts de vida temporals (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Activate boosters to gain una velocitat de vol de 15 peus for 1 minute (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Fire arm-mounted laser: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, range 120 feet, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 2d6} de dany radiant (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Translate any writing you can see in any nonmagical language, to a total of one thousand words over 1 minute (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Fill the armor with air, allowing you to breathe normally in any environment for up to 1 hour (1 charge or 5 hit points).
Gain {@sense visió de foscor} to a range of 60 feet for up to 1 hour (1 charge or 5 hit points).

entries: The armor can accept only one cel·la d'energia at a time. It is found with one cel·la d'energia attached, containing {@dice 2d10} charges.

entries.name: Powered Armor Options
entries: Depending on where and how it appears in the adventure, you might wish to modify the features of Kwalish's legendary powered armor.

entries.name: Automatic Defenses
entries: Unless Kwalish deactivates the suit's automatic defenses, no one can approach the armor without setting those defenses off. Treat the armor as a {@creature shield guardian} that has stored a {@spell missil màgic} spell cast using a 4th-level spell slot. When the armor es queda a 0 punts de vida, its defenses are rendered inert and it can be safely approached.

entries.name: Battle of Wills
entries: When donned by a new user, the armor deems itself superior and attempts to take possession of that user. The user ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 13). Si falla, be possessed by the armor. While possessed, the user is {@condition incapacitat} and loses control of its body but retains its awareness. The armor uses the possessed user's statistics (as adjusted by the armor), but doesn't gain access to the user's knowledge, features, or proficiencies.

Freeing a creature trapped inside the armor first requires defeating the armor's automatic defenses (as above). The trapped creature can also attempt a DC 20 Carisma saving throw each day at dawn. Si supera, the armor no longer controls the creature and can be safely donned by that creature at any time.

entries.name: Stasis
entries: Whenever a creature wearing the armor es queda a 0 punts de vida, the armor places that creature into a state of stasis. While in this state, the creature is stable and does not make salvades de mort, but the armor takes control of the creature (as above). Additionally, the armor attempts to assume the identity of the user, assuring their allies that nothing is amiss. Freeing the user first requires defeating the armor's automatic defenses (as above). A creature in stasis does not make Carisma saving throws to break the armor's control.

entries.name: Alternative Power
entries: Powered armor originally required cel·les d'energia to fuel it, but was adapted by Kwalish to be fueled by the life energy of the creature wearing it. You might decide that the armor can also draw power from additional sources, or that cel·les d'energia can be recharged with the aid of a tinker, inventor, or artificer. It might also be possible for allies to connect to the armor through the use of magic that generates a conduit something like an astral silver cord. While so connected, a willing ally can give up hit points as a reaction to fuel the armor's abilities.

item.name: Pressure Capsule
entries: This small capsule is made of beeswax blended with sand and a variety of enchanted water plants. A creature who consumes a pressure capsule ignores the effects of swimming at depths greater than 100 feet (see "{@book Unusual Environments|dmg|5|Unusual Environments}" in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

item.name: Pride Silk
entries: The hearty silk unique to the region has long been a point of pride with the locals. When processed and woven properly, the resulting cloth is pride silk: an extremely flexible material with the durability of tanned leather. Pride silk has become a favorite cloth for use on military ship sails, war banners, and other utilitarian applications, but has also gained popularity in affluent circles. High-end clothing made from pride silk is both fashionable and protective, leading many nobles and wealthy merchants to seek full outfits and formal gowns made with it. The tailors skilled enough to create such outfits are few and far between, so while pride silk might be expensive as a raw material, outfits made of the cloth are prohibitively expensive for most common folk.

item.name: Pride Silk Outfit
entries: An outfit made of pride silk weighs 4 pounds and costs 500 gp. If you aren't wearing armor, your base Armor Class is 11 + el teu modificador de Destresa while wearing it.

item.name: Pack Religiós
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item motxilla|phb}
a {@item manta|phb}
10 {@item espelma|phb|candles}
a {@item tinderbox|phb}
una capsa d'almoina
2 blocs d'encens
a censer
vestments
2 days of {@item Racions (1 dia)|phb|rations}
a {@item waterskin|phb}.

item.name: Professor Orb
entries: Each professor orb takes the form of a smooth, solid, 5-pound sphere of smoky gray quartz about the size of a grapefruit. Close examination reveals two or more pinpricks of silver light deep inside the sphere.

A Professor Orb is sentient and has the personality of a scholar. Its alignment is determined by rolling on the alignment table in the "{@book Sentient Magic Items|DMG|7|Sentient Magic Items}" section in chapter 7 of the {@book Guia del Mestre de Masmorres|dmg}. Regardless of its disposition, the orb has an Intel·ligència of 18, and Saviesa and Carisma scores determined by rolling 3d6 for each ability. The orb speaks, reads, and understands four languages, and can see and hear normally out to a range of 60 feet. Unlike most sentient items, the orb has no will of its own and can't initiate a conflict with the creature in possession of it.

A Professor Orb has extensive knowledge of four narrow academic subjects. When making an Intel·ligència check to recall lore from any of its areas of expertise, the orb has a +9 bonus to its roll (including its Intel·ligència modifier).

In addition to the knowledge it possesses, a professor orb can cast the {@spell mà de mag} cantrip at will. It uses the spell only to transport itself. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència.

item.name: Professor Skant
entries: The {@item professor orb|WDMM} owned by Vellynne Harpell and stolen by Nass Lantomir calls itself Professor Skant. It is lawful good, and it has a Saviesa of 11 and a Carisma of 9 {@note (as a professor orb, it has an Intel·ligència of 18)}. It speaks and reads Common, Dracònic, Èlfic, and Loross (the dead language of the Empire of Netheril). Professor Skant is a chatterbox and assumes all humanoids are dunderheads. When elaborating on its areas of expertise, it adopts an unintentionally patronizing tone. It has the following four areas of expertise:

items: The history of Netheril (see the "{@adventure Fate of Netheril|IDRotF|17|Fate of Netheril}" sidebar)
Vampirism and the traits of vampires
Rituals surrounding the making, bottling, and drinking of Elverquisst (a rare, ruby-colored elven liquor distilled from sunshine and rare summer fruits)
The {@creature tarrasque} (see the Monster Manual)

entries: When making an Intel·ligència check to recall lore from any of its areas of expertise, the orb has a +9 bonus to its roll (including its Intel·ligència modifier).

Professor Skant takes the form of a smooth, solid, 5-pound sphere of smoky gray quartz about the size of a grapefruit. Close examination reveals two or more pinpricks of silver light deep inside the sphere.
Professor Skant can see and hear normally out to a range of 60 feet. Unlike most sentient items, the orb has no will of its own and can't initiate a conflict with the creature in possession of it.

In addition to the knowledge it possesses, Professor Skant can cast the {@spell mà de mag} cantrip at will. It uses the spell only to transport itself. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència.

item.name: Propeller Helm
entries: While worn, the helm allows its wearer to use an action to cast the {@spell levitar} spell, sense requerir components. The helm's propeller spins and whirs loudly mentre duri el conjur. Each time the spell ends, there is a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance that the helm loses its magic and becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Prosthetic Limb
entries: This item replaces a lost limb-a hand, an arm, a foot, a leg, or a similar body part. While the prosthetic is attached, it functions identically to the part it replaces. You can detach or reattach it com a acció, and it can't be removed against your will. It detaches if you die.

item.name: Protective Verses
entries: This leather-bound spellbook is reinforced with iron and silver fittings and an iron lock (DC 20 to open). Com a acció, you can touch the book's cover and cause it to lock as if you cast {@spell pany arcà} on it. When found, the book contains the following spells: {@spell pany arcà}, {@spell dissipar màgia}, {@spell globus d'invulnerabilitat}, {@spell glif de guarda}, {@spell Santuari Privat d'en Mordenkainen}, {@spell protegir del bé i del mal||protection from evil}, i {@spell Símbol}. It functions as a spellbook for you.
While you are holding the book, you can use it com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus wizard spells.
The book has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. You can use the charges in the following ways while holding it:

items: If you spend 1 minute studying the book, you can expend 1 charge to replace one of your prepared wizard spells with a different spell in the book. The new spell must be of the abjuration school.
When you cast an abjuration spell, you can expend 1 charge to grant una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast {@dice 2d10} punts de vida temporals.

attachedSpells: protegir del bé i del mal

item.name: Psi Crystal
item.reqAttune: by a creature with an intelligence score of 3 or higher
entries: This crystal grants you telepathy for as long as you remain attuned to it. See the {@book introduction of the Monster Manual|MM|0|Telepatia} for rules on how this telepathy works.
The crystal also glows with a purplish inner light while you are attuned to it.
The higher your intelligence, the greater the light's intensity and the greater the range of the telepathy (see the Psi Crystal Properties table).

entries.caption: Psi Crystal Properties
rows: 15 feet
Dim light out to a range of 5 feet
30 feet
Llum forta en un radi de 5 peus i llum tènue uns 5 peus adicionals
60 feet
Llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals
16 or higher
120 feet
Llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals

item.name: Psychic Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Cuc lila Poison
entries: This poison must be harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitat} {@creature cuc lila}. Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 19), taking 42 ({@dice 12d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Pyroconverger
entries: A Pyroconverger is an Izzet-made flamethrower. It carries a risk of malfunction each time you use it.

Com a acció, you can cause the Pyroconverger to project fire en un con de 10 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 13), taking {@dice 4d6} de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

Each time you use the Pyroconverger, roll a {@dice d10} and add the number of times you have used it since your last long rest. If the total is 11 or higher, the Pyroconverger malfunctions: you rep {@dice 4d6} de dany de foc, and you can't use the Pyroconverger again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Pyxis of Pandemonium
entries: A creature that touches this ornate wooden vessel for 1 minute gains the benefits of a short rest. That creature also gains the effects of the {@spell beneir} spell until the creature finishes a short or long rest. The creature can't gain these benefits again until it finishes a long rest.

If the vessel is opened, roll on the Pyxis of Pandemonium table to determine what happens. Any spells cast by the vessel have a spell save DC of 17. One minute after the vessel is opened, it disappears. It reappears, sealed, in a random location on the same plane of existence 24 hours later.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: Any creature that gains the benefit of a short rest from the vessel hears cloying telepathic whispers emanating from it. That creature ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 17). Si falla, the creature is {@condition fascinat} by the vessel durant 1 hora. The {@condition fascinat} creature does everything it can to open the vessel as soon as possible. Si supera, the creature is immune to the vessel's whispers durant 24 hores.

rows: {@b Androphagia.} Each creature within 60 feet of the vessel ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 17). Si falla, go berserk durant 1 minut. The berserk creature must begin its turn using the {@action Atacar} action to make one melee or ranged attack (its choice) against the creature nearest to it. The berserk creature can repeat the save at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success.
{@b Bile Blight.} The vessel casts the {@spell malmenar} spell on each creature within 30 feet of it.
{@b Flood.} The vessel casts the {@spell tsunami} spell at a point of el/la/li MM's choice within 120 feet of it.
{@b Medusa's Gaze.} The vessel casts the {@spell carn a pedra} spell on each creature within 30 feet of it.
{@b Labyrinth.} The vessel casts the {@spell laberint} spell on each creature within 30 feet of it.

{@b Nightmare.} Tendrils of shadow seep from the vessel and form into {@dice 1d4} {@creature shadow demon||shadow demons} (see the Monster Manual for their stat block), which appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it and are hostile.
{@b Swarming Insects.} The vessel casts the {@spell plaga d'insectes} spell, centered on itself and with a radius of 30 feet.
{@b Unbridled Revel.} The vessel casts the {@spell Dansa Irresistible de l'Otto} spell on each creature within 30 feet of it.

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Anchor
entries: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect.

entries.name: Anchor
entries: Pots, com a acció, touch the token to a boat or ship. Durant les properes 24 hores, the vessel can't be moved by any means. Touching the token to the vessel again ends the effect. When the effect ends, the token disappears.

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Bird
entries: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect.

entries.name: Bird
entries: Pots, com a acció, toss the token 5 feet into the air. The token disappears and an enormous, multicolored bird takes its place. The bird has the statistics of a {@creature roc}, but it obeys your simple commands and can't attack. It can carry up to 500 pounds while flying at its maximum speed (16 miles an hour for a maximum of 144 miles per day. with a one-hour rest for every 3 hours of flying), o 1,000 pounds at half that speed. The bird disappears after flying its maximum distance for a day or if it es queda a 0 punts de vida. You can dismiss the bird as an action.

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Fan
entries: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect.

entries.name: Fan
entries: If you are on a boat or ship, pots, com a acció, toss the token fins a 10 peus in the air. The token disappears, and a giant flapping fan takes its place. The fan floats and creates a wind strong enough to fill the sails of one ship, increasing its speed by 5 miles per hour durant 8 hores. You can dismiss the fan as an action.

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Swan Boat
entries: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect.

entries.name: Swan Boat
entries: Pots, com a acció, touch the token to a body of water at least 60 feet in diameter. The token disappears, and a 50-foot-long, 20-foot-wide boat shaped like a swan takes its place. The boat is self-propelled and moves across water at a speed of 6 miles per hour. You can use an action while on the boat to command it to move or to turn up to 90 degrees. The boat can carry up to thirty-two Medium or smaller creatures. A Large creature counts as four Medium creatures, while a Huge creature counts as nine. The boat remains durant 24 hores and then disappears. You can dismiss the boat as an action.

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Tree
entries: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect.

entries.name: Tree
entries: You must be outdoors to use this token. Pots, com a acció, touch it to an unoccupied space on the ground. The token disappears, and in its place a nonmagical oak tree springs into existence. The tree is 60 feet tall and has a 5-foot-diameter trunk, and its branches at the top spread out in a 20-foot radius.

item.name: Quaal's Feather Token, Whip
entries: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exist, each with a different single-use effect.

entries.name: Whip
entries: Pots, com a acció, throw the token to a point within 10 feet of you. The token disappears, and a floating whip takes its place. You can then use a bonus action to make a atac màgic cos a cos against a creature within 10 feet of the whip, with an attack bonus of {@hit 9}. Si impacta, l'objectiu rep {@dice 1d6 + 5} de dany de força.

Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can direct the whip to fly fins a 20 peus and repeat the attack against a creature within 10 feet of it. The whip disappears passada 1 hora, when you use an action to dismiss it, or when you are {@condition incapacitat} or die.

item.name: Quartz
entries: A transparent white, smoky gray, or yellow gemstone.

item.name: Quiver
entries: A quiver can hold up to 20 {@item fletxa|phb|fletxes}.

item.name: Buirac d'Ehlonna
entries: Each of the quiver's three compartments connects to an extradimensional space that allows the quiver to hold numerous items while never weighing more than 2 pounds. The shortest compartment can hold up to sixty {@item fletxa|phb|arrows}, {@item crossbow bolt|phb|bolts}, or similar objects. The midsize compartment holds up to eighteen {@item javelina|phb|javelins} or similar objects. The longest compartment holds up to six long objects, such as bows, {@item quarterstaff|phb|quarterstaffs}, o {@item llança|phb|spears}.
You can draw any item the quiver contains as if doing so from a regular quiver or scabbard.

item.name: Radiance
entries: While holding this wand, Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls. A més, you ignore half cover when making a spell attack. Radiance is in the form of an exquisite golden hand mirror.

While surrounded by darkness, it sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. A creature that is attuned to Radiance can use a bonus action while holding the mirror to cast the {@spell esperonar habilitat} spell, choosing itself and no other creature as the spell's target. Once this property of the wand is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Radiant Absorbing Tattoo
entries: {#itemEntry Absorbing Tattoo|TCE}

item.name: Rain Catcher
entries: A rain catcher is a simple contraption consisting of a 5-foot-square leather tarp and a wooden frame with legs. When the tarp is stretched across the wooden frame, it forms a basin that can catch 2 gallons of drinking water per inch of rainfall and hold up to 8 gallons. The tarp and wooden frame fold up for easy transport.

item.name: Rakdos Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Rakdos, allows you to cast {@spell venjança dels inferns}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Rakdos' recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Rakdos Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Rakdos guild
entries: This dark granite keyrune is marbled with scarlet veins and carved with the leering visage of a mischievous demon. When activated, it transforms into a {@creature cackler|GGR} for up to 1 hour.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature cackler|GGR}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Rakdos Riteknife
entries: Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. Its blade is cruelly serrated, and its hilt resembles a demonic head and wings. Whenever you slay a creature with an attack using the dagger, the creature's soul is imprisoned inside the dagger, and that creature can be restored to life only by a {@spell desig} spell. The dagger can hold a maximum of five souls.

For each soul imprisoned in the dagger, your attacks with it deal an extra {@dice 1d4} de dany necròtic on a hit. While the dagger is within 5 feet of you, your dreams are haunted by whispers from the trapped souls.
The dagger has the following additional properties.

entries.name: Siphon Vitality
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can release any number of stored souls from the dagger to regain {@dice 1d10} hit points per soul released.

entries.name: Annihilation
entries: If the dagger holds five souls, you can use this property: As a reaction immediately after you hit a creature with the dagger and deal damage to that target, you can release all five souls. If the target now has fewer than 75 hit points, ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, die. If the target dies, you can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

item.name: Racions (1 dia)
entries: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

item.name: Red Dragon Mask
entries: This mask of glossy crimson has swept-back horns and spiked cheek ridges. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties.

entries.name: Absorbir Dany
entries: You have resistance against fire damage. If you already have resistance to fire damage from another source, you instead have immunity to fire damage. If you already have immunity to fire damage from another source, whenever you are subjected to fire damage, you take none of that damage and regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt of that type.

entries.name: Inefabilitat Dracònica
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Carisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense visió de foscor} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense visió a cegues} out to 30 feet durant 5 minuts.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Dracònic. A més, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma you make against Red Dragons.

entries.name: Resistència Llegendària
entries: (1/Dia) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Dragon Fire
entries: If you deal fire damage to a creature or flammable object, it starts burning. A l'inici de cada torn seu, a creature burning in this way takes {@dice 1d6} de dany de foc. A creature that can reach the burning target can use an action to extinguish the fire.

item.name: Cota d'Escates de Drac Vermell
entries: La cota d'escates de drac està feta d'escames d'un tipus de drac. Alguns dracs coleccionen les escates que han mudad i les regalen als humanoides. En altres casos els caçadors curen i preserven la pell d'un drac mort amb molta cura. Sia com sia, una cota d'escates de drac és molt valuosa. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens: +1 a la CA; avantatge a salvar contra l'Alè d'Atac i la Presència Aterradora dels dracs; i resistència al dany de foc.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac red més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Reincarnation Dust
entries: When this small pouch of purple dust is sprinkled on a dead humanoid or a piece of a dead humanoid, the dust is absorbed by the remains. If willing, the dead creature returns to life with a new body as if the {@spell reencarnar} spell had been cast on the remains.

item.name: Reszur
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which doesn't make noise when it hits or cuts something.

The name "Reszur" is graven on the dagger's pommel. If the wielder speaks the name, the blade gives off a faint, cold glow, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius until the wielder speaks the name again.

item.name: Reveler's Concertina
entries: While holding this concertina, Tens un +2 a the saving throw DC of your bard spells.
Com a acció, you can use the concertina to cast {@spell Dansa Irresistible de l'Otto} from the item. This property of the concertina no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Rhodochrosite
entries: An opaque light pink gemstone.

item.name: Ring of Acid Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Ring of Air Elemental Command
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, tens avantatge a tirades de attack rolls against elementals from the Elemental Plane of Air, and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. A més, you have access to properties based on the Elemental Plane of Air.
The ring té 5 càrregues. It regains {@dice 1d4 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.

You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast {@spell dominar criatura} on an {@creature air elemental}. A més, when you fall, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling. You can also speak and understand Auran.
If you help slay an {@creature air elemental} while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

items: Tens resistència al dany elèctric.
Tens una velocitat de vol equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar and can hover.

You can cast the following spells from the ring, expending the necessary number of charges: {@spell llamp en cadena} (3 charges), {@spell ràfega de vent} (2 charges), or {@spell paret del vent} (1 charge).

item.name: Ring of Animal Influence
entries: This ring has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing the ring, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges to cast one of the following spells:

items: {@spell Amistat Animal} (save DC 13)
{@spell Temor} (save DC 13), targeting only beasts that have an Intel·ligència of 3 o menys
{@spell Parlar Animal}

item.name: Ring of Cold Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Ring of Djinni Summoning
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, pots dir la seva paraula màgica as an action to summon a particular {@creature djinni} from the Elemental Plane of Air. The {@creature djinni} apareix en un espai desocupat you choose within 120 feet of you. It remains as long as you concentrate (as if concentrating on a spell), to a maximum of 1 hour, or until it es queda a 0 punts de vida. It then returns to its home plane.

While summoned, the {@creature djinni} is friendly to you and your companions. It obeys any commands you give it, no matter what language you use. If you fail to command it, the {@creature djinni} defends itself against attackers but takes no other actions.
After the {@creature djinni} departs, it can't be summoned again durant 24 hores, and the ring becomes nonmagical if the {@creature djinni} dies.

item.name: Ring of Earth Elemental Command
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, tens avantatge a tirades de attack rolls against elementals from the Elemental Plane of Earth and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. A més, you have access to properties based on the Elemental Plane of Earth.
The ring té 5 càrregues. It regains {@dice 1d4 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.

You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast {@spell dominar criatura} on an {@creature earth elemental}. A més, you can move in terreny difícil that is composed of rubble, rocks, or dirt as if it were normal terrain. You can also speak and understand Terran.
If you help slay an {@creature earth elemental} while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

items: Tens resistència al dany d'àcid.
You can move through solid earth or rock as if those areas were terreny difícil. If you end your turn there, you are shunted out to the nearest unoccupied space you last occupied.

You can cast the following spells from the ring, expending the necessary number of charges: {@spell moldejar la pedra} (2 charges), {@spell pell de pedra} (3 charges), or {@spell paret de pedra} (3 charges).

item.name: Ring of Evasion
entries: This ring has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. When you fail a Destresa saving throw while wearing it, you can use your reaction to expend 1 of its charges to succeed on that saving throw instead.

item.name: Ring of Feather Falling
entries: When you fall mentre vesteixis el ring, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling.

item.name: Ring of Fire Elemental Command
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, tens avantatge a tirades de attack rolls against elementals from the Elemental Plane of Fire and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. A més, you have access to properties based on the Elemental Plane of Fire.
The ring té 5 càrregues. It regains {@dice 1d4 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.
You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast {@spell dominar criatura} on a {@creature fire elemental}. A més, tens resistència al dany de foc. You can also speak and understand Ignan.
If you help slay a {@creature fire elemental} while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

items: You are immune to fire damage.
You can cast the following spells from the ring, expending the necessary number of charges: {@spell mans ardents} (1 charge), {@spell bola de foc} (2 charges), and {@spell paret de foc} (3 charges).

item.name: Ring of Fire Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Ring of Force Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Anell d'Acció Lliure
entries: While you wear this ring, terreny difícil doesn't cost you extra movement. A més, magic can neither reduce your speed nor cause you to be {@condition paralitzat} or {@condition restrained}.

item.name: Ring of Invisibilitat
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, you can turn {@condition invisible} as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} with you. You remain {@condition invisible} until the ring is removed, until you attack or cast a spell, or until you use a bonus action to become visible again.

item.name: Anell de salt
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, you can cast the {@spell botar} spell from it as a bonus action at will, but can target only yourself when you do so.

item.name: Ring of Lightning Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Anell de Protecció Mental
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, you are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughts, determine whether you are lying, know your alignment, or know your creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with you only if you allow it.
Pots, com a acció, cause the ring to become {@condition invisible} until you use another action to make it visible, until you remove the ring, or until you die.

If you die while wearing the ring, your soul enters it, unless it already houses a soul. You can remain in the ring or depart for the afterlife. As long as your soul is in the ring, you can telepathically communicate with any creature wearing it. A wearer can't prevent this telepathic communication.

item.name: Ring of Necrotic Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Ring of Obscuring
entries: This band of iron resembles a skull and is cold to the touch. It has 3 charges and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. As an action while wearing the ring, you can expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell núvol de boira} spell from it, with the following changes: the cloud is centered on you when it first appears, and the spell lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required).

item.name: Ring of Poison Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Anell de Protecció
entries: Tens +1 a la CA and saving throws mentre vesteixis el ring.

item.name: Ring of Psychic Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Ring of Radiant Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Ring of Regeneració
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, you regain {@dice 1d6} hit points every 10 minutes, provided that you have at least 1 hit point. If you lose a body part, the ring causes the missing part to regrow and return to full functionality after {@dice 1d6 + 1} days if you have at least 1 hit point the whole time.

item.name: Ring of Shooting Stars
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring in dim light or darkness, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell llums dansaires} i {@spell llum} from the ring at will. Casting either spell from the ring requires an action.
The ring has 6 charges for the following other properties. The ring recupera {@dice 1d6} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Foc Follet
entries: You can expend 1 charge as an action to cast {@spell foc follet} from the ring.

entries.name: Ball Lightning
entries: You can expend 2 charges as an action to create one to four 3-foot-diameter spheres of lightning. The more spheres you create, the less powerful each sphere is individually.

Each sphere apareix en un espai desocupat que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. The spheres last as long as you concentrate (as if concentrating on a spell), up to 1 minute. Each sphere sheds dim light in a 30-foot radius.

Com a acció bonus, you can move each sphere fins a 30 peus, but no farther than 120 peus lluny de tu. Quan una criatura other than you comes within 5 feet of a sphere, the sphere discharges lightning at that creature and disappears. That creature ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, rep lightning damage based on the number of spheres you created. (4 spheres = {@dice 2d4}, 3 spheres = {@dice 2d6}, 2 spheres = {@dice 5d4}, 1 sphere = {@dice 4d12})

entries.name: Shooting Stars
entries: You can expend 1 to 3 charges as an action. For every charge you expend, you launch a glowing mote of light from the ring at a point que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. Each creature within a 15-foot cube originating from that point is showered in sparks and ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15), taking {@dice 5d4} de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Ring of Spell Storing
entries: This ring stores spells cast into it, holding them until the attuned wearer uses them. The ring can store up to 5 levels worth of spells at a time. When found, it contains {@dice 1d6 - 1} levels of stored spells chosen by el/la/li MM.

Any creature can cast a spell de nivell 1 a 5 into the ring by touching the ring as the spell is cast. The spell has no effect, other than to be stored in the ring. If the ring can't hold the spell, the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.

Mentre vesteixis el ring, you can cast any spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and habilitat de llançament de conjurs of the original caster, but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the ring is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.

item.name: Ring of Spell Turning
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against any spell that targets only you (not in an area of effect). A més, if you roll a 20 for the save and the spell is 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on you and instead targets the caster, using the slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and habilitat de llançament de conjurs of the caster.

item.name: Ring of Swimming
entries: You have a swimming speed of 40 feet mentre vesteixis el ring.

item.name: Ring of Telequinesi
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, you can cast the {@spell Telequinesi} spell at will, but you can target only objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

item.name: Ring of Temporal Salvation
entries: If you die mentre vesteixis el gray crystal ring, you vanish and reappear en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the space you left (or the nearest unoccupied space). You have a number of hit points equal to {@dice 3d6} + el teu modificador de Constitució. If your punts de vida màxims is lower than the number of hit points you regain, your punts de vida màxims rises to a similar amount. If you have any levels of {@condition exhaust}, reduce your level of {@condition exhaust} by 1. Once the ring is used, it turns to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: Anell del Moltó
entries: This ring has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing the ring, pots, com a acció, expend 1 to 3 of its charges to attack una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. The ring produces a spectral ram's head and makes its attack roll with a +7 bonus. Si impacta, for each charge you spend, l'objectiu rep {@dice 2d10} de dany de força and is pushed 5 peus lluny de tu.

Alternatively, you can expend 1 to 3 of the ring's charges as an action to try to break an object que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast that isn't being worn or carried. The ring makes a Força check with a +5 bonus for each charge you spend.

item.name: Ring of Three Wishes
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its 3 charges to cast the {@spell desig} spell from it. The ring becomes nonmagical when you use the last charge.

item.name: Ring of Thunder Resistència
entries: {#itemEntry Ring of Resistència}

item.name: Ring of Truth Telling
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, tens avantatge a tirades de Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) checks to determine whether someone is lying to you.

item.name: Ring of Warmth
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, tens resistència al dany de fred. A més, you and everything you wear and carry are unharmed by temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit.

item.name: Ring of Water Elemental Command
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, tens avantatge a tirades de attack rolls against elementals from the Elemental Plane of Water and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. A més, you have access to properties based on the Elemental Plane of Water.
The ring té 5 càrregues. It regains {@dice 1d4 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.

You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast {@spell dominar criatura} on a {@creature water elemental}. A més, you can stand on and walk across liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground. You can also speak and understand Aquan.
If you help slay a {@creature water elemental} while attuned to the ring, you gain access to the following additional properties:

items: You can breathe underwater and have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

You can cast the following spells from the ring, expending the necessary number of charges: {@spell crear o destruir aigua} (1 charge), {@spell control d'aigua} (3 charges), {@spell tempesta de gel} (2 charges), or {@spell paret de glaç} (3 charges).

item.name: Anell de Caminar per l'Aigua
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, you can stand on and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground.

item.name: Ring of Winter
entries: {@creature Artus Cimber|ToA} has kept this item in his possession for over a century. The Ring of Winter is a golden band that resizes to fit snugly on the finger of its wearer. A thin layer of frost coats the outside of the ring, which normal heat can't melt. The ring feels ice cold to the touch and initially numbs the hand that wears it, but this cold ceases to be felt by one who is attuned to this ring.

The Ring of Winter is sentient and tries to take control of any creature that wears it (see "Sentient Magic Items" chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). If it succeeds, the ring compels its wearer to cause undue harm to everyone and everything around it, in a cold-hearted attempt to incur the wrath of enemies and bring the wearer's doom.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Ring of Winter is a sentient chaotic evil item with an Intel·ligència of 14, a Saviesa of 14, and a Carisma of 17. The ring communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it, and it has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 60 feet. The ring craves destruction, and it likes inflicting indiscriminate harm on others.

entries.name: Indetectable
entries: The Ring of Winter defies attempts to magically locate it. Neither the ring nor its wearer can be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

entries.name: Frozen Time
entries: As long as you wear the ring, you don't age naturally. This effect is similar to suspended animation, in that your age doesn't catch up to you once the ring is removed. The ring doesn't protect its wearer from magical or supernatural aging effects, such as the Albir Terrorífic of a {@creature ghost}.

entries.name: Cold Immunity
entries: While attuned to and wearing the ring, you have immunity to cold damage and don't suffer any ill effects from extreme cold (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon's Master Guide).

entries.name: Magic
entries: The Ring of Winter has 12 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can expend the necessary number of charges to activate one of the following properties:

items: You can expend 1 charge as an action and use the ring to lower the temperature in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on a point que puguis veure a 300 peus d'abast. The temperature in that area drops 20 degrees per minute, to a minimum of -30 degrees Fahrenheit. Frost and ice begin to form on surfaces once the temperature drops below 32 degrees. This effect is permanent unless you use the ring to end it com a acció, at which point the temperature in the area returns to normal at a rate of 10 degrees per minute.

You can cast one of the following spells from the ring (spell save DC 17) by expending the necessary number of charges: {@spell Mà d'en Bigby} (2 charges; the hand is made of ice, is immune to cold damage, and deals dany contundent instead of force damage as a clenched fist), {@spell con de fred} (2 charges), flesh to ice (3 charges; as {@spell carn a pedra} except that the target turns to solid ice with the density and durability of stone), {@spell tempesta de gel} (2 charges), {@spell Esfera Glaçada de l'Otiluk} (3 charges), {@spell tempesta d'aiguaneu} (1 charge), {@spell brot d'espines} (1 charge; the spikes are made of ice), or {@spell paret de glaç} (2 charges).

You can expend the necessary number of charges as an action and use the ring to create either an inanimate ice object (2 charges) or an animated ice creature (4 charges). The ice object can't have any moving parts, must be able to fit inside a 10-foot cube, and has the density and durability of metal or stone (escull). The ice creature must be modeled after a beast with a challenge rating of 2 or less. The ice creature has the same statistics as the beast it models, with the following changes: the creature is a construct with vulnerability to fire damage, immunity to cold and poison damage, and immunity to the following conditions: {@condition fascinat}, {@condition exhaust}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition paralitzat}, {@condition petrificat}, i {@condition emmetzinat}. The ice creature obeys only its creator's commands. The ice object or creature apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of you. It melts into a pool of normal water passades 24 hores or when it es queda a 0 punts de vida. In extreme heat, it loses 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points per minute as it melts. Use the guidelines in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide to determine the hit points of an inanimate object if they become necessary.

entries.name: Other Properties
entries: The Ring of Winter is rumored to possess other properties that can be activated only by an evil being whose will the ring can't break. Frost giants have long believed that the ring can be used to freeze entire worlds, while a {@creature djinni} in the service of a Calishite pasha once claimed that the ring could be used to summon and control white dragons, as well as the mighty ice primordial named Cryonax.

entries.name: Destroying the Anell
entries: The ring is nigh indestructible, resisting even the most intense magical heat. If it is placed on the finger of the powerful archfey known as the Summer Queen, the ring melts away and is destroyed forever.

item.name: Ring of X-ray Vision
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, pots, com a acció, speak its paraula màgica. When you do so, you can see into and through solid matter durant 1 minut. This vision has a radius of 30 feet.
