To you, solid objects within that radius appear transparent and don't prevent light from passing through them. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, or fins a 3 peus of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block the vision, as does una fulla fina de plom.
Whenever you use the ring again before taking a long rest, you ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, gain one level of {@condition exhaust}.

item.name: Rings of Shared Suffering
entries: These rings come in linked pairs. If you possess the Marcasentinella, pots, com a acció bonus, form a link to the creature attuned to the other ring; from then on, whenever that creature suffers damage, they only suffer half of that damage and you take the rest. This effect continues until you end it as a bonus action or until you or the other creature removes their ring. This effect isn't limited by range. A creature cannot be attuned to more than one ring of shared suffering.

item.name: Robe of Eyes
entries: This robe is adorned with eyelike patterns. While you wear the robe, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: The robe lets you see in all directions, and tens avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.
Tens {@sense visió de foscor} a 120 peus d'abast.
You can see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects, as well as see into the Pla Etèri, out to a range of 120 feet.

entries: The eyes on the robe can't be closed or averted. Although you can close or avert your own eyes, you are never considered to be doing so mentre vesteixis el robe.

A {@spell llum} spell cast on the robe or a {@spell llum del dia} spell cast within 5 feet of the robe causes you to estar {@condition encegat} durant 1 minut. Al final de cada torn teu, you pot salvar per Constitució (DC 11 for {@spell llum} or DC 15 for {@spell llum del dia}), ending the blindness on a success.

item.name: Robe of Scintillating Colors
entries: This robe has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While you wear it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cause the garment to display a shifting pattern of dazzling hues fins el final del teu proper torn. During this time, the robe desprèn llum forta en un radi de 30 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals. Creatures that can see you have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. A més, any creature in the bright light that can see you when the robe's power is activated ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition atordit} until the effect ends.

item.name: Robe of Serpents
entries: A robe of serpents is a stylish silk garment that is popular among wealthy nobles and retired assassins. The robe is emblazoned with {@dice 1d4 + 3} stylized serpents, all brightly colored.

Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can transform one of the robe's serpents into a {@creature giant poisonous snake}. The snake instantly falls from the robe, slithers into an unoccupied space next to you, and acts on your initiative count. The snake can tell friendly creatures from hostile ones and attacks the latter. The snake disappears in a harmless puff of smoke passada 1 hora, when it es queda a 0 punts de vida, or when you dismiss it (no requereix acció). Once detached, a snake can't return to the robe. When all of the robe's snakes have detached, the robe becomes a nonmagical garment.

item.name: Robe of Stars
entries: This black or dark blue robe is embroidered with small white or silver stars. Tens un +1 a saving throws while you wear it.

Six stars, located on the robe's upper front portion, are particularly large. Mentre vesteixis el robe, pots, com a acció, pull off one of the stars and use it to cast {@spell missil màgic} com a conjur de nivell 5. Daily at dusk, {@dice 1d6} removed stars reappear on the robe.

While you wear the robe, pots, com a acció, enter the Pla Astral along with everything you are wearing and carrying. You remain there until you use an action to return to the plane you were on. You reappear in the last space you occupied, or if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.

item.name: Robe of Summer
entries: This elegant garment is made from fine cloth in hues of red, orange, and gold. While you wear the robe, tens resistència al dany de fred. A més, you are comfortable as if the temperature were that of a balmy day, so you suffer no ill effects from the weather's temperature extremes.

item.name: Robe of the Archmagi
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: This elegant garment is made from exquisite cloth of white, gray, or black and adorned with silvery runes. The robe's color corresponds to the alignment for which the item was created. A white robe was made for good, gray for neutral, and black for evil. You can't attune to a robe of the archmagi that doesn't correspond to your alignment.
You gain these benefits while wearing the robe:

items: If you aren't wearing armor, your base Armor Class is 15 + el teu modificador de Destresa.
Tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against spell and other magical effects.
Your spell save DC and spell attack bonus each increase by 2.

item.name: Robe of Useful Items
entries: This robe has cloth patches of various shapes and colors covering it. While wearing the robe. pots, com a acció, detach one of the patches, causing it to become the object or creature it represents. Once the last patch is removed, the robe becomes an ordinary garment.
The robe has two of each of the following patches:

items: Daga
Llanterna d'ull de bou (filled and lit)
Mirall d'acer
10-foot pole
Hempen rope (50 feet, coiled)
Sack

entries: A més, the robe has {@dice 4d4} other patches. El/la/li MM chooses the patches or determines them randomly.

rows: Bag of 100 gp
Silver coffer (1 foot long, 6 inches wide and deep) worth 500 gp
Iron door (fins a 10 peus wide and 10 feet high, barred on one side of your choice), which you can place in an opening you can reach; it conforms to fit the opening, attaching and hinging itself
10 gems worth 100 gp each
Wooden ladder (24 feet long)
A {@creature riding horse} with saddle bags
Pit (a cube 10 feet on a side), which you can place on the ground within 10 feet of you
4 {@item poció de curació||potions of healing}
{@item Rowboat} (12 feet long)
Spell scroll containing one spell of 1st to 3rd level
2 {@creature mastiff||mastiffs}
Window (2 feet by 4 feet, fins a 2 peus deep), which you can place on a vertical surface you can reach
{@item Ariet portàtil|phb}

item.name: Rod of Absorption
entries: While holding this rod, you can use your reaction to absorb a spell that is targeting only you and not with an area of effect. The absorbed spell's effect is canceled, and the spell's energy—not the spell itself—is stored in the rod. The energy has the same level as the spell when it was cast. The rod can absorb and store up to 50 levels of energy over the course of its existence. Once the rod absorbs 50 levels of energy, it can't absorb more. If you are targeted by a spell that the rod can't store, the rod has no effect on that spell.
When you become attuned to the rod, you know how many levels of energy the rod has absorbed over the course of its existence, and how many levels of spell energy it currently has stored.

If you are a spellcaster holding the rod, you can convert energy stored in it into spell slots to cast spells you have prepared or know. You can create spell slots only of a level equal to or lower than your own spell slots, up to a maximum of 5th level. You use the stored levels in place of your slots, but otherwise cast the spell as normal. For example, you can use 3 levels stored in the rod com a conjur de nivell 3 slot.
A newly found rod has {@dice 1d10} levels of spell energy stored in it already. A rod that can no longer absorb spell energy and has no energy remaining becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Rod of Alertness
entries: This rod has a flanged head and the following properties.

entries.name: Alertness
entries: While holding the rod, tens avantatge a tirades de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks and on rolls for initiative.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While holding the rod, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}, {@spell detectar màgia}, {@spell detectar malalties i metzines}, o {@spell veure invisibilitat}.

entries.name: Protective Aura
entries: Com a acció, you can plant the haft end of the rod in the ground, whereupon the rod's head desprèn llum forta en un radi de 60 peus i llum tènue uns 60 peus adicionals. While in that bright light, you and any creature that is friendly to tens +1 a la CA and saving throws and can sense the location of any {@condition invisible} hostile creature that is also in the bright light.

The rod's head stops glowing and the effect ends after 10 minutes, or quan una criatura uses an action to pull the rod from the ground. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

attachedSpells: detectar el bé i el mal

item.name: Rod of Lordly Might
entries: This rod has a flanged head, and it functions as a magic mace that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage roll made with it. The rod has properties associated with six different buttons that are set in a row along the haft. It has three other properties as well, detailed below.

entries.name: Six Buttons
entries: You can press one of the rod's six buttons as a bonus action. A button's effect lasts until you push a different button or until you push the same button again, which causes the rod to revert to its normal form.
If you press button 1, the rod becomes a {@item flame tongue} as a fiery blade sprouts from the end opposite the rod's flanged head (you choose the type of sword).

If you press button 2, the rod's flanged head folds down and two crescent-shaped blades spring out, transforming the rod into a magic battleaxe that grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci.

If you press button 3, the rod's flanged head folds down, a spear point springs from the rod's tip, and the rod's handle lengthens into a 6-foot haft, transforming the rod into a magic spear that grants a+3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci.

If you press button 4, the rod transforms into a climbing pole fins a 50 peus long, as you specify. In surfaces as hard as granite, a spike at the bottom and three hooks at the top anchor the pole. Horizontal bars 3 inches long fold out from the sides, 1 foot apart, forming a ladder. The pole can bear up to 4,000 pounds. More weight or lack of solid anchoring causes the rod to revert to its normal form.
If you press button 5, the rod transforms into a handheld battering ram and grants its user a +10 bonus to Força checks made to break through doors, barricades, and other barriers.

If you press button 6, the rod assumes or remains in its normal form and indicates magnetic north. (Nothing happens if this function of the rod is used in a location that has no magnetic north.) The rod also gives you knowledge of your approximate depth beneath the ground or your height above it.

entries.name: Drenar Vida
entries: Quan impactes a una criatura with a melee attack using the rod, you can force the target to make a DC 17 Constitució saving throw. On a failure, the target rakes an extra {@dice 4d6} de dany necròtic, and you regain a number of hit points equal to half that necrotic damage. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Paralyze
entries: Quan impactes a una criatura with a melee attack using the rod, you can force the target to make a DC 17 Força saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot tornar a salvar al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on a success. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Terrify
entries: While holding the rod, pots, com a acció, force each creature que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast to make a DC 17 Saviesa saving throw. On a failure, a target is {@condition acovardit} de tu durant 1 minut. Un objectiu {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Rod of Resurrecció
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or paladí
entries: The rod té 5 càrregues. While you hold it, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell sanar} (expends 1 charge) or {@spell resurrecció} (expends 5 charges).
The rod regains 1 expended charge daily at dawn. If the rod is reduced to 0 charges, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the rod disappears in a burst of radiance.

item.name: Rod of Retribution
entries: This adamantine rod is tipped with a glowing crystalline eye. The rod has 3 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn.

When una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast damages you while you are holding this rod, you can use your reaction to expend 1 of the rod's charges to force the creature to make a DC 13 Destresa saving throw. The creature rep {@damage 2d10} de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Rod of Rulership
entries: Pots, com a acció, present the rod and command obedience from each creature of your choice que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, està {@condition fascinat} by you durant 8 hores. While {@condition fascinat} in this way, the creature regards you as its trusted leader. If harmed by you or your companions, or commanded to do something contrary to its nature, a target ceases to be {@condition fascinat} in this way. The rod no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Rod of Security
entries: While holding this rod, pots, com a acció, activate it. The rod then instantly transports you and up to 199 other willing creatures you can see to a paradise that exists in an extraplanar space. You choose the form that the paradise takes. It could be a tranquil garden, lovely glade, cheery tavern, immense palace, tropical island, fantastic carnival, or whatever else you can imagine. Regardless of its nature, the paradise contains enough water and food to sustain its visitors. Everything else that can be interacted with inside the extraplanar space can exist only there. For example, a flower picked from a garden in the paradise disappears if it is taken outside the extraplanar space.

For each hour spent in the paradise, a visitor regains hit points as if it had spent 1 Dau de Vida. Also, creatures don't age while in the paradise, although time passes normally. Visitors can remain in the paradise for up to 200 days divided by the number of creatures present (arrodonint a la baixa).

When the time runs out or you use an action to end it, all visitors reappear in the location they occupied when you activated the rod, or an unoccupied space nearest that location. The rod can't be used again until ten days have passed.

item.name: Rod of the Vonindod
entries: The {@creature fire giant} Duke Zalto hired a wizard to craft several of these adamantine rods. Each measures 4 feet long, weighs 100 pounds, and is sized to fit comfortably in a {@creature fire giant||fire giant's} hand. The rod has two prongs at one end and a molded handle grip on the opposite end.

The rod has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} of its expended charges daily at dawn. Com a acció, you can grasp it by the handle and expend 1 charge to cast the {@spell localitzar objecte} spell from it. When the rod is used to detect objects made of adamantine, such as fragments of the Vonindod construct, its range increases to 10 miles.

item.name: Corda d'Escalada
entries: This 60-foot length of silk rope weighs 3 pounds and can hold up to 3,000 pounds. If you hold one end of the rope and use an action to speak the paraula màgica, the rope animates. Com a acció bonus, you can command the other end to move toward a destination you choose. That end moves 10 feet en el teu torn when you first command it and 10 feet on each of your turns until reaching its destination, up to its maximum length away, or until you tell it to stop. You can also tell the rope to fasten itself securely to an object or to unfasten itself, to knot or unknot itself, or to coil itself for carrying.
If you tell the rope to knot, large knots appear at 1-foot intervals along the rope. While knotted, the rope shortens to a 50-foot length and grants advantage on checks made to climb it.
The rope has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point every 5 minutes as long as it has at least 1 hit point. If the rope es queda a 0 punts de vida, it is destroyed.

item.name: Rope of Entanglement
entries: This rope is 30 feet long and weighs 3 pounds. If you hold one end of the rope and use an action to speak its paraula màgica, the other end darts forward to entangle una criatura que puguis veure a 20 peus d'abast. The target ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition restrained}.

You can release the creature by using a bonus action to speak a second paraula màgica. A target {@condition restrained} by the rope can use an action to make a DC 15 Força or Destresa check (target's choice). On a success, the creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by the rope.
The rope has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point every 5 minutes as long as it has at least 1 hit point. If the rope es queda a 0 punts de vida, it is destroyed.

item.name: Rope of Apedaçar
entries: You can cut this 50-foot coil of hempen rope into any number of smaller pieces, and then use an action to speak a paraula màgica and cause the pieces to knit back together. The pieces must be in contact with each other and not otherwise in use. A rope of mending is forever shortened if a section of it is lost or destroyed.

item.name: Rotor of Return
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Constitució saving throws. You periodically receive flashbacks of old memories, and you can unerringly recall any event that took place within the previous 30 days.

entries.name: Borrow Object
entries: You name a mundane item with a value of 50 gp or less and it appears in your hand or at your feet. This can be any item that appears in chapter 5, "{@book Equipment|PHB|5}," of the Player's Handbook, or any similar item selected with el/la/li MM's permission. The summoned item is transported to you from somewhere else in the world, but it is generic in nature, so that you might call for a longsword but you cannot borrow a specific creature's longsword. The item vanishes 10 minutes after it appears. Once you use this feature of the rotor of return, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Recall Code
entries: Com a acció, you can set your current location as a point of return locked to the rotor. Anytime thereafter, pots, com a acció bonus, teleport to the rotor's point of return as long as you are within 500 feet of that point. Once you use the rotor of return to teleport, this feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by el/la/li MM.

item.name: Rowboat
entries: Keelboats and rowboats are used on lakes and rivers, If going downstream, add the speed of the current (typically 3 miles per hour) to the speed of the vehicle. These vehicles can't be rowed against any significant current, but they can be pulled upstream by draft animals on the shores. A rowboat weighs 100 pounds, in case adventurers carry it over land.

item.name: Ruby
entries: A transparent clear red to deep crimson gemstone.

item.name: Ruby of the Mag de Guerra
entries: Etched with eldritch runes, this 1-inch-diameter ruby allows you to use una arma simple o marcial com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus spells. For this property to work, you must attach the ruby to the weapon by pressing the ruby against it durant 10 minuts o més. Thereafter, the ruby can't be removed unless you detach it as an action or the weapon is destroyed. Not even an {@spell camp antimàgic} causes it to fall off. The ruby does fall off the weapon if your attunement to the ruby ends.

item.name: Ruin's Wake
entries: This spear is made from the ivory bone of an drac daurat ancià and carved with an Orc hymn to Gruumsh.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ruin's Wake is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 20, a Saviesa of 16, and a Carisma of 22. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, and Orc.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A slaughter-loving {@creature balor} named Yarrowish lives within Ruin's Wake. The weapon desires only to draw blood and pushes its wielder to solve problems with violence.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The spear grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Abyssal and Orc.

Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica, and it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany perforant to any target it hits. Immediately after you make a ranged attack with this weapon, it flies back to your hand.

As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can make a melee attack with Ruin's Wake with advantage against the attacker. You can't use this property again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the spear reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and the extra piercing damage dealt by the weapon increases to {@dice 2d8}.

When you hurl the spear and speak a paraula màgica, it transforms into a bolt of lightning, forming a line 5 feet wide that extends out from you to una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus d'abast. Tota criatura a dins de la línia, excluding you, ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, rep {@damage 8d6} de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat. Ruin's Wake then returns to your hand. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the spear reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.

While holding the spear, you can let out a battle cry as a bonus action. Each creature you choose within 30 feet of you gains advantage on attack rolls fins el final del teu proper torn. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with an attack from the spear, you can regain hit points equal to the damage you dealt with the attack. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Ruinblade
entries: Ruinblade is a unique weapon possessed by {@creature Moghadam|IMR}, the architect of the Tomb of Horrors. A symbol of his authority, Moghadam carries the weapon during the time frame of the adventure to intimidate the tomb's workers. (In later years, after {@creature Acererak|ToA} trapped Moghadam in the completed tomb as an undead archwraith, Moghadam was able to use the weapon as his own phylactery.)

A small jade version of the green devil face of the Tomb of Horrors is fashioned into the hilt of the weapon, with the blade extending from its open mouth. The blade always appears ruined and rusting, and causes its surroundings to appear reflected in the blade as if in a state of decay.
Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. When you hit an undead creature with it, the attack deals an extra {@dice 1d8} de dany de força.
A més, the weapon has the following properties:

entries.name: Blighted Ruin
entries: You can cast the {@spell plaga} spell from the weapon (DC 15). Once used, this property of the weapon can't be used until the next dawn.

entries.name: Destructive Ruin
entries: You can cast the {@spell desintegrar} spell from the weapon, but can target only a nonmagical object or a creation of magical force. Once used, this property of the weapon can't be used until dawn seven days later.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a anul·lar maledicció spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon.
The weapon must take direct part in the destruction of 1,000 gp worth of materials and objects every seven days, or a conflict arises between you and the weapon at the end of the seventh day.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Ruinblade is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 15, a Saviesa of 8, and a Carisma of 16. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.

The weapon can speak, read, and understand Common, and can communicate with its wielder telepathically. Its voice is a rough, ruined echo. While you are attuned to it, Ruinblade also understands every language you know.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Ruinblade speaks either with a dolorous or frenetic tone, depending on its mood. That mood improves when the sword is actively engaged in acts of destruction, but worsens if the blade is left inactive too long.

The weapon's purpose is to ruin and unmake existing objects, so that its owner can rebuild the world from a blank slate. It thus encourages its wielder to engage in constant destruction, claiming that this will allow the creation of a more superior vision from the ruin of what came before.

item.name: Ruinstone
entries: A fiery red crystal the size of a human palm.

Once per day com a acció bonus, a villain can activate the ruinstone to undo one deed they have performed. The possibilities here are broad, but in combat it's simplest to allow them the opportunity to "rewind" one action and take it again, or to reroll a failed saving throw (if it can still take actions).

Each use of the artifact has a terrible side effect: someone known to the wielder is also erased from reality. After the villain uses the ruinstone, roll a {@dice d20}: on a 5-20, one of their allies disintegrates, on an 1-4, one of the player characters disintegrates.

If a creature bound its soul to the ruinstone in the "Thalivar's Beacon" quest, the artifact explodes when used and the creature who is bound to it disintegrates, disappearing from reality and can only be brought back with a {@spell desig} spell, or similar magic.

item.name: Ryath Root
entries: Any creature that ingests a ryath root gains {@dice 2d4} punts de vida temporals. A creature that consumes more than one ryath root in a 24-hour period ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13). Si falla, suffer the {@condition emmetzinat} condition durant 1 hora.

item.name: Sack
entries: A sack can hold up to 1 cubic foot or 30 lliures d'equipament.

item.name: Saddle of the Cavalier
entries: While in this saddle on a mount, you can't be dismounted against your will if you're conscious, and attack rolls against the mount have disadvantage.

item.name: Saint Markovia's Thighbone
entries: Saint Markovia's thighbone has the properties of a {@item maça of disruption}. If it scores one or more hits against a {@creature vampire} or a {@creature vampire spawn} in the course of a single battle, the thighbone crumbles into dust once the battle concludes.

As a youth, Markovia followed her heart and became a priest of the Morninglord soon after her eighteenth birthday. She proved to be a charismatic proselytizer and, before the age of thirty, had gained a reputation for allowing no evil to stand before her.

Markovia had long considered Strahd a mad tyrant, but only after his transformation into a {@creature vampire} did she dare to challenge him. As she rallied her followers and prepared to march on Castle Ravenloft, Strahd sent a group of {@creature vampire spawn} to her abbey. They confronted Markovia and were destroyed to a one.

Suffused with confidence born of a righteous victory, Markovia advanced on Castle Ravenloft. A great battle raged from the catacombs to the parapets. In the end, Markovia never returned to Barovia, and Strahd long afterward walked with a limp and a grimace of pain. It is said that he trapped Markovia in a crypt beneath his castle, and her remains linger there yet.
The essence of Markovia's saintliness passed partly into her bones as the rest of her body decomposed. Her remaining thighbone is imbued with power that inflicts grievous injury on the undead.

{@item Maça of Disruption}. When you hit a diastre or an undead with this arma màgica, that creature takes an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany radiant. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, be destroyed. Si supera, the creature becomes {@condition acovardit} de tu fins el final del teu proper torn.
While you hold this weapon, desprén llum forta en un radi de 20 peus, i llum ténue uns 20 peus adicionals.

item.name: Sardonyx
entries: An opaque bands of red and white gemstone.

item.name: Scarab of Protection
entries: If you hold this beetle-shaped medallion in your hand for 1 round, an inscription appears on its surface revealing its magical nature. It provides two benefits while it is on your person:

items: Tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against spells.

The scarab té 12 càrregues. If you fail a saving throw against a necromancy spell or a harmful effect originating from an undead creature, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge and turn the failed save into a successful one. The scarab crumbles into powder and is destroyed when its last charge is expended.

item.name: Pack d'Erudits
entries: Includes:

items: a {@item motxilla|phb}
a {@item llibre|phb} of lore
a {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|phb|bottle of ink}
an {@item ink pen|phb}
10 {@item Parchment (una fulla)|phb|sheets of parchment}
a little bag of sand
a small knife.

item.name: Scimitar of Speed
entries: Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. A més, you can make one attack with it as a bonus action on each of your turns.

item.name: Scorpion Armor
entries: This suit of armadura de plaques is fashioned from {@creature giant scorpion} chitin. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: The armor improves your combat readiness, granting you a +5 bonus to initiative as long as you aren't {@condition incapacitat}.
The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on your Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks.
The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on saving throws made to resist the effects of extreme heat (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This armor is cursed. Whenever you don or doff it, you ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15), taking 100 ({@dice 10d10 + 45}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat. Only a {@spell desig} spell can remove the armor's curse.

item.name: Scribe's Pen
item.reqAttune: by a creature with the Marca-Escriba
entries: You can use this pen to write on any surface. You decide whether the writing is visible or {@condition invisible}, but the writing is always visible to a person with the Marca-Escriba.
Any creature with the Marca-Escriba can use an action to touch the {@condition invisible} writing, making it visible to all.
If you use the pen to write on a creature that isn't a construct, the writing fades after 7 days.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Aberrations
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form un cilindre de 5 peus de radi i 10 d'alçada. Durant 5 minuts, this barrier prevents aberrations from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that an aberration would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Beasts
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form un cilindre de 5 peus de radi i 10 d'alçada. Durant 5 minuts, this barrier prevents beasts from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that a beast would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Celestials
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form un cilindre de 5 peus de radi i 10 d'alçada. Durant 5 minuts, this barrier prevents celestials from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that a celestial would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Elementals
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form un cilindre de 5 peus de radi i 10 d'alçada. Durant 5 minuts, this barrier prevents elementals from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that an elemental would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Fey
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form un cilindre de 5 peus de radi i 10 d'alçada. Durant 5 minuts, this barrier prevents fey from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that a fey would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Diastres
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form un cilindre de 5 peus de radi i 10 d'alçada. Durant 5 minuts, this barrier prevents diastres from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that a diastre would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Plants
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form un cilindre de 5 peus de radi i 10 d'alçada. Durant 5 minuts, this barrier prevents plants from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that a plant would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Protection from Undead
entries: Using an action to read the scroll encloses you in an {@condition invisible} barrier that extends from you to form un cilindre de 5 peus de radi i 10 d'alçada. Durant 5 minuts, this barrier prevents undead from entering or affecting anything within the cylinder. The cylinder moves with you and remains centered on you. However, if you move in such a way that an undead would be inside the cylinder, the effect ends. A creature can attempt to overcome the barrier by using an action to make a DC 15 Carisma check. On a success, the creature ceases to be affected by the barrier.

item.name: Scroll of Tarrasque Summoning
entries: Using an action to read the scroll causes the {@creature tarrasque} (see the creature's entry in the Monster Manual) to appear en un espai desocupat you can see within 1 mile of you. The tarrasque disappears when it es queda a 0 punts de vida and is hostile toward all creatures other than itself.

item.name: Scroll of the Comet
entries: By using an action to read the scroll, you cause a comet to fall from the sky and crash to the ground at a point you can see up to 1 mile away from you. You must be outdoors when you use the scroll, or nothing happens and the scroll is wasted.

The comet creates a 50-foot-deep, 500-foot-radius crater on impact. Any creature in that radius ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 20). Si falla, rep {@damage 30d10} de dany de força on a failed saving throw; si supera, en rep la meitat. All structures in the crater are destroyed, as are all nonmagical objects that aren't being worn or held.

item.name: Seeker Dard
entries: This small dart is decorated with designs like windy spirals that span the length of its shaft.

When you whisper the word "seek" and hurl this dart, it seeks out a target of your choice within 120 feet of you. You must have seen the target before, but you don't need to see it now. If the target isn't within range or if there is no clear path to it, the dart falls to the ground, its magic spent and wasted. Otherwise, elemental winds guide the dart instantly through the air to the target. The dart can pass though openings as narrow as 1 inch wide and can change direction to fly around corners.

When the dart reaches its target, the target ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 16). Si falla, rep {@dice 1d4} de dany perforant and {@dice 3d4} de dany elèctric. The dart's magic is then spent, and it becomes an ordinary dart.

item.name: Sekolahian Worshiping Statuette
entries: Skillfully carved from sandstone, this 1-foot-tall statuette depicts a shark twisting through the water with its mouth open. If any Tiny sea-dwelling animal is within 1 inch of the statuette's mouth, the shark flashes to life and deals 1 piercing damage to it. The shark can deal damage in this way no more than once per hour.

item.name: Selesnya Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Selesnya, allows you to cast {@spell fascinar persona}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Selesnya's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Selesnya Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Selesnya guild
entries: Carved from white and green marble in the shape of a wolf's head, this keyrune transforms into a {@creature dire wolf}. The wolf persists durant 8 hores. Its Intel·ligència is 6, and it understands Èlfic and Silvà but can't speak those languages. While it is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate with each other telepathically.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature dire wolf}. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Sending Stone
entries: Also at rank 1, you are given use of an Acquisitions Incorporated sending stone, an uncommon magic item that resembles a gemstone in a bold setting. It functions like a normal sending stone, except that it has no matching stone and allows communication with Head Office, specific secretarians you know, and the secretarian nearest your location. You must succeed on una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) amb CD 15 to establish contact. Once the stone is successfully used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.
Making contact with another secretarian assumes that they are in possession of their own sending stone.

entries.caption: Quirks of Your Sending Stone
rows: It's a flip stone.
It gets great reception everywhere except in your headquarters.
It sometimes picks up other magical conversations.
It's the perfect size, shape, and weight to be used as a skipping stone.
It heats up when you use it, to the extent that it once burned through your gloves.
It has an obnoxious ringtone that you can't work out how to change.
It fails to notify you of incoming messages except for a faint pulsating glow.
It's voice activated, so that every time you talk to someone, it tries to send a message to someone else.

entries.name: Rumor Mill
entries: Also at rank 2, whenever your franchise begins a major quest or mission, make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Història}) amb CD 15. On a success, you can learn up to three rumors related to creatures or organizations involved in the mission, which come to you through your sending stone. These rumors reflect current or historical knowledge possessed by Acquisitions Incorporated or the organization's many contacts.

entries.name: Improved Rumor Mill
entries: At rank 3, Quan empris el tret Rumor Mill, el/la/li MM provides you with a sense of which parts of a particular rumor are inaccurate, if any. You do not necessarily learn the truth behind those false rumors.

item.name: Pedres Missatgeres
entries: Pedres Missatgeres come in pairs, with each smooth stone carved to match the other so the pairing is easily recognized. While you touch one stone, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell encàrrec} spell from it. The target is the bearer of the other stone. If no creature bears the other stone, you know that fact as soon as you use the stone and don't cast the spell.
Once {@spell encàrrec} is cast through the stones, they no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba. If one of the stones in a pair is destroyed, the other one becomes nonmagical.

item.name: Sentinel Shield
entries: Mentre duguis l'escut, tens avantatge a tirades de initiative rolls and Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks. The shield is emblazoned with a symbol of an eye.

item.name: Serpent Scale Armor
entries: This suit of magic armor is made from shimmering scales. While wearing it, you can apply your full Destresa modifier (instead of a maximum of +2) when determining your Armor Class. A més, this armor does not impose disadvantage on your Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks.

item.name: Metzina de serp
entries: This poison must be harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitat} {@creature giant poisonous snake}. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 11 Constitució saving throw, taking 10 ({@dice 3d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Serpent's Fang
entries: This single-edged magic sword is made from the scrimshawed fang of a giant serpent. Its hilt changes shape to adjust to the grasp of any creature that picks it up. The weapon deals an extra {@damage 1d10} de dany de verí to any target it hits.

item.name: Erm de l'Ombra Brand Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo is dark in color and abstract.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Shadow Essence
entries: You gain {@sense visió de foscor} amb un abast de 60 peus, and tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}).

entries.name: Shadowy Defense
entries: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to become insubstantial for a moment, halving the damage you take. Then the reaction can't be used again until the next sunset.

item.name: Erm de l'Ombra Brand Tattoo
entries: This tattoo is dark in color and abstract. While it's on your skin, tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}).

entries.name: Shadowy Defense
entries: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to become shadowy and insubstantial for a moment, reducing the damage you take by half. Once used, this reaction no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If you have multiple magic tattoos, they count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in the closest unoccupied space to you.

item.name: Erm de l'Ombra Shard
entries: This dull, cold crystal sits heavy and leaden, saturated by the Erm de l'Ombra's despair. Com a acció, you can attach the shard to a Tiny object (such as a weapon or a piece of jewelry) or detach it. It falls off if your attunement to it ends. You can use the shard as a spellcasting focus while you hold or wear it.

When you use a Metamàgia option on a spell while you are holding or wearing the shard, you can momentarily curse one creature targeted by the spell; choose one ability score, and fins el final del teu proper torn, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws that use that ability.

item.name: Shard
entries: Silver coin, slightly smaller than the nib (1 shard = 10 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Shard of the Ise Rune
entries: This shard of ice is long and slender, roughly the size of a dagger. The ise (ice) rune glows within it. The shard has the following properties, which work only while it's on your person.

entries.name: Frigid Touch
entries: Com a acció, you can touch a body of water and freeze the water in a 10-foot-radius sphere around the spot you touched. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Frost Friend
entries: Tens resistència al dany de foc.

entries.name: Icy Mantle
entries: Com a acció, you can touch yourself or another creature with water on your finger. The water creates an icy mantle of protection. The next time within the next minute that the target takes bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage, that damage is reduced to 0, and the mantle is destroyed. Once you use this property, no hi pots tornar until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Winters Howl
entries: Com a acció, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell tempesta d'aiguaneu} (spell save DC 17). You regain this ability after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Gift of Frost
entries: You can transfer the shard's magic to a nonmagical item—a cloak or a pair of boots-by tracing the ise rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the shard is destroyed, and the rune appears in blue on the chosen item, which gains a benefit based on its form:

items.name: Cloak.
items.entry: The cloak is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing it, tens resistència al dany de foc, and tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made while in snowy terrain.

items.name: Boots.
items.entry: The pair of boots is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing it, you ignore terreny difícil while walking, and you can walk on water.

item.name: Shard of the Kalt Rune
entries: This long, slender shard of ice is roughly the size of a dagger. The kalt rune—the rune of ice—glows within the shard. When first grasped, the shard emits a painful cold that leaves your hand and arm numb. That feeling passes after a moment, allowing the shard to be handled normally.

entries.name: Frigid Touch (Simple Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe the kalt rune on the surface of  any volume of water. The water freezes in a 10-foot radius around the spot where you scribed the rune.

entries.name: Frost Friend (Simple Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, tens resistència al dany de foc.

entries.name: Icy Mantle (Simple Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe the kalt rune using water onto yourself or another creature. The water instantly freezes into a mantle of protective ice that does not hinder movement or action. The next time the creature takes bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage, that damage is reduced to zero and the icy mantle is destroyed.

entries.name: Freezing Bolt (Complex Property)
entries: Com a acció, you scribe this rune using water onto a creature within your reach as you expend a spell slot. The rune freezes in place, i la criatura ha de salvar per Constitució (DC 12 + the level of the expended spell slot). On a failure, the creature rep {@damage 2d8} de dany de fred mes {@damage 1d8} de dany de fred per level of the expended spell slot, and its speed is reduced to 0 fins el final del teu proper torn. Si supera en rep la meitat and its speed is not affected.

entries.name: Ice Brand (Complex Property)
entries: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune using water onto a melee or ranged weapon, or onto up to 20 pieces of ammunition. The weapon or ammunition gains a ghostly white aura and deals cold damage instead of piercing, slashing, or dany contundent.
A més, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon or ammunition a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot's level divided by three.
These effects last durant 24 hores or until you use this property again.

entries.name: Winter's Howl (Complex Property)
entries: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast tempesta d'aiguaneu as an action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

item.name: Shatterspike
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. If it hits an object, the hit is automatically a critical hit, and it can deal bludgeoning or slashing damage to the object (escull). Further, damage from nonmagical sources can't harm the weapon.

item.name: Shatterstick
entries: A shatterstick is a nonmagical, 12-inch-long, 4-pound stake made of blue-tinged infernal iron mined on Cania, the eighth layer of els Nou Inferns. When embedded in earth or pounded into solid rock, the stake emits a seismic vibration in a 20-foot radius centered on itself for 1 minute, shaking the ground in that area for the duration. When the effects ends, the shatterstick breaks apart, becoming useless, and all structures within 20 feet of it take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany contundent.

item.name: Shawm
entries: A double-reed instrument similar to an oboe or a bassoon, popular with gnomes, who have developed some bellows-powered versions.

item.name: Shield Guardian Amulet
entries: The amulet is a 4-inch-wide disk composed of silver-framed wood, with a rune carved into its face. A {@spell detectar màgia} spell reveals a magical aura of enchantment around the amulet.

Every {@creature shield guardian} has an amulet magically linked to it. A shield guardian can have only one corresponding amulet, and if that amulet is destroyed, the shield guardian is {@condition incapacitat} until a replacement amulet is created.

A shield guardian's amulet is subject to direct attack if it isn't being worn or carried. It has AC 10, 10 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Crafting an amulet requires 1 week and costs 1,000 gp in components.

A shield guardian's solitary focus is to protect the amulet's wearer. The amulet's wearer can command the guardian to attack its enemies or to guard the wielder against attack. If an attack threatens to injure the wearer, the construct can magically absorb the blow into its own body, even at a distance.

A humanoid that attunes to this amulet knows the distance and direction of the shield guardian, provided the amulet and the guardian are on the same plane of existence. Com a acció, the amulet's attuned wearer can try to reactivate the shield guardian, doing so with a successful DC 20 Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) check. Reactivation can only be attempted while the amulet and guardian are within 10 feet of each other.

item.name: Shield of Expression
entries: The front of this shield is shaped in the likeness of a face. While bearing the shield, pots, com a acció bonus, alter the face's expression.

item.name: Shield of Far Sight
entries: A {@creature mind flayer}ed at crafting magic items creates a shield of far sight by harvesting an eye from an intelligent humanoid and magically implanting it on the outer surface of a nonmagical shield. The shield becomes a magic item once the eyes is implanted, whereupon the {@creature mind flayer} can give the shield to a thrall or hang it on a wall in its lair. As long as the shield is on the same plane of existence as its creator, the {@creature mind flayer} can see through the shield's eye, which has {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 60 feet. While peering through this magical eye, the {@creature mind flayer} can use its Explosió Mental action as though it were standing behind the shield.
If a shield of far sight is destroyed, the {@creature mind flayer} that created it is {@condition encegat} for {@dice 2d12} hours.

item.name: Shield of Missile Attraction
entries: Mentre duguis l'escut, you have resistance to damage from atacs armats a distància.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This shield is cursed. Attuning to it curses you until you are targeted by the {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic. Removing the shield fails to end the curse on you. Whenever a atac armat a distància is made against a target within 10 feet of you, the curse causes you to become the target instead.

item.name: Shield of the Hidden Lord
entries: The Shield of the Hidden Lord is of celestial origin and serves as a prison for the pit diastre Gargauth, whose mortal followers revere it as a god. Over time, Gargauth's evil has warped the shield's appearance, so that its celestial motif and designs have become twisted into a fiendish face that subtly moves in disturbing ways.
Mentre duguis l'escut, tens +1 a la CA and resistance to fire damage.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Shield of the Hidden Lord is sentient as long as it imprisons Gargauth. While sentient, the shield has the following properties:

items: The shield has an Intel·ligència of 22, a Saviesa of 18, and a Carisma of 24, as well as hearing and {@sense truesight} out to a range of 120 feet.
The shield can speak, read, and understand Common and Infernal, and it can communicate telepathically with any creature it can sense within 120 feet of it. Its voice is a deep, hollow whisper.

The shield té 3 càrregues. Pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge to cast {@spell bola de foc} or 2 charges to cast {@spell paret de foc} from the shield (save DC 21 for each). The {@spell paret de foc} spell lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required). The shield regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

Anytime during your turn, the shield can choose to radiate an aura of dread durant 1 minut. (This is not a power of the shield that you control.) Any creature hostile to you that starts its turn within 20 feet of the shield ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 18). Si falla, the creature is {@condition acovardit} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. Si supera, the creature is immune to this power of the shield durant les properes 24 hores. Once the shield uses this power, it can't use it again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Gargauth's Personality
entries: Gargauth desperately seeks freedom but can't escape on its own. The pit diastre won't reveal its true nature, referring to itself only as the Hidden Lord. It drops hints and subtle suggestions that it is an angel trapped in an unholy prison. If released from the shield, the pit diastre honors the terms of whatever bargain it struck to facilitate its escape.

While trapped in the shield, Gargauth carefully steers the shield's current owner toward committing acts of cruelty and domination, hoping to condemn the individual's soul to els Nou Inferns. Conflict occurs if the shield's owner does anything that would make it more difficult for Gargauth to escape its prison, such as leaving the shield in a place where others are unlikely to find it.

Gargauth doesn't know how to escape from the shield. The pit diastre believes (incorrectly) that it can break free of the shield if it's brought to els Nou Inferns, for it's convinced that the shield's powers are weaker there.

entries.name: Freeing Gargauth
entries: Casting {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} on the shield has a {@chance 1|1 percent} chance of freeing the pit fiend, or automatically succeeds if the spell is cast by a {@creature solar}, a {@creature planetar}, or an archdevil. A god can release the pit diastre by touching the shield and speaking Gargauth's name. When released, Gargauth appears in a random, unoccupied space as close to the shield as possible.

item.name: Shield of the Uven Rune
entries: This shield is made from the scale of an drac blanc ancià. It has a rune burned into its outward-facing side. A character who examines the rune and succeeds on una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Història}) amb CD 20 recognizes it as an uven ("enemy" in Giant) rune that confers great power.
While holding the shield, you benefit from the following properties.

entries.name: Winter's Friend
entries: You are immune to cold damage.

entries.name: Deadly Rebuke
entries: Immediately after a creature hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to deal {@dice 3d6} de dany necròtic to that creature.

entries.name: Perdició
entries: You can cast the {@spell perdició} spell from the shield (save DC 17). The spell does not require concentration and dura 1 minut. Once you cast the spell from the shield, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

entries.name: Gift of Vengeance
entries: You can transfer the shield's magic to a nonmagical weapon by tracing the uven rune on the weapon with one finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the end, the shield is destroyed, and the rune is etched or burned into the chosen weapon. This weapon becomes a rare magic item that requires attunement. It has the properties of a +1 weapon. El bonus es torna +3 when the weapon is used against one of the following creature types, chosen by you at the time of the arma màgica's creation: aberrations, celestials, constructs, dragons, elementals, fey, diastres, giants, or undead.

item.name: Shiftweave
entries: When a suit of shiftweave is created, up to five different outfits can be embedded into the cloth. While wearing the clothing, pots dir la seva paraula màgica as a bonus action to transform your outfit into your choice of one of the other designs contained within it. Regardless of its appearance, the outfit can't be anything but clothing. Although it can duplicate the look of other magical clothing, it doesn't gain their magical properties.

item.name: Corda de seda (50 peus)
entries: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Força check.

item.name: Silken Spite
entries: The blade of this rapier is made of spider silk. Its onyx pommel is tipped with a ruby cut in the shape of a spider, and the blade carries the blessing of Lolth.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Silken Spite is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 13, a Saviesa of 15, and a Carisma of 15. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal, Common, Èlfic, and Undercommon.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A murderous {@creature yochlol} named Sinnafex lives within Silken Spite. The weapon speaks in whispers, pushing its wielder to trust no one and to kill those who cause the slightest personal offense.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The rapier grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Abyssal, Èlfic, and Undercommon.
Tens {@sense visió de foscor} a 60 peus d'abast. If you already have {@sense visió de foscor}, being attuned to the rapier increases the range of your {@sense visió de foscor} by 60 feet.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

Pots, com a acció, cause poison to coat the rapier's blade. The poison remains for 1 minute or until an attack using this weapon hits a creature. That creature ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 13). Si falla, esdevé {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora. Si falla la salvada per 5 o més, the creature is also {@condition inconscient} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the creature awake.

While carrying the rapier, pots moure't en qualsevol direcció en superfícies verticals i en sostres (t'hi quedes penjant), deixant-te les mans lliures. Obténs una velocitat d'escalada equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar. Additionally, you can't be caught in webs of any sort and can move through webs as if they were terreny difícil.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: The rapier grants the following benefits in its awakened state:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poison increases to 15.

While holding the rapier, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from it (save DC 15): {@spell matanúvol}, {@spell foscor}, {@spell levitar}, o {@spell tirarany}. Once a spell has been cast using the rapier, that spell can't be cast from the rapier again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: The rapier grants the following benefits in its exalted state:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The saving throw DC for the weapon's poison and spells cast from the weapon increases to 17.
Magical darkness doesn't impede your {@sense visió de foscor}.

While holding the weapon in dim light or darkness, pots, com a acció bonus, teleport fins a 60 peus a un espai desocupat que puguis veure that is also in dim light or darkness. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Silver (sp)
entries: Common coins come in several different denominations based on the relative worth of the metal from which they are made. The three most common coins are the gold piece (gp), the silver piece (sp), and the copper piece (cp).

With one gold piece, a character can buy a belt pouch, 50 feet of good rope, or a goat. A skilled (but not exceptional) artisan can earn one gold piece a day. The gold piece is the standard unit of measure for wealth, even if the coin itself is not commonly used. When merchants discuss deals that involve goods or services worth hundreds or thousands of gold pieces, the transactions don't usually involve the exchange of individual coins. Rather, the gold piece is a standard measure of value, and the actual exchange is in gold bars, letters of credit, or valuable goods.
One gold piece is worth ten silver pieces, the most prevalent coin among commoners. A silver piece buys a laborer's work for a day, a flask of lamp oil, or a night's rest in a poor inn.
One silver piece is worth ten copper pieces, which are common among laborers and beggars. A single copper piece buys a candle, a torch, or a piece of chalk.

A més, unusual coins made of other precious metals sometimes appear in treasure hoards. The electrum piece (ep) and the platinum piece (pp) originate from fallen empires and lost kingdoms, and they sometimes arouse suspicion and skepticism when used in transactions. An electrum piece is worth five silver pieces, and a platinum piece is worth ten gold pieces.
A standard coin weighs about a third of an ounce, so fifty coins weigh a pound.

item.name: Cota d'Escates de Drac d'Argent
entries: La cota d'escates de drac està feta d'escames d'un tipus de drac. Alguns dracs coleccionen les escates que han mudad i les regalen als humanoides. En altres casos els caçadors curen i preserven la pell d'un drac mort amb molta cura. Sia com sia, una cota d'escates de drac és molt valuosa. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens: +1 a la CA; avantatge a salvar contra l'Alè d'Atac i la Presència Aterradora dels dracs; i resistència al dany de fred.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac silver més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Silver headdress with amber and red-coral feathers (Imperi del Sol)
Silver necklace with a gemstone pendant
Silver necklace with an amber pendant (Imperi del Sol)
Silver shoulder piece with amber and garnet (Imperi del Sol)
Silver Sword
item.reqAttune: by a creature that has psionic ability
entries: You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the {@spell projecció astral} spell), you can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

item.name: Silver-plated steel longsword with jet set in hilt
Simic Guild Signet
entries: This ring, adorned with the symbol of Simic, allows you to cast {@spell retirada estratègica}. A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or higher, as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical properties, the ring is also an indicator of Simic's recognition and favor.
A signet has 3 charges, and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While wearing it, you can expend 1 charge to cast the associated spell (save DC 13).

item.name: Simic Keyrune
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Simic guild
entries: This keyrune is assembled from coral, mother-of-pearl, and chrome and adorned with the spirals and curves characteristic of Simic ornamentation. The head resembles the shell of a sea creature. On command, the keyrune turns into a {@creature category 1 krasis|GGR} that has the Grabber and Stabilizing Legs adaptations. The transformation lasts for up to 5 hours.

When you use an action to speak the item's paraula màgica and place the keyrune on the ground en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of you, the keyrune transforms into a {@creature category 1 krasis|GGR} that has the Grabber and Stabilizing Legs adaptations. If there isn't enough space for the creature, the keyrune doesn't transform.

The creature is friendly to you, your companions, and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the {@action Esquivar} action and moves to avoid danger.

At the end of the duration, the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it es queda a 0 punts de vida or if you use an action to speak the paraula màgica again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune form, it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

item.name: Sinda berries (10)
entries: These berries are dark brown and bitter. A full-grown sinda berry bush has {@dice 4d6} berries growing on it. A bush plucked of all its berries grows new berries in {@dice 1d4} months. Picked berries lose their freshness and efficacy passades 24 hores.

Fresh sinda berries can be eaten raw or crushed and added to a drink to dull the bitterness. A creature that consumes at least ten fresh sinda berries gains advantage on saving throws against disease and poison durant les properes 24 hores.

item.name: Siren Song Lyre
entries: Pots, com a acció, play this lyre and cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell amistat animal}, {@spell fascinar persona}, {@spell captivar}, {@spell suggestió}. If the spell requires a saving throw, the spell save DC is 13.
Once the instrument has been used to cast a spell, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Skyblinder Staff
entries: Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this magic quarterstaff. While holding it, Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls.

If a flying creature que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast makes an attack roll against you, you can use your reaction to hold the staff aloft and cause it to flare with light. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll, and it ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, està {@condition encegat} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

item.name: Gos de Trineu
entries: A gos de trineu (use the {@creature wolf} stat block in appendix A of the Monster Manual) costs 50 gp and can pull 360 pounds.
Gossos de Trineu must take a short rest after pulling a sled durant 1 hora; otherwise, they gain one level of {@condition exhaust}.

item.name: Sling Bullets of Althemone
entries: The sling bullets come in a pouch, which contains {@dice 1d4 + 4} bullets. Roll on the Magic Sling Bullets table for each bullet to determine its magical property.

You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with each of these bullets. If a bullet misses its target, the bullet teleports back into the pouch. Once a bullet hits a target, the bullet loses its magic.

entries.caption: Magic Sling Bullets
rows: {@b Banishment.} A creature that takes damage from this bullet ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 15). Si falla, be banished as though affected by the {@spell desterrament} spell.

{@b Fulguration.} Si impacta, this bullet deals an extra {@damage 2d8} de dany elèctric to its target. All other creatures within 10 feet of the target must each succeed on a DC 15 Constitució saving throw or rep {@damage 1d8} de dany de tro.
{@b Stunning.} Si impacta, this bullet deals an extra {@damage 1d10} de dany de força, and the target is {@condition atordit} fins el final del teu proper torn.

{@b Tracking.} A creature that takes damage from this bullet is marked with a glowing rune where the bullet hit. The mark lasts 24 hours. While the creature is marked, you always know the direction to it.

item.name: Espardenyes de Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: While you wear these light shoes, pots moure't en qualsevol direcció en superfícies verticals i en sostres (t'hi quedes penjant), deixant-te les mans lliures. Obténs una velocitat d'escalada equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar. However, the slippers don't allow you to move this way on a slippery surface, such as one covered by ice or oil.

item.name: Small gold statuette set with rubies
Small mirror set in a painted wooden frame
Eines de Ferrer
additionalEntries: Smith's tools allow you to work metal, heating it to alter its shape, repair damage, or work raw ingots into useful items.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Smith's tools include hammers, tongs, charcoal, rags, and a whetstone.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana and History
entries: Your expertise lends you additional insight when examining metal objects, such as weapons.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: You can spot clues and make deductions that others might overlook when an investigation involves armor, weapons, or other metalwork.

additionalEntries.name: Repair
entries: With access to your tools and an open flame hot enough to make metal pliable, you can restore 10 hit points to a damaged metal object for each hour of work.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Ferrer
rows: Sharpen a dull blade
Repair a suit of armor
Sunder a nonmagical metal object

item.name: Smoke Grenade
entries: Com a acció, a character can throw a grenade at a point fins a 60 peus away. With a grenade launcher, the character can propel the grenade fins a 120 peus away.

One round after a smoke grenade, lands, it emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily obscured area in a 20-foot radius. A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses the smoke in 4 rounds; a strong wind (20 or more miles per hour) disperses it in 1 round.

item.name: Smokepowder
entries: Smokepowder is a magical explosive chiefly used to propel a bullet out of the barrel of a firearm. It is stored in airtight wooden kegs or tiny, waterproof leather packets. A packet contains enough smokepowder for five shots, and a keg holds enough smokepowder for five hundred shots.

If smokepowder is set on fire, dropped, or otherwise handled roughly, it explodes and deals fire damage to each creature or object within 20 feet of it: {@dice 1d6} for a packet, {@dice 9d6} for a keg. A successful DC 12 Destresa saving throw halves the damage.
Casting {@spell dissipar màgia} on smokepowder renders it permanently inert.

item.name: Snowshoes
entries: Snowshoes reduce the likelihood of their wearer getting stuck in the deep snow.

item.name: Songhorn
entries: A recorder, a simple type of flute, usually carved from wood.

item.name: Soothsalts
entries: Soothsalts are derived from a naturally occurring crystalline substance discovered throughout the wilds of the Miskath Strand. The crimson crystals have been mined from cavernous veins like those in the mouth of the Miskath Pit and found within smaller geode formations near sites ravaged by the Calamity. Soothsalts are consumed orally in lozenge-sized doses, and frequent users can be identified by the telltale crimson stain around their mouths. A creature subjected to a dose of soothsalts gains advantage on all Intel·ligència checks for {@dice 1d4} hours.
For each dose of soothsalts consumed, la criatura ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, gain one level of {@condition exhaust}—an effect which is cumulative with multiple doses.

item.name: Soul Bag
entries: When an evil humanoid dies as a result of a {@creature night hag}'s Nightmare Haunting, the hag catches the soul in this black sack made of stitched flesh. A soul bag can hold only one evil soul at a time, and only the night hag who crafted the bag can catch a soul with it. Crafting a soul bag takes 7 days and a humanoid sacrifice (whose flesh is used to make the bag).

item.name: Soul Coin
entries: Soul coins are about 5 inches across and about an inch thick, minted from infernal iron. Each coin weighs one-third of a pound, and is inscribed with Infernal writing and a spell that magically binds a single soul to the coin. Because each soul coin has a unique soul trapped within it, each has a story. A creature might have been imprisoned as a result of defaulting on a deal, while another might be the victim of a night hag's curse.

entries.name: Carrying Soul Coins
entries: To hold a soul coin is to feel the soul bound within it—overcome with rage or fraught with despair.

An evil creature can carry as many soul coins as it wishes (up to its maximum weight allowance). A non-evil creature can carry a number of soul coins equal to or less than its Constitució modifier without penalty. A non-evil creature carrying a number of soul coins greater than its Constitució modifier has disadvantage on its attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

entries.name: Using a Soul Coin
entries: A soul coin has 3 charges. A creature carrying the coin can use its action to expend 1 charge from a soul coin and use it to do un/a dels següents:

items.name: Drenar Vida.
items.entry: You siphon away some of the soul's essence and gain {@dice 1d10} punts de vida temporals.

items.name: Query.
items.entry: You telepathically ask the soul a question and receive a brief telepathic response, which you can understand. The soul knows only what it knew in life, but it must answer you truthfully and tan bé com pugui. The answer is no more than a sentence or two and might be cryptic.

entries.name: Freeing a Soul
entries: Casting a spell that removes a curse on a soul coin frees the soul trapped within it, as does expending all of the coin's charges. The coin itself rusts from within and is destroyed once the soul is released. A freed soul travels to the realm of the god it served or the outer plane most closely tied to its alignment (DM's choice). The souls of lawful evil creatures released from soul coins typically emerge from the River Styx as {@creature lemure} devils.

A soul can also be freed by destroying the coin that contains it.
