A soul coin has AC 19, 1 hit point for each charge it has remaining, and immunity to all damage except that which is dealt by a {@item focferni weapon|bgdia} or an infernal war machine's furnace (see "{@adventure Soul Fuel|bgdia|11|Soul Fuel}").
Freeing a soul from a soul coin is considered a good act, even if the soul belongs to an evil creature.

entries.name: Hellish Currency
entries: Soul coins are a currency of els Nou Inferns and are highly valued by devils. The coins are used among the infernal hierarchy to barter for favors, bribe the unwilling, and reward the faithful for services rendered.

Soul coins are created by Mammon and his greater devils on Minauros, the third layer of els Nou Inferns, in a vast chamber where the captured souls of evil mortals are bound into the coins. These coins are then distributed throughout els Nou Inferns to be used for goods and services, infernal deals, dark bargains, and bribes.

item.name: Sovereign Glue
entries: This viscous, milky-white substance can form a permanent adhesive bond between any two objects. It must be stored in a jar or flask that has been coated inside with {@item oil of slipperiness}. When found, a container contains {@dice 1d6 + 1} ounces.

One ounce of the glue can cover a 1-foot square surface. The glue takes 1 minute to set. Once it has done so, the bond it creates can be broken only by the application of {@item universal solvent} or {@item oil of eterietat}, or with a {@spell desig} spell.

item.name: Speaking Stone
entries: The key to long-distance, virtually instantaneous communication across Khorvaire is House Sivis's network of message stations. Each station contains at least one speaking stone, which is carved from a Siberys dragonshard and inscribed with arcane symbols that uniquely identify it. If you're a gnome with the Marca-Escriba, you can touch the stone and use an action to cast the {@spell encàrrec} spell from it. The target is any other speaking stone whose location or unique sequence of symbols you know. A creature within 5 feet of the stone hears the message as if they were the target.
In a Sivis message station, a gnome is always on duty by the speaking stone, listening for messages that might come in and transcribing them for delivery to their intended recipients.

item.name: Spear of Backbiting
entries: Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. When you throw it, its normal and long ranges both increase by 30 feet, and it deals one extra die of damage on a hit. After you throw it and it hits or misses, it flies back to your hand immediately.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with {@spell anul·lar maledicció} or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon, keeping it within reach at all times. A més, you have disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.

Whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll using this weapon, the weapon bends or flies a impactar you in the back. Make a new attack roll with advantage against your own AC. If the result is a hit, you take damage as if you had attacked yourself with the spear.

item.name: Spell Bottle
entries: This glass bottle can store one spell of up to 5th level at a time. When found, roll a {@dice d6} and subtract 1; the total determines the level of spell in the bottle (el/la/li MM chooses the spell, and 0 means the bottle is empty). A swirling blue vapor fills the bottle while it contains a spell.
When the bottle is empty, any creature can cast a spell de nivell 1 a 5 into it by touching it while casting. The spell has no effect other than to be stored in the bottle.

While holding the bottle, you can cast the spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and habilitat de llançament de conjurs of the original caster, but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The bottle becomes empty once the spell is cast.

If you're holding the empty bottle when you see a creature casting a spell within 60 feet of you, you can open the bottle as a reaction in an attempt to interrupt the spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell has no effect, and it is stored in the bottle. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an Intel·ligència check. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the spell has no effect, and it is stored in the bottle.

item.name: Spell Gem (Amber)
entries: An amber spell gem can contain one spell from any class's spell list. You become aware of the spell when you learn the gem's properties. While holding the gem, you can cast the spell from it as an action if you know the spell or if the spell is on your class's spell list. Doing so doesn't require any components, and doesn't require attunement. The spell then disappears from the gem.
An amber spell gem can store up to 4th level spells. Spells cast from the spell gem have a save DC of 15 and an attack bonus of {@hit 9}.

You can imbue the gem with a spell if you're attuned to it and it's empty. To do so, you cast the spell while holding the gem. The spell is stored in the gem instead of having any effect. Casting the spell must require either 1 action or 1 minute or longer, and the spell's level must be no higher than the gem's maximum. If the spell belongs to the escola d'abjuració and requires material components that are consumed, you must provide them, but they can be worth half as much as normal.
Once imbued with a spell, the gem can't be imbued again until the next dawn.
Gnoms de les profunditats created these magic gemstones and keep the creation process a secret.

item.name: Spell Scroll (nivell 1)
entries: A spell scroll bears the words of a single spell, written as a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your class's spell list, you can read the scroll and cast its spell without providing any material components. Otherwise, the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell's normal casting time. Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and it crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupted, the scroll is not lost.

If the spell is on your class's spell list but of a higher level than you can normally cast, you must make an ability check using your habilitat de llançament de conjurs to determine whether you cast it successfully. The DC is 11. On a failed check, the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.
Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and the scroll itself crumbles to dust.
A spell cast from this scroll has a save DC of 13 and an attack bonus of {@hit 5}.

A wizard spell on a spell scroll can be copied just as spells in spellbooks can be copied. When a spell is copied from a spell scroll, the copier must succeed on una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) amb CD 11. If the check succeeds, the spell is successfully copied. Whether the check succeeds or fails, the spell scroll is destroyed.

When a spell is copied from a spell scroll, the copier must succeed on una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) amb CD 18. If the check succeeds, the spell is successfully copied. Whether the check succeeds or fails, the spell scroll is destroyed.

item.name: Spell Scroll (nivell 9)
entries: A spell scroll bears the words of a single spell, written as a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your class's spell list, you can read the scroll and cast its spell without providing any material components. Otherwise, the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell's normal casting time. Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and it crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupted, the scroll is not lost.

If the spell is on your class's spell list but of a higher level than you can normally cast, you must make an ability check using your habilitat de llançament de conjurs to determine whether you cast it successfully. The DC is 19. On a failed check, the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.
Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and the scroll itself crumbles to dust.
A spell cast from this scroll has a save DC of 19 and an attack bonus of {@hit 11}.

A wizard spell on a spell scroll can be copied just as spells in spellbooks can be copied. When a spell is copied from a spell scroll, the copier must succeed on una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) amb CD 19. If the check succeeds, the spell is successfully copied. Whether the check succeeds or fails, the spell scroll is destroyed.

item.name: Spell Scroll (Truc)
entries: A spell scroll bears the words of a single spell, written as a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your class's spell list, you can read the scroll and cast its spell without providing any material components. Otherwise, the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell's normal casting time. Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and it crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupted, the scroll is not lost.

If the spell is on your class's spell list but of a higher level than you can normally cast, you must make an ability check using your habilitat de llançament de conjurs to determine whether you cast it successfully. The DC is 10. On a failed check, the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.
Once the spell is cast, the words on the scroll fade, and the scroll itself crumbles to dust.
A spell cast from this scroll has a save DC of 13 and an attack bonus of {@hit 5}.

item.name: Spellbook
entries: Essential for wizards, a spellbook is a leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells.

item.name: Spellguard Shield
entries: Mentre duguis l'escut, tens avantatge a tirades de salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics, and spell attacks contra tu tenen desavantatge.

item.name: Spellshard
entries: This polished Eberron dragonshard fits in the hand and stores information similar to a book. The shard can hold the equivalent of one book that's no more than 320 pages long. A shard can be created blank or already filled with information. When the shard is created, the creator can set a passphrase that must be spoken to access the information stored within.

While holding the shard, pots, com a acció, open your mind to the shard, seeing its content in your mind. On subsequent rounds, reading the text or scribing new text on blank "pages" in the shard requires concentration (as if concentrating on a spell) and takes the same amount of time it takes you to read and write normally. Thinking of a particular phrase or topic draws you to the first section in the shard that addresses it.
A wizard can use a spellshard as a spellbook, with the usual cost in gold and time to "scribe" a spell into the shard.

item.name: Spellwrought Tattoo (nivell 1)
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo contains a single {@filter 1st level spell|spells|level=1}, wrought on your skin by a magic needle. To use the tattoo, you must hold the needle against your skin and speak the paraula màgica. The needle turns into ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin in whatever design you like. Once the tattoo is there, you can cast its spell, sense que calguin components materials. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
The Ability modifier for this spell is +3; the Save DC is 13 and the attack bonus is +5.

item.name: Spellwrought Tattoo (nivell 1)
entries: This tattoo contains a single spell, wrought on your skin by a magic needle. To use the tattoo, you must hold the needle against your skin where you want the tattoo to appear and speak the paraula màgica. The needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on your skin. Once the tattoo is on your skin, you can cast its spell, sense que calguin components materials. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
A spell cast from this tattoo has a modificador de llançament de conjurs of +3, a save DC of 13 and an attack bonus of +5.

item.name: Spellwrought Tattoo (nivell 2)
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo contains a single {@filter 2nd level spell|spells|level=2}, wrought on your skin by a magic needle. To use the tattoo, you must hold the needle against your skin and speak the paraula màgica. The needle turns into ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin in whatever design you like. Once the tattoo is there, you can cast its spell, sense que calguin components materials. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
The Ability modifier for this spell is +3; the Save DC is 13 and the attack bonus is +5.

The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
A spell cast from this tattoo has a modificador de llançament de conjurs of +3, a save DC of 13 and an attack bonus of +5.

Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
The Ability modifier for this spell is +4; the Save DC is 15 and the attack bonus is +7.

The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
A spell cast from this tattoo has a modificador de llançament de conjurs of +4, a save DC of 15 and an attack bonus of +7.

Once the tattoo is there, you can cast its spell, sense que calguin components materials. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.

To use the tattoo, you must hold the needle against your skin where you want the tattoo to appear and speak the paraula màgica. entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo contains a single {@filter 5th level spell|spells|level=5}, wrought on your skin by a magic needle. Once the tattoo is there, you can cast its spell, sense que calguin components materials. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
The Ability modifier for this spell is +5; the Save DC is 17 and the attack bonus is +9.

item.name: Spellwrought Tattoo (nivell 5)
entries: This tattoo contains a single spell, wrought on your skin by a magic needle. To use the tattoo, you must hold the needle against your skin where you want the tattoo to appear and speak the paraula màgica. The needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on your skin. Once the tattoo is on your skin, you can cast its spell, sense que calguin components materials. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
A spell cast from this tattoo has a modificador de llançament de conjurs of +5, a save DC of 17 and an attack bonus of +9.

item.name: Spellwrought Tattoo (Truc)
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo contains a single {@filter cantrip|spells|level=0}, wrought on your skin by a magic needle. To use the tattoo, you must hold the needle against your skin and speak the paraula màgica. The needle turns into ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin in whatever design you like. Once the tattoo is there, you can cast its spell, sense que calguin components materials. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
The Ability modifier for this spell is +3; the Save DC is 13 and the attack bonus is +5.

item.name: Spellwrought Tattoo (Truc)
entries: This tattoo contains a single spell, wrought on your skin by a magic needle. To use the tattoo, you must hold the needle against your skin where you want the tattoo to appear and speak the paraula màgica. The needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on your skin. Once the tattoo is on your skin, you can cast its spell, sense que calguin components materials. The tattoo glows faintly while you cast the spell and durant la duració del conjur. Once the spell ends, the tattoo vanishes from your skin.
A spell cast from this tattoo has a modificador de llançament de conjurs of +3, a save DC of 13, and an attack bonus of +5.

item.name: Sphere of Annihilation
entries: This 2-foot-diameter black sphere is a hole in the multiverse, hovering in space and stabilized by a magical field surrounding it.

The sphere obliterates all matter it passes through and all matter that passes through it. Artifacts are the exception. Unless an artifact is susceptible to damage from a sphere of annihilation, it passes through the sphere unscathed. Anything else that touches the sphere but isn't wholly engulfed and obliterated by it takes {@dice 4d10} de dany de força.

The sphere is stationary until someone controls it. If you are within 60 feet of an uncontrolled sphere, pots, com a acció, make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) amb CD 25. On a success, the sphere levitates in one direction of your choice, up to a number of feet equal to 5 × your Intel·ligència modifier (minimum 5 feet). On a failure, the sphere moves 10 feet toward you. A creature whose space the sphere enters ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 13). Si falla, be touched by it, taking {@dice 4d10} de dany de força.

If you attempt to control a sphere that is under another creature's control, you make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) contested by the other creature's Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) check. The winner of the contest gains control of the sphere and can levitate it as normal.

If the sphere comes into contact with a planar portal, such as that created by the {@spell portal} spell, or an extradimensional space, such as that within a {@item portable hole}, el/la/li MM determines randomly what happens, using the following table.

rows: The sphere is destroyed.
The sphere moves through the portal or into the extradimensional space.
A spatial rift sends each creature and object within 180 feet of the sphere, including the sphere, to a random plane of existence.

item.name: Vara d'Aranya
entries: The top of this black, adamantine staff is shaped like a spider. The staff weighs 6 pounds. You must be attuned to the staff to gain its benefits and cast its spells. The staff can be wielded as a quarterstaff. It deals {@dice 1d6} extra poison damage on a hit when used to make a weapon attack.

The staff has 10 charges, which are used to fuel the spells within it. With the staff in hand, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from the staff if the spell is on your class's spell list: {@spell grimpat d'aranya} (1 charge) or {@spell tirarany} (2 charges, spell save DC 15). No components are required.
The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges each day at dusk. If you expend the staff's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff crumbles to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: Spies' Murmur
entries: This headpiece, crafted from dark metal, is worn curved around the ear. If you know a creature wearing another Spies' Murmur and that creature is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate telepathically with each other. Com a acció bonus, you can allow that creature to hear everything you hear durant 1 hora. You can end this effect com a acció bonus, and it ends if you're {@condition incapacitat}.

item.name: Spinel
entries: A transparent red, red-brown, or deep green gemstone.

item.name: Spyglass
entries: Objects viewed through a spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

item.name: Spyglass of Clarividència
entries: At rank 2, your Head Office-supplied spyglass becomes a common magic item. Com a acció, you can look through the spyglass of clarividència at a location within 1 mile of you that is obstructing your view, such as a mountain, castle, or forest. You must then succeed on a DC 15 Saviesa check using {@item eines de cartografia|phb} to map the natural terrain found within three miles of that chosen point. You do not gain any knowledge of creatures, structures, or anything other than natural terrain. This property of the spyglass cannot be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Staff of Adornment
entries: If you place an object weighing no more than 1 pound (such as a shard of crystal, an egg, or a stone) above the tip of the staff while holding it, the object floats an inch from the staff's tip and remains there until it is removed or until the staff is no longer in your possession. The staff can have up to three such objects floating over its tip at any given time. While holding the staff, you can make one or more of the objects slowly spin or turn in place.

item.name: Staff of Birdcalls
entries: This wooden staff is decorated with bird carvings. It has 10 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge from the staff and cause it to create one of the following sounds out to a range of 60 feet: a finch's chirp, a raven's caw, a duck's quack, a chicken's cluck, a goose's honk, a loon's call, a turkey's gobble, a seagull's cry, an owl's hoot, or an eagle's shriek.

The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff explodes in a harmless cloud of bird feathers and is lost forever.

item.name: Staff of Charming
item.reqAttune: by a bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: While holding this staff, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its 10 charges to cast {@spell fascinar persona}, {@spell command}, o {@spell comprendre idiomes} from it using your spell save DC. The staff can also be used as a magic quarterstaff.

If you are holding the staff and fail a saving throw against an enchantment spell that targets only you, you can turn your failed save into a successful one. You can't use this property of the staff again until the next dawn. If you succeed on a save against an enchantment spell that targets only you, with or without the staff's intervention, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge from the staff and turn the spell back on its caster as if you had cast the spell.
The staff regains {@dice 1d8 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

item.name: Staff of Defense
entries: This slender, hollow staff is made of glass yet is as strong as oak. It weighs 3 pounds. You must be attuned to the staff to gain its benefits and cast its spells.
While holding the staff, you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class.

The staff has 10 charges, which are used to fuel the spells within it. With the staff in hand, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from the staff if the spell is on your class's spell list: {@spell armadura de mag} (1 charge) or {@spell escut} (2 charges). No components are required.
The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges each day at dawn. If you expend the staff's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff shatters and is destroyed.

item.name: Staff of Dunamancy
entries: This staff of polished gray wood bears numerous runes carved along its length. The staff has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff turns into dust and is destroyed.

While holding the staff, pots, com a acció, expend 2 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spell attack bonus: {@spell afavorir la fortuna|egw} (2 charges), {@spell ona de pulsacions|egw} (3 charges), or {@spell esvoranc de gravetat|egw} (4 charges).

entries.name: New Possibility
entries: If you are holding the staff and fail a saving throw against a spell that targets only you, you can turn your failed save into a successful one. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Staff of Fate
entries: This transparent crystal staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci.

entries.name: Altered Outcome
entries: The staff té 6 càrregues. Com a acció bonus, you can expend 1 of the staff's charges to give yourself or one other creature that you can see a {@dice d4}. The recipient can roll this {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, damage roll, or saving throw it makes abans de l'inici del teu proper torn. If this extra die is not used before then, it is lost.

If you expend the staff's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 9 or lower, the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff that breaks the first time it scores a hit and deals damage. On a roll of 10 or higher, the staff regains {@dice 1d6} of its expended charges.

item.name: Staff of Fire
item.reqAttune: by a druid, sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: Tens resistència al dany de foc while you hold this staff.

The staff té 10 càrregues. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell mans ardents} (1 charge), {@spell bola de foc} (3 charges), or {@spell paret de foc} (4 charges).
The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff blackens, crumbles into cinders, and is destroyed.

item.name: Staff of Flowers
entries: This wooden staff has 10 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge from the staff and cause a flower to sprout from a patch of earth or soil within 5 feet of you, or from the staff itself. Unless you choose a specific kind of flower, the staff creates a mildscented daisy. The flower is harmless and nonmagical, and it grows or withers as a normal flower would. The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff turns into flower petals and is lost forever.

item.name: Staff of Frost
item.reqAttune: by a druid, sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: Tens resistència al dany de fred while you hold this staff.

The staff té 10 càrregues. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell con de fred} (5 charges), {@spell núvol de boira} (1 charge), {@spell tempesta de gel} (4 charges), or {@spell paret de glaç} (4 charges).
The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1. the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

item.name: Staff of Healing
item.reqAttune: by a bard, cleric, or druida
entries: This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and modificador de llançament de conjurs: {@spell curar ferides} (1 charge per spell level, up to 4th), {@spell restabliment menor} (2 charges). or {@spell curar ferides massiu} (5 charges).
The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1. the staff vanishes in a flash of light, lost forever.

item.name: Staff of Power
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. While holding it, tens +2 a la CA, saving throws, and spell attack rolls.

The staff has 20 charges for the following properties. The staff regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff retains its +2 bonus to attack and damage roll but loses all other properties. On a 20, the staff regain {@dice 1d8 + 2} charges.

entries.name: Power Strike
entries: When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany de força to the target.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While holding this staff, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spell attack bonus: {@spell con de fred} (5 charges), {@spell bola de foc} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell globus d'invulnerabilitat} (6 charges), {@spell immobilitzar criatura} (5 charges), {@spell levitar} (2 charges). {@spell llampec} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell missil màgic} (1 charge), {@spell raig d'afebliment} (1 charge), or {@spell paret de força} (5 charges).

entries.name: Retributive Strike
entries: Pots, com a acció, break the staff over your knee or against a solid surface, performing a retributive strike. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it.

You have a {@chance 50} chance to instantly travel to a random plane of existence, avoiding the explosion. If you fail to avoid the effect, you take force damage equal to 16 × the number of charges in the staff. Every other creature in the area ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 17). Qui falli rep an amount of damage based on how far away it is from the point of origin, as shown in the following table. Qui superi en rep la meitat.

rows: 10 peus away or closer
8 × the number of charges in the staff
11 to 20 peus away
6 × the number of charges in the staff
21 to 30 peus away
4 × the number of charges in the staff

item.name: Staff of Striking
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci.

The staff té 10 càrregues. When you hit with a melee attack using it, you can expend up to 3 of its charges. For each charge you expend, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany de força. The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

item.name: Staff of Swarming Insects
item.reqAttune: by a bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: This staff has 10 charges and regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, a {@creature swarm of insects} consumes and destroys the staff, then disperses.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While holding the staff, pots, com a acció, expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell insecte gegant} (4 charges) or {@spell plaga d'insectes} (5 charges).

entries.name: Insect Cloud
entries: While holding the staff, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cause a swarm of harmless flying insects to spread out in a 30-foot radius from you. The insects remain durant 10 minuts, making the area heavily obscured for creatures other than you. The swarm moves with you, remaining centered on you. A wind of at least 10 miles per hour disperses the swarm and ends the effect.

item.name: Staff of the Adder
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or bruixot
entries: Pots, com a acció bonus, speak this staff's paraula màgica and make the head of the staff become that of an animate poisonous snake durant 1 minut. By using another bonus action to speak the paraula màgica again, you return the staff to its normal inanimate form.

You can make a melee attack using the snake head, which has a reach of 5 feet. el teu bonus de competència applies to the attack roll. Si impacta, l'objectiu rep {@dice 1d6} de dany perforant and ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, rep {@dice 3d6} de dany de verí.

The snake head can be attacked while it is animate. It has an Armor Class of 15 and 20 hit points. If the head es queda a 0 punts de vida, the staff is destroyed. As long as it's not destroyed, the staff regains all lost hit points when it reverts to its inanimate form.

item.name: Staff of the Forgotten One
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: This crooked staff is carved from bone and topped with the skull of a forgotten {@creature archmage} whom {@creature Acererak|ToA} destroyed long ago. Etched into the skull's forehead is {@creature acererak|ToA|Acererak's} rune, which is known on many worlds as a sign of death.

entries.name: Beneficial Properties
entries: While the staff is on your person, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: el teu bonus de competència to Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) and Intel·ligència ({@skill Història}) checks is doubled.
You can't be {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition petrificat}, o {@condition atordit}.
Undead with a challenge rating of 2 or lower will neither threaten nor attack you unless you harm them.
You can wield the staff as a +3 quarterstaff that deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) de dany necròtic on a hit.

entries.name: Invoke Curse
entries: The Staff of the Forgotten One has 7 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn. While holding the staff, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge and target una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució (using your spell save DC) or be cursed. While cursed in this way, the target can't regain hit points and has vulnerability to necrotic damage. A {@spell restabliment superior}, {@spell anul·lar maledicció}, or similar spell ends the curse on the target.

entries.name: The Forgotten One
entries: The bodiless life force of a dead {@creature archmage} empowers the staff and is imprisoned within it. The rune carved into the staff's skull protects {@creature Acererak|ToA} from this spirit's vengeance. Each time a creature other than {@creature Acererak|ToA} expends any of the staff's charges, there is a {@chance 50} chance that the life force tries to possess the staff wielder. The wielder ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 20). Si falla, be possessed, becoming an NPC under el/la/li MM's control. If the intruding life force is targeted by magic such as a {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell, it becomes trapped in the staff once more. Once it takes control of another creature, the insane spirit of the dead {@creature archmage} attempts to destroy the staff.

entries.name: Destroying the Staff
entries: A creature in possession of the staff can use an action to break it over one knee or a solid surface. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 18), taking 132 ({@dice 24d10}) de dany de força; si supera, en rep la meitat. When the staff is destroyed, the life force of the Forgotten One is released to the afterlife. Where it goes is anyone's guess.

item.name: Staff of the Ivory Claw
entries: This gray-and-cerulean staff is topped with a small dragon claw carved from ivory. While holding the staff, Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls. Whenever you score a critical hit with a spell attack, the target rep {@damage 3d6} de dany radiant extra.

item.name: Staff of the Magi
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or mag
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. While you hold it, Tens un +2 a spell attack rolls.

The staff has 50 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 4d6 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20, the staff regains {@dice 1d12 + 1} charges.

entries.name: Spell Absorption
entries: While holding the staff, tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against spells. A més, you can use your reaction quan una altra criatura casts a spell that targets only you. If you do, the staff absorbs the magic of the spell, canceling its effect and gaining a number of charges equal to the absorbed spell's level. However, if doing so brings the staff's total number of charges above 50, the staff explodes as if you activated its retributive strike (see below).

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While holding the staff, pots, com a acció, expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and habilitat de llançament de conjurs: {@spell convocar elemental} (7 charges), {@spell dissipar màgia} (3 charges), {@spell bola de foc} (7th-level version, 7 charges), {@spell esfera de flames} (2 charges), {@spell tempesta de gel} (4 charges), {@spell invisibilitat} (2 charges), {@spell picaporta} (2 charges), {@spell llampec} (7th-level version, 7 charges), {@spell passaparets} (5 charges), {@spell saltar de pla} (7 charges), {@spell Telequinesi} (5 charges), {@spell paret de foc} (4 charges), or {@spell tirarany} (2 charges).

You can also use an action to cast one of the following spells from the staff without using any charges: {@spell pany arcà}, {@spell detectar màgia}, {@spell engrandir/enxiquir}, {@spell llum}, {@spell mà de mag}, o {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}.

entries.name: Retributive Strike
entries: Pots, com a acció, break the staff over your knee or against a solid surface, performing a retributive strike. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it.

You have a {@chance 50} chance to instantly travel to a random plane of existence, avoiding the explosion. If you fail to avoid the effect, you take force damage equal to 16 × the number of charges in the staff. Every other creature in the area ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 17). Qui falli rep an amount of damage based on how far away it is from the point of origin, as shown in the following table. Qui superi en rep la meitat.

rows: 10 peus away or closer
8 × the number of charges in the staff
11 to 20 peus away
6 × the number of charges in the staff
21 to 30 peus away
4 × the number of charges in the staff

attachedSpells: protegir del bé i del mal

item.name: Staff of the Python
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or bruixot
entries: Pots, com a acció, speak this staff's paraula màgica and throw the staff on the ground within 10 feet of you. The staff becomes a {@creature giant constrictor snake} under your control and acts on its own initiative count. By using a bonus action to speak the paraula màgica again, you return the staff to its normal form in a space formerly occupied by the snake.

En el teu torn, you can mentally command the snake if it is within 60 feet of you and you aren't {@condition incapacitat}. You decide what action the snake takes and where it moves during its next turn, or you can issue it a general command, such as to attack your enemies or guard a location.

If the snake es queda a 0 punts de vida, it dies and reverts to its staff form. The staff then shatters and is destroyed. If the snake reverts to staff form before losing all its hit points, it regains all of them.

item.name: Staff of the Woodlands
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. While holding it, you have a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls.

The staff has 10 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff loses its properties and becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: Pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of the staff's charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell amistat animal} (1 charge), {@spell obrir els ulls} (5 charges), {@spell pell d'escorça} (2 charges), {@spell localitzar plantes o animals} (2 charges), {@spell parlar animal} (1 charge), {@spell parla vegetal} (3 charges), or {@spell paret d'espines} (6 charges).
You can also use an action to cast the {@spell passar desapercebudament} spell from the staff without using any charges.

entries.name: Tree Form
entries: Pots, com a acció, plant one end of the staff in fertile earth and expend 1 charge to transform the staff into a healthy tree. The tree is 60 feet tall and has a 5-foot-diameter trunk, and its branches at the top spread out in a 20-foot radius. The tree appears ordinary but radiates a faint aura of transmutation magic if targeted by {@spell detectar màgia}. While touching the tree and using another action to speak its paraula màgica, you return the staff to its normal form. Any creature in the tree falls when it reverts to a staff.

item.name: Staff of Thunder and Lightning
entries: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. It also has the following additional properties. When one of these properties is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Elèctric
entries: When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can cause the target to take an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany elèctric.

entries.name: Tro
entries: When you hit with a melee attack using the staff, you can cause the staff to emit a crack of thunder, audible out to 300 feet. The target you hit ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17). Si falla, esdevé {@condition atordit} fins el final del teu proper torn.

entries.name: Llança de Llamp
entries: Pots, com a acció, cause a bolt of lightning to leap from the staff's tip in a line that is 5 feet wide and 120 feet long. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 17), taking {@dice 9d6} de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

entries.name: Esclat de Tro
entries: Pots, com a acció, cause the staff to issue a deafening Esclat de Tro, audible out to 600 feet. Each creature within 60 feet of you (not including you) ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17). Qui falli rep {@dice 2d6} de dany de tro and becomes {@condition eixordat} durant 1 minut. Qui superi takes half damage i no està {@condition eixordat}.

entries.name: Thunder and Lightning
entries: Pots, com a acció, use the Llança de Llamp and Esclat de Tro properties at the same time. Doing so doesn't expend the daily use of those properties, only the use of this one.

item.name: Staff of Withering
item.reqAttune: by a cleric, druid, or bruixot
entries: This staff has 3 charges and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff. Si impacta, it deals damage as a normal quarterstaff, and you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra {@dice 2d10} de dany necròtic to the target. A més, the target ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, have disadvantage durant 1 hora on any ability check or saving throw that uses Força or Constitució.

item.name: Star rose quartz
entries: A translucent rosy stone with white star-shaped center gemstone.

item.name: Star Ruby
entries: A translucent ruby with white star-shaped center gemstone.

item.name: Star Sapphire
entries: A translucent blue sapphire with white star-shaped center gemstone.

item.name: Statuette of Saint Markovia
entries: This golden statuette grants any good-aligned creature that carries it a +1 bonus to saving throws.

item.name: Stone of Controlling Earth Elementals
entries: If the stone is touching the ground, pots, com a acció, speak its paraula màgica and summon an {@creature earth elemental}, as if you had cast the {@spell convocar elemental} spell. The stone no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba. The stone weighs 5 pounds.

item.name: Stone of Golorr
entries: The Stone of Golorr is a glossy, greenish-gray stone that fits in the palm of your hand. The stone is actually an {@creature aboleth} named Golorr, transformed by magic into an object.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Stone of Golorr has the following properties, determined by rolling on the tables in the "Artifacts" section in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}

entries.name: Recordar Llegendes
entries: The Stone of Golorr has 3 charges and recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba. While holding the stone, you can expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell recordar llegendes} spell.

By using the stone to cast recordar llegendes, you communicate directly with the {@creature aboleth}, and it shares its knowledge with you. The aboleth can't lie to you, but the information it provides is often cryptic or vague.

The aboleth knows where Lord Neverember's secret vault is located. It also knows that three keys are needed to open the vault and that a gold dragon named Aurinax inhabits the vault and guards its treasures.

entries.name: Failed Memory
entries: When your attunement to the Stone of Golorr ends, you ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 16). Si falla, you lose all memory of the stone being in your possession and all knowledge imparted by it. A {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell cast on you has a {@chance 20} chance of restoring the lost knowledge and memories, and a {@spell restabliment superior} spell does so automatically.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Stone of Golorr is a sentient lawful evil magic item with an Intel·ligència of 18, a Saviesa of 15, and a Carisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet. It can communicate telepathically with the creature that is attuned to it, as long as that creature understands at least one language. A més, the {@creature aboleth} learns the greatest desires of any creature that communicates telepathically with the stone.

The Stone of Golorr hungers for information and prefers not to remain in the clutches of any creature for too long. Whenever the stone desires a new owner, it demands to be given to another intelligent creature as quickly as possible. If its demands are ignored, it tries to take control of its owner (see "Sentient Magic Items" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).

entries.name: Personality
entries: The Stone of Golorr has an alien intellect that is both domineering and hungry for knowledge. It thinks of itself as an ageless and immortal god.

entries.name: Destroying the Stone
entries: While in stone form, the {@creature aboleth} isn't a creature and isn't subject to effects that target creatures. The Stone of Golorr is immune to all damage. Casting an {@spell antipatia/simpatia} spell on the stone destroys it if the antipathy effect is selected and the spell is directed to repel aberrations. When the spell is cast in this way, the stone transforms into mucus and is destroyed, and Golorr the aboleth apareix en un espai desocupat within 30 feet of the stone's remains. The aboleth is incensed by the stone's destruction, and it attacks all other creatures it can see.

item.name: Stone of Good Luck
entries: While this polished agate is on your person, Tens un +1 a ability checks and saving throws.

item.name: Stone of Ill Luck
entries: This polished agate appears to be a {@item stone of good luck} to anyone who tries to {@spell identificar} it, and it confers that item's property while on your person.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This item is cursed. While it is on your person, you take a -2 penalty to ability checks and saving throws. Until the curse is discovered, el/la/li MM secretly applies this penalty, assuming you are adding the item's bonus. You are unwilling to part with the stone until the curse is broken with {@spell anul·lar maledicció} or similar magic.

item.name: Stonespeaker Crystal
entries: Created by the stone giant librarians of Gravenhollow, this nineteen-inch-long shard of quartz grants you advantage on Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) checks while it is on your person.

The crystal té 10 càrregues. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell parlar animal} (2 charges), {@spell parlar amb els morts} (4 charges), or {@spell parla vegetal} (3 charges).

When you cast a {@filter endevinació|spells|school=D} spell, you can use the crystal in place of one material component that would normally be consumed by the spell, at a cost of 1 charge per level of the spell. The crystal is not consumed when used in this way.
The crystal regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the crystal's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the crystal vanishes, lost forever.

item.name: Stonky's anell
entries: Mentre vesteixis el ring, you can cast the {@spell Telequinesi} spell at will, but you can target only objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint.
Any character who attunes to the ring gains control of Stonky's creations, though the {@creature skitterwidget|cm|skitterwidgets} ignore commands spoken more than 30 feet away from them.

item.name: Storm Boomerang
entries: This boomerang is a ranged weapon carved from {@creature griffon} bone and etched with the symbol of elemental air. When thrown, it has a range of 60/120 feet, and any creature that is proficient with the javelin is also proficient with this weapon. Si impacta, the boomerang deals {@dice 1d4} de dany contundent and {@dice 3d4} de dany de tro, and the target ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 10). Si falla, està {@condition atordit} fins el final del seu proper torn. On a miss, the boomerang returns to the thrower's hand.

Once the boomerang deals thunder damage to a target, the weapon loses its ability to deal thunder damage and its ability to stun a target. These properties return after the boomerang spends at least 1 hour inside an elemental air node.

item.name: Stormgirdle
entries: A Stormgirdle is a wide belt made of thick leather branded with the symbol of Kord. The girdle's clasps are made from dragon ivory.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While wearing the Stormgirdle in its dormant state, tens resistència al dany elèctric damage and thunder, and your Força score becomes 21 if it isn't already 21 or higher. A més, pots, com a acció, become a Storm Avatar for 1 minute, i reps els beneficis següents for the duration:

items: You have immunity to lightning damage and thunder damage.

When you hit with a weapon attack that normally deals dany contundent, it deals thunder damage instead. When you hit with a weapon attack that normally deals piercing or slashing damage, it deals lightning damage instead.

Com a acció bonus, you can choose una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast to be struck by lightning. The target ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, rep {@damage 3d6} de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

entries: Once you use the girdle's Storm Avatar property, that property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: While wearing the Stormgirdle in its awakened state, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Your Força score becomes 23 if it isn't already 23 or higher.
Your Storm Avatar's llança de llamp deals {@damage 4d6} de dany elèctric (instead of {@dice 3d6}).
While transformed into a Storm Avatar, obtens una velocitat de vol de 30 peus and can hover.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: While wearing the Stormgirdle in its exalted state, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Your Força score becomes 25 if it isn't already 25 or higher.
Your Storm Avatar's llança de llamp deals {@damage 5d6} de dany elèctric (instead of {@dice 3d6}).
You can cast the {@spell controlar el temps} spell from the girdle. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Sun
entries: Platinum coin, twice as large as a {@item nib|wdh} (1 sun = 1,000 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Sun amulet on a beaded chain (Imperi del Sol)
Sun Blade
entries: This item appears to be a longsword hilt. While grasping the hilt, pots, com a acció bonus, cause a blade of pure radiance to spring into existence, or make the blade disappear. While the blade exists, this magic longsword has the finesse property. If you are proficient with {@item espasa curta|phb|shortswords} or {@item espasa llarga|phb|longswords}, you are proficient with the sun blade.

Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with it, that target takes an extra {@dice 1d8} de dany radiant.

The sword's luminous blade emits llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals. The light is sunlight. While the blade persists, pots, com a acció, expand or reduce its radius of bright and dim light by 5 feet each, to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.

item.name: Sunforger
entries: Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

Com a acció, you can hurl the weapon fins a 120 peus to a point you can see. When it reaches that point, the weapon vanishes in an explosion, and tota criatura en una esfera de 20 peus de radi centrada en aquell punt ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15), taking {@dice 6d6} de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. Afterward, pots, com a acció, cause the weapon to reappear in your empty hand. You can't cause it to explode again until you finish a short or long rest.
If you don't call the weapon back to your hand, it reappears at the point where it exploded when you are no longer attuned to it or when 24 hours have passed.

item.name: Sunsword
entries: The Sunsword is a unique blade once possessed by Strahd's brother, Sergei von Zarovich. In its original form, it had a platinum hilt and guard, and a thin crystal blade as strong as steel.

Strahd employed a powerful wizard named Khazan to destroy the weapon after Sergei's death. The first part of the process required the hilt and the blade to be separated, which Khazan accomplished. While Khazan was busying himself destroying the blade, his apprentice stole the hilt and fled. Khazan later located his apprentice's mutilated corpse in the Svalich Woods, but the hilt was nowhere to be found. To avoid the vampire's wrath, Khazan told Strahd that the entire weapon had been destroyed.
The hilt, which is sentient, knows that it can never be reunited with its original crystal blade. It has, however, gained the properties of a {@item sun blade}:

items: Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with it, that target takes an extra {@dice 1d8} de dany radiant.

The sword's luminous blade emits llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals. The light is sunlight. While the blade persists, pots, com a acció, expand or reduce its radius of bright and dim light by 5 feet each, to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Sunsword is a sentient chaotic good weapon with an Intel·ligència of 11, a Saviesa of 17, and a Carisma of 16. It has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 60 feet. The weapon communicates by transmitting emotions to the creature carrying it or wielding it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: The Sunsword's special purpose is to destroy Strahd, not so much because it wants to free the land of Barovia from evil but because it wants revenge for the loss of its crystal blade. The weapon secretly fears its own destruction.

item.name: Survival Mantle
entries: This carapace-like augmentation encases portions of the wearer's shoulders, neck, and chest. A survival mantle is equivalent to a suit of nonmagical mitja armadura de plaques and takes just as long to don or doff. It can't be worn with other kinds of armor.

A creature wearing a survival mantle can breathe normally in any environment (including a vacuum) and has advantage on saving throws against harmful gases (such as those created by a {@spell matanúvol} spell, a {@spell núvol fètid} spell, inhaled poisons, and the breath weapons of some dragons).

item.name: Sword of Answering (Answerer)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Answerer, the Chaotic Good sword, has an emerald set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Back Talker)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Back Talker, the Chaotic Evil sword, has jet set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Concluder)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Concluder, the Lawful Neutral sword, has an amatista set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Last Quip)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Last Quip, the Chaotic Neutral sword, has a tourmaline set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Rebutter)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Rebutter, the Neutral Good sword, has a topazi set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Replier)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Replier, the Neutral sword, has a peridot set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Retorter)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Retorter, the Lawful Good sword, has an aquamarine set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Scather)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Scather, the Lawful Evil sword, has a garnet set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Answering (Squelcher)
entries: In the world of Greyhawk, only nine of these blades are known to exist. Each is patterned after the legendary sword Fragarach, which is variously translated as "Final Word." Each of the nine swords has its own name and alignment, and each bears a different gem in its pommel.
Squelcher, the Neutral Evil sword, has a spinel set in its pommel.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this sword. A més, while you hold the sword, you can use your reaction to make one melee attack with it against any creature in your reach that deals damage to you. Tens avantatge a tirades de the attack roll, and any damage dealt with this special attack ignores any damage immunity or resistance the target has.

item.name: Sword of Kas
entries: When Vecna grew in power, he appointed an evil and ruthless lieutenant, Kas the Bloody Handed, to act as his bodyguard and right hand. This despicable villain served as advisor, warlord, and assassin. His successes earned him Vecna's admiration and a reward: a sword with as dark a pedigree as the man who would wield it.

For a long time, Kas faithfully served the {@creature lich} but as Kas's power grew, so did his hubris. His sword urged him to supplant Vecna, so that they could rule the {@creature lich||lich's} empire in Vecna's stead. Legend says Vecna's destruction came at Kas's hand, but Vecna also wrought his rebellious lieutenant's doom, leaving only Kas's sword behind. The world was made brighter thereby.

The Sword of Kas is a magic, sentient longsword that grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. It scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20, and deals an extra {@dice 2d10} de dany tallant to undead.

If the sword isn't bathed in blood within 1 minute of being drawn from its scabbard, its wielder ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 15). Si supera, the wielder takes {@dice 3d6} de dany psíquic. Si falla, the wielder is dominated by the sword, as if by the {@spell dominar criatura} spell, and the sword demands that it be bathed in blood. The spell effect ends when the sword's demand is met.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Sword of Kas has the following random properties:

items: 1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental property}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}

entries.name: Spirit of Kas
entries: While the sword is on your person, you add a {@dice d10} to your initiative at the start of every combat. A més, when you use an action to attack with the sword, you can transfer some or all of its attack bonus to your Armor Class instead. The adjusted bonuses remain in effect fins el final del teu proper torn.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While the sword is on your person, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells (save 18) from it: {@spell invocar llamps}, {@spell mot diví}, o {@spell dit de la mort}. Once you use the sword to cast a spell, you can't cast that spell again from it until the next dawn.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Sword of Kas is a sentient chaotic evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 15, a Saviesa of 13, and a Carisma of 16. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Common

entries.name: Personality
entries: The sword's purpose is to bring ruin to Vecna. Killing Vecna's worshipers, destroying the {@creature lich||lich's} works, and foiling his machinations all help to fulfill this goal.
The Sword of Kas also seeks to destroy anyone corrupted by the Eye and {@item Hand of Vecna}. The sword's obsession with those artifacts eventually becomes a fixation for its wielder.

entries.name: Destroying the Sword
entries: A creature attuned to both the {@item Eye of Vecna} and the {@item Hand of Vecna} can use the wish property of those combined artifacts to unmake the Sword of Kas. The creature must cast the {@spell desig} spell and make a Carisma check contested by the Carisma check of the sword. The sword must be within 30 feet of the creature, or the spell fails. If the sword wins the contest, nothing happens, and the {@spell desig} spell is wasted. If the sword loses the contest, it is destroyed.

item.name: Sword of the Paruns
entries: Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. Additionally, un cop a cada torn teu, you can use one of the following properties if you're holding the sword:

items: Immediately after you use the {@action Atac} action to attack with the sword, you can enable one creature within 60 feet of you to use its reaction to make one weapon attack.
Immediately after you take the {@action Córrer} action, you can enable one creature within 60 feet of you to use its reaction to move up to its speed.
Immediately after you take the {@action Esquivar} action, you can enable one creature within 60 feet of you to use its reaction to gain the benefits of the Dodge action.

item.name: Sword of Zariel
item.reqAttune: by a creature the sword deems worthy
entries: This longsword belonged to the angel Zariel before her fall from grace. Fashioned from celestial steel, it gives off a faint glow and hum. The weapon chooses who can attune to it and who can't. It desires a wielder who embodies bravery and heroism.

entries.name: Harmonització
entries: The sword allows you to attune to it immediately, without having to take a short rest. The first time you attune to the sword, you are transformed into a heavenly, idealized version of yourself, blessed with otherworldly beauty and a touch of heaven in your heart. Neither magic nor intervenció divina can reverse this transformation. Your alignment becomes lawful good, and you gain the following traits:

items.name: Angelic Language
items.entry: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Celestial.

items.name: Celestial Resistència
items.entry: Tens resistència al dany necrotic and radiant.

items.name: Divine Presence
items.entry: Your Carisma score becomes 20, unless it is already 20 or higher.

items.name: Feathered Wings
items.entry: You sprout a beautiful pair of feathered wings that grant you una velocitat de vol de 90 peus and the ability to hover. If you already have a different kind of wings, these new wings replace the old ones, which fall off.

items.name: Truesight
items.entry: Your eyes become luminous pools of silver. You can see in normal and magical darkness, see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects, automatically detect visual illusions and succeed on saving throws against them, perceive the original form of a shapechanger or a creature that is transformed by magic, and see into the Pla Etèri, all within a range of 60 feet.

items.name: New Personality
entries: You gain new personality traits, determined by rolling once on each of the following tables. These traits override any conflicting personality trait, ideal, bond, or flaw.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: I treat all beings, even enemies, with respect.
I won't tell a lie.
I enjoy sharing my philosophical worldview and experiences with others.
I cut right to the chase in every conversation.
I often quote (or misquote) religious texts.
I anger quickly when I witness cruelty or injustice.
My praise and trust are earned and never given freely.
I like everything clean and organized.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: Charity. I always help those in need. (Good)
Faith. I choose to follow the tenets of a particular lawful good deity to the letter. (Lawful)
Responsibility. It is the duty of the strong to protect the weak. (Lawful)
Respect. All people deserve to be treated with dignity. (Good)
Honor. The way I conduct myself determines my reward in the afterlife. (Lawful)
Redemption. All creatures are capable of change for the better. (Good)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: I have a favorite religious hymn that I constantly hum.
I must keep a written record of my beliefs and the sins that I witness. When finished, this book will be my gift to the multiverse.
I have cherished memories of Idyllglen, though I've only seen this bucolic town in dreams.
I would die for those who fight beside me, regardless of their faults.
I seek to honor the angel Zariel by destroying diastres and other evildoers wherever I find them.
The Sword of Zariel has chosen me. I shall not fail to wield it justly.

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: I am too quick to judge others.
I offer forgiveness too readily.
I will sacrifice innocent lives for the greater good.
Flaw? What flaw? I am flawless. Utter perfection!
I allow nothing to stand in the way of my crusade to eradicate evil from the multiverse.
I ignore those who do not support my plans, for my calling is higher than all others.

entries.name: Holy Light
entries: The sword desprèn llum forta en un radi de 5 peus i llum tènue uns 5 peus adicionals. Diastres find the sword's light disconcerting and painful, even if they can't see it, and have disadvantage on attack rolls made within the weapon's radius of bright light.
Com a acció bonus, you can intensify the sword's light, causing it to shed llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals, or reduce its glow to its normal intensity.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The sword has 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}.

entries.name: Searing Radiance
entries: The sword deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) de dany radiant to any creature it hits, o 16 ({@dice 3d10}) de dany radiant if you're wielding the weapon with two hands. An evil creature that takes this radiant damage ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17). Si falla, està {@condition encegat} fins el final del seu proper torn.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Sword of Zariel is a sentient, lawful good item with an Intel·ligència of 10, a Saviesa of 20, and a Carisma of 18. It has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 30 feet.
The sword communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it.

entries.name: Truth Seer
entries: While holding the sword, you gain advantage on all Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}) checks.

entries.name: Destroying the Sword
entries: Zariel can destroy the sword simply by grasping it. She couldn't bring herself to do so when she was an angel, but as an archdevil she has no compunction about ridding the multiverse of the weapon. The sword is also destroyed if it's used to shatter the Companion (see "{@adventure Shattering the Companion|bgdia|8|shattering the companion}"), unless the blade is wielded by an angel amb un valor de repte de 15 o superior, or a good-aligned cleric or paladin of at least 10th level.
If Zariel is killed for good (that is, if she dies in els Nou Inferns), the sword becomes no harder to destroy than a normal longsword.

item.name: Talisman of Pure Good
item.reqAttune: by a creature of good alignment
entries: This talisman is a mighty symbol of goodness. A creature that is neither good nor evil in alignment takes {@dice 6d6} de dany radiant upon touching the talisman. An evil creature takes {@dice 8d6} de dany radiant upon touching the talisman. Either sort of creature takes the damage again each time it ends its turn holding or carrying the talisman.
If you are a good cleric or paladin, you can use the talisman as a holy symbol, and Tens un +2 a spell attack rolls while you wear or hold it.

The talisman té 7 càrregues. If you are wearing or holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge from it and choose one creature you can see on the ground within 120 feet of you. If the target is of evil alignment, a flaming fissure opens under it. The target ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 20). Si falla, fall into the fissure and be destroyed, leaving no remains. The fissure then closes, leaving no trace of its existence. When you expend the last charge, the talisman disperses into motes of golden light and is destroyed.

item.name: Talisman of the Sphere
entries: Quan fas una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Arcana}) to control a {@item sphere of annihilation} while you are holding this talisman, you double el teu bonus de competència on the check. A més, when you start your turn with control over a {@item sphere of annihilation}, pots, com a acció, levitate it 10 feet plus a number of additional feet equal to 10 × your Intel·ligència modifier.

item.name: Talisman of Ultimate Evil
item.reqAttune: by a creature of evil alignment
entries: This item symbolizes unrepentant evil. A creature that is neither good nor evil in alignment takes {@dice 6d6} de dany necròtic upon touching the talisman. A good creature takes {@dice 8d6} de dany necròtic upon touching the talisman. Either sort of creature takes the damage again each time it ends its turn holding or carrying the talisman.
If you are an evil cleric or paladin, you can use the talisman as a holy symbol, and Tens un +2 a spell attack rolls while you wear or hold it.

The talisman té 6 càrregues. If you are wearing or holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge from the talisman and choose one creature you can see on the ground within 120 feet of you. If the target is of good alignment, a flaming fissure opens under it. The target ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 20). Si falla, fall into the fissure and be destroyed, leaving no remains. The fissure then closes, leaving no trace of its existence. When you expend the last charge, the talisman dissolves into foul-smelling slime and is destroyed.

item.name: Talking Doll
entries: While this stuffed doll is within 5 feet of you, you can spend a short rest telling it to say up to six phrases, none of which can be more than six words long, and set an observable condition under which the doll speaks each phrase. You can also replace old phrases with new ones. Whatever the condition, it must occur within 5 feet of the doll to make it speak. For example, whenever someone picks up the doll, it might say, "I want a piece of candy." The doll's phrases are lost when your attunement to the doll ends.

item.name: Tangler Grenade
entries: A tangler grenade is an alchemical, nonmagical item with an ovoid resin shell that shatters on impact. An as action, a creature can throw a tangler grenade at a point fins a 60 peus away. Each creature within 10 feet of a shattered tangler grenade ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 15). Si falla, està {@condition restrained} by sticky white webs. Com a acció, a creature can try to free itself or another creature within its reach from the webs, doing so with a successful DC 20 Força ({@skill Atletisme}) check. A gallon of alcohol dissolves the webs produced by a single tangler grenade. Otherwise, the webs dissolve on their own passada 1 hora, freeing any creatures {@condition restrained} by them.

item.name: Tankard
entries: A tankard holds 1 pint of liquid.

item.name: Tankard of Plenty
entries: This golden stein is decorated with dancing nans and grain patterns. Speaking the paraula màgica ("Illefarn") while grasping the handle fills the tankard with three pints of rich dwarven ale. This power can be used up to three times per day.

item.name: Tankard of Sobriety
entries: This tankard has a stern face sculpted into one side. You can drink ale, wine, or any other nonmagical alcoholic beverage poured into it without becoming inebriated. The tankard has no effect on magical liquids or harmful substances such as poison.

item.name: Tantan
entries: A tambourine, a popular instrument with halflings and humans south of the Dalelands.

item.name: Taol
entries: Brass coin, about two inches square with a hold large enough for a {@item nib|wdh} to fit in (1 taol = 200 {@item nib|wdh|nibs})

item.name: Tearulai
entries: The longsword, Tearulai, is a sentient, neutral good {@item sword of sharpness} with an emerald-colored blade and precious gemstones embedded in its hilt and pommel. The sword's magical properties are suppressed until it is removed from Valdemar's skull.

Evil creatures can't attune to Tearulai; any evil creature that tries to do so takes 20 psychic damage. The weapon's emerald blade can't be damaged or dulled, and the sword can't be teleported anywhere without its wielder while the two are attuned to one another.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: The sword has 6 charges and regains {@dice 1d4 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. A creature attuned to the sword can use an action and expend 1 or more charges to cast one of the following spells from it without material components: {@spell volar} (2 charges), {@spell polimorfia} (3 charges), or {@spell teleportació floral} (4 charges).

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The sword has an Intel·ligència of 17, a Saviesa of 12, and a Carisma of 20. It has hearing and {@sense truesight} out to a range of 120 feet. It communicates telepathically with its attuned wielder and can speak, read, and understand Common, Dracònic, Èlfic, and Silvà. A més, the sword can ascertain the true value of any gemstone brought within 5 feet of it.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Tearulai admires great beauty, music, fine art, and poetry. Vain, the weapon strives to improve its appearance. It craves gemstones and seeks out better ones with which to adorn itself.
