A tiny gnome-crafted music box that plays a song you dimly remember from your childhood
A small wooden statuette of a smug halfling
A brass orb etched with strange runes
A multicolored stone disk
A tiny silver icon of a raven
A bag containing forty-seven humanoid teeth, one of which is rotten
A shard of obsidian that always feels warm to the touch
A dragon's bony talon hanging from a plain leather necklace
A pair of old socks
A blank book whose pages refuse to hold ink, chalk, graphite, or any other substance or marking
A silver badge in the shape of a five-pointed star
A knife that belonged to a relative
A glass vial filled with nail clippings
A rectangular metal device with two tiny metal cups on one end that throws sparks when wet
A white, sequined glove sized for a human
A vest with one hundred tiny pockets
A small, weightless stone block
A tiny sketch portrait of a goblin
An empty glass vial that smells of perfume when opened
A gemstone that looks like a lump of coal when examined by anyone but you
A scrap of cloth from an old banner
A rank insignia from a lost legionnaire
A tiny silver bell without a clapper
A mechanical canary inside a gnomish lamp
A tiny chest carved to look like it has numerous feet on the bottom
A dead {@creature sprite} inside a clear glass bottle
A metal can that has no opening but sounds as if it is filled with liquid, sand, spiders, or broken glass (escull)
A glass orb filled with water, in which swims a clockwork goldfish
A silver spoon with an 'M' engraved on the handle
A whistle made from gold-colored wood
A dead scarab beetle the size of your hand
Two toy soldiers, one with a missing head
A small box filled with different-sized buttons
A candle that can't be lit
A tiny cage with no door
An old key
An indecipherable treasure map
A hilt from a broken sword
A rabbit's foot
A glass eye
A cameo carved in the likeness of a hideous person
A silver skull the size of a coin
An alabaster mask
A pyramid of sticky black incense that smells very bad
A nightcap that, when worn, gives you pleasant dreams
A single caltrop made from bone
A gold monocle frame without the lens
A 1-inch cube, each side painted a different color
A crystal knob from a door
A small packet filled with pink dust
A fragment of a beautiful song, written as musical notes on two pieces of parchment
A silver teardrop earring made from a real teardrop
The shell of an egg painted with scenes of human misery in disturbing detail
A fan that, when unfolded, shows a sleeping cat
A set of bone pipes
A four-leaf clover pressed inside a book discussing manners and etiquette
A sheet of parchment upon which is drawn a complex mechanical contraption
An ornate scabbard that fits no blade you have found so far
An invitation to a party where a murder happened
A bronze pentacle with an etching of a rat's head in its center
A purple handkerchief embroidered with the name of a powerful {@creature archmage}
Half of a floorplan for a temple, castle, or some other structure
A bit of folded cloth that, when unfolded, turns into a stylish cap
A receipt of deposit at a bank in a far-flung city
A diary with seven missing pages
An empty silver snuffbox bearing an inscription on the surface that says "dreams"
An iron holy symbol devoted to an unknown god
A book that tells the story of a legendary hero's rise and fall, with the last chapter missing
A vial of dragon blood
An ancient arrow of elven design
A needle that never bends
An ornate brooch of dwarven design
An empty wine bottle bearing a pretty label that says, "The Wizard of Wines Winery, Red Dragon Crush, 331422-W"
A mosaic tile with a multicolored, glazed surface
A {@condition petrificat} mouse
A black pirate flag adorned with a dragon's skull and crossbones
A tiny mechanical crab or spider that moves about when it's not being observed
A glass jar containing lard with a label that reads, "Griffon Grease"
A wooden box with a ceramic bottom that holds a living worm with a head on each end of its body
A metal urn containing the ashes of a hero

item.name: Sèrum de la veritat
entries: Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 11). Si falla, esdevé {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora. The {@condition emmetzinat} creature can't knowingly speak a lie, as if under the effect of a {@spell zona de la veritat} spell.

item.name: Turquoise
entries: An opaque light blue-green gemstone.

item.name: Two-Birds Sling
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

When you make a ranged attack with this sling and hit a target, you can cause the ammunition to ricochet toward a second target within 10 feet of the first, and then make a ranged attack against the second target.

item.name: Tenda per a 2 persones
entries: A simple and portable canvas shelter, a tent sleeps two.

item.name: Unbreakable Arrow
entries: This arrow can't be broken, except when it is within an {@spell camp antimàgic}.

item.name: Uncommon Glamerweave
entries: Glamerweave is clothing imbued with harmless illusory magic. While wearing these clothes, pots, com a acció bonus, create a moving illusory pattern within the cloth. Alternativament, you can have the pattern rise from the cloth. For example, a glamerweave gown might be wreathed in harmless, illusory flames, while a glamerweave hat might have illusory butterflies fluttering around it.

When you make a Carisma ({@skill Persuasió}) or Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check while wearing the glamerweave, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the check. Once you use this property, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Universal Solvent
entries: This tube holds milky liquid with a strong alcohol smell. Pots, com a acció, pour the contents of the tube onto a surface within reach. The liquid instantly dissolves up to 1 square foot of adhesive it touches, including {@item sovereign glue}.

item.name: Vanrak's Mitrall Shirt
entries: Mitrall is a light, flexible metal. A mitrall chain shirt or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks or has a Força requirement, the mitrall version of the armor doesn't.
Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, you gain {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 60 feet.

item.name: Velvet doublet with gold buttons (Legió del Crepuscle)
Pulmons de Ventilació
entries: These metallic nodules were created in response to the poisonous gases used on the battlefields of the Last War. When you attune to these lungs, they replace the lungs in your chest, which disappear. The lungs allow you to breathe normally, even in an camp antimàgic, and their breathing function can't be suppressed by magic.

Outside an camp antimàgic or any other effect that suppresses magic, these lungs allow you to breathe normally in any environment (including a vacuum), and tens avantatge a tirades de saving throws against harmful gases such as those created by a {@spell matanúvol} spell, a {@spell núvol fètid} spell, inhaled poisons, and gaseous breath weapons.

Com a acció, you can use these lungs to exhale a ràfega de vent, as if you had cast the {@spell ràfega de vent} spell (spell save DC 15) with no components. This property of the lungs no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.
If your attunement to the lungs ends, your original lungs reappear.

item.name: Verminshroud
entries: This patchy cloak was pieced together from the pelts of rats found feasting on the dead in Blightshore and is dotted with the bloated corpses of magically preserved insects along its seams.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While wearing the Verminshroud in its dormant state, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte, ets immune a les malalties, and tens {@sense visió de foscor} a 60 peus d'abast. If you already have {@sense visió de foscor}, wearing the cloak increases the range of your {@sense visió de foscor} by 60 feet.

Com a acció, you can use the Verminshroud to cast {@spell polimorfia} on yourself, transforming into a {@creature giant rat} or {@creature rat} while retaining your Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores, as well as the properties of the cloak. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: While wearing the Verminshroud in its awakened state, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: Tens resistència al dany poison.

Pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell plaga d'insectes} spell (save DC 15) from the Verminshroud, sense que calguin components materials. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.
When you cast the {@spell polimorfia} spell using the Verminshroud, you can transform into a {@creature giant wasp}.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: While wearing the Verminshroud in its exalted state, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

Your teeth become razor-sharp natural weapons, i per tant et permeten fer atacs desarmats. If you hit with them, you deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + el teu modificador de Força, i no el dany normal d'un atac desarmat. You can make this attack as a bonus action. When you bite a creature and deal damage to it, la criatura ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17). Si falla, està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot tornar a salvar al final de cada torn seu, ending the condition on itself on a success.
When you cast the {@spell polimorfia} spell using the Verminshroud, you can transform into a {@creature giant scorpion}.

item.name: Veteran's Cane
entries: When you grasp this walking cane and use a bonus action to speak the paraula màgica, it transforms into an ordinary longsword and ceases to be magical.

item.name: Vial
entries: A vial can hold up to 4 ounces of liquid.

item.name: Vial of Stardust
entries: Any creature that sprinkles the contents of a Vial of Stardust over itself gains the ability to cast the {@spell somnis} spell once as an action (spell save DC 15), sense requerir components.

item.name: Voting Kit
entries: At rank 4, your voting kit becomes a common magic item that conceals an extradimensional space. Com a acció bonus, you can place one tool kit that you are proficient with into the voting kit, or can remove it. No other type of object can be placed into the extradimensional space. A creature searching the voting kit finds and extracts the tool kit with a successful DC 20 Intel·ligència ({@skill Investigació}) or Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) check.
Additionally, you can use the voting kit to cast {@spell fascinar persona} (save DC 15). This property of the kno es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Vox Seeker
entries: This clockwork device resembles a metal crab the size of a dinner plate. Every action used to wind up the device allows it to operate for 1 minute, to a maximum of 10 minutes. While operational, the item uses the accompanying {@creature Vox Seeker|EGW} stat block. This automaton is under el/la/li MM's control. A vox seeker reduced to 0 hit points is destroyed.

item.name: Voyager Staff
entries: Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this magic quarterstaff. While you hold it, Tens un +1 a spell attack rolls.

This staff has 10 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of the staff's charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: {@spell desterrament} (4 charges), {@spell pampalluga} (3 charges), {@spell pas boira} (2 charges), {@spell passaparets} (5 charges), or {@spell teleportació} (7 charges).
The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the staff vanishes forever.

item.name: Vareta de Binding
entries: This wand has 7 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: While holding the wand, pots, com a acció, expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 17): {@spell immobilitzar criatura} (5 charges) or {@spell immobilitzar humanoide} (2 charges).

entries.name: Assisted Escape
entries: While holding the wand, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge and gain advantage on a saving throw you make to avoid being {@condition paralitzat} or {@condition restrained}, or you can expend 1 charge and gain advantage on any check you make to escape a grapple.

item.name: Vareta de Conducting
entries: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges and create orchestral music by waving it around. The music can be heard out to a range of 60 feet and ends when you stop waving the wand.
The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, a sad tuba sound plays as the wand crumbles to dust and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Enemy Detection
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action and expend 1 charge to speak its paraula màgica. For the next minute, you know the direction of the nearest creature hostile to you within 60 feet, but not its distance from you. The wand can sense the presence of hostile creatures that are ethereal, {@condition invisible}, disguised, or hidden, as well as those in plain sight. The effect ends if you stop holding the wand.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Enredar
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell enredar} spell (save DC 13) from it.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Temor
entries: This wand has 7 charges for the following properties. It regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

entries.name: Ordre Imperativa
entries: While holding the wand, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge and command another creature to flee or grovel, as with the {@spell command} spell (save DC 15).

entries.name: Cone of Temor
entries: While holding the wand, pots, com a acció, expend 2 charges, causing the wand's tip to emit a 60-foot cone of amber light. Tota criatura a dins del con ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition acovardit} de tu durant 1 minut. While està {@condition acovardit} in this way, a creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. Tampoc pot prendre reaccions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevent it from moving. If it has nowhere it can move, the creature can use the Dodge action. Al final de cada torn seu, a creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Vareta de Fireballs
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell bola de foc} spell (save DC 15) from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Lightning Bolts
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell llampec} spell (save DC 15) from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Magic Detection
entries: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the {@spell detectar màgia} spell from it. The wand recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

item.name: Vareta de Missils Màgics
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell missil màgic} spell from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Orcus
entries: The ghastly Vareta de Orcus rarely leaves {@creature Orcus|MTF|Orcus's} side. The device, as evil as its creator, shares the demon lord's aims to snuff out the lives of all living things and bind the Material Plane in the stasis of undeath. {@creature Orcus|MTF} allows the wand to slip from his grasp from time to time. When it does, it magically appears wherever its master senses an opportunity to achieve some fell goal.

Made from bones as hard as iron, the wand is topped with a magically enlarged skull that once belonged to a human hero slain by {@creature Orcus|MTF}. The wand can magically change in size to better conform to the grip of its user. Plants wither, drinks spoil, flesh rots, and vermin thrive in the wand's presence.

Any creature besides {@creature Orcus|MTF} that tries to attune to the wand ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17). Si supera, the creature takes {@dice 10d6} de dany necròtic. Si falla, the creature dies and rises as a {@creature zombie}.

In the hands of one who is attuned to it, the wand can be wielded as a magic {@item maça|phb} that grants a +3 a les tirades d'impacte i de dany que faci. The wand deals an extra {@dice 2d12} de dany necròtic on a hit.

entries.name: Random Properties
entries: The Vareta de Orcus has the following random properties:

items: 2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial property}
2 {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental properties}
1 {@table Artifact Properties; Major Detrimental Properties|dmg|major detrimental property}

entries: The detrimental properties of the Vareta de Orcus are suppressed while the wand is attuned to {@creature Orcus|MTF} himself.

entries.name: Protection
entries: Tens +3 a la CA while holding the wand.

entries.name: Conjurs
entries: The wand té 7 càrregues. While holding it, you can use an action and expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 18) from it: {@spell animar els morts} (1 charge), {@spell plaga} (2 charges), {@spell cercle de la mort} (3 charges), {@spell dit de la mort} (3 charges), {@spell paraula de poder matar} (4 charges), or {@spell parlar amb els morts} (1 charge). The wand regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn.
While attuned to the wand, {@creature Orcus|MTF} or a follower blessed by him can cast each of the wand's spells using 2 fewer charges (mínim de 0).

entries.name: Call Undead
entries: While you are holding the wand, pots, com a acció, conjure {@creature skeleton||skeletons} and {@creature zombie||zombies}, calling forth as many of them as you can divide 500 hit points among, each undead having average hit points. The undead magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of you and obey your commands until they are destroyed or until dawn of the next day, when they collapse into inanimate piles of bones and rotting corpses. Once you use this property of the wand, no hi pots tornar until the next dawn.

While attuned to the wand, {@creature Orcus|MTF} can summon any kind of undead, not just skeletons and zombies. The undead don't perish or disappear at dawn the following day, remaining until {@creature Orcus|MTF} dismisses them.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: The Vareta de Orcus is a sentient, chaotic evil item with an Intel·ligència of 16, a Saviesa of 12, and a Carisma of 16. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The wand communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Abyssal and Common.

entries.name: Personality
entries: The wand's purpose is to help satisfy {@creature Orcus|MTF|Orcus's} desire to slay everything in the multiverse. The wand is cold, cruel, nihilistic, and bereft of humor. In order to further its master's goals, the wand feigns devotion to its current user and makes grandiose promises that it has no intention of fulfilling, such as vowing to help its user overthrow {@creature Orcus|MTF}.

entries.name: Destroying the Vareta
entries: Destroying the Vareta de Orcus requires that it be taken to the Positive Energy Plane by the ancient hero whose skull surmounts it. For this to happen, the long-lost hero must first be restored to life—no easy task, given the fact that {@creature Orcus|MTF} has imprisoned the hero's soul and keeps it hidden and well guarded.
Bathing the wand in positive energy causes it to crack and explode, but unless the above conditions are met, the wand instantly reforms on {@creature Orcus|MTF|Orcus's} layer of the Abyss.

item.name: Vareta de Paralysis
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges to cause a thin blue ray to streak from the tip toward una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast. The target ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, està {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. Al final de cada torn de l'objectiu, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Polimorfia
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell polimorfia} spell (save DC 15) from it.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Castell de Focs
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges and create a harmless burst of multicolored light at a point you can see fins a 60 peus away. The burst of light is accompanied by a crackling noise that can be heard fins a 300 peus away. The light is as bright as a torch flame but lasts only a second.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand erupts in a harmless pyrotechnic display and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Scowls
entries: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges and target a humanoid que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. The target ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 10). Si falla, be forced to scowl durant 1 minut.
The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand transforms into a {@item wand of smiles|xge}.

item.name: Vareta de Secrets
entries: The wand té 3 càrregues. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges, and if a secret door or trap is within 30 feet of you, the wand pulses and points at the one nearest to you. The wand recupera {@dice 1d3} càrregues gastades cada dia a trenc d'alba.

item.name: Vareta de Smiles
entries: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges and target a humanoid que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. The target ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 10). Si falla, be forced to smile durant 1 minut.
The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand transforms into a {@item wand of scowls|xge}.

item.name: Vareta de Viscid Globs
entries: Crafted by the {@creature drow}, this slim black wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges to cause a small glob of viscous material to launch from the tip at one creature within 60 feet of you. Make a ranged attack roll against the target, with a bonus equal to your spellcasting modifier (or your Intel·ligència modifier, if you don't have a spellcasting modifier) plus el teu bonus de competència. Si impacta, the glob expands and dries on the target, which is {@condition restrained} durant 1 hora. After that time, the viscous material cracks and falls away.

Applying a pint or more of alcohol to the {@condition restrained} creature dissolves the glob instantly, as does the application of {@item oil of eterietat} or {@item universal solvent}. The glob also dissolves instantly if exposed to sunlight. No other nonmagical process can remove the viscous material until it deteriorates on its own.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at midnight. If you expend the wands last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand melts into harmless slime and is destroyed.
A wand of viscous globs is destroyed if exposed to sunlight durant 1 hora without interruption.

item.name: Vareta de Web
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell tirarany} spell (save DC 15) from it.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Winter
entries: This wand looks and feels like an icicle. You must be attuned to the wand to use it.

The wand has 7 charges, which are used to fuel the spells within it. With the wand in hand, pots, com a acció, cast one of the following spells from the wand, even if you are incapable of casting spells: {@spell raig gebre} (no charges, or 1 charge to cast at 5th level; +5 a impactar with atac màgic a distància), {@spell tempesta d'aiguaneu} (3 charges; spell save DC 15), or {@spell tempesta de gel} (4 charges; spell save DC 15). No components are required. The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges each day at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20, the wand melts away, forever destroyed.

item.name: Vareta de Wonder
entries: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 of its charges and choose a target within 120 feet of you. The target can be a creature, an object, or a point in space. Roll {@dice d100} and consult the following table to discover what happens.
If the effect causes you to cast a spell from the wand, the spell's save DC is 15. If the spell normally has a range expressed in feet, its range becomes 120 feet if it isn't already.
If an effect covers an area, you must center the spell on and include the target. If an effect has multiple possible subjects, el/la/li MM randomly determines which ones are affected.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into dust and is destroyed.

rows: You cast {@spell alentir}.
You cast {@spell foc follet}.
You are {@condition atordit} fins el final del teu proper torn, believing something awesome just happened.
You cast {@spell ràfega de vent}.
You cast {@spell detectar pensaments} on the target you chose. If you didn't target a creature, you instead rep {@dice 1d6} de dany psíquic.
You cast {@spell núvol fètid}.
Heavy rain falls in a 60-foot radius centered on the target. The area becomes lightly obscured. The rain falls fins el final del teu proper torn.

An animal appears in the unoccupied space nearest the target. The animal isn't under your control and acts as it normally would. Roll a {@dice d100} to determine which animal appears. On a 01-25, a {@creature rhinoceros} appears; on a 26-50, an {@creature elephant} appears; and on a 51-100, a {@creature rat} appears.
You cast {@spell llampec}.
A cloud of 600 oversized butterflies fills a 30-foot radius centered on the target. The area becomes heavily obscured. The butterflies remain durant 10 minuts.
You enlarge the target as if you had cast {@spell engrandir/enxiquir}. If the target can't be affected by that spell or if you didn't target a creature, you become the target.
You cast {@spell foscor}.
Grass grows on the ground in a 60-foot radius centered on the target. If grass is already there, it grows to ten times its normal size and remains overgrown durant 1 minut.
An object of el/la/li MM 's choice disappears into the Pla Etèri. The object must be neither worn nor carried, within 120 feet of the target, and no larger than 10 feet in any dimension.
You shrink yourself as if you had cast {@spell engrandir/enxiquir} on yourself.
You cast {@spell bola de foc}.
You cast {@spell invisibilitat} on yourself.

Leaves grow from the target. If you chose a point in space as the target, leaves sprout from the creature nearest to that point. Unless they are picked off, the leaves turn brown and fall off passades 24 hores.

A stream of {@dice 1d4 × 10} gems, each worth 1 gp, shoots from the wand 's tip in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each gem deals 1 dany contundent, and the total damage of the gems is divided equally among all creatures in the line.

A burst of colorful shimmering light extends from you in a 30-foot radius. You and tota criatura dins de l'àrea that can see ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition encegat} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.
The target's skin turns bright blue for {@dice 1d10} days. If you chose a point in space, the creature nearest to that point is affected.

If you targeted a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). If you didn't target a creature, you become the target and must make the saving throw. Si falla la salvada per 5 o més, the target is instantly {@condition petrificat}. On any other failed save, the target is {@condition restrained} and begins to turn to stone. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw Al final del seu proper torn, becoming {@condition petrificat} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the target is freed by the {@spell restabliment superior} spell or similar magic.

item.name: Wand Sheath
entries: A wand sheath clamps onto your arm and imparts the following benefits:

items: The wand sheath can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it.
You can insert a wand into the sheath as an action. The sheath can hold only one wand at a time.
You can retract or extend a wand from the sheath as a bonus action. While the wand is extended, you can use it as if you were holding it, but your hand remains free.

entries: If a sheathed wand requires attunement, you must attune to the wand before you can use it. However, the wand sheath and the attached wand count as a single magic item with regard to the number of magic items you can attune to. If you remove the wand from the sheath, your attunement to the wand ends.

item.name: Wargong
entries: A metal gong, traditionally made from a shield, particularly the shield of an enemy. Both goblins and nans make and play wargongs, their sound echoing through tunnels in the Sotafoscor.

item.name: Watchful Helm
entries: While you wear this helm, tens +1 a la CA and remain aware of your surroundings even while you're asleep, and tens avantatge a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.
Com a acció bonus, you can cast the {@spell veure invisibilitat} spell from the helm. Once this property of the helm is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Waterskin
entries: Una bóta can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

item.name: Wave
item.reqAttune: by a creature that worships a god of the sea
entries: Held in the dungeon of White Plume Mountain, this trident is an exquisite weapon engraved with images of waves, shells, and sea creatures. Although you must worship a god of the sea to attune to this weapon, Wave happily accepts new converts.
Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. If you score a critical hit with it, the target takes extra necrotic damage equal to half its punts de vida màxims.

The weapon also functions as a {@item trident of fish command} and a {@item weapon of warning}. It can confer the benefit of a {@item barret de respiració aquàtica} while you hold it, and you can use it as a {@item cube of force} by choosing the effect, instead of pressing cube sides to select it.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Wave is a sentient weapon of neutral alignment, with an Intel·ligència of 14, a Saviesa of 10, and a Carisma of 18. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.

The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Aquan. It can also speak with aquatic animals as if using a {@spell parlar animal} spell, using telepathy to involve its wielder in the conversation.

entries.name: Personality
entries: When it grows restless, Wave has a habit of humming tunes that vary from sea chanteys to sacred hymns of the sea gods.

Wave zealously desires to convert mortals to the worship of one or more sea gods, or else to consign the faithless to death. Conflict arises if the wielder fails to further the weapon's objectives in the world. The trident has a nostalgic attachment to the place where it was forged, a desolate island called Thunderforge. A sea god imprisoned a family of storm giants there, and the giants forged Wave in an act of devotion to—or rebellion against—that god.

Wave harbors a secret doubt about its own nature and purpose. For all its devotion to the sea gods, Wave fears that it was intended to bring about a particular sea god's demise. This destiny is something Wave might not be able to avert.

item.name: Waythe
entries: Waythe is a unique greatsword most recently in the possession of a high-ranking {@creature cloud giant} ambassador.

Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. Quan impactes a una criatura of the giant type with it, the giant takes an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany tallant, and it ha de salvar per Força (CD 15). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}.
The sword also functions as a {@item wand of enemy detection}. It regains all of its expended charges at dawn and isn't at risk of crumbling if its last charge is used.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Waythe is a sentient weapon of neutral good alignment, with an Intel·ligència of 12, a Saviesa of 2, and a Carisma of 14. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon can speak and understand Giant and Common, and it can communicate telepathically with its wielder.

entries.name: Personality
entries: This sword believes in freedom and allowing others to live as they see fit. It is protective of its friends, and wants to be friends with a like-minded wielder. (It takes only 1 minute for a good-aligned character to gain attunement with the sword.) Waythe is courageous to the point of foolhardiness, however, and vocally urges bold action. It is likely to come into conflict with an evil or a timid wielder.

item.name: Eines de Cistelleria
additionalEntries: Weaver's tools allow you to create cloth and tailor it into articles of clothing.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Weaver's tools include thread, needles, and scraps of cloth. You know how to work a loom, but such equipment is too large to transport.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History
entries: Your expertise lends you additional insight when examining cloth objects, including cloaks and robes.

additionalEntries.name: Investigation
entries: Using your knowledge of the process of creating cloth objects, you can spot clues and make deductions that others would overlook when you examine tapestries, upholstery, clothing, and other woven items.

additionalEntries.name: Repair
entries: Com a part d'un Descans Curt, you can repair a single damaged cloth object.

additionalEntries.name: Craft Clothing
entries: Assuming you have access to sufficient cloth and thread, you can create an outfit for a creature com a part d'un Descans Llarg.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de Cistelleria
rows: Repurpose cloth
Mend a hole in a piece of cloth
Tailor an outfit

item.name: Weird Tank
entries: A weird tank is a ten-gallon tank of blown glass and sculpted bronze with a backpack-like carrying harness fashioned from tough leather. A {@creature water weird} is contained within the tank. While wearing the tank, pots, com a acció, open it, allowing the {@creature water weird} to emerge. The {@creature water weird} acts immediately after you in the initiative order, and it is bound to the tank.

You can command the {@creature water weird} telepathically (no requereix acció) while you wear the tank. You can close the tank as an action only if you have first commanded the {@creature water weird} to retract into it or if the {@creature water weird} is dead.

If the {@creature water weird} is killed, the tank loses its magical containment property until it spends at least 24 hours inside an elemental water node. When the tank is recharged, a new {@creature water weird} forms inside it.

The tank has AC 15, 50 hit points, vulnerability to dany contundent, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Reducing the tank to 0 hit points destroys it and the {@creature water weird} contained within it.

item.name: Well of Many Worlds
entries: This fine black cloth, soft as silk, is folded up to the dimensions of a handkerchief. It unfolds into a circular sheet 6 feet in diameter.

Pots, com a acció, unfold and place the well of many worlds on a solid surface, whereupon it creates a two-way portal to another world or plane of existence. Each time the item opens a portal, el/la/li MM decides where it leads. Pots, com a acció, close an open portal by taking hold of the edges of the cloth and folding it up. Once well of many worlds has opened a portal, it can't do so again for {@dice 1d8} hours.

item.name: Wheel of Stars
entries: While attuned to this device, you have a +1 bonus to Saviesa saving throws, and pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell llums dansaires}, {@spell guia}, o {@spell missatge} cantrips.

entries.name: Portent of the Stars
entries: As a reaction when una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus d'abast makes an attack roll, saving throw, or ability check, you make that creature roll a {@dice d10} and add or subtract the number rolled (escull) from the roll. Once you use this feature of the wheel of stars, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Alter Gravity
entries: Com a acció, Pots llançar el conjur {@spell volar} on yourself or Pots llançar el conjur {@spell levitar} (save DC 15). Once you use this feature of the wheel of stars, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Part of a Whole
entries: While this component is not installed in the {@item Orrery of the Wanderer|AI}, its magic might function sporadically or with unpredictable side effects, as determined by el/la/li MM.

item.name: Wheel of Wind and Water
entries: When mounted at the helm of an elemental galleon or airship, this wheel allows a creature that possesses the Marcatempesta to telepathically control the elemental bound inside the vessel.

If a wheel of wind and water is mounted on a mundane sailing ship, a creature with the Marcatempesta who is using the wheel can create an area of ideal conditions around the vessel, increasing its speed by 5 miles per hour.

item.name: Whelm
entries: Whelm is a powerful warhammer forged by nans and lost in the dungeon of White Plume Mountain.

Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. At dawn the day after you first make an attack roll with Whelm, you develop a fear of being outdoors that persists as long as you remain attuned to the weapon. This causes you to have disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks while you can see the daytime sky.

entries.name: Llancívola Weapon
entries: Whelm has the thrown property, with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit amb un atac armat a distància using it, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d8} de dany contundent, or an extra {@dice 2d8} de dany contundent if the target is a giant. Each time you throw the weapon, it flies back to your hand after the attack. If you don't have a hand free, the weapon lands at your feet.

entries.name: Shock Wave
entries: Pots, com a acció, strike the ground with Whelm and send a shock wave out from the point of impact. Each creature of your choice on the ground within 60 feet of that point ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, esdevé {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Once used, this property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Supernatural Awareness
entries: While you are holding the weapon, it alerts you to the location of any secret or concealed doors within 30 feet of you. A més, pots, com a acció, cast {@spell detectar el bé i el mal} or {@spell localitzar objecte} from the weapon. Once you cast either spell, you can't cast it from the weapon again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Whelm is a sentient lawful neutral weapon with an Intel·ligència of 15, a Saviesa of 12, and a Carisma of 15. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Nannès. Giant, and Goblin. It shouts battle cries in Nannès when used in combat.

entries.name: Personality
entries: Whelm's purpose is to slaughter giants and goblinoids. It also seeks to protect nans against all enemies. Conflict arises if the wielder fails to destroy goblins and giants or to protect nans. Whelm has ties to the dwarf clan that created it, variously called the Dankil or the Mightyhammer clan. It longs to be returned to that clan. It would do anything to protect those nans from harm. The hammer also carries a secret shame. Centuries ago, a dwarf named Ctenmiir wielded it valiantly for a time. But Ctenmiir was turned into a {@creature vampire}. His will was strong enough that he bent Whelm to his evil purposes, even killing members of his own clan.

attachedSpells: detectar el bé i el mal

item.name: Whisper Jar
entries: Also at rank 1, you are the beneficiary of a whisper jar—a common magic item resembling an ether-filled jar with a long tap hose. The jar is used to record others' stories and your own observations, like a verbal notebook with unlimited space. The whisper jar records as fast as a creature can speak into it, and whispers back words at the same pace they were recorded. Activating the playback of a particular recording is an action.

entries.caption: Things Recorded in Your Whisper Jar
rows: A live recording of the only performance of the mostly forgotten stage play Tabaxi on a Hot Tin Roof
The life's work of the loremonger who owned the jar before you
Every courageous thought you've ever had, to cover for how scared you are most of the time
Everything, because everyone else around you will eat their words one day!
The top seven places to eat fried rat skewers in every settlement you've ever visited
The entire family tree of every royal line, extant or lost, in Faerûn
A moment-by-moment review of your favorite Jim Darkmagic stage performance
The sound of raucous applause, which you play back liberally

entries.name: Whispered Encyclopedia
entries: At rank 2, your whisper jar becomes an uncommon magic item that can tap into the broader lore of Acquisitions Incorporated. Com a acció bonus, you ask the jar for information on a specific subject and make una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Història}) amb CD 15. On a success, the jar plays back a recording on that subject, made somewhere, sometime by another Acq Inc loremonger. This property of the whisper jar no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Whispered Warnings
entries: Also at rank 3, your whisper jar gains additional power and becomes a rare magic item. Com a acció, you can cause the jar to function as a {@item wand of enemy detection}, whereupon it whispers the direction to foes within range. This property of the whisper jar no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Whispered Arcana
entries: Also at rank 4, your whisper jar gains access to even more magic. By whispering the name of one of the following spells into the jar com a acció, you can cast that spell from the jar: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}, {@spell detectar màgia}, {@spell detectar malalties i metzines}, {@spell trobar trampes}, {@spell identificar}, o {@spell localitzar plantes o animals}. This property of the whisper jar no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

attachedSpells: detectar el bé i el mal

item.name: White Dragon Cape
entries: Tens resistència al dany de fred mentre vesteixis el cape.

item.name: White Dragon Mask
entries: This gleaming mask is white with highlights of pale blue and is topped by a spined crest. The mask reshapes to fit a wearer attuned to it. While you are wearing the mask and attuned to it, you can access the following properties.

entries.name: Absorbir Dany
entries: You have resistance against cold damage. If you already have resistance to cold damage from another source, you instead have immunity to cold damage. If you already have immunity to cold damage from another source, whenever you are subjected to cold damage, you take none of that damage and regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt of that type.

entries.name: Inefabilitat Dracònica
entries: While you are wearing no armor, you can add your Carisma bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Dragon Breath
entries: If you have a breath weapon that requires rest to recharge, it gains a recharge of 6.

entries.name: Dragon Sight
entries: You gain {@sense visió de foscor} out to 60 feet, or to an additional 60 feet if you already have that sense. Once per day, you can gain {@sense visió a cegues} out to 30 feet durant 5 minuts.

entries.name: Dragon Tongue
entries: You can speak and understand Dracònic. A més, tens avantatge a tirades de Carisma you make against White Dragons.

entries.name: Resistència Llegendària
entries: (1/Dia) If you fail a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Winter's Fury
entries: While your current hit points are equal to or less than half your punts de vida màxims, you deal an extra {@dice 1d8} de dany de fred with your melee attacks.

item.name: Cota d'Escates de Drac Blanc
entries: La cota d'escates de drac està feta d'escames d'un tipus de drac. Alguns dracs coleccionen les escates que han mudad i les regalen als humanoides. En altres casos els caçadors curen i preserven la pell d'un drac mort amb molta cura. Sia com sia, una cota d'escates de drac és molt valuosa. Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, tens: +1 a la CA; avantatge a salvar contra l'Alè d'Atac i la Presència Aterradora dels dracs; i resistència al dany de fred.

A més, pots, com a acció, percebre màgicament la distància i direcció al drac white més proper a tu, fins a 30 milles d'abast. Aquesta acció especial no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

item.name: Wildroot
entries: Introducing the juice of a wildroot into a {@condition emmetzinat} creature's bloodstream (for example, by rubbing it on an open wound) rids the creature of the {@condition emmetzinat} condition. Once used in this way, a wildroot loses this property.

item.name: Will of the Talon
entries: Black, blue, green, red, and white gems carved in the form of dragon heads cover this ostentatious gold war pick, marking it as a weapon channeling the power of Tiamat.

entries.name: Sentience
entries: Will of the Talon is a sentient lawful evil weapon with an Intel·ligència of 14, a Saviesa of 15, and a Carisma of 19. It has hearing and {@sense visió de foscor} out to a range of 120 feet.
The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speak, read, and understand Common, Dracònic, and Infernal.

entries.name: Personality
entries: A short-tempered {@creature diable d'ossos} named Ashtyrlon lives within Will of the Talon. The weapon is greedy and values strong leadership. It demands that its wielder take decisive action to keep order in high-pressure situations—and to always take a fair share of treasure in return.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: The war pick grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

items: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Dracònic and Infernal.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

As a bonus action while holding the war pick, you can cause the following effect: each creature of your choice that is within 30 feet of you and is aware of you ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 13). Si falla, esdevé {@condition acovardit} de tu durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature is immune to your Presència Aterradora durant les properes 24 hores. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

While holding the war pick, pots, com a acció, exhale destructive energy. Pick a damage type from the Will of the Talon Alèns d'Atac table. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea of the exhalation must make a DC 13 saving throw, the type of which is specified in the table. Qui falli, rep {@damage 3d6} damage; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

entries: When you use the war pick to unleash a breath weapon of a specific damage type, you can't choose that same damage type again until the next dawn.

entries.caption: Will of the Talon Alèns d'Atac
rows: Àcid
5 peus wide, 30 peus long line
Destresa
Fred
15 peus cone
Constitució
Foc
15 peus cone
Destresa
Elèctric
5 peus wide, 30 peus long line
Destresa
Verí
15 peus cone
Constitució

entries.name: Awakened
entries: When the war pick reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
The saving throw DC for the war pick's Breath Weapon property increases to 15, and that property deals {@damage 4d6} damage; si supera, en rep la meitat.
The saving throw DC for the war pick's Presència Aterradora property increases to 15.
While carrying the weapon, tens resistència al dany d'àcid, cold, fire, lightning, and poison.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: When the war pick reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

items: The weapon's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The saving throw DC for the war pick's Breath Weapon property increases to 17, and that property deals {@damage 5d6} damage; si supera, en rep la meitat.
The saving throw DC for the war pick's Presència Aterradora property increases to 17.

entries.name: Betrayer Artifact Properties
entries: The Arms of the Betrayers advance in power in the same manner as the Vestiges of Divergence. In its dormant state, each of these artifacts has one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and one {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the artifact attains an awakened state, it gains an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Beneficial Properties|dmg|minor beneficial} property and an additional {@table Artifact Properties; Minor Detrimental Properties|dmg|minor detrimental} property. When the item reaches its exalted state, it gains a {@table Artifact Properties; Major Beneficial Properties|dmg|major beneficial} property. See "Artifact Properties" in chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information.

item.name: Willowshade Oil
entries: A dark blue oil can be extracted from the rare fruit of the willowshade plant. A creature can use its action to apply the oil to another creature that has been {@condition petrificat} for less than 1 minute, causing the {@condition petrificat} condition on that creature to end at the start of what would be that creature's next turn.

item.name: Wind Fan
entries: While holding this fan, pots, com a acció, cast the {@spell ràfega de vent} spell (save DC 13) from it. Once used, the fan shouldn't be used again until the next dawn. Each time it is used again before then, it has a cumulative {@chance 20} chance of not working and tearing into useless, nonmagical tatters.

item.name: Windvane
entries: A silver spear, Windvane has dark sapphires on the filigreed surface of its polished head. Held by its shining haft, the weapon feels insubstantial, as if clutching a cool, gently flowing breeze. The spear contains a spark of {@creature Yan-C-Bin|PotA}, the Prince of Evil Air.
You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica, which has the finesse weapon property. When you hit with it, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany elèctric.

entries.name: Air Mastery
entries: Obténs els beneficis següents while you hold Windvane:

items: You can speak Auran fluently.
Tens resistència al dany elèctric.
Pots llançar el conjur {@spell dominar criatura} (save DC 17) on an {@creature air elemental}. Once you have done so, Windvane no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Song of the Four Winds
entries: While inside an air node, you can perform a ritual called the Song of the Four Winds, using Windvane to create a {@item devastation orb of air|PotA}. Once you perform the ritual, Windvane can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Flaw
entries: Windvane makes its wielder mercurial and unreliable. While attuned to the weapon, you gain the following flaw: "I break my vows and plans. Duty and honor mean nothing to me."

item.name: Botes Alades
entries: Mentres vesteixis les botes, tens una velocitat de vol equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar. You can use the boots to fly for up to 4 hours, all at once or in several shorter flights, each one using a minimum of 1 minute from the duration. If you are flying when the duration expires, you descend at a rate of 30 feet per round until you land.
The boots regain 2 hours of flying capability for every 12 hours they aren't in use.

item.name: Wings of Flying
entries: Mentre vesteixis el cloak, pots, com a acció, speak its paraula màgica. This turns the cloak into a pair of bat wings or bird wings on your back durant 1 hora or until you repeat the paraula màgica as an action. The wings give you una velocitat de vol de 60 peus. When they disappear, you can't use them again for {@dice 1d12} hours.

item.name: Wingwear
entries: This snug uniform has symbols of air stitched into it and leathery flaps that stretch along the arms, waist, and legs to create wings for gliding. A suit of wingwear has 3 charges. While you wear the suit, pots, com a acció bonus, and expend 1 charge to gain una velocitat de vol de 30 peus until you land. Al final de cada torn teu, your altitude drops by 5 feet. Your altitude drops instantly to 0 feet at the end of your turn if you didn't fly at least 30 feet horizontally on that turn. When your altitude drops to 0 feet, you land (or fall), and you must expend another charge to use the suit again.
The suit regains all of its expended charges after spending at least 1 hour in an elemental air node.

item.name: Winter's Dark Bite
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

This greatsword is made of an unknown black metal. In most cases, it works as a {@item +1 espasa gran}. But when used against a {@creature thessalhydra|hftt}, it works as a {@item +3 espasa gran}. While in the Upside Down, it works as a +4 greatsword.

item.name: Eines de fuster
additionalEntries: Woodcarver's tools allow you to craft intricate objects from wood, such as wooden tokens or arrows.

additionalEntries.name: Components
entries: Woodcarver's tools consist of a knife, a gouge, and a small saw.

additionalEntries.name: Arcana, History
entries: Your expertise lends you additional insight when you examine wooden objects, such as figurines or arrows.

additionalEntries.name: Nature
entries: Your knowledge of wooden objects gives you some added insight when you examine trees.

additionalEntries.name: Repair
entries: Com a part d'un Descans Curt, you can repair a single damaged wooden object.

additionalEntries.name: Craft Arrows
entries: Com a part d'un Descans Curt, you can craft up to five arrows. Com a part d'un Descans Llarg, you can craft up to twenty. You must have enough wood on hand to produce them.

additionalEntries.caption: Eines de fuster
rows: Craft a small wooden figurine
Carve an intricate pattern in wood

item.name: Wreath of the Prism
entries: This loop of golden thorns is inset with dozens of gems representing the five colors of Tiamat.

entries.name: Dormant
entries: While wearing the wreath in its dormant state, tens {@sense visió de foscor} a 60 peus d'abast. If you already have {@sense visió de foscor}, wearing the wreath increases the range of your {@sense visió de foscor} by 60 feet.

When you hit a beast, dragon, or monstrosity amb un valor de repte de 5 o menor with an attack, or when you grapple it, you can use the wreath to cast {@spell dominar criatura} on the creature (save DC 13). Si supera, the target is immune to the power of the wreath durant 24 hores. On a failure, a shimmering, golden image of the wreath appears as a collar around the target's neck or as a crown on its head (escull) until it is no longer {@condition fascinat} by the spell. If you use the wreath to charm a second creature, the first spell immediately ends. Quan acaba el conjur, the target knows it was {@condition fascinat} by you.

entries.name: Awakened
entries: Once the Wreath of the Prism reaches an awakened state, it gains the following benefits:

items: You can affect creatures amb un valor de repte de 10 o menor with the wreath.
The save DC of the wreath's spell increases to 15.

entries.name: Exalted
entries: Once the Wreath of the Prism reaches an exalted state, it gains the following benefits:

items: You can affect creatures amb un valor de repte de 15 o menor with the wreath.
The save DC of the wreath's spell increases to 17.

item.name: Wukka Nut
entries: These fist-sized nuts grow on wukka trees, which are popular haunts for {@creature jaculi|ToA}, {@creature su-monster|ToA|su-monsters}, i {@creature zorbo|ToA|zorbos}. A wukka nut rattles when shaken, causing its shell to shed llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals. This magical light fades after 1 minute, but shaking the nut again causes the light to reappear. If the shell of the nut is cracked open, it loses its magic.

entries.items: Wyllow's staff is peculiar in that it can't create roses, which the archdruid dislikes. If a rose is chosen, a daisy grows instead.

item.name: Wyrmskull Throne
entries: Built by dwarven gods and entrusted to the rulers of Shanatar, an ancient dwarven empire. The Wyrmskull Throne was a symbol of dwarven power and pride for ages untold. The throne hovers a foot off the ground and is a massive thing made of polished obsidian with oversized feet—the impaled skulls of four drac blau anciàs. Runes glisten in the carved obsidian winking to life with blue energy when the throne's powers are activated.

After the fall of Shanatar, the Wyrmskull Throne fell into the clutches of less honorable creatures. A band of adventurers wrested the throne from the aquatic elf tyrant Gantar Kraok and sold it to the {@creature storm giant} Neri for a considerable fortune. Neri had the throne magically enlarged and gave it to her husband, King Hekaton, as a gift, along with one of the Ruling Scepters of Shanatar, which she had found in a wreck at the bottom of the Trackless Sea. Only a creature attuned to a Ruling Scepter and in possession of it can harness the powers of the Wyrmskull Throne, which has become the centerpiece of King Hekaton's throne room in the undersea citadel of Maelstrom. Fear of the throne's power has helped prevent evil giants from challenging or threatening Hekaton's leadership.

Any creature not attuned to a Ruling Scepter who sits on the throne is {@condition paralitzat} and encased in a magical force field. While encased, the creature can't be touched or moved from the throne. Touching a Ruling Scepter to the force field dispels the field, though the creature remains {@condition paralitzat} until it is separated from the throne.

Any creature seated on the throne can hear faint Whispers in Dracònic—the whisperings of four blue dragons whose skulls adorn the throne. Although powerless, these spirits try to influence the decisions of the throne's master

entries.name: Properties of the Throne
entries: The throne has 9 charges and regains all expended charges daily at dawn. A creature that sits on the throne while attuned to a Ruling Sceptor in its possession can harness the throne's properties, which are as follows:
The throne gains una velocitat de vol de 30 peus and can hover and flies where the creature wills. This property doesn't expend any charges.
Both the throne and the creature sitting on it can move through earth and stone without disturbing the material they move through. This property doesn't expend any charges.

Com a acció, the creature can expend 1 charge to cast {@spell llampec} (spell save DC 19) from the throne. The spell is cast as though using a 9th-level spell slot and deals 49 ({@dice 14d6}) de dany elèctric. The bolt discharges from the mouth of one of the throne's blue dragon skulls.
Com a acció, the creature can expend 2 charges to cast the {@spell globus d'invulnerabilitat} spell from the throne. The globe encloses both the creature and the throne.

Com a acció, the creature can expend 3 charges to create a spectral image of an {@creature drac blau ancià} that surrounds both it and the throne. The spectral dragon dura 1 minut. Al final de cada torn de la criatura, the spectral dragon makes one bite attack and two claw attacks against targets of the creature's choice. These attacks have the same attack bonus, reach, and damage as an {@creature drac blau ancià||drac blau ancià's} bite and claw attacks.

entries.name: Destroying the Throne
entries: The Wyrmskull Throne can be destroyed by breaking at least five Ruling Scepters of Shanatar simultaneously on it. This fact has never been recorded or sung of among the nans or any bards or storytellers, and it can't be discovered with an ability check. Characters who want to destroy the throne must go on a quest to learn the method for doing so. The throne's destruction triggers an explosion, as shards of obsidian fly out in all directions. Each creature and object within a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the throne must succeed on a DC 21 Destresa saving throw, taking 70 ({@dice 20d6}) de dany tallant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Metzina de Wívern
entries: This poison must be harvested from a dead or {@condition incapacitat} {@creature wyvern}. Una criatura afectada per aquesta metzina ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15), taking 24 ({@dice 7d6}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat.

item.name: Yahcha
entries: A yahcha (pronounced YAH-chah) is a harmless, meaty beetle about the size of a human hand, which feeds on worms and maggots. It moves slowly (walking speed 10 feet) and is easy to catch. A creature with mad monkey fever that eats a raw or cooked yahcha can immediately make a saving throw with advantage against that disease (see "Diseases," page 40),

item.name: Yarting
entries: A southern instrument from Amn and Calimshan that is a Faerûnian analog to the guitar. Numerous variations have spread across the continent.

item.name: Yellow Sapphire
entries: A transparent fiery yellow or yellow-green gemstone.

item.name: Ythryn Mythallar
entries: A mythallar looks like an enormous crystal ball held in an ornate cradle. The globe desprèn llum forta en un radi de 300 peus i llum tènue uns 300 peus adicionals. The globe draws magic from the Weave that can be harnessed for various purposes. For example, Netherese mages used mythallars to keep their cities aloft and empower their magic items. The bigger the mythallar, the more magic it can hold. The largest mythallars are 150 feet in diameter.

The Ythryn mythallar is a relatively small device—a mere 50 feet in diameter. To attune to this mythallar, a creature must finish a short rest within 30 feet of it, meditating on the mythallar. Up to eight creatures can be attuned to it at one time; otherwise, the Ythryn mythallar follows the attunement rules in the Dungeon Master's Guide. If a ninth creature tries to attune to the mythallar, nothing happens.

All creatures attuned to the Ythryn mythallar can sense when the device is being used. A creature attuned to the device can use any of its properties, but only if all other creatures attuned to the device agree to allow it. The Ythryn mythallar's properties are as follows:

items: While you're on the same plane of existence as the Ythryn mythallar, pots, com a acció, cause it to fly in any direction you choose at a speed of 30 feet. All matter within 500 feet of the device moves with it. The Ythryn mythallar and all structures held aloft by it hover in place when not in motion.

Com a acció, you can cause one magic item you are holding within 30 feet of the Ythryn mythallar to immediately regain all its expended charges or uses. A magic item recharged in this manner can't be recharged by the Ythryn mythallar again until after the item regains expended charges or uses on its own.

You can use the Ythryn mythallar to cast the {@spell controlar el temps} spell without requiring any components and without the need for you to be outdoors. This casting of the spell has a 50-mile radius. Durant la duració del conjur's casting time, you must be within 30 feet of the Ythryn mythallar or the spell fails.

entries.name: Touching the Mythallar
entries: Any creature that touches the globe of the mythallar ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 22), taking 180 ({@damage 20d10 + 70}) de dany radiant; si supera, en rep la meitat. Undead have disadvantage on this saving throw. Any object that touches the globe, other than an artifact or the mythallar's cradle, is disintegrated instantly (no save).

item.name: Zabou
entries: Zabou mushrooms feed on offal and the rotting wood of dead trees. If handled carefully, a zabou can be picked or uprooted without causing it to release its spores. If crushed or struck, a zabou releases its spores in a 10-foot-radius sphere. A zabou can also be hurled fins a 30 peus away or dropped like a grenade, releasing its cloud of spores on impact. Any creature in that area ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 10). Si falla, està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. The {@condition emmetzinat} creature's skin itches for the duration. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

item.name: Zircon
entries: A transparent pale blue-green gemstone.

item.name: Zulkoon
entries: A complex pump organ that originated with the zulkirs of Thay, who use it in the casting of their spells. It is considered to have a dramatic, but sinister, sound.

itemGroup.name: Absorbing Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features designs that emphasize one color.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Resistència al Dany
entries: While the tattoo is on your skin, tens resistència al dany a type of associated with that color, as shown on the table below. El/la/li MM chooses the color or determines it randomly.

entries.name: Absorbir Dany
entries: When you take dany del tipus escollit, you can use your reaction to gain immunity against that instance of the damage, and you regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage you would have taken. Once this reaction is used, no es pot tornar a emprar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

itemGroup.name: Flensing Claws
entries: {@creature mind flayer||Illithids} don't always provide their thralls with normal weapons, such as swords and axes. Sometimes they improve the natural capabilities of thralls by giving them new anatomy. Flensing claws take the form of articulated digits that extend into long metal blades. The claws are knitted into the flesh and bones of a creature's arms and can't be removed without surgical amputation.

Each set of flensing claws is designed for a specific creature and can't be used by anyone else. A creature equipped with flensing claws can use its action to make one atac armat cos a cos with the claws. The claws deal slashing damage based on the creature's size. The creature adds its proficiency bonus and Força modifier to any attack roll made with the claws, and its Força modifier to its damage roll when it hits a target with the claws. Tiny and Gargantuan creatures can't be fitted with flensing claws.

itemGroup.reqAttune: by a member of the relevant guild
entries: Associated with a particular guild, a guild keyrune is a ceremonial, stylized key, about 1 foot long, made from carved stone. Not a literal key, the item is a badge of authority that gives its bearer access to privileged places in its guild's headquarters and outposts. At el/la/li MM's discretion, a character might be given a keyrune upon attaining a renown score of 25 in their guild.

itemGroup.name: Imbued Wood Focus
entries: An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this as a spellcasting focus.

When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one damage roll of the spell, provided the damage is of the type associated with the item's wood. The types of wood and their associated damage types are listed in the Imbued Wood Focus table.

itemGroup.name: Orb of Shielding
entries: An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.

If you're holding the orb when you take damage of the type associated with the orb's material, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d4 (to a minimum of 0). The materials and their associated damage types are listed in the Orb of Shielding table.
